item.text: bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba ye shes kyi snying po thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing 'dus pa dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wAnU ga ta sarba kA ya wA k+tsit+ta/ g+hu ya gnya' na gar+b+ha sarba pa ri pU ri twA sa mA dza shwI g+hu ya sa mu dA ya ma hA tan+ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba ye shes kyi snying po thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing 'dus pa/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba/ thams cad ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnam dag gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa mchog gi gnas/ rgya chad phyogs lhung tshad las 'das pa/ rang byung 'od kyi gzhal yas khang na/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu

bzang po/ drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid/ ma bcos spros med byang chub chen po'i ngang nas rang shar nas/ kun bzang yum gyi b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs te/ kun gzhi ye nas dag pa'i yum gyi mkha' las/ skye ba'i cho 'phrul du/ e yaM ra suM keM raM b+h+rUM du shar bas e las kun rtog go 'byed nam mkha' mthing nag tu gsal/ yaM las 'jig rten 'degs byed rlung gi dkyil 'khor ljang gur gsal/ ra las kun skyed rak+ta'i rgya mtsho dmar nag tu gsal/ de las 'dod khams gnas ris nyi shu yongs su rdzogs/ suM las brtan gzhi gser gyi sa rngams ser nag tu gsal/ de las gzugs khams gnas ris bcu bdun yongs su rdzogs par shar/ raM las 'byung ba drod bsnyams bskal pa'i me ri dmar ser du gsal/ keM las rten byed rus pa'i ri rab dkar por gsal// de las gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi yongs su rdzogs par shar/ de lhar 'byung ba lnga brtsegs pa'i steng du/ b+h+rUM las ye shes lnga ldan b+han+d+ha gsar rnying gnam lcags gzer chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud can gcig gi dbus su/ dpal gyi pho brang dgu yongs su rdzogs pa/ dur khrod 'bar ba'i klong/ de la lha brgyad kyi ka ba tshangs pa'i gdung dang bcas pa// klu brgyad kyi ka gdan rgyu skar gyi dral grab can/ nang sgo zang thal ye shes kyi sgo bzhi dang ldan pa ka ba bzhis bdud bzhi bcom pa/ zhi lpags kyi thog/ zhing chen rlon pa'i 'phan gdugs 'phyar ba/ rgyu ma'i lda ldi tsit+ta'i pho lto/ thod pa'i dra ba/ rat+na'i pha gu seg na'i dra phyed brgyan pa/ mAM sa'i ri phung/ rak+ta'i rdzing bu/ rus pa'i gram pa dang ldan pa/ thod pa'i rta babs dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo chu srin gyis brgyan pa// sgo yang sbrul gyi skyes bu/ chu srin gyi ya them/ rus sbal gyi ma them/ zhing chen gyi sgo logs byas pa/ sgo khang rgyan dgus spras pa/ rdo rje'i rwa ba me ri dmar nag gis bskor ba/ theg pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa/ rdo rje'i brag chen la pad+ma dmar po stong ldan du brdal te/ rtsibs stong 'khor lo'i gur phub pa ni rnal 'byor gsum gyi theg mchog yongs su rdzogs pa/ pho brang dbus kyi gdan

yang/ ma chags pad+ma'i gdan steng/ thabs shes rab nyi zla'i khar/ lha brgyad klu brgyad kyi chings su bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su/ mi 'jigs seng ge dang/ dpa' brtul stag dang/ rngam pa gzig dang/ gtum pa dom dang/ stobs ldan glang po che dang/ brjid pa ma he dang/ 'jigs pa chu srin dang/ zhe sdang sbrul dang/ byol song chen po brgyad kyi khri stengs su/ 'khor ba rgyun gcod gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i stengs su/ chos kyi sku las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dpal che mchog he ru ka zhes bya ba/ dus gsum rgyal ba'i sa nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su rdzogs pa'i brdar/ dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bstan pa/ chags pa can gyi 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyir phyag bzhi bcu zhe gnyis na/ zhi ba'i lha bzhi bcu zhe gnyis yab yum thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du bsnams pa/ zhe sdang can gyi 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyir/ dpal gyi chas bcus sku la spras pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rje btsan du gyur pa/ gar dgu'i tshul du bzhugs pa/ yum khro mo gnam zhal ma/ dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad ni/ theg pa dgu dang stong pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs tshul du bzhugs pa/ g.yas pa gtso bo la 'khyud pa/ g.yon dung dmar gtso la stob pa/ thabs shes rab yongs su rdzogs brdar/ yab yum gnyis med du sbyor zhing/ gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa la/ 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngang las yab yum sbyor ba mdzad pa'i byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ sprul sku'i khro bo 'chol pa phyogs bcur 'phros/ lha chen po la sogs dregs pa can thams cad btul tshar bcad de/ phyogs mtshams brgyad du bting ba las/ sprul pa sku'i dkyil 'khor bkod de/ shar du badzra he ru ka thugs las sprul te bzhugs/ lhor gshin rje gshed po sku las sprul te bzhugs/ nub tu rta mgrin dbang chen gsung las sprul te bzhugs/ byang du rdo rje gzhon nu phrin las las sprul te bzhugs/ shar lhor gzi brjid las sprul bla med he ru ka bzhugs/ nub byang du 'jigs byed las sprul dpal dregs pa kun 'dul bzhugs/ byang shar du stobs las sprul pa stobs ldan nag po bzhugs// lho nub tu rigs pa las sprul pa'i sku/ rig 'dzin rdo rje chos bzhugs su gsol// de dag la yang so so'i sprul pa yang sprul sum sprul khro bo dang/ khro mo dang bcas te/ pho brang dgu la gar dgu dang ldan pas khams gsum 'jigs byed dpal gyi chas yongs su rdzogs par yab yum gyi mkha' gsang las sprul te/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor ye shes rang snang gi lha tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'khod do// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang

po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka la/ 'khor rigs bzhi'i he ru ka la sogs pa khro bo dang khro mo rnams dang/ gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje chos kyis phyag dang bskor ba mdzad de/ mgrin gcig tu 'di skad bstod de zhus pa/ e ma ho// chos dbyings spros bral nam mkha'i thugs klong nas// byams pa'i sprin 'phel zhi dang khro gar mdzad// phrin las yongs rdzogs char gyis 'gro ba 'dul// phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas kun gyi yang rje la'o// e ma gsang bdag dpal chen he ru ka/ 'gro ba'i dug gzhom yang dag lam gzud phyir// bde gshegs yongs rdzogs dpal chen thugs gsang ba/ kun 'dus shin tu rnal 'byor rgyud chen stsol// zhes bstod de glus bskul cing gsol ba btab pa las yab kyi dpal chen che mchog he ru kas// rdo rje'i gad rgyangs bsgrags te stsol pa/ kye ho// nyon cig sras mchog rigs 'dus he ru ka/ yab yum 'khor bcas legs par nyon// mun la nyi bzhin dug sel ba// gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud chen bshad// mdor na chos sgo bsam yas kun// 'di ru 'dus phyir dngos po bcu// bstan rim theg pa'i rnam gzhag dang// lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu dang// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa chen po dang// dbang bskur dam tshig mtha' rgyas su// rgyud rnams kun gyi gsang ba 'dus// skal ldan 'khor la yongs rdzogs bstan// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ gnang ba'i skabs phye ba gleng blang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams thams cad mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// dpal chen che mchog he ru ka/ rgyud don bstan pa'i rnam gzhag de// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad ces ni gsol pa dang// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// kye ho 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams rtse gcig nyon// rgyud don bstan pa'i rnam gzhag bshad// thog mar kun gzhi bcos bslad med// cir yang rgya chad phyogs lhung bral// stong khyab nam mkha' lta bu la// rang rtsal 'gyu byed rlung gis g.yos// ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis// nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa bor// rtsal la rang dbang ma thob pas// 'gyus dran zin dang chags dbang gis// khams gsum 'khor cing rgyud drug 'khyams// ma rtogs log par rtogs pa las// rtsal la dbang thob kun bzang gis// grol thabs theg pa sna tshogs bstan// bsdu na theg pa rim dgu ste// nyan thos rang rgyal byang sems gsum// gang zag dbang po dman la dgongs// kri ya yo ga u pa gsum// gang zag dbang po

'bring la dgongs// bskyed dang rdzogs pa a ti gsum// gang zag dbang po rab la dgongs// dbye na dbang po rim dgus ched// re re la yang ngo bo dang// nges tshig dbye ba rang 'dod kyis// 'jug sgo lta spyod sgom pa dang// phrin las 'bras bu'i rim pa bstan// rgyal dgongs theg pa sna tshogs kyang// gong ma gong ma'i lta ba yis// 'og ma 'og ma rnams la gnod// de phyir rim gyis gong ma 'phags// theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// de la 'khor 'das yongs rdzogs pas// mthar thug rnal 'byor nges pa'i don// mngon sum rjes rig tshad du dag/ yi ge gsum gyis mngon sangs rgyas// de phyir yongs rdzogs rgyud chen 'dir// rgyud lung man ngag yongs su rdzogs// thun mong ma yin thugs kyi rgyud// 'di las gsang ba'i nges don med// ces bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ bstan pa'i rim pa theg pa'i rnam gzhag bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ yang dag don ston kun tu bzang// bla med che mchog he ru ka/ rgyud don lta ba'i rgyal po de// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsal zhu// de skad gsol pa thugs dgongs te// ston pa chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rtse gcig nyon// rgyud don lta ba'i rgyal po ni// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid 'di// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ye nas ma bcos chos kyi sku// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// thugs dgongs lta ba mthar thug pa// snang srid gzhir bzhengs lta ba ru// 'khor 'das gnyis med yongs su rdzogs// he ru ka las gzhan ma yin// thig le snying po byang sems brdal// yang dag don gyi gnas lugs te// spros bral thig le gcig tu rdzogs// rang byung rang shar rang grol bas// rang bzhin ma bcos spros bral bzhag/ khyung chen nam mkhar lding ba bzhin// snang srid spyi rgya rlabs kyis chod// sems las kun 'byung bde gshegs sems// rang las sangs rgyas gzhan na med// bltas pas dpal chen zhal ma mthong// tshig mtshon dper bya kun las 'das// brjod dang brjod bral gnyis su med// blta bya ma 'gags lta byed med// gnyis med don rtogs chos kyi sku// rang rig sems la sems kyis ltos// ngos bzung ma grub ngo bos stong// stong pa nyid de rang gsal la// gsal ba'i dus na dngos po med// dngos med de nyid gsal bar shar// de phyir gsal stong gnyis su med// sa le hrig ge 'dzin zhen med// de la

dgongs pa yongs rdzogs te// kun gyis ma rtogs gsang ba dag/ rang la 'dus phyir gsang ba 'dus// theg pa kun gyi rgyal po yin// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ rang bzhin ma bcos kun tu bzang// 'gyur med che mchog he ru ka/ rgyud don bsgom pa'i rgyal po de// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsal zhu// de skad gsol pa thugs dgongs te// ston pa chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rtse gcig nyon// rgyud don bsgom pa'i rgyal po ni// mi bsgom bsgom don de shes nas// sgo gsum ma bcos sor 'jog pa// bde gshegs yongs rdzogs bsgom pa yin// gdod nas chos sku rang gi sems// lta bas stong gsal dbyer med rtogs// gdeng 'og chud nas rgyun du gsal// de ni dpal chen bsgom pa yin// gyabs kyis chod pa'i lta ba yis// snang srid dpal chen sku ru bsgom// gsal stong gnyis med bsgom pa'i mchog/ sgra ru grag tshad ngo bos stong// grag stong gnyis med bsgom pa'i mchog/ yin ni 'gyu+u dran ngo bos stong// dran stong gnyis med bsgom pa'i mchog/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med cing// thabs shes gnyis med bsgom pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med cing// 'khor 'das gnyis med bsgom pa'i mchog/ yul dang dbang po gnyis med cing// bde sdug gnyis med bsgom pa'i mchog/ rang rig dpal dang gnyis med cing// lta spyod gnyis med bsgom pa'i mchog/ rnam rtog chos sku gnyis med cing// mtshan ma zil gnon bsgom pa'i mchog/ gnyis med don la dbang thob na// ting 'dzin yongs rdzogs bsgom pa yin// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ rang byung rig pa kun tu bzang// bde spyod che mchog he ru ka/ rgyud don spyod pa'i rgyal po ni// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsal zhu// de skad gsol pa thugs dgongs te// ston pa chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rtse gcig nyon// rgyud don spyod pa'i rgyal po ni// gang ltar lta sgom dbyer med pa'i// ngang las 'bral med spyod pa'i mchog/ nyin snang rtogs pa'i don bstan nas// rmi lam bde ba spyod pa'i mchog/ rigs pa gar 'gyus lta ba dran// rang snang 'dzin med spyod pa'i mchog/ 'dzin pa grol bas snang ba dag/ snang ba

yan thub spyod pa'i mchog/ tshogs drug yul zhen rtsad chod nas// 'khor ba rgyas thebs spyod pa'i mchog/ nyams len goms pas rnam rtogs yal// dus bzhi mnyam sbyor spyod pa'i mchog/ mnyam rjes rtog langs dus gsum du// chos skur grol ba spyod pa'i mchog/ 'khor 'das spang blang rang grol nas// dus gsum bde gshegs spyod pa'i mchog/ snang grag dran rtog thams cad kun// dpal chen sku gsung thugs spyod pa// rgyal pa yongs rdzogs spyod pa yin// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// dpal kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa// kye kye kye/ sku gsum yongs rdzogs kun tu bzang// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka/ rgyud don 'bras bu'i rgyal po de// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsal zhu// de skad gsol pa thugs dgongs te// ston pa chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams rtse gcig nyon// rgyud don 'bras bu'i rgyal po ni// lta ba mngon gyur sgrib g.yogs bral// kun bzang rgyal po'i 'bras bu yin// smin grol mthar phyir mi bzlog/ dus gsum bde gshegs 'bras bu yin// sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa// lta ba yongs rdzogs 'bras bu yin// yongs su rdzogs don de spros dang bral// skye med chos sku'i 'bras bu yin// thugs rje 'gag med zhi khror shar// bde chen longs sku'i 'bras bu yin// gnyis med ngang nas cir yang sprul// 'gro 'dul sprul sku'i 'bras bu yin// rtogs na bcos med snying po'i don// ye nas rang snang 'bras bu yin// snang dang mi snang gnyis su med// tha dad dbyer med 'bras bu yin// bcos dang ma bcos gnyis su med// tha dad dbyer med 'bras bu yin// lta sgom spyod 'bras gnyis su med// tha dad dbyer med 'bras bu yin// phyogs lhung ma lhung gnyis su med// tha dad dbyer med 'bras bu yin// rgya chad ma chad gnyis su med// tha dad dbyer med 'bras bu yin// dbu ma mtha' ma gnyis su med// tha dad dbyer med 'bras bu yin// rang byung gzhan byung gnyis su med// tha dad dbyer med 'bras bu yin// 'khor dang myang 'das gnyis su med// tha dad dbyer med 'bras bu yin// mthar phyin sku dang ye shes tshogs// thams cad yongs rdzogs 'khrul pa med// he ru ka yi 'bras bu yin// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ dkyil 'khor bdag nyid kun tu

bzang// lhag pa'i lha mchog he ru ka/ rgyud don yongs rdzogs lha bsnyen sgrub// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsal zhu// de skad gsol pa thugs dgongs te// ston pa chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams rtse gcig nyon// zhi khro yongs rdzogs bsnyen sgrub ni// gzhal yas khang rten sku gsung thugs yongs rdzogs// thogs mtha' spros bcad bsgrub lugs mos blor sbyang// chos sku skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin las// longs sku skye ba'i cho 'phrul gzhal yas lha// zhi khro bde gshegs sprul sku bsam mi khyab// bde gshegs mkhar mnyam yongs rdzogs rtsa ba'i lha// bcom ldan dpal chen spyi mes gtsug gi rgyan// thabs shes zung 'jug sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor bas// sbyang gzhi sbyong byed bde chen g.yung drung lha// rigs brgya zhe gnyis lnga gsum yongs rdzogs sku// chags can 'dul phyir thabs gsang rang byung ba// 'byung bzhi dbang chen gzhal yas 'khyil ba'i dbus// rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi pa// gru chad glo 'bur bar khyams rim par brtsegs// sgo khyud ka brgyad rta babs rgyan sogs mdzes// a dkar gsal 'tsher zhi ba'i rten mthar thug/ seng ge glang chen rta dang rma bya khyung// rin chen khri rkang pad sdong bar du 'khyil// pad+ma zla ba nyi ma'i gdan steng gsal// mi bskyod mthing ga rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// snang mdzad dkarapo 'khor lo dril bu 'dzin// rin 'byung ser po nor bu dril bu 'dzin// mtha' yas dmar po pad+ma dril bu 'dzin// don grub ljang gu rgya gram dril bu 'dzin// kun kyang rdzogs skyil gnyis med yum chen ni// bzang mo spyan dang mA ma gos dkar sgrol// g.yas pa rigs 'dzin g.yon dril yab la 'khyud// kun bzang yid mthing rdo rje dril bu bsnams// bzang mo chos mthing mnyam gzhag phyag rgya gsal// sprul 'khor sa snying nam mkha'i snying po dang// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag na rdo rje ming// lA s+ye mA le gIrti nirti sring// kun bzang byams pa sgrib sel 'jam dbyangs ming// me tog bdud spros mar me dri chab sring// lha dbang thags bzang shakA thub ser rab brtan// kha 'bar chos rgyal la sogs thub pa drug/ gshin rje stobs chen rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil// ro langs mi 'pham ral gcig khro gnyer yum// 'khor rnams nyi ma'i zer ltar rang bzhin 'du// rin chen rgyan rdzogs tshul dgu'i gar ldan mdzes// de las spro bsdu cho 'phrul cir yang bde/ bde chen longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal// bsam gyis mi khyab bder 'dus rigs brgya yongs// rtsa ba lngar rdzogs de nyid kun rdzogs pa// gcig dang tha dad stong nyid snying rje bstan// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' shel gyi mdog/ rgyal ba'i spyi gzugs zhal

gcig phyag gnyis pa// phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga thugs kar bsnams// g.yon pas dngul dkar dril bu dku la brten// zhabs gnyis skyil krung nyi zla pad dkyil bzhugs// zhi tshul rgyan chas 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar// dung khang 'khor lo ljags pad thugs rdo rje// oM dkar AHdmar hUM mthing 'phro 'dur bzlas// gyen du bde gshegs sku gsung thugs mchod bskul// thur du snod bcud lus ngag yid sgrib sbyang// tshur 'dus sku gsung thugs bcud dngos grub bsdu// rang sems rnam dag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// sku gsung thugs su bde bar gshegs par bstan// rgyud lung man ngag yongs rdzogs sgo nas bsgrub// dgra gsum bdud bzhi 'gro drug g.yang sa bcad// sum cu phrag drug gis 'grub las rnams 'grub// sku dang ye shes yongs rdzogs lhun gyis grub// rang bzhin zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam bkod la// bde gshegs rgyal ba yongs gyis dbu rgyan no// de ltar phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba yongs rdzogs rnams// gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo rol par bstan// rab tu gdul dka' khro zhing gtum pa la// zhi des lcug pas phan par mi 'gyur phyir// zhi tshogs dbu yi gtsug tu rab bsdus nas// bcom ldan de gshegs rgyal ba yongs rdzogs pa// rab 'jigs khro bo rol pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan// stong gsal rgyu las rang byung gzhal yas ni// chos dbyings mi 'gyur mthing nag gru gsum e// stobs chen g.yo byed ljang nag kha gdengs yaM// thugs rje'i rlan gyis kun sdud dmar nag ra// rab brtan kun shong bcu gsum rdzogs byed suM// 'od gsal smin byed dngos 'joms dmar ser raM// rdo rje sra mkhregs rus pa'i ri rab stengs// phyi dang nang gsal rin chen yongs rdzogs b+h+rUM// gzhal yas bkod pa tshad med rnam dag dbus// theg pa dgu rdzogs dpal chen dkyil 'khor dgu// 'khor 'das dbyer med ye shes sgo dgur gsal// ye shes lnga rdzogs rtsibs bzhi lte bar bcas// thugs rje'i zer ldan spros bral mu khyud mdzes// yon tan ma bkag rin chen zur brgyad ldan// mtshan nyid bzhi rdzogs gru chad rnam bzhis spras// de bzhin pho brang dgu la phrin las rdzogs// bdud 'joms ka bzhi chu srin gdan stengs btsugs// thabs shes nyi zla'i ka zhus zhing gdung btegs// thugs rjes gdal khyab rU tra'i lpags thog phub// sku gsum lhun grub thod tshar sum brtsegs la// gnam lcags rig rtsal gzer gyis rab tu bsdams// ye shes bzhi ldan zang thal nang sgo bzhi// ye shes zer lngas gling dgu'i bar mtshams bres// chags pa'i thugs rjes rak+ta'i zham chu 'bab// snying po'i don rtogs tsit+ta'i pho ltos brgyan// chos sku mnyam rdzogs bar khyams 'khor yug

brdal// dgos 'dod re skong rin chen sna lngas brtsigs// tshad med bzhi ldan sgo bzhi phyogs bzhir bgrad// rnam thar brgyad kyi them skas rim par brtan// thugs rjes 'dzin phyir chu srin ya them mdzes// 'byung po sri 'dul ma them rus sbal brjid// gdug pa tshar gcod sbrul nag skyes bu btsugs// 'khor ba rgyun gcod zhing lpags sgo logs bcad// chos kyi gaN+DI cong dang dril bu bsgrags// yul brgyad 'dzin bcom klu brgyad ka gdan stengs// tshogs brgyad rang dag lha brgyad ka bar btsugs// thabs shes brgyad ldan gza' brgyad ka zhur bskal// bcu drug rol pa'i zhing smug gdung chen bkram// 'gyu byed rang 'grol kun grol rgyu skar dral grab bkram// bzang ngan med mnyam zhing chen lpags thog bkram// ma rig mun sel nyi zla'i skar khung mdzes// 'khor 'das spyi chings chos sku'i bre bum pa// skyon gyis ma gos bum stan pad+mar gsal// sa lam yongs rdzogs 'khor 'degs 'khor lo brtsegs// kun khyab theg pa'i yongs rtser gdugs tog rngam// bstan pa'i spyi phud bya ru dar dpyangs brgyan// phrin las bzhi rdzogs rat+na'i rta babs brtsegs// chags bral pad stengs chos 'khor rab tu mdzes// rgya chad phyos su+u ma lhung zhing gdugs phub// rang byung mi nub mi mgo'i rin chen tog/ rig stong dbyer med ri dwags chu srin mdzes// dbyings rig yongs 'brel sprin nag grib so gtibs// dbyings las rtsal shar sgo khang rgyan dgus mdzes// 'dod yon zhen med spyod phyir 'dod khyams bskor// dbyings nas kun snang mu tig thod ras spras// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs shel gyi mchod rten dkrigs// sna tshogs 'od gsal mchog phran da ru ka/ ma rig sgrib sel bcu gcig rdo rje gseng// thabs kyis sgrib sel zla phyed rdo rjes brgyan// bdud 'joms zhing drang lha chen rgyal mtshan brgyad// 'khor ba'i g.yul rgyal zhing chen 'phan brgyad phyar// don rtags brgyad ldan dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor// tshul bcu'i mtha' grol he ru'i gnas bcus gtams// khams gsum zil gnon rgya gram rwa bzhis mnan// ma chags phrin las kun khyab pad stong brdal// sangs rgyas stong rdzogs 'khor lo rtsibs stong phub// gsang sngags snying po 'gyur med brag ris gtams// gnyen pos mi shigs rdo rje'i ra bas bskor// gzung 'dzin nags sreg ye shes me lnga 'bar// byol song dregs pa nyi zla pad gdan brjid// dgos 'dod kun 'byung gter bum dpag bsam rgyas// snang srid yongs rdzogs gzhal yas khang chen gsal// phyi nang 'khor lo rin chen gsang ba e// zhi khro'i rgyan sogs dbye'am yongs rdzogs pa// gang la gang 'dul dkyil 'khor 'phrul shes bya// gzhal

yas de dag rnal 'byor rang lus la// yongs rdzogs sgrub rten mchod rdzas dur khrod rdzogs// de yang rang rig sems kyi dkyil 'khor du// yongs rdzogs thig le nyag gcig ngo mtshar te// rgya chad phyogs lhung kun bral gzhal mtha' yas// dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs kun gyi mthar thug yin// sgrub rdzas rten gyi rim pa mchod bcas ni// sku gsung thugs yon phrin las dmigs pa'i rten// sku rten gzugs la gsung rten snying po dgod// yon tan bdud rtsi phrin las phur pa bsham// sgos rten zhi ba mthar thug a dkar la// che mchog yongs rdzogs sgrub rten bum mthar thug/ de bzhin yang dag me gcig gshin rje phram// pad+ma rta thod rta zhal phrin phur gcig/ ma mo nal snying rig 'dzin sku gcig ma// dregs pa sku gcig drag sngags byang gcig ste// rten rnams yongs rdzogs sgrub rdzas rang lus yin// rig pa'i sems nyid sgrub rten kun mthar thug/ 'dod yon rdzas 'jom phyi yi mchod pas te// rang lus rang byung bdud rtsi nang mchod rdzas// rtog tshogs rang byung rang grol gsang mchod de// yid chos dbyer med ngang dwangs mchod mthar thug/ dkyil 'khor lte dbus zla kham e yi dkyil// chos dbyings a las rang byung lhun grub lha// kun bzang che mchog khro rgyal he ru ka/ mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing bzhad gshe rngam// g.yas gsum rtse dgu rtse lnga rtse gsum bsnams// g.yon gsum b+han+da dung dmar thod khrag bsnams// rdo rje'i gsheg g.yas rin chen gshog g.yon gdengs// sku gsung thugs ldan srog gi ye shes gsal// dpal gyi chas bcu dur khrod rgyan yongs spras// zhabs bzhi dor stabs g.yas brkyangs g.yon bskums tshul// gnam zhal yum chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing// phyag g.yas rtse gsum gtsor khyud g.yon dmar stob// zhabs g.yas yab 'khril g.yon brkyang gtso la sbyor// rigs lngas dbu rgyan dur khrod rgyan drug gsol// gnyis med rab 'jigs me dpung klong na brjid// brdas bskul mkha' gsang rab sbyor sprul sras 'gyed// shar gyi rtsibs stengs rak+sha he ru ka/ smug nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'khor lo g.yas// g.yon pa thod khrag zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum 'gyings// rak+Sha kro tI shwa rI cha lugs yab 'dra 'khril// lho rtsibs g+hu ya he ru ka ser nag/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis rin chen thod khrag bsnams// g+hu ya kro tI shwa rI yab 'dra 'khril// nub rtsibs bi shwa he ru ka dmar nag/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pad+ma thod khrag bsnams// bi shwa kro d+hI shwa rI yab 'dra 'khril// byang rtsibs yak+Sha he ru ka ljang nag/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgya gram thod

khrag thogs// yak+Sha kro d+hI shwa rI yab 'dra 'khril// dur khrod chas gsol brda rtags gtso dang 'dra// nyi dang zer bzhin sprul pa'i 'khor tshogs ni// phyogs skyong dregs 'dul khro bo chen po bcu// ta kr-ita sgo skyong pho nya bstan srung bcas// che mchog yon tan yongs rdzogs rang byung shar// phyogs mtshams pho brang brgyad du thugs kyi sras// dkyil 'khor shar dbus zla kham e yi dkyil// ru dra nyi zla pad+ma 'od 'bar steng// bcom ldan thugs mchog badzra he ru ka/ mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing bzhad rngam gshe// g.yas gsum rdo rje kha T+wAM rnge chung bsnams// g.yon gsum dril bu b+han dmar rgyu zhags bsnams// gshog gnyis zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums dor stabs tshul// sku gsung thugs srog dur khrod chas rnams rdzogs// kro d+hI shwa rI yum chen sku la 'khril// phyag zhabs chas sogs brdas bskul gtso dang 'dra// shar gyi rtsibs stengs bud+d+ha he ru ka/ smug nag g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon rgyu zhags/ bud+d+ha kro d+hI g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// lho yi rtsibs steng rat+na he ru ka/ ser nag g.yas g.yon rat+na stong gsum bsnams// rat+na kro tI g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// nub tu rtsibs steng pad+ma he hu ka/ dmar nag g.yas pa pad+ma ti ra bsnams// pad+ma kro d+hI g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// byang gi rtsibs stengs karma he ru ka/ ljang nag g.yas g.yon rgya gram ri rab bsnams// karma kro d+hI g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// sprul 'khor kau ri ma brgyad sid+ha brgyad// sgo skyong bka' srung yang dag thugs rdzogs shar// dkyil 'khor lho dbus zla kham e yi dkyil// chu glang nyi zla pad+ma 'od 'bar steng// bcom ldan sku mchog 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing bzhad gshe rngam// g.yas gsum 'khor lo ral gri dgra s+t+wa bsnams// g.yon gsum sdig mdzub mdung dang b+han dmar bsnams// gshog gnyis zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums dor stabs bgrad// sku gsung thugs srog dur khrod chas rnams rdzogs// sbyor yum be tA lI ni sku la 'khril// sgrol yum tsa tI tri shUl b+han dmar bsnams// phyag zhabs chas rdzogs brdas bskul gtso dang 'dra// shar rtsibs gsod byed ya ma rA dza mthing// g.yas pa 'khor lo g.yon pa dgra s+t+wa bsnams// nag mo ral gcig g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// lho rtsibs myos byed 'bar ba ser nag la// g.yas pa be con g.yon pa dgra s+t+wa bsnams// gtum mo dug hrul g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// nub rtsibs Ar+ya me ru tse dmar po// g.yas pa dung khrag g.yon pa dbyug to bsnams// 'od

zer can ma g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob/ byang rtsibs ral pa tshar dgu ljang nag la// g.yas pa gtun shing g.yon pa dung dmar bsnams// nag mo re ti g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// sprul 'khor phyogs skyong chen po bcu gnyis dang// sgo skyong bka' srung 'jam dpal sku rdzogs shar// dkyil 'khor nub dbus zla gam e yi dkyil// klu brgyad nyi zla pad+ma 'od 'bar steng// bcom ldan gsung mchog pad+ma dbang chen sku// dmar nag zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar bzhad gshe rngam// g.yas gsum rdo rje kha T+wAM sbrul zhags bsnams// g.yon gsum dril chen b+han dmar lcags sgrog bsnams// gshog gnyis zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums dor stabs tshul// sku gsung thugs srog dur khrod chas kun rdzogs// pad+ma gzi ldan bde chen yum mchog 'khril// phyag zhabs chas rdzogs brdas bskul gtso dang 'dra// shar rtsibs steng du rdo rje dbang chen dkar// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa thod khrag bsnams// rdo rje dbang phyug g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// lho rtsibs steng du rin chen dbang chen ser// g.yas pa rin chen g.yon pa thod khrag bsnams// rat+na dbang phyug g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// nub rtsibs steng du pad+ma dbang chen dmar// g.yas pa pad dkar g.yon pa thod khrag bsnams// pad+ma dbang phyug g.yas 'khyud g.yon khrag stob// byang rtsibs steng du karma dbang chen ljang// g.yas pa rgya gram g.yon pa thod khrag bsnams// karma dbang phyug g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// sprul 'khor zil gnon khro bo yab yum brgyad// sgo skyong bka' srung pad+ma gsung rdzogs shar// dkyil 'khor byang dbus zla gam e yi dbus// lha chen nyi zla pad+ma 'od 'bar stengs// bcom ldan las mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing bzhad gshe rngam// g.yas g.yon dang po rtse dgu me dpung bsnams// bar gnyis rtse lnga kha T+wAM mthar phur 'dril// gshog gnyis zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums dor stabs tshul// sku gsung thugs srog dur khrod chas rnams rdzogs// 'khor lo rgyab 'debs yum chen sku la 'khril// phyag zhabs chas sogs brdas bskul gtso dang 'dra// shar rtsibs sras mchog bud+d+ha kI la dkar// g.yas pa phur pa g.yon pa thod khrag bsnams// yum gcig sangs rgyas g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// lho rtsibs sras mchog rat+na kI la ser// g.yas pa dgra s+t+wa g.yon pa thod khrag bsnams// yum chen rin chen g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// nub rtsibs sras mchog pad+ma kI la dmar// g.yas pa gri gug g.yon pa thod khrag

bsnams// yum gcig pad+ma g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// byang rtsibs sras mchog karma kI la ljang// g.yas pa mdung thung g.yon pa thod khrag bsnams// yum gcig las byed g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// sprul 'khor khro bcu yab yum za gsod bcas// sgo skyong bka' srung phrin las phur tshogs shar// shar lho'i dkyil 'khor zla gam e dbus su// ma mo nyi zla pad+ma 'od 'bar steng// dpal chen bla med gsang ba mngon rdzogs sku// mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing brjid dang ldan// g.yas gsum rdo rje khyung khra sbrul zhags bsnams// g.yon gsum b+han dmar zhing dbyug dung chen bsnams// kun bzang nyid bzhi bde mchog sku la 'khril// g.yas pa dril bu gtso 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// yab yum sku la dur khrod chas rnams rdzogs// 'khor lo'i rtsibs shar rnam snang gsal dkar mo// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje thod khrag bsnams// 'khor lo'i lho rtsibs 'od gsal 'bar ser mo// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rin chen thod khrag bsnams// 'khor lo'i nub rtsibs gnyan gsal 'bar dmar mo// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pad+ma thod khrag bsnams// 'khor lo'i byang rtsibs yang gsal g.yas sngon mo// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgya gram thod khrag bsnams// dpal chen mdun zur bkrag gsal mnyam mthing nag/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'khor lo thod khrag bsnams// sprul 'khor rje mo sman mo bdun chu gnyis// sgo skyong bka' srung rbod gtong yongs rdzogs shar// lho nub dkyil 'khor zla gam e yi dbus// seng chen dar gyi pho long pad brtsegs steng// dpal chen rdo rje thod pa rtsal mchog sku// zhal phyag sku mdog phyag mtshan sna tshogs kyang// mi rnams 'dul phyir zhal gcig phyag gnyis gsal// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa dril bu 'khrol// gnyis med yum chen rdo rje rnal 'byor 'khril// yab yum sku+u la rin chen rus pas brgyan// dbang gi thor tshugs ldem pa dar dmar bcings// 'khor lo'i rtsibs shar lhun grub rig 'dzin dkar// rtsibs lhor phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin ser// nub rtsibs tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin dmar// byang rtsibs rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin ljang// kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis thor tshugs can// rin chen rus pa dar sna'i rgyan gyis spras// sprul 'khor grub pa'i rig 'dzin chen po brgyad// sgo skyong bka' srung rig 'dzin yongs rdzogs shar// nub byang dkyil 'khor zla gam e'i dbus su// lha chen nyi zla pad+ma 'od 'bar steng// dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul 'jigs byed sku// mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir

bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing rngam la 'jigs// g.yas gsum rdo rje lha brgyad mgo bo 'dzin// g.yon gsum b+han dmar klu brgyad mgo bo bsnams// srid pa spyi 'dul sku la dgyes par 'khril// 'khor rtsibs shar du ya ma rA dza nag/ g.yas pa be con g.yon pa thod dbyug bsnams// sgrol byed yum nag 'khor lo thod khrag stob// 'khor rtsibs lho ru skos rje drang dkar nag/ g.yas pa khram shing g.yon pa thod khrag bsnams// nag mo re ti khram shing nad rkyal thogs// 'khor rtsibs nub tu srin po glog phreng nag/ g.yas pa glog phreng g.yon pa ser ba thogs// sbal mgo khrag mig phur pa mi mgo 'dzin// 'khor rtsibs byang du gnod sbyin me dpal nag/ g.yas pa rin chen g.yon pa zangs gri bsnams// gnod sbyin sngon mo spu gri g.yu sbyang thogs// sprul 'khor sde dpon nyi shu rab 'jigs bskor// yang sbrul mgo skyong 'jig rten dregs tshogs shar// byang shar dkyil 'khor zla gam e yi dbus// dgra bgegs nyi zla pad+ma 'bar ba'i steng// dpal chen drag po stobs ldan nag po'i sku// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi dor stabs bgrad// dbu gsum mthing nag nag dang nag 'tsher khros// g.yas gsum rdo rje lha brgyad tsit+ta bsnams// g.yon gsum thod khrag klu brgyad tsit+ta 'dzin// 'byung lnga'i bdag mo gzugs 'degs 'dod khams gnon// rtsibs shar gshin rje 'chi bdag nag po'i sku// g.yas pa gri gug g.yon pa thod khrag bsnams// gsod byed nag mo zangs gri tsit+ta 'dzin// rtsibs lhor bdud nag me yi kha rlangs can// g.yas pa kha T+wAM g.yon pa tri shUl thogs// bdud ma nag mo khram shing thod rlon 'dzin// nub rtsibs srin po gsod byed 'bar ba smug/ g.yas pa ral gri g.yon pa thod khrag thogs// za byed nag mo gri gug thod khrag thogs// byang rtsibs gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po sngo// g.yas pa ral gri g.yon pa dar nag 'phyar// sha za sngon mo dar nag mi lpags thogs// sprul 'khor sde dpon 'jigs byed bcu yis bskor// sngags bdag dregs pa yongs rdzogs drag po shar// kun kyang khro rngam sgeg pa dpa' la 'jigs// snying rje'i spyan ldan gar dgu'i chas rdzogs gsal// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi khyams 'khor yug tu// sprul 'khor yang sprul bka' nyan pho nya ste// sprul 'khor gong smos sras min bde brjod rnams// mngon spyod las kyis gdul dka'i 'gro 'dul phyir// sku mdog sna tshogs gdab phur brgya rtsar gsal// mkha' 'gro ging gtso bzhi bzhi ma sring shar// sgo bzhi skyong mdzad khro rgyal yab yum brgyad// ya mAn+ta kr-ita dkar po thod dbyug lcags kyu thogs// pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-ita ser po rtse gsum zhags pa thogs// pad+mAn+ta (2)

kr-ita dmar po thod sbrul lcags sgrog thogs// big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita ljang gu rgya gram dril bu thogs// rta gdong dkar mo phag nag spre'u dmar spyong gdong ljang// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril 'khrol ma// sdigs mdzub sgo 'dab g.yas g.yon nang ngos shar// phyi rim lcags ri'i skor du dbang phyug ma// nyer brgyad DA ki sum cu rtsa gnyis dang// ging chen bco brgyad lang+ka brtan ma dang// pho nya drug cu rtsa bzhi sprin ltar bskor// snang srid yongs rdzogs lhar gsal rnam par dag/ chos sku'i rang rtsal zhi dang khro gar bsgyur// zhi lha bsam yas dam pa rigs brgyar 'dus// de nyid bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lha la thug/ de dag rgyal ba sku lngar yongs rdzogs shing// de yang gsang chen yin nam gsum gcig rdo rje sems dpar thug/ de bzhin bde gshegs yongs rdzogs sku bsgrub mtha'// bsam 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed la thug/ gsung bsgrub lha mtha' rta mgrin dbang chen la// thugs bsgrub lha rnams badzra he ru'i sku// yon tan lha tshogs che mchog nyid la thug/ phrin las lha tshogs rdo rje gzhon nu nyid// rbod gtong bsgrub mtha' bla med he rur thug/ rig 'dzin bsgrub mtha' rdo rje thod pa rtsal// 'jig rten bsgrub mtha' dregs pa kun 'dul te// drag sngags bsgrub mtha' stobs ldan nyid la thug/ thams cad yongs rdzogs tshom dgur bde gshegs 'dus// dril bsgrub khro rgyal kun gyi thug mtha' yin// sku yi rang bzhin shes na yang dag sku// sku yi rnam bkod de nyid rab bstan nas// gsang ba sngags kyi de nyid bstan par bya// bde gshegs yongs rdzogs rnam dag cho 'phrul ni// thabs shes ma 'gags rang byung yi ger grags/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+hA ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+ShaH/ gsal byed thabs kyi yi ge yab tu shar/ a A/ i I// u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ aM aH/ shes rab dbyings kyi yi ge yum du shar// thabs shes yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mthus// sngags kyi sgra skad ma 'gags sna tshogs sgrogs// chos sgras 'jig rten yongs khyab ngo mtshar che// thabs kyi rdo rje gsal byed shes rab pad+mar sbyar// zung 'jug sbyor mtshams nas byung sngags them ni// sngags rnams dang po dbyangs kyi 'bru dang bgo/ shes rab bcu gsum steng bzhag bco lnga'i mgo bos brgyan// ye shes lnga ldan kun dbur drang bya oM// gsal byed gsum gsum dbyangs yig drug mjug 'thud// shes rab bco lnga'i mgo steng brgyan pa hUM// thabs yig so gnyis nyer dgu phyed brgyan swA// shes rab gnyis pa'i A dang thabs kyi so gsum pa// mjug la shes rab dang 'og btags pa hA// zhi ba yongs rdzogs rigs lnga'i yang

snying yin// oM AHhUM swA hA/ oM dang hA yig thog mtha' bar bcu drug/ dam pa rigs brgya 'dus pa'i yang snying yin/ oM A li kA li dz+nyA na pany+tsa satwa kro d+ha mu na ye swA hA/ oM dang hA yi bar na bcu gnyis pa/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis zhi ba'i snying po yin/ oM bod+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha dz+nyA na d+hA tu a/ oM dang hUM bar rang byung 'bru gcig AHgnas pa/ oM AHhUM sangs rgyas kun 'dus rigs gcig yang snying yin// de bzhin hUM ni bde gshegs kun 'dus yang snying mtha'// oM phaT bar na yi ge bcu gnas pa// oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT// che mchog yon tan yongs rdzogs snying po yin// oM phaT bar na yi ge bdun gnas pa// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ yang dag thugs mchog yongs rdzogs snying po yin// oM phaT bar na yi ge bco lnga pa// oM A kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ gshin rje gshed po yongs rdzogs snying po yin// oM phaT bar na yi ge bcu bdun pa// oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita ma hA kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ pad+ma dbang chen yongs rdzogs snying po yin// oM phaT bar na yi ge bcu gnyis pa// oM badzra kI li kI la/ sarba big+hAM baM hUM phaT/ phur pa 'phrin las yongs rdzogs snying po yin// oM phaT bar na yi ge rtsa dgu pa// oM gu h+ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka/ gu h+ya dz+nyA na kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ ma ma yo gi nI ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ rbod gtong ma mo yongs rdzogs snying po yin// oM phaT bar na yi ge brgyad gnas pa// oM badzra ma hA gu ru sarba hUM phaT/ rig 'dzin slob dpon yongs rdzogs snying po yin// oM phaT bar na yi ge brgyad gnas pa// oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ 'jig rten mchod bstod yongs rdzogs snying po yin// oM phaT bar na yi ge drug gnas pa// oM badzra sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ dmod pa drag sngags yongs rdzogs snying po yin// thabs shes 'od zer sras kyi dgos sngags ni// oM shrI ma hA rak+sha he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM rak+sha kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM shrI ma hA gu h+ya he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM gu h+ya kro d+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM shrI ma hA bi shwa he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM bi shwa kro d+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM ma hA yak+Sha he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM yak+Sha kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ che mchog sras bzhi he ru ka yab yum gyi snying po'o// oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM bud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa rI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM rat+na shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM karma shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM karma kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ badzra he ru ka'i sras bzhi rigs bzhi he ru ka yab yum gyi snying po'o// oM ya ma rA dza pre ta tho li hUM phaT/ oM rak+mo rak+mo snying rtsa la sha ma b+h+yo// oM ya ma rA dza pre ta bi di marda ka hUM phaT/ oM rak+mo rak+mo khrag la mu sha ma b+h+yo/ oM ya ma rA dza pre ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ oM rak+mo ting la ma ma b+h+yo/ oM ya ma rA dza kA

la k+She pre tod ka Ta hUM phaT/ oM rak+mo rak+mo ting ka la ma b+h+yo// gshin rje gshed sras rigs bzhi'i yab yum gyi snying po yin no// oM pad+ma kro d+ha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzre shwa rI kro d+hi hUM phaT/ oM rat+ne pad+ma kro d+ha da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM rat+na shwa rI kro d+hI hUM/ oM pad+ma kro d+ha pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM pad+me kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM karma pad+ma kro d+ha ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ oM karma shwa rI hUM phaT/ pad+ma dbang chen sras rigs bzhi yab yum gyi snying po'o// oM bud+d+ha kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM bud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa rI hUM/ oM rat+na kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI hUM/ oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI hUM/ oM karma kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM karma kro d+hI shwa rI hUM/ rdo rje gzhon nu sras bzhi yab yum gyi snying po'o// oM g+h+ri sa mu hUM swA hA/ oM dz+wa la raM pa ha/ oM b+hi sha san+d+hi ha// oM b+hi ra yaM laM te ha/ oM ma hA laM te ha/ bla med he ru ka'i yum rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga'i snying po'o// oM bud+d+ha gu ru ma hA hUM/ oM rat+na gu ru ma hA hUM/ oM pad+ma gu ru ma hA hUM/ oM karma gu ru ma hA hUM/ rig 'dzin bzhi'i snying po'o// ya ma rA dza b+h+yo/ ya ma dan ti ya dza b+h+yo/ du phrag du dza b+h+yo/ dun ting du dza b+h+yo/ rak+Sha ra dza b+h+yo/ rak+mo ra dza b+h+yo/ yak+Sha k+Sha dza b+h+yo/ yak+mo k+Sha dza b+h+yo/ dregs pa kun 'dul sras pho nya yab yum gyi snying po'o// ya ma rA dza tsit+ta hriM hriM b+h+yo/ rak+Sha ra tsit+ta hriM hriM b+h+yo/ rak+mo ra tsit+ta hriM hriM dza b+h+yo/ yak+Sha k+Sha tsit+ta hriM hriM dza b+h+yo/ yak+mo k+Sha tsit+ta dza b+h+yo ma ma ru lu tsit+ta hriM hriM dza b+h+yo/ du phrag du tsit+ta hriM hriM dza b+h+yo/ dun ting du tsit+ta hriM hriM b+h+yo/ stobs ldan nag po sras sngags bdag rigs bzhi'i snying po'o// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni/ ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ gshin rje yongs rdzogs kyi drag sngags so// oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita/ ha ya grI wa/ ma hA kro d+ha/ e ka dza TI/ sa ma ya ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ a ra li dza/ kro d+ha bra be sha tshal pa tshal pa/ dum bu dum bu hUM phaT/ pad+ma dbang chen yongs rdzogs kyi snying po'o// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM A hUM ha he hUM phaT/ hUM ni ma tsit+ta/ rdul phran rdul phran/ keM keM rak+ta/ ma ru tse snying la shad shad/ tsin d+ha ma rus la keM keM/ ru ti sha rbad/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ dbugs la 'ub 'ub/ a hUM ma ma b+h+yo dza/ ru lu ru lu rak+mo b+h+yo dza dza/ yang dag yongs rdzogs drag sngags so// oM shrI ma hA sa ma ya/ badzra yak+Sha he ha hUM/ oM bi shwa kro d+ha kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la hUM/ ma hA srog sha kha thun ha la ha la hUM phaT/ dzaHdzaH/ che mchog yongs rdzogs drag sngags so// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ oM sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ ma ma rak+mo yak+mo kA la rU pa snying rtsa la yaM yaM/ srog la yaM yaM/ snying la phril phril/ srog la chuM chuM/ tsit+ta srog la tung tung/ snying khrag shad dza/ thum ri li li/ snying tseg tseg 'ur 'ur/ shig shig gul

gul/ myags myags/ sod sod/ d+ha d+hi ma ma/ karma shi g+h+raM ka rA ya/ mA ra se na phra marda nA ya hUM phaT/ phur pa yongs rdzogs drag sngags so// oM badzra ni la kha T+wAM ga kro d+hI shwa rI/ b+ha ga pad+ma rgya bde klong shon ma dzaHdzaHb+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma ma rak+Sha ma ma rak+Sha ru lu ru lu/ rak+mo snying khrag la ma b+h+yo/ trag rak+Sha ma ma srog thun b+h+yo/ che ge mo nr-i dug snying mA ra ya phaT/ badzra ta tsha khrim mugs sha mugs sha/ rbad da ra rbad da ra/ mugs te myogs shar sod/ tsi sod snying la thum ril yA/ mig dkyus nas phyung zhig/ rgyungs pa rtsad nas chod cig lce lkog nas drongs shig ma mo yongs rdzogs drag sngags so// oM badzra ma hA gu ru sarba hUM phaT/ oM kA la rU pa che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ rig 'dzin yongs rdzogs drag sngags so// oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ ging ka ra bdud tri mA ra ya hUM/ a bi shu+u ba sha mi ki nA ga yak+Sha/ rak+Sha ma ma che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ 'jig rten yongs rdzogs drag sngags so// oM badzra sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ ya ma nA ga de ga rA hu la/ yak+Sha rak+Sha d+ha sha g+h+ri wa/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ dmod pa yongs rdzogs drag sngags so// oM AHhUM swA hA/ muM hrIHhUM aH/ oM badzra shrI ma hA kro d+hA hUM/ shI he ru ka/ ya mAn+ta ka/ hri pad+mAn+ta kr-ita/ hUM badzra kI li kI la ya/ ma hA yak+Sha/ kA la rU ba/ yak+Sha kro d+ha/ badzra sarba duSh+tAn/ oM dza khroM badzra ga ru rta/ ma ma kro d+hI shwa rI/ karma raM raM/ dz+wa la raM raM/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ zhi khro bde gshegs yongs rdzogs bsnyen bsgrub las su bcas pa'i nus 'dril chen mo'i sngags so// oM badzra ma hA kro d+ha/ pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI badzra kI la ya/ ma hA yak+Sha kA la rU pa/ karma raM raM dz+wa la raM raM hUM phaT/ yongs rdzogs nus pa dril ba bsnyen bsgrub las su bcas pa'i sngags so// oM ya mAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ oM pradz+nyAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/ badzra pA sha hUM/ oM pad+mAn ta krita phaT/ badzra s+pho Ta baM/ oM big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ badzra gaN+Di hoH/ sgo ba yab yum brgyad kyi snying po'o// thabs shes gsal dbyangs dag las spros pa yi// gzhan yang las byed snying po gang gang dag/ 'di nyid gong 'og yan lag kun shes 'phrul// thabs shes A ki kA li'i don shes nas// sgrar grags thams cad yongs rdzogs sngags snying rang shar bas// rgyu 'jug gnas de yi ge gsum gyi dngos// 'gyus dran 'dzin chags rang grol don snying hUM// bde gshegs yongs rdzogs gsung sgrub thugs mtha' ni// zhi ba ma lus snying po gsung gi mtha'/ A li bco brgyad sngags la yongs su rdzogs// de yang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis snying po'i mtha'/ bo d+hi bcu bzhi pa la yongs su rdzogs// de nyid rigs lnga'i yang snying 'bru lngar rdzogs// sku gsum rigs gcig gsung mtha' 'bru gsum ste// ji ltar ji snyed chos kun mthar thug de nyid yin// hUM du kun 'dus yongs su rdzogs pa'i

dpal// de byin khro bo'i gsang sngags mtha' yas las// che mchog sngags 'dus yi ge bcu gnyis te// gshin rje gshed po'i sngags mtha' bcu bdun pa// badzra he ru'i gsung mtha' 'bru dgu mchog/ dbang chen gsung mtha' yig 'bru bcu dgur 'dus/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i gsung mtha' bru bcu bzhi/ bla med he ru'i gsung mtha' sum cu pa/ rigs 'dzin gsung mtha' yi ge bcu par thug/ de bzhin dregs pa kun 'dul gsung mtha' 'bru bcu pa// stobs ldan nag po'i gsung mtha' yi ge brgyad// zhi khro yongs dril sngags mtha' don brgyad yin// khro rgyal yongs rdzogs drag sngags so lngar 'dus// de nyid gsung srog yi ge hUM la rdzogs// gsung gi rang bzhin shes pas gsung mtha' thug/ bde gshegs ma lus yongs rdzogs dgongs pa'i mtha'// bye brag dang ni yongs rdzogs yang dag bshad/ ma rig 'ching bzlog 'chi bdag bdud chen po// kun gzhi ye shes snying po rtogs nas sangs// ma bcos spros med ngang dngas lhug par zhog/ snang srid khram 'debs gshin rje gshed dgongs yin// 'khor 'das snang stong dbyer med rta skad gsum// rang sems dri med rnam dag sa lam bcad// snang stong dran stong grag stong so mar zhog/ 'khor 'das zil gnon rta skad dgongs pa yin// chos kun sems su yang dag gnas lugs te// rang bzhin rnal 'byor spros bral sku gsum rdzogs// ma bkag rang 'byung ma 'breng rang zhir zhog/ gzung 'dzin mun gsal me gcig dgongs pa yin// ma rig rnam rtog nyon mongs dug mtsho'i nang// rang byung ye shes rtsi bcud thig les gzhom// ma spangs mi gnas 'dod yon rnam dag zhog/ bdud rtsi 'chi med dgongs pa mthar thug yin// nga bdag gzung 'dzin dgra bgegs ling+ga la// rang rig ye shes phur pas khyab par gdab// rtogs pa thal phyung gsum mtha' gcig tu bzhag/ phur pa thal phyin dgongs pa chen po yin// ma gcig kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo la// snying po rig pa'i ye shes thams cad mkhyen// ma nor ma bcos kun khyab ma bslab zhog/ kun khyab ma chen dgongs pa'i mthar thug yin// thabs shes kun ldan ye stong bdag nyid rig/ mi bsgom ma yengs rig pa dbyings su 'dzin// brjod med shes rab g.yo med rang grol zhog/ rig 'dzin rang grol dgongs pa chen po yin// 'khor 'das chos kun ye grol pha mtha' yas// 'dzin med rang grol gza' gtad 'khrul pa zhig/ lha 'dre rang snang rang grol chen por zhog/ 'jig rten kun grol dgongs pa mthar thug yin// srid rtsa nyes rgyu ha la bdag rtog dug/ rtsa bral snying po'i sngags kyis dug rang bsad// dug lnga ye shes lnga ru rang grol bzhag/ dug lnga rang

gshed mtha' bral dgongs pa yin// de dag yongs rdzogs sems nyid chos kyi sku// snang srid gzhir bzhengs 'khor 'das dbyer med rdzogs// gsang ba bla med byang chub snying pos khyab// 'khor 'das dbyer med thig le nyag gcig las// ma 'gags rol pa sna tshogs rtsis gdab bral// rang bzhin med grol skye med dbyings su dag/ ma 'dres yongs rdzogs rang byung ye shes dang// bde gshegs dgongs pa rtsis gdab brjod med rdzogs// sku gsung thugs mtha' khog dkrul spros bcad nas// rnal 'byor blo mthun bsgrub lugs rtsa lag gnyis// 'di ni yongs rdzogs bsgrub chen drel ba dang// zhi khro rkyang dang sku gsum yang dril las// yan lag sngags bsgrub brgyad las 'dir ma smos// 'di dag spros bcas spros chung shin tu chung// sangs rgyas bstan bsrung ched gnyer don du bstan// mdor na ngas bstan rgyud lung thams cad du// bde gshegs 'dus dang yongs rdzogs kun dril dang// kun rig kun gsal kun chub gsang 'dus sogs// sna tshogs phun sum thams cad ma lus sgra// thugs dgongs lhad med rgyud der mtshon tshig las/ ming phyogs blo mthas phyogs ris ltos mi bya// sgyu ma smig rgyu rmi lam gzugs brnyan dang// dri za'i grong khyer brag cha chu zla dang// chu sbur dmigs rkyen sprul pa la sogs te// shes bya bcu tshul gsang sngags nyams su blangs// dkrugs bcus gab stsogs ras chod bzlog phyir ston// ngas sprul phyi rabs rig 'dzin dam pas bsdeb// man ngag dbang thob gdeng ldan rnal 'byor pas// yid 'ong dben pa'i bsgrub gnas su// maN+Dal phyi nang mchod pa bsham// yan lag bcu yis tshogs chen bsag/ gzhan yang sta gon ci rigs bya/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams bsdams te// gnas dang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs// bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab// thig tshon grub chen skabs dang mtshungs// bri thabs dbus mthing gru gsum la// zla gam gnam sgo thod zlum bskor// gru chad sgo khyud yongs rdzogs bri// de dbus rat+na rdza'i bum pa// bre tshad nang du rnam rgyal dang// a mr-i ta yi ril bus dgang/ kha rgyan gzungs thag rgyan gyis spras// de steng mtshan ldan ka pA la// dpal chen gris sku dmigs pa'i rten// lcags phur mtshan ldan khro zhal can// gu gul gyis bdug dar gyis spras// dpal chen skur bskyed e la gzug/ sman rag gtor chen la sogs pa// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas bskor// mtshams gcad sgo dbye brda' phyag 'tshal// byin dbab dam bshags mchod rdzas dbul// de ltar las bdun yongs rdzogs nas// khyad par phrin las de bzhin nyid// kun snang rgyu las 'byung rim brtseg/ gzhal yas gdan bskyed rgyu hUM

las// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa// g.yas gyi phyag gsum rdo rje la// g.yon gyi phyag gsum b+han dmar bsnams/ zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums dor thabs bgrad// rdo rje rin chen gshog pa gdengs// dur khrod chas rdzogs yum chen mo// gnam zhal zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'khril// g.yas pa kha T+wAM g.yon dung dmar// sku mdog rgyan rnams yab dang mtshungs// kun gyi bdag nyid rtsa ba'i lha'o// dpal gyi spyi gtsug mgrin pa dang// thugs ka lte ba 'khor lo bzhir// 'jam dpal spyan ras gzigs dbang dang// rdo rje sems dpa' rig pa'i bdag/ rim pa bzhin bsgom rigs lnga yis// dbu la brgyan te yan lag lha'o// de nas sras mchog go cha'i lha// dpral bar 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// mgrin par rta mgrin dbang gi lha// thugs kar badzra he ru ka/ lte bar rdo rje gzhon nu che/ gsang bar bla med he ru ka/ spyi bor rig 'dzin 'dus pa'i sku// zhabs kyi pus mo g.yas g.yon steng// dregs pa kun 'dul chen po dang// 'jigs byed stobs ldan nag po bskyed// rdo rje rin chen gshog dpung rtser// klu 'dul khyung chen dkar nag bskyed// so so'i 'khor tshogs khro bo dang// khro mo yang sprul sum sprul bcas// 'bar khro rngam brjid gsal brtan nas// byin brlab dbang bskur spyan drang bstim// mchod bstod tshogs 'khor dus bzhir dbul// de dag sems kyi cho 'phrul te// rang bzhin skye med chos kyi sku// lha nyid snang stong gnyis su med// rol pa ma 'gag longs spyod sku// thugs rje'i 'phro 'dus 'gro ba 'dul// phrin las longs spyod sprul pa'i sku// sku gsum rang la ngo sprad nas// bla med rol pa'i 'phro 'du yis// bdud bzhi gzhom dang dgra gsum bsad// 'gro drug g.yang sa gcad bya'i phyir// srog snying rdzong dang 'phrad gnad kyis// yang dag nges don rab ldan pas// snang stong grag stong bde stong gi/ ngang la bying rgod gnyis spangs te// kun gyi gsang srog hUM gi bsnyen// 'dzab bstod dbyangs bcas rig rtsal sbyang// de nas bde gshegs yongs rdzogs pa'i// gsang sngags 'dus pa nye bar bsten// oM AHhUM swA hA// mUM hrIHhUM aH/ oM badzra shrI ma hA kro d+ha/ oM shrI he ru ka ya mAn+ta ka/ hrIHpad+mAn+ta kr-ita/ hUM badzra kI li kI la ya/ badzra ma hA yak+Sha/ kA la rU pa/ yak+Sha kro d+hI/ badzra sa ba duSh+tAn/ e dza b+h+yo/ khroM badzra ga ru Da/ ma ma kro d+hI shwa rI/ karma raM raM/ dz+wa la raM raM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ gsang ba 'dus pa'i drag sngags 'di// mgar gyi tsha tsha lta bur bzlas// thun mtshams bstod cing phrin las bcol// smon lam btab cing rdzogs rim bsgom// grangs 'bum bsnyen cing rtags la sbyar// zhal mthor lung ston dngos

grub ster// rdzas la 'od dang du ba 'byung// rmi lam mgo la nyi ma shar// mchod rten rtse la sdod pa dang// bud med tshogs 'dus bsnyen bkur byed// lus bde ngag nus sems rtogs 'char// bum pa'i rdzas la dngos grub blang// rgyun du za tshogs drang zhing rten// bde gshegs gcig grub kun gyi ngang// de bzhin bsgrub chos las sbyor stsogs// gsang sngags rgyud sde bsam yas kyi// las sbyor la sogs gang dang gang// gang la brtsams kyang the tshom med// dkyil 'khor bsdus te rgyun spyod bya// zhi khro yongs rdzogs bsnyen bsgrub 'dir// dus gsum bde gshegs gsang ba 'dus// bdag gzhan yongs kyi dpal chen po// mchog gi dam pa 'di bsgrubs pas// bdag srung rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ zhi khro yongs rdzogs 'dus pa'i bsnyen bsgrub gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa// kye kye kye/ tshogs kyi slob dpon kun tu bzang// tshogs rje tshogs bdag he ru ka/ rgyud don yongs rdzogs bsgrub chen po// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsal zhu// de skad gsol par thugs dgongs te// ston pa chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams rtse gcig nyon// bde gshegs zhi khro yongs rdzogs pa'i// rgyud don gsang ba'i bsgrub chen la// bzhi ste phun sum tshogs gzhi bzung// sta gon rim pas sgrom du gzhug/ dngos gzhi bsnyen sgrub gzhung bsrangs te// mtha' rgyas cho gas rjes bskyang ngo// bsgrub gzhi phun sum tshogs bdun dpyad// bsgrub rkyen bla ma phun tshogs ni// bde gshegs bka' babs bsgrub rgyud zin// dbang rnams yongs rdzogs dam la gnas// blta bas thag chod ting 'dzin gsal// spyod pa blang dor man ngag can// gsang sngags mtha' drug rdzogs pa la// thos pas rgyud grol snying rje yis// 'gro 'dul thabs mkhas de nyid bsten// sgrub rten slob ma phun tshogs ni// dam gtsang dpa' brtan snying rus che// blo che shes rab mchog tu bzang// bsgrub dang phrin las brtson 'grus can// bzo mkhas rig gsal dad ldan gces// bsgrub gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni// bkra shis gangs rgyud ri bzangs 'dab// gnam sa pad 'khor kha sbyar 'dra// sngon yang grub thob rkyen thub par// bsgrub khang pho brang lta bur brtsig/ bsgrub pa'i grogs 'khor phun tshogs ni// rgyud zhi sha tsha blo gsal zhing// mi bslu gsang thub nga lo yang// de 'dra'i rgyal thebs karma dang/ las brgya mdzes sdug yid 'ong ba// rigs dang mtshan ldan 'dris thub rten// sgrub pa'i yo byad

phun tshogs ni// rten rdzas mchod rdzas dngos grub rdzas// 'cho ba zas dang rkyen zlog sman// sna tshogs re skong yo byad sogs// bsgrub pa'i dus tshod phun tshogs ni// spyir na lo zla gza' skar dang// zhag dus dar dang yar ngo gces// bye brag zhi rgyas dbang drag gam// bsnyen bsgrub las sbyor dus kun brtsi// sgrub chos phun sum tshogs pa ni// ma hA'i rgyud dang a nu'i lung// a ti man ngag skor la sogs// shes bya kun la mkhas par sbyang// mdor na bde gshegs gsang 'dus pa'i// yongs rdzogs 'di nyid 'dzom par bya// sgrom 'jug sta gon rim pa bcas// sa brtag gzung sbyang dkyil 'khor brtsig/ spyi bshags bskang bya phyi mtshams bcad// sri mnan sgo srung byang bu gdags// ma traM mnan cing phyin gyis brlab// sgrub rdzas byin brlab chag chag gdab// thig gdab sa tshon byin gyis brlab// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bri bya ste// thig bzhi btab pas ling tshe dgu'i// kha dog phyogs mtshon thod pa brtsig/ dbus nas brtsams te ling tshe dgu'i// zla gam sgo gcig e dgus mtshon// sgo sgor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bar// mu khyud dang bcas re re dgod// kun la rin chen zur brgyad de// mdo mtshams ka bzhi sgo zang thal// spros la dga' na sgo rdzogs pa// kun tu dgu ru mdzes par bri// kun gyi phyi ru khyams sgo bzhi// pho nya reg mthing dkar ser leb ljang// 'dod yon pha gu dra ba dang// phra phyed mda' yab de ru ka/ ka brgyad rta babs chos 'khor sogs// zhi khro yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor phyir// kun la rin chen dur khrod brgyan// spel te mkhas pas bri bar bya// mu khyud pad 'khor brag chen dang// rdo rje me ri 'khor yug bskor// phyi gru nang khyud dur khrod brgyan// mtshams bzhir dpag bsam bum pa br-i// bsre bsnan bya zhing chas gos gsol// gral bcas sman bsdu brda' sgo dbye// brda' yi phyag btsal rtags mchog gdab// dam bca' bshags pa byin chen dbab// dkyil 'khor lha dang rgyan dgod de// gling dgur b+han d+ha dgu'am ni// bum gcig me gcig khram gcig dang// ta zhal phur gcig snying gcig dang/ sku gcig sku rten drag sngags dgod// yang na mtshan ldan gcig nang du// che mchog sku bri kha khyer la// dpal chen dgu yi snying po bri// sku dang gsung gi rten yin pas/ dmigs pa'i rten du dbus su dgod// thugs rten rdo rje rtse lnga dgod// yon tan rten du a mr-i ta// phrin las bsgrub phyir lcags phur dgu/ sras kyi sngags phur bzhi bzhis bskor// sgo bzhi phur pa bzhi yang dgod// gdab phur brgya dang rtsa brgyad kyis// mtha' skor yongs rdzogs 'khor du bskyed// sgo 'byed mar me dgu yang dgod// gzhan

yang phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad du// gri bzhi mda' bzhi me long bzhi// phur bzhi tshon skud dra bas spras// bla bre gdugs dang dar dbyangs 'phan// dpal chen gtor chen dgu yang dgram// sman rag d+ha ka'i mchod gtor sogs// phyi nang mchod pas bklubs la dgang// de nas dngos gzhi bsnyen bsgrub bshad// dang po phyi nang gsang mtshams bcad// oM badzra kro d+ha swa b+hA wa sa ma ya ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ hUM hUM bi shwa badzra tsakra dz+wa la ma d+ha la/ ha la ha la/ hUM phaT/ de nas brda' sgo dbye bar bya/ b+h+rUM pra be sha phaT/ de nas brda li phyag kyang btsal/ hUM he ru ka a ti pu ho/ pra tI ts+tsha ho/ de nas dam bca' yongs su gzung// hUM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas byin chen dbab par bya/ oM shrI badzra kro d+ha de ba duSh+tAn d+ha ki nI sa ma ya ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ A be sha ya a a/ de nas mchod pa byin brlabs 'bul// oM AHhUM/ badzra puSh+pe hUM/ badzra d+hU pe hUM/ badzra A lo ke hUM/ badzra gan+d+he hUM/ badzra ne bi te hUM/ badzra shap+ta hUM/ badzra sarba pU dza me g+ha hUM// raM yaM khaM/ oMHAHhUM/ ma hA ba liM ta te dzo ba li te/ ba la ba ta/ gu h+ya sa ma ya swA hA/ oM AHhUM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hri tha/ oM AHhUM/ ma hA rak+ta sa man+ta maN+Dal hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza/ ma hA pany+tsa ma hA ba liM ta/ ma hA rak+ta/ a ho su kha ho// sa ma ya swA hA/ de nas nyams chag gnong 'gyod bshags// oM AHhUM swA hA/ sa ma ya dza/ na ra ka/ bre ta ka/ tir ya ka/ ma nu Sha/ de wa/ a de wa/ a liM bi shud+d+he/ dag sha ka/ bud+d+he shud+d+he swA hA/ sbyang gzhi sbyong byed thabs chen po// khyad par bskyed rdzogs 'di ltar bsgom// hUM spros med yang dag de bzhin nyid// mnyam yangs phyogs bral kun tu bdal// ma nor ma bcos chos kyi sku// rang bzhin lhun grub ngang gis gsal// oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA nA badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de bzhin kun khyab kun tu snang// ma rig 'khrul snang 'khor ba'i klong// gzung 'dzin bag chags rab tu 'thas// ma rtogs sems can snying re rje// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+hA+e maN+Dal hUM/ hUM chos rnams rang byung rten 'brel te// rgyu las ma byung gang yang med// hUM ni thams cad skyed pa'i rgyu// dgos tshig rkang 'di med pa'ang 'dug 'dod 'byung ba'i yi ge bsgom// rang rig don gyi snying po hUM/ tsit+ta badzra hUM/ raM yaM khaM/ bskal pa gsum gyi 'jig rten stongs// ye nas dag pa'i ngang nyid las// snod bcud sbyang phyir 'byung rim brtseg/ e yaM ra suM keMraM b+h+rAM/ e las nam mkha' mtha' dbus med// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// ra las rak+ta'i rgya mtsho 'khyil// suM las zhing chen sa gzhi brdal// keM las rus pa'i ri rab steng// raM las bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar/ b+h+rUM las ye shes gzhal yas khang/ dur khrod rab 'jigs dkyil 'khor skyed// b+h+rUM bi shwa

bi shud+d+he// b+han+da gnya' na e tsakra maN+Da la hUM b+h+ruM/ zla gam ye shes 'char sgo'i dbus// chos sku 'gyur med e ru gsal// b+han+da skam rlon pho brang brtseg/ rin chen mdzes pa'i gling dgu la// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bar khyams sgo khyud rdzogs// rang byung lhun grub ngo mtshar che// dregs pa nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// gtso dang 'khor bcas 'tshams par gsal// b+h+rUM ru dra kro d+hI ti ra baM/ ma sUr+ya maN+Da la a tsan+da maN+Da la/ baM pad+ma maN+Da la/ hUM rgyu yi yi ge gdan la babs// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag dbu gsum phyag drug pa// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// sku mchog rigs lnga dbu la rdzogs// spyan dgu zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs// g.yas kyi phyag gsum rdo rje bsnams// g.yon gyi phyag gsum b+han dmar bsnams// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chas kyi brgyan// gnam zhal yum mchog kun bzang sbyor// g.yas pa gtso 'khyud kha T+wAM bsnams// g.yon pa chags pa'i dung dmar stob// sku mdog rgyan cha yab dang 'dra// bskal pa'i me dpung klong na bzhugs// oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI s+t+waM/ hUM dpal chen yab yum thugs ka nas// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du// mthing nag hUM chen yi ge spro// khrag 'thung yab yum sras bcas bskyed// hUM hUM/ hUM hUM/ hUM hUM/ hUM hUM/ hUM hUM/ hUM hUM/ hUM hUM/ hUM hUM/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita/ ma hA kro d+ha ha ya g+h+rI ba/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ oM gu h+ya gnya' na shrI he ru ka/ gu h+ya dz+nyA na kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ ma ma yo gi ni/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM badzra ma hA gu ru sarba hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ oM badzra sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ hUM rgyu las bskyed pa'i sngags brjod pas// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// bskal pa me ltar 'bar klong nas// rang byung ye shes khro tshogs shar// shar du badzra he ru ka/ badzra kro d+hI shwa rI yum// rigs bzhi la sogs 'khor bcas gsal// lho ru 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// za byed be tA nag mo yum// rigs bzhi la sogs 'khor bcas gsal// nub tu dbang chen rta mgrin rgyal// pad+ma gzi ldan khro mo yum// rigs bzhi la sogs 'khor bcas gsal// byang du rdo rje gzhon nu che// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs dpal gyi yum// rigs bzhi la sogs 'khor bcas gsal// shar lhor bla med he ru ka/ nyid bzhi bde mchog yum chen sbyor// ma lnga la sogs 'khor dang bcas// lho nub rig 'dzin rdo rje'i sku// bde chen rdo rje rnal 'byor 'khril// rigs bzhi la sogs 'khor bcas gsal// nub

byang dregs pa kun 'dul dpal// khams gsum srid pa spyi 'dul 'khril// rigs bzhi la sogs 'khor bcas gsal// byang shar stobs ldan nag po che// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag mo yum// rigs bzhi la sogs 'khor bcas gsal// nyi ma dang ni 'od zer bzhin// dpal chen so so'i sprul 'khor bcas// phyi rol sgo ba rigs bzhi ni// ya mAn pradz+nyA pad+mA big/ lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// tshom bu dgu yi lha tshogs rnams// sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyan cha lugs// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par gsal// hUM rang byung dkyil 'khor dpal chen tshogs// mthu rtsal yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir// sku gsung thugs su byin brlab cing// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur ro// oM AHhUM/ oM hUM swA hrIHhA/ de nas rang bzhin spyan drangs te/ e h+ye hi/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sa ma ya hriM hrIM dzaH/ de nas dam tshig bdag la bstim/ sa ma ya A be sha ya tiSh+Tha lhan// de nas phyag gi mchod pa ni// a ti pu to/ na ma ya te/ de nas phyag rgya gar gyi mchod// ma hA pU dza mu dra hoH// de nas ye shes glu yis mchod// ma hA dz+nyA na te na hUM/ te na hUM/ te na te te hUM/ de nas phyi nang rnam lngas mchod// oM pa na peM/ pe nu su ra to/ ti pu pa ra mu/ sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi hUM/ sa ma yo ta mu/ oM AHhUM/ ma hA pany+tsa ba liM ta rak+ta khA hi/ oM shrI badzra rA ga d+hU pe d+hU/ puSh+pe bu/ A lo ke hrIH/ gan+d+he gan/ nai bid+yA A/ girti hUM/ de nas bdud rtsi sman mchod 'bul// lha rnams so so'i rtsa sngags la// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mr-i ta kha raM khA hi/ de nas bdud rtsi'i dngos grub blang// kA ya sid+d+hi oM/ wA ka sid+d+hi AH/ tsit+ta sid+d+hi hUM/ sarba sid+d+hi hrIH/ de nas bdud rtsi gsang nan mchod/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi/ de nas ma chags gtor chen mchod// lha rnams kun gyi rtsa sngags la/ ma hA ba liM ta kha raM khA hi/ lha rnams kun gyi sngags mjug la// ma hA rak+ta kha raM khA hi/ de nas yab yum sbyor mchod 'bul// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ pad+ma yo gi nI/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya phaT/ de nas sgrol ba'i mchod pa bya/ oM ma hA shrI he ru ka/ ma traM ru dra pra b+ha na tsakra hUM phaT/ pra be sha ya hUM phaT/ ti hUM a s+pha ra Na phaT/ de nas yig brgyas bshags shing bskang// oM AHhUM swA hA/ oM badzra he ru ka sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra he ru ka twai no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-iD+ho me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shre yAM/ ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga wAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra he ru ka/ ma me muny+tsa/ badzrI b+ha wa/ ma hA sa ma ya/ badzra he ru ka sa twa a/ de nas dgyes pa'i bstod mchod bya// oM mnyam nyid sku yi rang bzhin yin// kun bzang zag pa med par bde// sems can don la bde bar gshegs// thugs rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// AM rtsol med

rang byung chos sku'i sgra// ma 'gags rang gsal 'dzin pa med// chags med skyon bral pad+ma'i gsung// yang dag gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM spros pa med pa'i dbyings kyi ngang// ma skyes 'jig med rdo rje'i thugs// blang dor med pa chos kyi dbyings// 'gyur med thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// swA chos dbyings rol pa chen po las// rtsal dang rol pa mi dmigs kyang// nam mkha' mdzod kyi cho 'phrul gyis// yon tan re skong phyag 'tshal bstod// hA rang bzhin cir yang ma nges kyang// dkyil 'khor chen po'i cha bzung nas// rtog med dregs pa ngang gis 'dul// phrin las mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzhan yang don mthun ci rigs bstod// oM AM hUM swA hA/ na mo hr-i dA ya/ de nas lha tshogs mtshan don nas// las bzhi la sogs bcol bskul bya// oM shIn+taM ku ru/ swA puSh+tiM ku ru/ A+oM ba shaM ku ru/ hA mA ra ya/ hUM sarba sid+d+hi ku ru hUM/ de nas bde gshegs kun gyi gsang/ 'dus pa'i snying po 'dzab bzlas te// zhi bas bsnyen cing khro bor bsgrub// thog mar zhi ba'i 'dzab bzlas te// bde gshegs yongs rdzogs snying po 'di'o// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha gnya' na d+hA tu a/ de yang 'di skad bskul zhing bsnyen// hUM gsang ba yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor du// che mchog dpal dgu'i dbu rgyan nang// thabs shes nyi zla 'od kyi dkyil// ma chags pad+ma'i ge sar la// mi bskyod rnam par snang mdzad dang// rin 'byung mtha' yas don yod grub// yum chen kun bzang sangs rgyas spyan// mA ma gos dkar dam tshig sgrol// rgyal ba rigs lnga yab yum bcas// kun bzang yab yum dgyes par sbyor// sras mchog sems dpa' sems mar bcas// sprul sku thub drug mthar byed brgyad// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi brjid 'bar/ dbu rgyan phreng ba cod pan dang// do shal dpung rgyan se mo do// rin chen dar dpyangs chas rnams rdzogs// gsung gi snying po sngags sgra sgrogs// thugs ni rang byung ye shes gsal// 'dzab kyis sku gsung thugs rgyud bskul// spros pas stong gsum sku yis gang// sku las gsung byung sngags 'brug ldir// bsdus pas chos dbyings mkha' la thim// ma gsal bar du bskyed cing bsgom// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha gnya' na d+hA tu a/ brgya stong khri 'bum bye ba sogs// bsnyen pa sum cha de la bskyal// stong tshig yan lag bdun mchod bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lo dus drug btang// de nas bde gshegs kun gyi gsung// tshom bu dgu yi snying po bskul// oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+tiHbikr-i ta na na hUM phaT/ oM h+ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya

hUM phaT/ oM gu h+ya gnya' na shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM badzra ma hA gu ru sarba hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ oM badzra sarba duSh+tAn e dzaHb+h+yo hUM phaT/ khroM ga ru Da hUM phaT/ sarba DA ki nI sa ma ya hriM hriM hUM phaT/ de yang 'di ltar bskul cing bsgrub// hUM dbus phyogs 'khor lo'i gzhal yas nas// zla gam dbang chen e yi dbyibs// byol song gtso brgyad dregs pa'i steng// thabs shes nyi zla 'od kyi dkyil// ma chags pad+ma'i ge sar la// bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ yum chen gnam zhal dbyings phyug ma// gnyis med 'khril sbyor sras cha lugs gi yang 'khor bcas// sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung// dgod dang gshe dang snying rje rngam// 'bar khro zhi tshogs gar dgu ldan// sku la dur khrod chas rnams rdzogs// gsung ni drag po'i sngags sgra sgrogs// thugs ni sgrol mdzad srog dang bcas// 'dzab kyi rgyud bskul sku gsung thugs// phaT kyi spros pas stong gsum gang// bsdus pas yum gyi mkha' la 'khyil// gsang ba'i sbubs nas thugs kar thim// ma gsal bar du bskyed cing bsgom// ma 'grub bar du mi gtong ngo// badzra kro d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ brgya stong khri 'bum bye bas bsgrub// stong tshig yan lag bcu pa bya// de bzhin khro bo kun la sbyar// dus drug tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// sgrub pa sum gnyis de la bsgrub// de nas las sbyor sum cha'i bar// dgongs pa gsum gyis mthar 'gyur te// bdag nyid yongs rdzogs dpal du bskyed// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad kun// chos nyid don la 'gyur med phyir// thams cad sku mdog mthing nag la// rdo rje phur pa 'dril zhing 'debs// dgra bgegs las rgyun gcod par bsam// rnal 'byor dur khrod chas gsol te// bsgrub phur rnams la drag tu bstim// oM badzra ma hA kro d+ha/ pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI/ badzra kI li kI la ya// ma hA yak+Sha/ kA la rU pa karma raM raM/ dz+wa la raM hUM phaT/ bde gshegs khro rgyal 'dus pa yi// drags sngags gnam thog drag tu bzlas// stong stong tshig tu khro rgyal bskul// dgra bgegs khugs pa'i rtags mthong tshe// e dbus mtshan ngan thod pa ru// ling ga 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bskyon// gu gul gyis bdug lha dang dbye// dpang gsol phyag rgya bzhi yis bcings// nr-i tri che ge mo dzaHhUM baM hoH/ A be sha ya a a/ phrin las rten gyi phur pa bsnams// gu gul byin bskyed khrag dbang bskur// yungs kar brab cing phrin las bcol// tshe lung khrus kyi dgongs pa bya// che mchog phur pa srog rtsar gdab// badzra he ru snying gar gdab// gshin rje gshed po dpral bar gdab// rta mgrin dbang gi lce la gdab// rdo rje gzhon nu lte bar gdab// bla med he ru gsang gnas gdab// dregs pa kun

'dul brla g.yas gdab// stobs ldan nag po brla yon gdab// rig 'dzin drag po spyi bor gdab// gdab pa'i sngags dgu 'og nas ston// so so'i 'khor gyis khyab par gdab// yungs kar dug khrag thun gyis brab/ drag sngags thams cad phur dkrugs phu sprugs/ kyang te// mngag phur gdab phur khyab par gdab// gdab brdeg mnan pas las kha bsdu// bdag dang phur pa 'ben dang gsum// tha mi dad de grub mtha' gcig/ chos kyi dbyings su gzung 'dzin sgrol// srid pa gsum yang dus gcig sgrol// khro rgyal 'dus pa'i phrin las so// de nas skabs su tshogs mchod bya// oM u tsusma/ be tA lI/ kro d+ha sarba dra byaM bi shwa d+ha na swA hA/ raM yaM khaM/ oM AM hUM/ a~M na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo de bI kro d+ha sarba ba liM ta khA hi khA hi/ oM AM hUM/ ma hA ba liM ta khA hi/ de nas lhag mas mchod pa bya// oM AM hUM/ u ts+tshiSh+ta badzra asti sta/ sa mun sha kra ma/ sa ma ya hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ hriM hriM hriM/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ A ra li dza/ de nas man ngag 'khrul 'khor bshad// gdul bya'i blo rigs tha dad pas// sku gsung thugs yon phrin las kyi// bye brag bsgrub la mos na yang// 'di yi bsnyen bsgrub skabs dang sbyor// bde bar gshegs la rang rgyud med// gang ltar mos pa de ltar 'grub// rgyud 'di tan tra bco brgyad kyi// nyams len rtsa ba yongs rdzogs phyir// dbu zhabs kun tu man ngag gang// mdo las zhib rgyas ma tshang na'ang// nyid las mi gzhan rig 'dzin gyis// rigs par sgrol bar bka' gnang gis// rgyud gzhan kun nas kha bskang bya// yang dag nges pa'i don la sbyar// 'khor la bka' bsgo dge sbyor bskul// bar chod nyul le brtags te bzlog/ rgyun du 'byung ba'i dngos grub blang// bsgrub pa'i gegs yin rnam rtog bsal// de ltar bsgrubs pa'i grub rtags bshad// bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i rtags su ni// dpal chen la sogs bde bar gshegs// gang na gang gi zhal mthong zhing// ngag gi bden pa grub pa dang// nyams snang mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan 'byung// mi mang 'dus nas phyag 'tshal dang// mgo la nyi ma shar ba dang// mchod rten rtse la 'dug pa dang// grong khyer nyams dga' mthong ba dang// rigs lnga'i phyag mtshan rnyed pa dang// bcud 'thung me tog zos pa dang// dmag dpon ded dpon byas pa dang// bsgrub pa grub pa'i rtags dag ni// gangs dkar rtse la 'dzegs pa dang/ ri bo'i rtse la 'dug pa dang// dar gdugs rgyal mtshan 'phyar ba dang// bud med tshogs 'dus skor ba byed// lus la khrag 'dzag sems can thon// b+han+da phur pa ldeg cing 'phar// sku dang 'od sgra lha mor ston// dam rdzas khol lam du ba 'byung// las sbyor grub pa'i rtags su ni// zhi bas 'jigs pa (3)

brgyad skyob nus// rgyas pas 'byor drug spel bar nus// dbang gis bdud bzhi dbang sdud nus// drag pos dgra bgegs myur bsgral nus// nyams su bla khugs dmigs pas gsod// bsams pa'i don grub zhag dus thebs// rmi lam du yang dud 'bud dang// rnga sogs rol mo sgrogs pa dang// sgyogs 'phang hom spar rdzing brtol dang// mchod rten lha khang mkhar sbe'u brtsig/ bsos btab mi rnams bran du 'khol// mtshan rtags de dag thams cad kyang// rab dngos yang yang brtag thub cing// 'bring du thun khol bdud rtsi khol// 'od sogs nyams la snang ba yin// tha ma rmi lam brtan po 'byung// ma grub rang la ngan srid na// nyams dma' dpa' chung stobs zhan dang// mdog ldog skad 'gag mi mi nyan// rmi lam du yang grogs med 'khyams// gos med mtshon sogs tshur sgyogs 'byung// gtor ma dus yol chag yod na// khral 'dod nye drung thams cad 'khang// sgo non rang yang ltogs snyam sems// nyams grib mi gtsang gos srid na// yugs sa mdze can gnyen khros dang// nam ngan kha ba bu yug 'tshub// 'dam rdzab du ba mun gling 'khyams// bskang dang bshags pa rgyun du bya// de ltar mtshan ma bzang dang ngan// gang ltar snang yang btang snyoms 'dug/ rloms sems rtog pa mi skye bar// dngos grub blang zhing ngan pa bzlog/ dngos grub len khar bro bshags bya// zhag grangs them mam rtags bzang na// dngos grub bcud sman zas bzang dang// ka pA la yi bdud rtsi dang// rgyal ba zhi khro'i mtshan don nas// dngos grub blang pa'i cho ga bya// slob ma bzang la dbang yang bskur// de nas dngos grub dbang rdzas rol// bsgrub pa'i skabs skabs shis pa brjod// de ltar bsnyen sgrub rim pa dag/ rab tu lo bsgrub rtags dang sbyar// 'bring la zla drug grangs dang sbyar// tha ma zhag bdun dag la bsdus// dad brtson drag pos bsgrubs gyur na// mtshams med lnga spyad zin mis kyang// dngos grub thob pa gsang sngags khyad// dam ldan rnams la smos ci dgos// de nas mtha' sdud cho ga yi// rim pa bsgrub chen rjes kyang bshad// sbyor ram sgrol na gdab las bya// myur du sgrub byed sbyin bsreg bya// gtor ma gtong khar cha gsum bgo/ dang po gter du sba bya ste// sa yi lha mo'i mkha' dbyings su// gter sbed cho ga rgyas par bya// cha gcig sbyin bsregs gseb tu gdab// tha ma'i cha yis skyong ma mchod// gtong gzhong 'og tu dam sri brub// phrin las rnam bzhi'i bro yis mnan// bkra shis tshe yi cho ga bya// dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing lhag chad bskang// bzod par gsol zhing bla ma la// gtong rag rgya chen legs par gtong// mar me thogs la smon lam gdab// lus bsrung

rgyun gyi ting 'dzin gces// dus mtshams sgrol ba'i gtor ma gtang// sbyin gtong bsgrubs tshar bsngo ba bya// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal ba rnams// yongs rdzogs gsang ba'i bsgrub chen gyi// mdo don mtshon pa de ltar yin// nyid las mi gzhan rjes 'jug gis// de la spro bsdu ci rigs pa// dus dang blo sbyong cho ga'i khrigs// drang ba'i don du 'phrul shes bya// mthar thug yang dag sa la sbyor// phun tshogs gsang ba'i bsgrub chen 'di// sku gsum yongs rdzogs sa la sbyor// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ zhi khro yongs rdzogs gsang ba bsgrub chen gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// kun 'dus ston pa he ru kar// rgyud don bskyed rdzogs rab bsdus dag/ bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams rtse gcig nyon// rgyud don bskyed rdzogs yang 'dril bshad// zhi khro bde gshegs yongs rdzogs kun// sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub par 'dus// sngon 'gro rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje sems dpa' zhi dang khro// yab yum rkyang spag gang bde ba'i// bskyed rdzogs zung 'jug gsal bsgoms te// oM AHhUM/ sku gsung thugs ldan yongs rdzogs pa'i// 'khor 'das srog snying 'bru gsum ldan// bdud gzhom dgra bsad g.yang sa gcad// bsnyen rdzogs las rnams ma lus 'grub// rdzong 'phrang srog gi tshad ldan te// de ltar sku gsung thugs bsgrubs kyang// bla med yang dag yi ge hUM// zab mo thugs kyi bsgrub par rdzogs// de nyid nyams len bsgrub par 'dus// dkon mchog bla ma bde gshegs la// skyabs su 'gro zhing sems bskyed bya// yan lag bcu pas tshogs kyang bsag/ snying rje byams dga' btang snyoms bsgom// ltar gsal thugs 'od 'phro 'du las// srung mtshams khro bcu'i 'khor lo bsgom// khro bcu'i sprul pas gdug pa bsgral// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM// gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM/ g+h-i h+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ha/ b+ha ga wAn bid+yA rA dzA ya hUM phaT/ oM na maHsa man+ta badzra kA ya wA ka tsit+ta nAM/ g+ha g+ha/ g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya/ sarba duSh+tAM hUM phaT/ kI li kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ de yis bgegs bsrung rab sbyangs te// snying ga'i hUM 'od rdo rje'i gur// rab gtams me 'od 'bar bar bsam// snying ga'i hUM las b+h+rUM 'phros zhu// de las gzhal yas khang sgo bzhi// rta babs 'dod yon pha gu dang// dra ba pu shud dar khad dang// 'phan dang rgyal mtshan dur khrod mdzes// pho brang rat+na zur brgyad dbus// nyi zla pad+ma brtsegs pa'i steng// tshangs pa rgya byin bsnol ba'i

khar// nyi zla'i ga'u kha sbyor dbus// rdo rje rtse lnga'i lte ba la// rang rig hUM mthing gcig tu bsam// grib ma'i tshul du dril bu bskyed// de las bde gshegs yongs rdzogs sku// yab yum 'khril sbyor zhig tu bskyed// de yang yab kyi ming 'dogs ni// dgyes mdzad rdo rje zhes kyang bya// bla med he ru zhes kyang bya// bde mchog 'khor lo zhes kyang bya// che mchog he ru zhes kyang bya// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i sku mchog nyid// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig pa// phyag g.yas rdo rje dung dmar 'khrugs// zhabs gnyis brkyangs bskums lha chen brdzis// kro d+hI yum chen yab 'dra 'khril// yum chen de yi ming 'dogs kyang// kun bzang pha rol phyin ma dang// rdo rje phag mo rnal 'byor ma// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs khros nag mo// e ka dza TI gnam zhal ma// de ltar yab yum zhal sbyor la// dur khrod chas brgyad rdzogs par bsgom// oM AM hUM/ oM hUM swA hrIHhA/ sku gsung thugs su byin brlab cing// ye shes lnga yis dbang yang bskur// spyan drangs stim mchod bstod sogs bya// lha gsal gyad du gyur pa na// phra mo'i ting 'dzin gsal bsgoms te// kun gyi spyi srog hUM gis bsnyen// 'dzab dbyang zab mos nyams rtogs spar// rdzogs rim lha nyid sems su brtag/ lha nyid rang la rang nyid lha// dbyer med chos nyid ming dang bral// rdzogs rim gsum gyis gol sa sbyang// sgo gsum rtags la sbyar cing bsgrub// phrin las rig pa'i kha bsgyur bya// 'bras bu bder 'dus phyag rgya che// sku gsum lhun grub ngang du grol// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal ba dang// zhi khro bka' brgyad lha tshogs rnams// che mchog dpal gyi sku ru 'dus// che mchog he ru ka'i ngo bo// ma nor ma bcos chos kyi dbyings// chos sku thig le nyag gcig yin// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las// bskyed rdzogs yang dril gyi sgrub thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnasam kyis mgrin gcig tu/ ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ chos kyi dbang phyug kun tu bzang// dbang chen che mchog he ru ka/ rgyud don dbang bskur rim pa dag/ bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rtse gcig nyon// rgyud don dbang bskur rim pa la// lnga ste ngo bo nges tshig dang// dbye ba skur thabs dgos ched do// ngo bo rang rig dbang tshugs thub// nges tshig sems nyid rtsal dbang bskur// dbye na khyad par thun mong ste// khyad par phyi nang gsang dbang gsum// thun mong phan dang nus dbang yin// dbang chen skur thabs rim pa

ni// bla ma gang gis slob ma ni// gang la bskur phyir snod bcud bstan// ji ltar skur thabs phyi nang gsang// phan nus yongs rdzogs dag yin te// dkyil 'khor rdzas rnams bsgrub dang mtshungs// khyad par dbang gi sger rdzas ni// rat+na'i bum dgu phyag mtshan bri// sman dang rin chen 'bru sogs stsal// 'bras ldan kha rgyan dar snas bcing// sna lnga'i gzungs thag rdo rjes bsrung// phyi zhi nang khro rigs lngas brgyan// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs bris sku gzug/ phyag mtshan bris pa'i prog zhu dang// me long shel bcas rdor dril dang// zhi rgyan khro tshogs rus rgyan sogs// dbang rdzas rim pa thams cad bsag/
