mtshan ldan mu dra yid 'ong bsham// sta gon rdzogs bya dal du gzhug/ mdor na dbang gi sngon 'gro rjes// bsgrub chen bsnyen bsgrub khog phub la// las dang dbang gi sbyor bas te// lha rnams bsnyen bsgrub sngags gzhug la// dbang gi gsang sngags 'di gdags bsnyen// kA ya wA ka tsit+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa A// 'od zer spro bsdu'i sbyor ba yis// bsgrub rdzas lhar gsal bdud rtsir bsgyur// slob bu'i sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyang// dus drug tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// lnga bdun nyer gcig zhag tu bsgrub// de nas cod pan dbang bskur te// zhu 'bul rjes gnang cong pan dor// oM badzra pra ti gr-i h+Na ho// A be sha ya a a/ lha ngos bzung zhing gsang mtshan gdags// slob bus gsal gdab bla ma yis// gsang ba'i sngags 'dis byin chen dbab// oM AHhUM badzra gu ru sarba sa ma ya/ A be sha ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a a/ de nas spyi gtsug bum dbang bskur// oM AHhUM swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta shrI he ru ka/ badzra ka la sha/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ su ra ta s+t+waM/ de rjes dbu rgyan dbang bskur te// rigs lnga'i phyag mtshan thod spras la// oM AHhUM swA hA/ badzra/ bud+d+ha/ rat+na/ pad+ma/ karma mu ku Ta trAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ de rjes phreng tshogs zhi rgyan dbang// gnas su bkod de dbang bskur ni// oM bod+hi tsit+ta mu dra ru tsi ra ma Ni pra brta ya swA hA/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ de nas dpal gyi chas gos rnams// gnas su bkod de dbang bskur ni// oM shrI he ru ka sarba yo gi/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa sa ma ya shrI ye hUM a/ de rjes dam rdzas mchod pa'i tshogs// spyi bor bzhag nas dbang bskur ba// oM AM hUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ba liM ta rak+ta sarba pU dza sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa sid+d+hi a b+hi Shiny+tsa a a/ de ltar phyi dbang yongs rdzogs nas// nang gi lha dbang bskur ba ni// rigs lnga khrag 'thung lngar bcas pa'i// sku gzugs la bstim dmigs pas bstim// spyi bo'i gtsugs nas bskur bar bya// oM AM hUM swA hA/ mUM lAM mAM pAM tAM/ badzra sa twa dz+nyAn a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ bud+d+ha dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ rat+na dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ pad+ma dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ karma dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa

a/ badzra shrI he ru ka badzra kro d+hI shwa rI a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka bud+d+ha kro d+hi shwa rI a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ rat+na shrI he ru ka rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ karma shrI he ru ka karma kro d+hI shwa rI a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ de nas rgyal ba rigs bzhi'i dbang// spyi bor 'jam dpal ye shes sems// oM bA gI shwa ri muM/ mgrin par spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ thugs kar gsang bdag rdo rje sems/ badzra sa twa hUM/ lte bar drug pa rdo rje 'chang// ma hA badzra d+ha ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ de rjes dpal chen khrag 'thung dgu'i// cha lugs gsal gdab dbang bskur te// slob bu'i spyi bor che mchog bstim// oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM/ sarba sa ma ya/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ dpral bar gshin rje gshed po bstim// oM hriHSh+tiHbi kr-i tA na na hUM sarba sa ma ya/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ mgrin par pad+ma dbang chen bstim// oM ha ya grI wa hu lu hu lu hUM/ sarba sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ snying gar badzra he ru bstim// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ sarba sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ lte bar rdo rje gzhon nu bstim// oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM/ sarba sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ gsang bar bla med he ru bstim// oM gu h+ya gnya' na shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shwa rI hUM/ sarba sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ rig 'dzin rgyal po spyi bor bstim// oM badzra ma hA gu ru sarba sa ma ya/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ brla g.yas dregs pa kun 'dul bstim// oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn hUM/ sarba sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ brla g.yon stobs ldan nag po bstim// oM badzra sarba duSh+tAn hUM/ sarba sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ dpung gnyis khyung pho khyung mo bstim// oM khroM ga ru Da hUM/ sarba sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ de nas sku gsung thugs dbang bskur// 'bru gsum snying po gnas su bstim// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas ye shes lngas dbang bskur// oM AM hUM swA hA/ de rjes lha dang dbyer med par// rab tu gnas pa'i dbang bskur ba// oM hUM swA hrIHhA/ ye d+harmA he tu pra b+hA wa he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya wa data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni rod+ha e waM bA dI ma hA shra ma Na swA hA/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ sa ma ya ho/ de rjes lha dbang mnga' gsol phyir// zhal zas tshogs kyi dbang bskur te// badzra A yu She/ hUM b+h+rUM nr-i dzaHa b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ sid+d+hi pha la sarba a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM a/ de rjes snang srid dregs pa yi// srog dbang mthu rtsal dbang bskur ba// slob ma mthu stobs bdag por bskyed// bsgrub phur bsdus la lag tu gtad// he ru ka gu'i sngags gzhug tu// drag sngags dgu po btags la bskur// oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn/ ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha hUM phaT/ kA ya

wA ka tsit+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM a/ sde brgyad gzugs la dmigs pas bstim// slob bu'i zhabs 'og bran du gtad// oM AM hUM badzra sarba duSh+tAn trig nan e hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ tsit+ta rbad nan/ ya ma rA dza sa ma ya dza/ ba shaM ku ru hUM phaT/ trag rak+sha kha mun tra dzaH/ ba shaM ku ru hUM phaT/ tri du ru bar 'di med pa yang 'dug hri du ru du ru har ti dzaH/ ba shaM ku ru hUM phaT/ shu la rA dza tri na traM sha ya dzaH/ ba shaM ku ru ye hUM phaT/ badzra sA d+hu sa ma ya rA dza tri ya tsa yang dzaH/ ba shaM ku ru ye hUM phaT/ hrIM badzra yak+Sha badzra hrIM hriM dzaH/ ba shaM ku ru ye hUM phaT/ nA ga rA dza sa ma ya phu dzaH/ ba shaM ku ru ye hUM phaT/ bran du gyur nas phud kyis gso// oM AM hUM/ sa ma ya a mr-i ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ de rjes slob bu khri la bzhag/ rab 'byams bka' yi dbang bskur te// rdo rje slob dpon nus pa'i dbang// slob dpon bka' rtags rdzas gtad cing// ngag gis rjes gnang legs par sbyin// oM sarba ta thA ga ta gu ru gu h+ya shwa ri badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas gdugs kyis dbang bskur ba// oM sUr+ya shar Na a b+hi Shiny+tsa a ho// de nas rdo rjes dbang bskur ba// dz+nyA na pany+tsa badzra A be sha ya a/ de nas dril bus dbang bskur ba// d+harma d+hA tu a b+hi Shiny+tsa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas nyan pa'i dbang bskur ba// oM d+harmA shra baN swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas 'bri ba'i dbang bskur ba// d+harma le kha na A li kA li swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas chos 'chad dbang bskur ba// oM sarba ta thA ga ta b+hA Sha na d+harma swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas bsgrub pa'i dbang bskur ba// oM sarba yo ga sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas tsaN+Da lIs dbang bskur// tshwa gsum tsha sna bu ram sbyar// chang bcas blud de sngags 'dis bskur// oM badzra tsaN+Da lI raM/ sarba ta thA ga ta sha ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas rab 'byams don dbang ni// 'phrul chen lnga bcu brjod la bskur// de nas phrin las nus dbang bskur// badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM a/ de ltar nang dbang yongs rdzogs nas// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang bskur ni// mtshan ldan bkra shis yid 'ong ma// pad dung glang sna gang rung ldan// bcu drug lon pa'i rig ma ni// gdan khar rigs kyi yum du bskyed// rang nyid rigs kyi yab tu gsal// mkha' gsang brda' yis byin gyis brlab// phyag rgya bzhi gdams pad+ma'i dbus// rdo rje snyoms 'jug dal gyis bsub// yab yum gnyis med bde ba skye// gnyis med bde ba hUM du bsam// hUM ring hUM thung sna nas bgrang// mkha' gsang bar nas hUM spros pa// slob bu gzungs ma dang bcas pa'i// shes rgyud dug lnga sbyang bar bsams// yul gsum gsal ba rab tu gces// phyi yul lus la bde ba skye// tha mal lus su tshor ba med// nang yul dbugs la

'gyu mi tshor// tha mal rlung gi rtog pa 'gag/ gsang yul sems la bde gsal 'bar/ tha mal nyon mongs 'dod chags med// de ltar yul gsum gsal ba dang// gsang ba'i dgra gsum sod dus mnyam// phyogs bral dmigs pa med pa yis// phyi dgra gzung dang 'dzin pa gsad// 'dod chags bde chen ye shes 'bar// nang dgra dug lnga dug gsum gsad// rnam rtog bag chags mtshan ma zhi// gsang dgra nga bdag rtog pa gsad// skye shi gnyis kyi 'phrang las sgrol// ting 'dzin de yis bdud bzhi bcom// yab yum sku la rdos med par// reg bya phung po'i bdud kyang bcom// bde ba skyes pas nyon bdud sgrol// bar gcod lha yi bu'i bdud bcom// yab yum thabs dang shes rab la// skye 'chi mi mnga' rdo rje'i sku// 'chi bdag bdud bcom rdzogs sangs rgyas// las dang bag chags nyon mongs dang// 'gro drug skye mkhan skye gnas med// de phyir 'gro drug g.yang sa chod// de nas yum nyid kha sbub pa'i// mkha' nas byang sems dkar dmar blang// mtshan ldan ka pA la'i nang du// dza gad bdud rtsi mngar gsum sbyar// de nas bla ma lha rnams kyis// byang sems dmigs pas dbab cing bstim// rang sngags brjod de ngag la bskur// oM b+ho d+hi tsit+ta ka ma la sid+d+hi hUM ma hA su kha ho// a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ de nas bu la yum gtad de// hUM shes rab mtshan ldan bkra shis yum// bden pa dbyer med bde chen bskyed// 'khor lo'i gnas bzhir dbab bzung la// brten nas chos nyid don rtogs byos// oM sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya pradz+nyA sha ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ a ho su kha b+hany+dza mok+Sha hoH/ de nas ras kyi yol ba'i phyir// slob bu yab yum lhar gsal gdab// rtsa rlung thig le'i gnad bstan la// mkha' gsang byin brlab dbab gzung bzlog/ dgram dang rgyas gdab 'khrul 'khor gyis// bde mchog lhan skyes rtogs goms sbyang// sems kyi dri ma des dag pas// bde chen lam bsgom rjes gnang sbyin// de ltar yab yum sbyor ba'i tshe// yul gsum gsal bar gyur ma gyur// gsang ba'i dgra gsum sod ma sod// 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi chom ma choms// 'gro drug g.yang sa chod ma chod// tshad dang ldan nam bla mas brtag/ ldan na nyon mongs ma spangs dag/ rang byung ye shes rang shar te// sa rnams non te phyir mi ldog/ go 'phang dbang gis bgrod par byed// de nas rig pa'i dbang bskur te// lag tu rdo rje dril bu gtad// me long shel bcas brda' ru 'phyar// tshig gis mtshon pa'i don ngo sprad// hUM sems nyid gsal la 'dzin rtog med// ka dag lhun grub ye shes sku// gnyis med 'dzin bral thugs rje'i gsung// rang rig yang dag rdo rje'i thugs// dz+nyA na pany+tsa

d+harma kA ya a/ de ltar gsang dbang yongs rdzogs nas// yang gsang lta ba spyi 'byams dbang// yongs rdzogs rgyal thabs 'di nyid de// shes rab mig ldan gcig la bskur// slob dpon mnyam gzhag phyag rgya'i mthil// a dkar gsal 'tsher gcig la gzhag/ dgongs pa chos nyid ngang la gzhag/ slob bus nor bu rin chen thogs// dpon dang slob bu yab yum kun// kun bzang yab yum skur gsal gdab// hUM thams cad lhun grub kun tu bzang po dngos// rang bzhin brjod med kun tu bzang mo'i ngang// gnyis med thabs kyi rgyal pos yongs la khyab// dbyer med chos kyi dbyings su dbang bskur bas// kun tu bzang po rang byung bcom ldan 'das// chos kyi dbyings la gcig tu bzhugs pa yi// rang rig byang chub sems kyi lha yin te// don dam sems kyi lha la bdag phyag 'tshal// phyag g.yas ar bcas slob bu'i spyi gtsug gzhag/ hUM kun tu bzang po dri ma med pa yi// yongs la dbang bsgyur ye shes rgyal por shar// rang sems rnam dag lta ba'i rgyal por shar// byang chub snying po bde ba chen por shar// thams cad ma lus lhun grub chos kyi sku/ chos rnams thams cad rang gi sems su 'dus// sems kyi bdag nyid ci yang ma yin pas// thig le spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// mnyam pa'i rgyal po kun la dbang bsgyur te// chos nyid rig pa'i rgyal po rdzogs pa che// ma 'dres cir yang ston pa theg pa'i mchog/ 'di dag ma lus myur du rdzogs bya'i phyir// spyi blugs lta ba'i dbang mchog 'di bskur bas// yongs kyi dbang rdzogs stobs kyi rgyal por 'gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pa la pa tra/ g+hu h+ya rA dza ta na sha sarba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas lta ba'i dbang bskur te/ slob ma'i mig mdun mkha' la gtad// hUM ltos shig ltos shig rigs kyi bu// mdun gyi nam mkha' 'di la ltos// gsal la dwangs pa mtha' dang bral// gang la'ang 'dzin med bde chen 'di// lta ba phyogs lhung bral ba yin// 'di nyid don la gnas par gyis// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// a ti ho// de nas bsgom pa'i dbang bskur te/ hUM ltos shig ltos shig rigs kyi bu// rang gi sems la nang du ltos// gsal la mi rtog ma yengs pa// mar me rlung gis ma bskyod 'dra// bsgom pa rang gsal 'dzin med yin// 'di yi don la rtag tu sgoms// dus gsum sangs rgyas bsgom nyams yin// a ti ho// de nas 'bras bu'i dbang bskur te// hUM ltos shig ltos shig skal ldan khyod// chos sku 'gyur med don la ltos// smra bsam brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das// mkhur ba chus bkang smra 'dod 'dra/ gang yang ma grub stong pa'i ngang// mi skye mi 'gag chos kyi sku// 'bras bu mi 'gyur gdeng

ldan yin// 'di yi don la gnas par gyis// dus gsum sangs rgyas 'di la gnas// a ti ho/ de nas spyod pa'i dbang bskur te// hUM nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi bu// rang byung ye shes rol pa la// ma 'gags thabs kyi rgyal po yis// gang snang sangs rgyas mdzad spyod la// ci bder spyod pa rang sar grol// spyod pa spyi 'byams yangs dog med// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgongs spyod yin// a ti ho// de ltar lta bsgom spyod 'bras bzhi// sus thob don la rab gnas na// theg pa spyi 'byams dbang chen 'thob// dbang rnams de las rab tu 'phros// de phyir dbang gi rgyal po yin// hUM bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa che// 'di las 'phros pas grol lam ste// ting 'dzin gsum dang dbang chen gsum// cho ga gsum dang lhar gsal gdab// byin brlab dbang bskur ye shes bstim// phyi nang gsang ba phyag rgyas mchod// bstod bskul 'dzab bsnyen dbul la sogs// bskyed rim grol ba'i lam yin te// thams cad sems kyi cho 'phrul yin// rang sems rtsal sbyong chen po'o// hUM lha rnams gnas su rdzogs rim ni// yid ni yab la chos ni yum// phung po yab la 'byung ba yum// rnam shes yab la yul lnga yum// dbang po yab la dus bzhi yum// nyon mongs drug ni sprul pa'i sku// lus chos yab la mu bzhi yum// thabs ni yab la shes rab yum// rang bzhin de ltar shes pas na// ma bsrungs ma bsgrubs rang lhar gnas// rang byung gnas 'gyur rdzogs rim yin// rang byung lhun rdzogs rdzogs chen ni// sangs rgyas thabs mkhas thugs rje yis// theg sgo bsam mi khyab gsungs kyang// thams cad blo yi 'bring thabs yin// chos rnams thams cad sems su rdzogs// chos kun bden pa dbyer med pas// thams cad yin la gang yang min// sangs rgyas mthar thug chos kyi sku// kun la rdzogs te ngo ma shes// hoH'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// 'khrul snang 'dzin pa gnyis su byung// yang dag don la dbye ba med// gnyis ka rang gi sems la rdzogs// hoHchos su 'dzin pa thams cad ni// spros pa blo yi chos yin phyir// sku gsum rang yang grangs su zad// 'dus byas chos kyis sangs mi rgya// hoHsangs rgyas chos su 'dzin pa ni// mthar thug 'khrul blo chen po yin// sangs ni chos min gcig gis rgya// blo las 'das pa rdzogs chen yin// hoHrgyas bsdus rim par rang lus bzhin// rim pa dbang gis bgrod par bya// sa ma ya ni shel gong ltar// gzhi ni dam tshig gtsang mas bzung// ting 'dzin lus dang grib ma ltar// nyams su ting nge 'dzin gyis long// man ngag gar chang 'thung ba ltar// don ni man ngag zab mos bsgrub// lta ba nam mkha'i mdung skor

bzhin// thag dang 'phang ni lta bas bcad// spyod pa mi sha rlon pa bzhin// la ni spyod pas dor bar bya// zung du 'brel la gol sa med// tshig tu rtog la ma brten par// sku gsum don po gcig tu dril// mtha' drug rgyud la rdzogs par gyis// mthar thug don dam nang nas 'char// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bzhin// thams cad stong pa'i ngang la gnas// hoHde ltar dbang rnams yongs rdzogs par// bskur ba'i yon tan bsam mi khyab// gsang sngags dngos grub dbang las 'byung// thob rtags mkha' 'gros lung bstan cing// ltas su yid bzhin gtsug na 'chang// mgo la nyi shar dmag dpon byed// mgo dang ro stod yang la bde// bum bcud 'thung dang zas bcud zos// rang rig rtsal la dbang bsgyur nus// dbang ma thob pa'i nyes pa ni// shes rab gsum rlom las bsog kyang// 'bras bu med cing rlag par byed// dbang yon ma phul shin tu nyams// de nas dbang yon dbul ba ni// byin rlobs dbang gi bla ma la// rgyal srid yul 'khor rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor dbyig dbul// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ gsang ba yongs rdzogs kyi dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams mgrin gcig tu/ ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ dam tshig chen po kun tu bzang// rdo rje 'chang kun yongs kyi rje/ rgyud don dam tshig chos kyi srog/ bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol bar don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams rtse gcig nyon// rgyud don dam tshig bsrung bya ba/ rtsa ba sku gsung thugs dang ni// yan lag nyi shu rtsa lnga las// spros na bsam gyis mi khyab kyang// rtsa ba yan lag nyams mi bya// yang na mnyam rdzogs chen por gnas// sku yi dam tshig rdo rje ste// slob dpon mched dang lcam dral la// brdeg btsog skur ba nam yang min// ngan sems 'phya sems gcig mi bya// gsung gi dam tshig dbang thob nas// yi dam dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyi// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// bla med theg mchog mi spang ngo// thugs kyi dam tshig gsang ba bcu// gnas dang dus grogs thams cad gsang// sgrub rdzas lag cha thams cad gsang// ma gsang mu stegs 'chal bar 'gyur// sman dang gtor ma mchod rdzas gsang// de ma gsang na dngos grub nyams// spyi 'dzab rtsa ba'i snying po gsang// ma gsang mthu dang byin brlabs nyams// sngags pa sngags dang phyag rgya gsang// de ma gsang na smyon par 'gyur// sbyor dang sgrol ba'i lag len gsang// ma gsang

skye bo'i ya gar 'gyur// phrin las mdzad spyod kun kyang gsang// de ma gsang na ras bar yang chod 'gyur// rgyud dang sgrub thabs man ngag gsang// ma gsang mkha' 'gro'i bka' chad 'ong// mdor na gsang ba 'os rigs gsang// de ma gsang na lkugs par 'gyur// ched du gnyer gtad man ngag gsang// ma gsang nyams pa chen por 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni// nyams na bskal pa gcig gnyis gsum// rdo rje dmyal bar gdon mi za// shes bya lnga dang spyad bya lnga// mi spang lnga dang bsgrub bya lnga// dang len lnga ni yan lag ste/ nyams na mnar med dmyal bar 'gro// gzhan yang khyad par dam tshig dang// bla ma bkur zhing gsung mi bcag/ thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor yengs mi bya// lha dang sngags la the tshom spangs// mched lcam kun la gdung sems bskyed// sems can kun la snying rjes bskyang// nga rgyal rlom sems zhe sdang dang// 'dod chags phrag dog khar mi btang// gsang sngags lta spyod zung du sbrel// bskyed rdzogs bsnyen bsgrub mtha' ru dbyung// le lo gnyid dang chang dbang spang// yang dag don gyi dam tshig tu// 'khor 'das chos rnams rang rig sems// gdod nas rang byung chos sku'i ngang// de nyid ye nas bsrung nyams ni// mi bsrung blo yis dor du med// nyams skyon thob bya'i 'bras bu med// ma spangs mi gnas gzung 'dzin 'das// skye med gnyen pos mi shigs dam// mu stegs bdag tu 'dzin pa tshig/ snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyang// dam tshig dag la brten te rgyas// da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang// dam tshig 'di la rab tu gnas// slad kyis 'byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyang// dam tshig dag la brten nas rgya// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ dam tshig dag la brten pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ sprul pa'i sku mchog kun tu bzang// skye med chos te sna tshogs ston// rgyud don mtha' rgyas yid bzhin gter// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs te// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyud don mtha' rgyas cha dang rkyen// man ngag la sogs bsam yas kyang// dgos pa mdo tsam bshad par bya// ji ltar 'dod pa'i don rjod cig/ de skad rjes su gnang ba dang// gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje chos// dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar// kye ho dpal chen yid bzhin mdzod// bde gshegs zhi khro yongs rdzogs pa'i// gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud mchog gi/ nyams len mdor bsdus bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i

don gsungs pa// bde gshegs yongs rdzogs gsang rgyud kyi// mdor bsdus nyams len sgrub lugs gsum// skye dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen te// gcig la gcig brten gcig gi ngang// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i tshul// phyi ni rdul tshon dkyil 'khor la// brten nas skyed pa'i rnal 'byor ni// gong du bstan pa'i sgrub chen yin// de yang gang zag blo rigs kyis// rab tu spros la mi dga' bas// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa'am// yang na zhi khro dgos sgrub bam// che mchog yab yum gnyis su dril// thugs sgrub hUM du bsgrub kyang rung// rgyud 'di sor gzhag kho na ltar// bde gshegs rtsa ba yongs rdzogs pas// rigs lnga zhi khro bka' brgyad gtso// rtsa ba'i lha tshogs go gcig skyed// nyi ma dang ni zer bzhin du// 'khor rnams rang bzhin lhan skyes rung// mdor na sku mdog phyag mtshan sogs// zhal phyag mang nyung bsam yas kyang// ye shes lha la rang rgyud par// rtsis gdab khrigs su gcad pa med// gdul bya'i blo dang gang mthun par// chos sku'i rang rtsal cir yang snang// thams cad sems kyi cho 'phrul yin// dkyil 'khor lha sngags ting nge 'dzin// rgyas bsdus gang ltar bsgom yang rung// nyams len bde la don mi 'gyur// de phyir bde chen g.yung drung lha// 'du 'bral med pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// sems 'dzin sems kyi rtsal sbyangs pas// de phyir sgrub chen bskyed pa yin// nang ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid la// brten nas rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa ni/ sngon 'gro'i las rnams kyang gsum sngon du song byas nas// ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i ldan tshul lha bsgom pa// ye nas kun gzhi stong gsal de bzhin nyid// de nyid kun khyab kun snang snying rje'i ngang// 'gag med rol ba hUM ni kun gyi rgyu// ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom// de bzhin 'byung ba rim pa lnga brtseg kyang// ma bskyed rang la rdzogs tshul 'di ltar bsgom// sems nyid nam mkha' stong gsal e yi ngang// 'gyu byed 'thor rlung skyod byed stobs ldan yaM// sdud byed khrag gyi rgya mtsho chu yin ra// gzugs ni rab brtan sha ni sa yin suM// smin byed drod kyi rang bzhin me yin raM// sgal tshigs rus pa'i ri rab brtsegs pas keM// khog pa gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin b+h+rUM/ yab yum byang sems dkar dang dmar mthing gis// srog rtsa dbu ma drang po tshangs pa'i thig/ 'khor lo bzhi yi tshangs thig cha bzhir bgo/ rtse chung gnyis rtse tshangs pa'i rtsa la zug/ de smad rtse chen long rtsa gnyis la zug/ lag gnyis blta rtsa bla rtsa rnam pa gnyis// phan tshul bsnol nas 'brel pa rtsa gnyis te// de bzhin srog pa'i rtsa la rab tu gyes// pho brang ling tshe dgu yi tshul du tshang// ling tshe re la rtsa yi 'dab bzhi

bzhi// phyogs bzhir gyes pas 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i tshul// rtsa yi rgyal po srog pa'i rtsa de las// rtsa chen bzhi gyes rtsa chen cha gcig ni// a wa la thug dbang po 'char byed rtsa// rtsa bran lnga brgya'i 'khor dang 'du 'phro byed// rtsa chen gcig dang gnyis 'brel dbang po rgyu// rtsa bran lnga brgya'i 'khor dang 'du 'phro byed// rtsa chen gcig dang de ltar 'brel byed pa'i// 'khor lo sgyur byed rgyu yang rtsa ste lnga brgyar ldan// rtsa chen gcig dang gsang 'brel 'byung byed rtsa// rtsa bran lnga brgya'i 'khor dang 'phro 'du byed// de yang klad pa'i a wa d+hU ti las// mtshon rtsa dgu bcu phyi nang rten 'brel gyis// dbang po rgyu byed rtsa la de bzhin pas// 'khor lo sgyur yang rgyu byed rtsa la de bzhin pas// 'byung ba skyed byed rtsa la de bzhin no// brgya dang nyi shu lpags pa'i mtshon rtsa yin// brgya dang nyi shu rus pa'i mtshon rtsa yin// brgyad dang nyi shu gdags sribs mtshon pa'i rtsa// rtsa ba'i rtsa bzhi srog pa'i rtsa dang lnga// de ltar bdun brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga po// bde gshegs bdun brgya nyer lnga'i pho brang yin// ma bskyed rang rtsal yongs su rdzogs pa ste// de bzhin b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas rang gi mgo/ snying nang zla gam ye shes dgu 'char bas// zla gam sgo dgu dngos grub yid bzhin gter// tsit+ta'i pho long ba su'i dra phyed dang// zhing lpags bla bre rak+ta'i rgya mtsho dang// sha chen keng rus dri chen dri chu dang// nang gi dur khrod gnas brgyad rang la tshang// nyi zla'i skar khung rang gi mig gnyis la// kha sna gsang bshad dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi yin// de ltar gzhal yas ye nas rang la rdzogs// lha rnams rang la yongs rdzogs 'di ltar bsgom// srog rtsa lus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus yin te// kun gzhi sems kyi rang bzhin de la brten// de phyir che chog yab yum rang rdzogs bsgom// srog rtsa'i shar phyogs snying yin rig pa shar// thugs mchog badzra he ru yab yum bsgom// srog rtsa'i lho mgo dbang po yon tan rgyas// sku mchog gshin rje gshed po yab yum bsgom// srog rtsa'i nub mgrin rtsa 'dus ro mchog nub// gsung mchog pad+ma dbang chen yab yum bsgom// srog rtsa'i byang ste srid pa lte nas chags// phrin las rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum bskyed// srog rtsa'i shar lho gsang gnas bde ba 'bar// bla med he ru ka chen yab yum bsgom// srog rtsa'i lho nub spyi bo dbang gi gnas// rig 'dzin bla ma rdo rje thod rtsal bsgom// srog rtsa'i nub byang rkang g.yas ngar gdong du// rab 'jigs dregs pa kun 'dul yab yum bsgom// srog rtsa'i byang shar rkang g.yon ngar gdong du// bdud 'dul stobs ldan nag po yab yum bsgom// phyi lpags khyams yin lus khyab rab tu gtums// pags pa'i rtsa bran bka' sdod pho nyar bsgom// pags pa'i

gnyer sul rdo rje rwa ba ste// ba spu rnams ni bskal pa'i me ri'o// de ltar gsang ba yongs rdzogs lha rnams kyang// rang rgyud phyogs ris dngos por 'dzin med pas// tshom bu gtso rkyang yab yum gang gsal rung// dbu dang phyag zhabs mang nyung dbyibs kha dog/ ji ltar mos pa'i rjes 'breng rig rtsal yin// de ltar ye rdzogs don shes rang gsal na// spyan drangs bstim mchod bstod bshags bya ba rdzogs// 'dzab kyang rlung gi sgra skad rang sgrar ldan// hUM ring hUM thung khro rgyal kun 'dus sngags// rang byung rdo rje'i glu yis bzlas pa'i tshe// khro tshogs kun gyis dir dir sgrogs par bsam// 'od zer mar 'phros sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyang// 'od zer gyen rdzogs rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom// rtsol med rang rdzogs rtsal sbyangs pas// de phyir rdzogs pa nang sgrub yin// gsang ba sems kyi dkyil 'khor la// brten nas rdzogs chen rnal 'byor ni// gnyis te dkyil 'khor rang rig la// rdzogs pa'i tshul dang nyams len no// rang rig sems su lha rdzogs tshul// snying po rang rig 'khrul mtshams chod// nga bdag dgra bgegs ming med rdzogs// rang sems rtsa bral rang rig pas// bshags bya 'chags byed med par rdzogs// spros bral byin gyis ye shes phebs// byin rlabs rang byung chen por rdzogs// rig pa ye shes 'char sgo phye// brda' sgo dbyer med ngang du rdzogs// chos min don dang rang rig mjal// brda phyag btsal du med par rdzogs// rang sems rdzas mchog 'dod dgur bsgyur// mchod rdzas bsham du med par rdzogs// skye 'gag gnyis med rang byung lha'i// ting 'dzin dbye bsal med par rdzogs// 'byung ba lnga nyid bcom ldan 'das// dbang chen yum lnga dbyer med rdzogs// don gyi snying po tshad las 'das// gzhal yas gsal 'grib med par rdzogs// bde gsal mi rtog dbyer med pas// nyi zla pad gdan mtshon med rdzogs// kun gzhi ma bcos klong yangs su// yid byed dran pa rnam par dag/ ye shes sems dpa' chos skur rdzogs// bdag med rang rig byang chub sems// gti mug rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// ye shes rang shar bde chen don// che mchog he ru'i ngo bor rdzogs// zhe sdang rang rgyud rang dag gis// ye shes rang shar bde gshegs thugs// badzra he ru'i ngo bor rdzogs// nga rgyal rang dag mnyam nyid kyi// ye shes rang shar bde gshegs sku// gshin rje gshed po'i ngo bor rdzogs// 'dod chags rang dag kun rtog gi/ ye shes rang shar bde gshegs gsung// dbang chen rta mgrin ngo bor rdzogs// phrag dog rang dag nan tan gyi// ye shes rang shar bde gshegs phrin// rdo rje gzhon nu'i ngo bor rdzogs// bag chags mngon gyur byang chub

sems// chos kyi skur snang brjid pa'i stobs// bla med he ru'i ngo bor rdzogs// rnam rtog 'gyu byed yid dag pas// longs spyod rdzogs sku 'jigs pa'i stobs// dregs pa kun 'dul ngo bor rdzogs// dug lnga phrag dog rnam dag pas// sprul sku sna tshogs gyad kyi stobs// stobs ldan nag po'i ngo bor rdzogs// sgyu lus rdos bcas rnam dag pas// rgyal ba rig 'dzin thogs med stobs// rdo rje slob dpon ngo bor rdzogs// 'jig rten 'dzin rtog rnam par dag/ bstan pa bsrung mdzad mthun chen stobs// dpal gyi bka' srung ngo bor rdzogs// de ltar yongs rdzogs rgyal ba rnams// cir yang snang thabs yab kyi tshul// shes rab mon 'das yum gyi ngang// lha tshogs de dag thams cad kyang// ye shes mtshon phyir ming du btags// don la rang byung ye shes sku// ma bcos thig le nyag gcig yin// ye nas rang dang lhan cig gnas// spyan drang bzhugs gsol mi dgos rdzogs// bzang ngan med mnyam gnyis med mchod// phyag dang mchod pa mi dgos rdzogs// rang rtsal thabs kyis 'gro don mdzad// phrin las bstod bskul mi dgos rdzogs// mtha' bral snying po brjod du med// bsnyen sgrub 'dzab bzlas mi dgos rdzogs// rang rig dri med 'od gsal lha// chos sku lhun grub 'bras bu yin// de ltar rdzogs pa'i don shes na// gsang ba'i nyams len mthar thug pas// rdzogs pa chen po'i sdom bzhi yin// gza' gtad med pa'i lta ba yis// yin pa med par rang ngo sprad// dmigs gtad med pa'i sgom pa yis/ mi nang med par nyams su blangs// blang dor med pa'i spyod pa yis// yin min med par 'gag kyang bsdam// spang thob med pa'i 'bras bu yis// re dang dogs pa'i gol sa bcad// lta ba'i ngo sprod don gsum ste// chos rnams mnyam nyid ngo sprod cing// grub mtha'i phyogs 'dzin grol ba dang// phyogs ris med par la bzla'o// mnyam nyid rang ngo sprad pa ni// 'khor 'das chos kun cir snang yang// snang ba chos nyid ma yin par// stong pa chos nyid yin pa'am// chos can ma yin chos nyid gcig/ logs nas 'byung bar 'dod pa'am// yod min med min yin sems mam// rang min gzhan min rtog pa'am// rdzun min bden pa min zhe na// de ltar tha dad ma yin te// chos rnams rang byung ye shes nyid// chos min gtad med nyid snang ba// snang na rang snang stong rang stong// snang dang stong pa ye nas mnyam// chos can nyid na chos nyid pas// chos can chos nyid ye nas mnyam// yod pa'i dus na rang bzhin med// yod dang med pa ye nas mnyam// rang mi snang bar gzhan mi snang// rang dang gzhan du ye nas mnyam// rdzun pa nyid na don nyid bden// rdzun dang bden par (4)

ye nas mnyam// ci phyir zhe na sems nyid kyi// ngo bo phyogs lhung gang yang min// de phyir chos min gtad med de// dper na ga pur sman dug bzhin// ye nas mnyam nyid rang ngo sprad// grub mtha'i phyogs 'dzin grol ba yin// chos rnams mnyam nyid mtha' grol la// byis pas rang rgyud bzung ba 'khrul// chad pas stong par bzung bas log/ theg dman snang ba dgrar bltas gol// byang sems gnyen pos sbyangs pas bsgribs// mtha' dbus stong par sgro 'dogs 'byams// sngags la phyi nang dag snang du// bsgyur bas chos min gting ma rtogs// mdor na phyogs 'dzin lta ba'i bdud// gza' gtad med pa'i lta ba yis// chos min rtogs pas phyogs 'dzin grol// phyogs ris med pa'i la bzla ni// chos can dngos po gang rung la// byung tshul ming gzugs mtshan dpe dang// las dang kha dog dbyibs su bral// bsam pas brtags na 'di yin med// yod pa'i phyogs su ma lhung zhing// cir yang snang bas med pa yi// phyogs su yang ni rgya ma chad// gnyis ka'i ngos nas rang snang ba'i// gnyis med phyogs su ma lhung bas// mnyam nyid rgya chad ris med par// yang dag don gyi la bzla'o// bsgom pa'i nyams len la gsum ste// bdag 'dzin ro dang dbral ba dang// bden rdzun 'khrul pa gzhig pa dang// yin min blo dang dbral ba'o// bdag 'dzin ro dang dbral ba ni// sgom byed mkhan po nga bdag ste// bsgom bya sgom byed dmigs pas 'khor// nga bdag nyid kyis nyid la brtag/ ngo bo lus sems gang gis byas// lus kyis byas na mgo yan lag/ don lnga snod drug sha rus lpags// gang gis byas te der mi snang// gal te sems kyis byas sems na// ngo bo stong pas byed mkhan med// rang bzhin gsal yang gzhi rtsa bral// mtshan nyid 'gyu dran 'dzin chags zhi// gang yang ma grub bdag ma rnyed// de ma rnyed pas bsgom bya yi// chos dang spang bya'i snang ba zhig/ de phyir dmigs gtad kun dang bral// bdag 'dzin ro med ngo sprod do// bden rdzun 'khrul pa zhig pa ni// phyi yi snang yul rang rgyud par// bden cing grub pa med par nges// bden na rigs drug ltar snang dang// mu stegs rtag chad theg dgu yi// mthong snang tha dad ci la rigs// de phyir chos min rang snang zhing// snang ba'i byed mkhan ma grub pas// snang yul bden rdzun 'khrul snang zhig/ gnyis 'dzin 'khrul pa gzhi rtsa bral// yin min blo dang phral ba ni// de ltar 'khrul gzhi rtsa bral bas// bsgrub bya 'di yin bsgrub tu med// spang bya 'di min spang du med// thams cad yul med rig pa nyid// phyogs med rang snang yul med grol// yin min blo dang der bral mod// spyod pa'i 'gag sdom la yang

gsum// chos byas gzung 'dzin gcad bya zhing// ma bcad lhun grub rdzogs pa dang// sgyu ma mnyam nyid 'gag bsdam mo// ched byas gzung 'dzin bcad pa ni// gza' gtad med pa'i lta ba yis// yin pa med pa'i phyogs las grol// dmigs gtad med pa'i bsgom pa yis// min pa med par grogs su 'char// blang dor med pa'i spyod pa yis// yin min med pas ci yang spyad// chos nyid klong las 'das pa med// dge bcu pha rol phyin drug dang// chos spyod bcu sogs 'di blang bya// mi dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga// rnam smin sdig che 'di sbyang bya// mtshan ma rang dag gzhi med pas// blang dor gzung 'dzin ming med de// yin min gnyis kyi chos las 'das// ma spyad lhun grub rdzogs tshul ni// de ltar lta sgom chos nyid kyi// ngang las 'gro sa ma rnyed pas// mi dge bcu dang sgrib gnyis sogs// ma spangs chos min lhun gyis grub// dge bcu chos spyod tshogs chen gnyis// ma btsal chos min lhun gyis grub// bsgrub bya sku dang ye shes sogs// ma sgrubs lhun gyis rdzogs pa'o// sgyu ma mnyam nyid 'gag bsdam ni// 'khor 'das kyis bsdus chos thams cad// sgyu ma'i dpe dgu ji bzhin du// yod nas snang ba ma yin te// yod pa nyid nas rang snang phyir// skye ba med pas thams cad skye// skyes tsam nyid nas skye med de// snang ba'i dus na snang bar mnyam// stong pa'i dus na stong par mnyam// gnyis ga'i dus na gnyis su mnyam// gnyis med gnyis su med par mnyam// mnyam nyid phyogs las grol bas na// sgyu ma lta bur 'gag bsdam mo// 'bras bu'i la bzla la yang gsum// rgyu 'bras yul 'das thag gcad cing// spang thob mtshan med gtan tshigs dang// bsgrub med ye rdzogs la bzla'o// rgyu 'bras yul 'das thag gcod ni// gong bzhin bdag 'dzin ro bral bas// rgyu ni sems can yul las 'das// chos nyid ci yang ma yin pas// 'bras bu sangs rgyas yul las 'das// mnyam nyid phyogs bral 'dzin med pas// rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi yul las 'das// 'das ma 'das kyi blo grol bas// gnyis med kyi yang yul las 'das// spang thob med pa'i gtan tshigs ni// bsgom pa min pa med pas na// gang snang thams cad grogs su shar// de la spang bya'i yul med pas// lta ba yin pa med pas na// phyogs las grol te thob yul med// de phyir spang thob mtshan ma med// bsgrub med ye rdzogs la zlo ni// lta ba yin pa med par rtogs// mngon du gyur pas chos kyi sku// sgom pa yin pa med pa ru// rang sar grol bas longs spyod sku// spyod pa min pa med pa ru// 'gro don rdzogs pa sprul pa'i sku// gnyis ka chos nyid de bzhin nyid// gcig tu rdzogs pas

ngo nyid sku// phyogs bral kun rdzogs chen po ru// la zlos chos zad bde chen sku// de ltar klong gyur ma btsal bar// ye nas lhun gyis yongs rdzogs pas// re dogs gnas med la bzla'o// de ltar nyams su len pa ni// yongs rdzogs a ti'i dgongs pa ste// rgyud mchog 'di yi khong snying yin// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las// gsang ba nyams len yongs rdzogs mdor bsdus kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams mgrin gcig tu// ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ srid pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang// rtsa ba'i che mchog he ru ka/ lus gnad rtsa yi man ngag gnad// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol ba'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// spyir na rnal 'byor lus gnad rtsa// stong phrag phyed dang bzhi brgyar 'dus// de las bsdu na stong phrag gcig/ bdun cu rtsa gnyis de bsdu na// nyis khri chig stong drug brgya yod// de yang bsdu na 'khor lo bzhi// de bsdus la la ra sa nA// a wad+hU tI dang gsum mo// rtsa rnams lus la gnas tshul ni// dra ba g.yogs bzhin 'brel nas gnas// rags pa 'khor lo bzhi yi rtsa// spyi gtsug klad pa bde chen gyi// 'khor lo rtsa 'dab so gnyis pa// gdugs rtsibs ltar gnas de dbus na// yi ge haM mgo thur bsten gnas// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo AH// rtsa 'dab bcu drug gnas lugs ni// bum ske'i dra ba lta bur gnas// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo na// rtsa brgyad 'dab brgyad pad+ma 'dra// de dbus yi ge hUM du gnas// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na// rtsa 'dab drug cu rtsa gnyis ni// gser khri lta bur gnas pa'i dbus// rtsibs bzhi'i dbus na ma a yang gnas so// phyi ni 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i tshul// dbus na ye shes rtsa gnas pa// de mdun gti mug g.yas zhe sdang// g.yon na nga rgyal phrag dog zur// rgyab na 'dod chags rtsa gnas so// dbus kyi rtsa mchog a d+hU tI// g.yas kyi rtsa mchog la la nA'o// g.yon kyi rtsa mchog ra sa nA'o// d+hU tI rang la gsum yin te// thabs kyi d+hU tI rgyungs pa ste// de nas byang sems dkar po rgyu// shes rab d+hU tI srog pa'i rtsa// de nas byang sems dmar po rgyu// gsang ba a wa d+hU tI'i rtsa// rtsa gnyis bar na drang por gnas// de ni dper na ba thag la// nyi zer phog pa lta bur yod// de nyid rtsa ba mtshan mar zug/ rtse mo spyi gtsug 'khor lo'i dbus// tshangs pa'i bu ga'i nang na gnas// de nas sor gsum klad pa'i dbus// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ste// rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi// dbus na de nyid gnas pa yin// de 'og bcu gsum sor 'og

na// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo yi// rtsa 'dab bcu drug dbus na yang// de nyid zang thal gnas pa yin// de nas an stong rus pa yi// tshigs gnyis bar nas mdun du 'khyog/ snying ga chos 'khor rtsa 'dab brgyad// de nyid dbus na zang thal te// lte ba sprul 'khor rtsa 'dab ni// drug cu rtsa gnyis dbus zang thal// dper na 'khor lo'i srog shing 'dra// g.yas kyi la la nA yi rtsa// dbu ma'i g.yas 'grims yar phyung ste// mig g.yas lcibs la slebs nas su// sna sgo g.yas nas rlung rgyu ba'i// las kyang de yis byed pa yin// de rtsa ltag pa g.yas su 'khyog/ an stong rus pa'i d+hU tI la// 'khril nas d+hU tI'i g.yas 'grims te// spu ni nag gu'i mtshams su sleb// g.yon phyogs ra sa nA'i rtsa yang// yar 'gug mig g.yon lcibs su sleb// sna sgo g.yon nas rlung rgyu ba'i// las kyang de yis byed pa yin// de rtsa ltag pa'i an stong nas// d+hU tI dang gshibs spu nag gu'i// dkyil du slebs nas gnas pa yin// de ltar g.yas g.yon mar sna gnyis// d+hU tI'i sgor tshud de'i yon tan// rtsa rlung bsgoms pas d+hU tIr rlung// tshud pas phyag rgya chen por 'char// de bzhir d+hU tIr rlung tshud tshe// rtog pa rang 'gag ye shes 'char// shugs kyis d+hU tIr rlung tshud tshul// pho mo bde ba spyad rjes su// byang sems phebs tshe d+hU tIr tshud// dran med bde la sma mi shes// de bzhin brgya lam 'chi khar yang// d+hU tIr rlung tshud cang mi dran// de phyir a wa d+hU tI ni// mi rtog chos dbyings ye shes rtsa// de nas rtsa gnas rim pa'o// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las// lus la rtsa gnas yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal chen po che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ 'byung ba'i rang rtsal kun tu bzang// thabs chen rgyal po he ru ka/ 'gyu byed stobs ldan rlung gi gnad// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol ba'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// 'khor 'das bzang mo zab mo yang kun gzhi dang// ma rig 'gyu byed rlung dbang gis// mnga' sgor khu khrag stor chags nas// lo gcig zla ba bcu gnyis bar// zhag re la ni rtsa'i bye brag/ nyis brgya nyis brgya skyed 'phel bas// stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis rtsa// rim gyis chags shing de bskyed de// rtsa yi gtso bo srog pa'i rtsa// 'gyu ba rlung gis sems de grangs// nyi khri chig stong rlung rgyus pas// de las 'bras bu brgyad khri dang// bzhi stong dag tu rang shar cing// de nyid rnam grangs mang gis kyang// rtsa bar bsdus na sde brgyad de// phyi rlung nang rlung gsang rlung

dang// rlung la nyams len goms rtags dang// gegs sel rlung gi yon tan no// de yang phyi ni rlung brgyad de// lus 'degs rlung dang 'byung snyom rlung// phung po 'jig rlung rgyun gcod rlung// 'byin byed rlung dang las byed rlung// 'bigs byed rlung dang khyab rlung ngo// nang ni yang ni rlung brgyad de// gyen rgyu thur du sel ba'i rlung// dwangs snyigs 'byed rlung bkrag gzi skyed// snying rje me dang me mnyam rlung// dwangs snyigs phyir 'byed shes rab rlung// gsang rlung kun gzhi byang chub sems// rlung gis las ni zhag gcig la// nyi khri dang ni chig stong rgyu// bsdu na nyon mongs ye shes rlung// zhag re la yang rlung de gnyis// khri tsho re dang lnga brgya rgyu// de yang 'byung 'jug gnas pa yi// rlung gsum dag tu 'dus pa yin// 'byung ba'i rlung ni sor bcu drug/ phyir 'byung nang rlung sor bcu drug/ nang 'jug gnas rlung skad cig tsam// lte ba dag na gnas pa yin// rlung la zhon nas yid 'gyu bas// 'khor ba skyed byed rlung yang yin// de phyir rigs drug rang la tshang// de nas rtsa rnams 'bri tshul yang// lo gcig lon nas lo brgya'i bar// zhag re lon nas rtsa gnyis gnyis// bri nas lo brgyas nus pa 'jig/ de tshe rigs pa byang chub sems// snying rje med pa'i rlung la zhon// gsang ba nas thon dmyal bar skye// rig pa thur rgyu'i rlung la zhon// bshang lam nas thon yi dwags skye// rigs pa me mnyam rlung la zhon// lte ba nas thon byol song skye// yang na rig pa byang chub sems// bkrag dang gzi mdangs rlung la zhon// mig g.yas nas thon lha gnas skye// rig pa dwangs snyigs 'byed rlung zhon// kha sna nas thon mi ru skye// rigs pa phyir 'byed rlung la zhon// ltag rtsa nas thon lha min skye// yang ni rig pa byang chub sems// gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung la zhon// tshangs bug nas thon bcu gsum non// rig pa shes rab rlung la zhon// snying ga'i dbus nas ye shes lam// mig g.yon 'bras bu rang ngo shes// thams cad rang byung ye shes 'char// de ltar rlung dang rig pa gnyis// don byed gcig la mtshan nyid gnyis// rang rig mtshan nyid dran zhing gsal// rlung gi mtshan nyid bskyod 'khrugs sems kyang 'bebs// de gnyis bsdang ba'i dper brjod ni// rig pa 'phye bo mig can 'dra// rlung ni rta long rkang can 'dra// de gnyis bsdongs pas phyogs bcur bgrod// de phyir rnam shes rlung gis bskyod// sgo lnga'i yul sogs kun tu rgyu// rig pa'i rgyu dang rlung rkyen 'dzom// 'khor ba'i bya ba thams cad byed// mi rta bral na 'gro rgyu med// de bzhin lam gyi rnal 'byor pas// d+hU tIr rlung bzung bsgom pa'i tshe// rta med 'phye bo dang 'dra ba'i// rig pa rlung med g.yo 'gul med// rig pa las su

rung ba yin// mig med rta pho dang 'dra ba'i// spyod byed rlung rta rig med pa'i// 'gro bar mi nus rang dbang thob// de tshe yang dag rang ngo sprod// rlung rig rang dwangs der sangs rgya'o// de phyir rlung 'dzin nyams len ni// sngon du tshogs bsag bla ma mchod// bgegs bsrung skyabs 'gro sems bskyed bya// khams gso bcud kyi sman mar sbyar// dngos gzhi'i dus su 'brel mtshams gcad// dben par 'bol ba'i stan la 'dug/ lha gsal nga rgyal mos pa bya// rkang pa rdo rje skyil krung bca'// sgal tshigs gser gyi dong tse bsrang// seng ltar stod 'gyings yid dgyer bya// rma bya'i mgrin bzhin yid dgug pa// lag gnyis mnyam gzhag lder tsho 'dra// mig 'bras sna yi rtse la dbab// lus gnad drug la legs goms nas// dag rlung 'bru gsum 'khor lo ni// rngub bskyil 'phang dang bskor bas te// bde gshegs rnams kyi yang snying mchog/ rngub rlung oM la bskyil gnas AH// 'phang ba hUM yin rlung gsum gyi// gnas pa AHla zin nan bskyed// 'khor lo bskor ba gang zhe na// sna bug g.yas nas rlung rgyu tshe// thabs rlung nyon mongs rlung yin phyir// mi bzung bzung na rlung log 'ong// sna bug g.yon nas rgyu ba'i tshe// shes rab ye shes rlung yin phyir// bzung na skyon med nyams rtogs 'phel// sna bug gnyis nas mnyam rgyu'i tshe// thabs shes gnyis su med pa'i rlung// a wa d+hU tI'i sgor tshud pas// 'di dus 'bad na ye shes 'char// de phyir rlung bzung gnad 'di ste// gru gu 'chams pos bshang sgo bsdam// sngon du 'og rlung bsdams te 'then// hUM ring gsum gyis rlung dug phyung// 'og rlung bsdams te steng rlung ni// rngub cing mnan te bskyil bar bya// tshad du slebs tshe mda' ltar du// sna nas mnga' gang tshad du 'phang// yang rngub yang bskyil yang 'phangs te// gnas pa'i rlung de bskyil yun bsring// 'byongs tshe d+hU tIr rlung tshud nas// skyod byed rlung rta g.yo 'gul bral// rig pa gar sbyin sbrang 'byar 'dra// de tshe rlung nyid las rung bas// tha mal shes pa snying dbus sad// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// ma bcos byang chub sems rtogs pas// nyon mongs rang sangs ye shes rgyas// gsang rlung ngos zin ngo mtshar che// de ltar klung bsgoms 'byongs rtags gsum// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i tshul// phyi rtags drod skye 'phar dang 'dar// 'gro mgyogs yang la 'jigs pa med// nang rtags snang ba sgyu mar rtogs// dbugs 'gyu mi tshor dbugs mi 'gyu// lto gos ched med la sogs 'byung// gsang rtags bde gsal 'dzin pa med// ma bcos bde chen 'gyur med brtan// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin no// bla ma'i man ngag ma thob na// rlung ro lus

nas gegs su 'gyur// mdor na rngub dgang 'phen la sogs// gtong ran bzung tshad ma shes shing// 'khor lo'i go rim log kyang gegs// 'gyur tshul srog rtsar rlung 'grims te// shor ba srid na smyo nas 'gro// sha mdangs bar du rlung shor na// mdze 'bras dmu chu shig nad 'byung// snying la shor na snying rlung 'byung// thur rlung log na phyi sa dang// byang sems dkar dmar 'dzag pa yin// gyen du log na mgo 'khor zhing// 'khrugs dang stod gzer sna gzer 'ong// de sogs rlung skyon bsam yas kyang// mun la nyi bzhin dug sel thabs// rlung bsgom thun mtshams thams cad du// hUM ring gsum bus rjes su// ha drag yang yang bstud cing gdab// ro stod yang snyam sems na gzhag/ des ni rlung skyon 'ong mi srid// chig chod thabs kyi rgyal po yin// de ltar gegs bsal rlung bsgoms pas// yon tan mngon shes rnam drug dang// spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'byung// sems ma zin pa zin par 'gyur// zin pa brtan gyur rig rtsal sbyang// mkha' spyod 'pho ba grong 'jug dang// chu la mi 'bying brag rjes thon// rkang mgyogs lha srin bran du 'khol// rang rig rtsal dbang nges par 'thob// tshe dbang rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i// yon tan brjod kyis mi lang ngo// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ 'gyu byed stobs ldan rlung gnad yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thig le chen po kun tu bzang// byams chen rgyal po he ru ka/ thig le byang sems gtum mo'i gnad// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol mdzod// de skad gsol ba'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// byang sems thig le'i man ngag gnad// gsang sngags grol lam rgyu yin cing// thabs lam kun gyi mthar thug yin// rtsa gnas lus la rab brten pa'i// byang sems stong phrag bye ba dang// phyed dang bzhi brgya yod na yang// bsdu na dwangs snyigs srog 'dzin gsum// dwangs ma las gyur byang sems ni// bza' btung bcud zos dwangs 'gyur tshul// zhag bdun lon nas chu ser 'gyur// bdun phrag sha la bdun na tshil// bdun phrag bzhi na rkang mar 'gyur// bdun lnga rgyungs pa bdun drug klad// de nas bdun na byang chub sems// thig le dkar po nyid du 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi snyigs ma ni// ngar snabs lud pa la sogs yin// srog 'dzin pa yi byang sems ni// snying dbus khrag gi dwangs ma ste// byi'u len ma'i sgong tshad kyi// dkyil nang 'od kyi gong bu ni// sran ma'i ga'u kha sbyar tshad// de dbus

dran byed shes pa gnas// de ltar gnas lugs legs shes nas// de nyid nyams len gal che ste// lus la rtsa gnas rtsa nang na// byang sems gnas te de zhu nas// bde mchog ye shes 'khor lo 'bar// de phyir byang sems 'ju ba'i las// gtum mo nyid ces de la lnga// phyi nang gsang ba 'bar 'dzag gnad// ngo sprod 'bras bu 'thob 'tshul te// phyi ni rdzas kyi gtum mo bstan// g.yag rgod mkhris pa dron mo ru// sga skya pi ling pho ba ris// tshwa sna tshogs chad zhib btags bsrub// skam thag chod par mnyes zin nas/ bu ram mgo bsdus sran tshad dril// sran tshad gsum gyis zhag gcig dros// drod bul srid na sga dmar sbyar// bsku mnye byas pas ser spongs te// bde drod me ltar 'bar bar nges// nang ni bskyed rim gtum mos te// me dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// lus ni lha yi gzhal yas khang// sgong skogs lta bu'i stong ra bsgom// nang khrol med par dmar sang de// rgya rdza mer bsregs lta bur bsgom// sems nyid che mchog phyag rgya rkyang// me ri'i klong na bzhugs par bsgom// ngag gis oM AHhUM dang gsum// rdo rje'i bzlas pa yid kyis bya// lus bde ngag nus sems rtogs pas// sgo gsum bde drod 'bar bar nges// gsang ba rlung bzung gtum mo ni// 'khrul 'khor gsum gyi sgo gsum gzir// bca' ba lus kyi 'khrul 'khor ni// bde ba'i gdan la tsog pur 'dug/ rkang g.yon bol gong g.yas mthing mnan// gru gu 'bol bas 'phongs stegs bya// g.yas g.yon bsnol ba'i lag mgo yis// bar lhu gnyis kyis 'phar rtsa bsdam// de khongs pus mo gnyis po bsdam// brla chen nang sha spo kyang spe sha dang// rtsa bo che bzhi cha bsgrims la// sems klong me yi 'khor lo bskor// ro stod g.yas su bskor cing bzhu// seng gis g.yengs pas rtsa mig dgram// de 'og ngag bcud 'khrul 'khor ni// lte ba'i lkog na me'i sa bon// raM gnas de la raM brjod pas// me 'bar bde drod 'bar bar bsam// de nas yid kyi 'khrul 'khor ni// yid gsal ma yengs ngar dang bcas// steng rlung mnan cing 'og rlung 'then// khyab byed bar gyi rlung dkrugs te// a long kha ni nem tsam bsdams// rang lus rdo rjer gsal ba yi// lte ba bde bas gang ba la// lus byings me ru 'bar bar bsgom// dug dbyung gegs sel rlung dang mtshungs// rlung nyid las rung drod sbar bas// thig le zhu nas bde drod 'bar// de yi man ngag 'bar 'dzag gnad// steng 'og gnyis kyi rlung yang ni// ha cang bsdams drags ma yin te// skabs su gsang zhing mtshams par mnan// steng rlung thabs kyi rang bzhin las// dkar po 'khyil ba sprin dang 'dra// 'og rlung shes rab rang bzhin nyid// yar la dmar po

'khyil ba ni// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo ru// sprul bzhin dkar dmar 'dres 'khyil bas// lte 'og sor bzhi chos 'byung nas// don dam gtum mo rgya khab tsam// dmar gsal gyen du 'bar ba yis// rtsa bar raM dmar gcig tu gnas// rang nyid lus kyi stong ra ni// rdza bsregs thur la sbub pa 'dra// gsang gnas yi ge yaM dkar las// rlung gi 'od zer gyen du 'gyus// don dam tsaN+Da lI la phog/ raM nyid me 'bar lte ba yis// sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'od du 'bar// de rtags lus ni bem bem byed// sems kyang bag tsam gnas pa 'byung// de nas me nyid snying gang sleb// chos kyi 'khor lo 'od du 'bar// phung po lnga yi rtog pa dang// dug lnga bsregs pas bde drod 'bar// lus 'dar 'phar dang sprug pa 'ong// de nas me lce mgrin par sleb// de rtags dgod dang a i zer// de nas me lce klad dkyil drang// klad pa bde chen 'khor lo dros// lte ba'i thig le byang chub sems// haM mgo thur la bstan pa de// 'od du ltem gyis zhu nas kyang// byang sems thig le bcu drug 'dzag/ de las bde chen skye tshul ni// klad dkyil babs pas dga' ba skye// de phyir mgrin pa'i 'khor lo 'dzag/ de yis bde ba mchog dga' skye// de phyir snying gar bzhi 'dzag pas// dga' bral bde stong dga' ba skye// de phyir lte dbus gnyis 'dzag pas// lus med bsam pa'i bde ba skye// bde stong dbyer med bde ba'i mchog/ lhan skyes ye shes dga' ba skye// bde nyams 'di 'dra smra mi shes// de nyid ngos bzung bsgom byas na// bde stong dbyer med rgyun 'thob 'gyur// thig le byang sems ngo sprad gsum// sems bzung ngo sprod zhen bzlog ste// dang po byang sems gzung thabs ni// spyi gtsug bde chen 'khor lor oM// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lor AH// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lor hUM// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor hAM// byang sems 'khor lor bsgom pa yaM// de las 'od zer gyen du sdud// 'khor lo bzhi yi yi ge bzhi// 'od zhu 'od kyi thig le bzhi// de la sems gtad mi 'phro na// snying gar drag tu gtad la bzung// de las 'phros na 'phros sar gtad// dar cig glod la rjes ngos gzung// rang rig sprin med bar snang bzhin// dngas la gsal ba rang sor zhog/ me long nang gi gzugs brnyan ltar// sal le hrig ge 'dzin med zhog/ de nyid ngo sprod bstan pa ni// de ltar srog 'dzin byang chub sems// bde stong tsit+ta'i dbus su bsad sad kyang// thams cad ye shes rtsal du shes// lhan skyes ye shes ngos zin tshe// shes pa bde gsal mi rtog gsum// rang byung shugs las 'char ba yin// de yang nyon mongs med pas bde// ma 'gags mi 'dzin mi rtog pa'o// de ltar ngo sprod ngo bo rig/ rang

bzhin dngas la rig pa g.yer// sngar ma mthong ba'i don mthong rig/ chos nyid ma bslad rang bzhin dwangs// gsal la ma 'gags 'dzin med bde// de ltar nges rtogs lta ba ste// de las mi yengs sgom pa nyid// de nyid mi nyams spyod pa yin// de nyid mthar phyin 'bras bu'o// mtha' ru zhen pa bzlog pa yang// lta ba rtogs pa'i ngang shugs la// chags pa'i blo med 'khri ba chod// gzung 'dzin sems bral mi phod brdzis// mngon zhen kun bzlog yang dag don// de ltar nyams su lon pa'i tshe// 'da' kar 'bras bu don spyod tshul// gong bstan srog 'dzin byang sems gnyis// ma rig langs zad skye med dang// rang byung rang shar ye shes bstan// spros bral 'gag med 'gro don mdzad// sku gsum lhun grub ngo mtshar che// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ thig le 'bar 'dzag tsaN+Da lI'i gnad yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu/ ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye// ye shes lnga bdag kun tu bzang// khyab bdag chen po he ru ka/ rim lnga gdan gcig yongs rdzogs don// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs te// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// dpal chen khrag 'thung he ru ka'i// bskyed rim rgyas bsdus zhig bsgoms te// rdzogs pa'i rim lnga gdan gcig la// bsgom pa'i don rab 'di lta ste// sngags sems lus dang 'od gsal dang// zung 'jug dag ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje'i bzlas pa srog rtsol rlung// oM dang AHhUM yi ge gsum// 'byung 'jug gnas dang ldan par bsam// gnas pa rgyun bsring dbu mar 'jug/ 'di las khyad 'phags sngags med phyir// rdo rje'i sngags bzlas rim pa'o// sems la dmigs pa'i rim pa ni// lhar gsal snying dbus 'dab brgyad la// dgod bya'i yig 'bru 'di dag ste// yang dag skye med snying po a// a A/ i I// u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e e/ o au/ aM aH/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+ShaH/ dngul dkar lugs nas phyung 'drar gsal// gsal byed phyir la dmigs pa gtad// snang ba'i byang chub sems bskyed de// rtags ni nyi zer 'od 'dra 'byung// dbyangs yig nang la dmigs pa gtad// snang ba mched pa'i ye shes skye// de rtags zla 'od zer 'dra 'byung// dbus kyi a dkar la dmigs na// snang ba nyer thob ye shes kyi// rtags ni mi rtog mun lta bu// bde stong nyid 'char sems dben yin// sgyu lus bsgom pa'i rim pa ni// snying

nang a las 'od dkar 'phros// rang lus sgrib bdag rlung sems 'dres// rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar// g.yas pa rtse lnga g.yon dril bu// seng khri pad zla nyi steng na// skyil krung 'od lnga'i sku yol mdzes// sgyu ma rmi lam 'ja' 'drar bsgom// snang la dngos po ma grub pas// bden snang mi bden sgyu lus yin// 'od gsal bsgom pa'i rim pa yang// rdor sems dpral bar a dkar bsam// a las 'od dkar lus khyab 'phros// sgyu lus 'od zhu a la 'dus// a ni skye ba med pa'i sems// sems las sems byung sems nyid don// stong par thim nas 'od gsal gnas// rtags ni du 'dra rang bzhin med// zung 'jug bsgom pa'i rim pa yang// snang ba'i rnam pa yang cha nas sgyu lus dang// rang bzhin cha nas 'od gsal gnyis// zung 'jug dbyer med sku yin te// stong pa nyid las gzugs gzhan med// gzugs las gud pa'i stong pa med// nam mkha'i ngang nas 'ja' sprin bzhin// zung 'jug mnyam bzhag de ltar bsgom// rim lnga thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor pas// 'da' ka chos nyid 'od gsal gyi// bar dor zung 'jug longs skur bzhengs// smon lam stobs kyis 'gro don 'byung// gsang sngags rgyud sde rgya mtsho yi// bcud mchog nyams len rim lnga yin// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rim lnga gdan gcig la yongs su rdzogs pa bsgom pa gsang sngags lag len gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ zung 'jug bde chen kun tu bzang// sbyor ba'i bdag nyid he ru ka/ sbyor ba bde mchog chags pa'i lam// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang sngags chags sdud sbyor ba yin// rnal 'byor chags pa can grol phyir// bde mchog sbyor lam spyad 'dod na// rang gi bde ba sngon du sbyang// zhing skyes sngags skyes ma sring sogs// mtshan ldan yongs rdzogs mu dra ma// bcu drug lon pa rab tu shis// dbab dang bzung bzlog dgram pa dang// gegs bsal tshad dang ldan nam brtag/ mtshan ldan sha rgyas sna bug gi// g.yas steng yang na snying ga ru// sme ba yod na de yi mkhar// dung can rtsa zhes bya ba gnas// rtsa des rdo rje 'jib bsdam shes// de bzhin rigs ldan gang du dag/ khrus byas rgyan gdags zas bcud gtang// bdud rtsi sman dang dri zhim byugs// zas ngan skyes pa gzhan bsten spang// rgyu 'bras chos bshad spro ba bskyed// chags pa g.yo byed gtam brjod pas// rtog pa gzhan

'gags chags bde skyed// yang ni bskyed phyir 'o 'khyud bya// steng rlung mnan cing 'og rlung bsten// ting 'dzin mi yengs dal gyis bsrub// spyi gtsug bde chen 'khor lo nas// rim gyis dbab cing thad kar gzung// de yang a wa d+hU tI'i rtsa// yar sna spyi gtsug mar gyi sna// rdo rje'i sbu gur zug pa las// g.yas g.yon rtsa gnyis mig sgo nas// ltag pa'i ngos su 'khyog pa las// mgrin pa dgye bar bsrangs pa yis// an stong rus kyi tsigs par sbyar// rtsa gsum der 'dus rang bzhin gyis// bsdams pa de la gzung ba ni// 'og rlung bsdams te shes pa gseng// thig le gyen du 'khyil bar bsam// g.yo dus skabs 'dir ma bzung na// 'og ma rnams ni zin par dka'// mgrin par babs pa'i tshe na yang// mgrin par dgye byas tshigs gnyis sbyar// rtsa gsum 'dus pa'i shugs kyis bsdam// de bzhin snying ga lte 'khor dang// gsang 'khor rdo rje'i rtse mor yang// thig le phebs tshe shes pa gseng// 'og rlung bsdams te bskyil zhing bzung// des mi thub na rdo rje yi// rtsa bar lag g.yon srin mtheb kyis// tshir gyis mnan la rlung yar 'then// bde ba rab skye mi rtog bsgom// bde gsal mi rtog nyams dang ldan// de nas bzlog pa'i las byas te// yum gyis rlung gis tshur phul cing// yab kyi rlung gis tshur la drang// 'og rlung bsdams te rdo rje phyung// dwangs ma tshur 'dus snyigs ma ni// mkhar ru brul yang bu mi 'chag/ dwangs ma bzlog pa'i 'khrul 'khor ni// bshang ba'i lam dgag rgyu zhabs bsdu// lce rtse mar dgug mig bzlog ste// hig brjod 'og rlung gyen du drang// dgram pa 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa yi// dmigs su dgram par bstan pa ni// seng ge rnam grol phyag rgya yis// g.yas bskor g.yon du khyab par dgram// rjes su lus sprug phril phril bya// de dag nyams kyi rim pa yang// spyi bo nas 'dzag dga' ba ste// mgrin par mchog dga' snying ga ru// babs pas lhan skyes dga' ba la// lte bar babs pas dga' bral nyid// gsang ba rdo rjer phebs pa'i tshe// don dam bde stong dbyer med 'char// mi rtog lhan skyes ngos gzung bya// de la zhen na zag bcas gol// gegs ni yas bzlog ma khrems na// chu sri grang shum chu lam tsha// seng ldeng gdus khu til mar sbyar// lus la bsku mnye byas pas sel// bde ba mi skye thig le 'chor// de la dam bshags dbang rdzogs zhu// thabs dang rig pas gegs rnams bsal// 'byongs pa'i tshad dang ldan gyur na// rlung rig gtad cing tshur drangs pas// yum bcud bdag la 'du ba 'byung// 'o ma dro la rdo rjer ldud// 'o ma brgyud nas kha ru 'drongs// snang ba thams cad bde bar 'char// gzhon nu'i sha chags rkang

mgyogs 'grub// ting 'dzin rig rtsal rang dbang thob// snying rje che la chags sems med// rmi lam sgyu ma'i nyams dang ldan// sgrib gnyis bag chags kun byang nas// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs sku 'thob// ces pa bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ bde mchog chags lam yongs rdzogs gnad kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ khams gsum yongs sgrol kun tu bzang// bdud 'dul rgyal po he ru ka/ drag pos tshar gcod sgrol ba'i lam// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs te// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang sngags mtha' sdud sbyor sgrol las// log lta gdug pa can don du// las rgyun gcod pa'i thugs rje yis// drag sngags yongs rdzogs gnam thogs bshad// nga ni kun bzang rdo rje 'chang// rgyal ba kun gyi spyi gzugs yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// nga ni che mchog he ru ka/ srid gsum gdug pa yongs bsgral phyir// che mchog yongs rdzogs drag sngags 'di'o// oM shri ma hA sa ma ya badzra yak+sha he ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra bi shwa kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la hUM/ ma hA srog sha la thun thun ha la ha la hUM hUM phaT dzaHdzaH/ che ge mo nr-i duSh+tAn mA ra ya hUM phaT/ badzra ma hA ta kr-ita gardza gardza hUM phaT/ badzra bi shwa kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la/ ha la ha la/ maN+Da la ma ma trag rak+sha ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ badzra sngags sor bzhag yin yak+sha ma ra trag sha hud de hud ha ra hud b+h+yo/ nA ga nA ge dzaHdzaH/ mA ra ya dzaHdzaHtrag rak+sha baM ril/ tsa tsha pa ta pa tu pa ni yang/ pa tu pa tu ni dzaHdzaH/ oM badzra Ar+ya ya ma/ any+dzu shrI ma tra// a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ a ha ha/ dzaHdzaHha ta ta ha ta ha yang ra kri ma rbad/ kI li kI la ya/ dgra bo nr-i rbad/ nga ni badzra he ru ka/ srid gsum gdug pa yongs bsgral phyir// khrag 'thung yongs rdzogs drag sngags 'di'o// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM AHhUMHha he phaT b+h+yoHhUM ni ma tsin+d+ha tsit+ta yang ma// rdul phran rdul phran/ keM keM ma rak+ta ma ri tsa snying la shad shad/ tsit+ta ma rus la keM keM ru tri sha la rbad rbad/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ dbugs la 'ub 'ub/ a hUM he ma mo b+h+yo dzaH/ ru lu ru lu rak+mo b+h+yo dzaH/ kI li kI la ya dgra bo nr-i rbad rbad// nga ni 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// srid gsum gdug pa yongs bsgral phyir// gshin rje yongs rdzogs drag sngags 'di'o// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hUM phaT/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI ya mAn+ta ka/ ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka dza TI dzaHdzaHtrag rak+sha kha mun tra sa tra snying kha rag ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rak+mo te gul kum yang dzaHdzaHkha la ma nyi ma yang ti b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya ya/ lon

lon// tsaN+Da ma la b+h+yo dzaHsnying kha rak+mo srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo dzaHdzaH/ oM ya mAn+ta ka ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni/ ra yak+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM rnal ma rnal te srog la rngam// srog la mer/ sbris sris kyangal chum/ thum pis thum pis/ lcags kyi skra gcig mas dgra bo'i snying phyung zhig mA ra ya rbad/ kI li kI la ya dgra bo nr-i rbad// hUM/ nga ni pad+ma dbang chen sku// srid gsum gdug pa yongs bsgral phyir// pad+ma yongs rdzogs drag sngags 'di'o// hrIHha dpe gzhan la oM pad+man+ta sogs las sngags thung 'di mi snang ya grI wa hUM phaT/ oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita ha ya gr-I wa ma hA kro d+ha e ka dza TI sa ma ya ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ A ra li dzaHoM thub thub/ myags myags// mug mug/ shar shar// zhar bar b+h+yo// zhir bar b+h+yo// da da klag klag/ du dang du dang// rbad rbud// dza dza b+h+yo b+h+yo/ hUM hUM myags rbad// myogs rbad/ mo ru sad mo du ra yag chod// srog gi snying po kha la dbang po snying la yang rak+ta tsa ra yA/ tad+ya thA/ snying la rbad ya/ khrag ti ma b+h+yo/ ma rig khrag sha yA/ mgo khrag nr-i chod/ sa pa lo yang la chod/ mu lo chod/ sha la khyi khyer/ dgra'i snying srog rtsad nas phyung zhig swA hA/ kI li kI la ya dgra bo nr-i rbad/ nga ni rdo rje gzhon nu che// srid gsum gdug pa yongs bsgral phyir// phur bu yongs rdzogs drag sngags 'di'o// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ dzaHhUM aHma rak+mo yak+mo/ kA la rU pa/ snying rtsa la yaM yaM/ srog rtsa la yaM yaM// snying la phril phril/ srog la chum chum/ tsit+ta srog la tung tung/ snying khrag shad dzaHthum ril li li/ snying rtsegs rtsegs 'ur 'ur/ shig shig gul gul/ myags myags/ sod sod/ d+ha d+hi ma ma karma shI g+h+raM ka rA ya// mA ra se na bra marda na ye hUM phaT/ kI li kI la ya/ dgra bo nr-i rbad// nga ni bla med he ru ka/ srid gsum gdug pa yongs bsgral phyir// ma mo yongs rdzogs drag sngags 'di'o// oM gu h+ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka gu h+ya dz+nyA na kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ ma ma yo gi ni ru lu ru lu b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM badzra ni la kha T+wAM kro d+hI shwa rI/ b+ha ga pad+mar+Ya/ bde klong shwa na ma dza dza b+h+yo/ ma ma trag rak+sha/ ru lu ru lu rak+mo snying khrag la b+h+yo/ trag rak+sha ma cig thun b+h+yo/ che ge mo nr-i duSh+tAM mA ra ya rbad phaT/ badzra he sa ta krim/ rmugs sha rmugs sha/ rbad da ra rbad da ra/ mug ti myogs srod// rtsi srib snying ri ma sha yA yA/ srog ri ya yA/ mig dkyus nas phyung zhig/ rgyungs pa rtsad nas chod cig/ lte lkog nas drongs shig/ oM ma ma rak+mo rtse/ snying kha rag rbad su b+h+yo/ rak+mo yak+mo rbad su choM/ ma ra ya choM choM// rbad mA ra ya rbad/ sod mA ra ya sod// thum ril trag rak+sha rbad gtub/ rbad gtub/ duM bu baM baM/ dgra bgegs kyi srog la mA ra ya rbad/ kI li kI la ya nr-i rbad/ nga ni rig 'dzin thod pa rtsal// srid gsum gdug pa

yongs bsgral phyir// rig 'dzin yongs rdzogs drag sngags 'di'o// oM badzra ma hA gu ru sarba hUM phaT/ kA la rU pa che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ kI li kI la ya nr-i tri rbad/ nga ni dregs pa kun 'dul rje// srid gsum gdug pa yongs bsgral phyir// sde dpon yongs rdzogs snying po 'di'o// oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tA na e dza b+h+yo// dgra bgegs che ge mo sha truM hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ ging ka ra ging ka ra sarba tri dza b+h+yo// che ge mo sha truM hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ bdud tri ma ra ya sarba duSh+Than rbad du tsa b+h+yo/ che ge mo sha truM hur thum dzAHma ra ya rbad/ a bi shu sarba tsa badzra b+h+yo// che ge mo sha truM hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ ba sha mi ki sarba dzaHb+h+yo// che ge mo sha truM hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ nA ga sarba phu dzaHb+h+yo// che ge mo sha truM hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ yak+sha/ sarba k+Sha dzaHb+h+yo// che ge mo sha truM hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ rak+sha sarba ra dzaHb+h+yo// che ge mo sha truM hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ ma ma sarba ma dzaHb+h+yo// che ge mo sha truM hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ kI li kI la ya dgra bo nr-i rbad// nga ni stobs ldan nag po'i sku// srid gsum gdug pa yongs bsgral phyir// sde brgyad yongs rdzogs drag sngags 'di'o// oM badzra sarba duSh+tAn/ a+ye tsit+ta hriM hriM dzaH/ che ge mo nr-i hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad// ya ma sarba tsit+ta hriM hriM dzaH/ che ge mo nr-i hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ ma ma sarba tsit+ta hriM hriM dzaH/ che ge mo nr-i hur thum dzaH/ mA ra ya rbad/ nA ga rak+sha sarba tsit+ta hriM hriM dzaH/ che ge mo nr-i hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ de wa rak+sha sarba tsit+ta hrIM hriM dzaH/ che ge mo nr-i hur thum dzaH/ mA ra ya rbad/ rA hu la rak+sha sarba tsit+ta hriM hriM dzaH/ che ge mo nr-i hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ yak+Sha rak+sha sarba tsit+ta hrIM hrIM dza/ che ge mo nr-i hur thum dzaH/ mA ra ya rbad/ yasha rak+sha sarba tsit+ta hrIM hrIM dzaH/ che ge mo nr-i hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ d+ha sha g+h+ri wa sarba tsit+ta hrIM hrIM/ dza \u0f7f/ che ge mo nr-i hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad// kI li kI la ya dgra bo nr-i rbad/ bde gshegs yongs rdzogs drag sngags 'di// dregs pa ma rungs rdul du rlog/ gdab pa'i sngags dgu zhes kyang bya// 'di la nyams len rim gsum ste// sham bur gdags dang phur tshugs bsgrub// gar dgos las la sbyar ba'o// dang por sham bur bstan pa yang// gsang ba sgrub chen las sbyor dus// mtshan ma ming byang bcas pa la// dpal chen yongs rdzogs phur bskor tshe// gnas dgur drag sngags de dgus gdab// srid pa gsum po dus gcig sgrol// drag sngags gnam thog mtshon cha 'di// phur tshugs chig dril sraug bsgrub ni// dben gnas brag phug dur khrod du// dpal chen nga rgyal ldan byas te// maN+Dal mda' gang khrag gis byug/ dbus su khru gsum ting du brko// de nang mtshan ngan thod pa ru// ro ras 'khor lo gnyis rim gyi// rtsibs la dgra gzugs (5)

bskyon la gzir// seng ldeng gseng dngul lcags phur pa// 'dom mda' khru gang sor mtheb tshad// rab 'bring gang rigs lha grangs sbyar// sku stod zhal phyag gzhog rdzogs sam// 'og ste zhal dbyung rgya mdud gnyis// dpal gsum chu srin kha nas dbyung// phur pa'i bye brag rnam pa bzhi// yongs rdzogs dpal gyi sku bskyed de// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// ye shes lnga dang rdzas dbang bskur// 'debs mkhan gdab yul tshe khrus lung// gdab dang thebs tshad 'bras bu ste// phur pa ngo bos stong shes kyi// ngang las yongs rdzogs dpal chen bskyed// de las sprul pas dgra bgegs dgug/ phur pa'i lha rnams sgo gsum du// oM dkar AHdmar hUM mthing bsgom// de nas phur pa'i spyi gtsug dang// mgrin pa snying ga lte gsang du// 'bru lnga rigs lnga bskyed la bzhag/ de ni ye shes phur pa ste// kun gyis ma rig snying re rje// log lta rnams la snying rje bskyed// gnyis med sgrol ba'i snying rje bsgom// de ni snying rje'i phur pa ste// rang nyid lhar gsal phyag g.yas g.yon// rigs lnga khrag 'thung yab yum bskyed// phur pa byang chub sems su bsgril// de ni byang sems phur pa yin// phur pa de la nyung dkar 'dril// gu gul bdug cing dug khrag byug/ 'bar ba e yi gdan la bzhugs// mtshan ma rdzas kyi phur pa yin// de nas bskyed rdzogs gzhung bsrangs te// 'dzab bzlas rtags la sbyar cing bsgrub// bdag nyid lta spyod zung 'jug pas// phur pa 'dril shing drag sngags bzlas// gdab yul dgra bgegs log lta can// gzugs la brten nas dngos gsal gdab// kho yi rnam shes srog dngos po// snying nag khrag dwangs bye'u mgo tsam// de dbus a 'od thig le'i nang// nr-i ljang gcig yod gdab pa'i yul// de nas phur rtse hUM gsum dang// rtse sgab dag tu phaT gsum bsam// ngag tu drag sngags dgu bzlas shing// 'dril shing 'dril shing sgo la gdab// nr-i dang ar bcas phur rtse yi// hUM la 'dus nas a dkar gsal// rang la bstan pas de tshur 'dus// de ni tshe lung dgongs pa yin// de nas dgra srog dug gsum gyi// ngo bo hUM gsum gnas pa de// zur gyi phaT gsum gyis 'phangs te// 'og min dpal gyi thugs kar spros// hUM nyid 'od zhu mgrin pa yi// a la thim nas a yang zhu// dung khang oM thim oM 'od zhu// sgal tshigs la brgyud yum mkhar babs// rgyal ba'i sras su byas pas ni// gnas spar zab mo khrus lung yin// de nas gnas dgur dpa' dgus gdab// tshogs brgyad bsgral zhing sgo lnga chod// gdab phur kun gyis khyab par gdab// de bar drag sngags phur tshugs bzlas// las mtha' mnan bsreg 'phang

la gtad// phur re thebs tshad 'bras bu yang// gdab phur 'ben gsum grub mtha' gcig/ thams cad chos dbyings stong par bsgral// rig pa ye shes phur pa de// chos dbyings thebs pas chos kyi sku// tshad med snying rje'i phur pa de// 'gro drug la btab sprul sku 'thob// byang chub sems kyi phur pa de// yum mkhar thebs pas longs sku 'thob// mtshan ma rdzas kyi phur pa des// dgra bgegs la btab bstan pa tshugs// drag sngags rgyal po gnam thog 'di// gar dgos las la sbyar ba ni// gtor na gtang dang srung ba'i mkhar// chos skyong bskul gcun dgra bgegs bsgral// bgegs dpung gzhom dang klu nad 'dul// smyo 'bog 'dul dang rbod gtong bzlog/ bgegs rnams gzir dang zho chang bsrung// mdze nad gso dang gag lhog gzhom// thams cad thams cad 'di yis 'grub// oM AHhUM i daM ba liM ta sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi/ ma hA rak+ta khA hi/ ma hA ba liM khA hi/ kA ya wAka tsit+ta rak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru hUM/ sarba ru dra hrIM hrIMdza/ sarba duSh+tAn b+h+yo// badzra sarba duSh+tAn trig nan e hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ nr-i sha truM hur thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ dgra bgegs dam sri ni tri rbad thum dza/ nA' ga du tsan+d+ha/ mi li mi li/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ nA ga ni swA hA/ da ra ya da ra ya/ hUM ha he phaT b+h+yo hri ta ya/ mo ha ya/ pra ha ra Na hUM phaT/ sa ma ya a ti pra ma na/ mA ra Ni b+h+yo a la la b+h+yo a la la b+h+yo/ bzlog bzlog/ sham bu'i drag sngags de dag gis// las kyi bye brag thams cad 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ bde gshegs yongs rdzogs phur sgrub kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu/ ston pa dpal kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ yon tan bdag nyid kun tu bzang// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba he ru ka/ dam rdzas sman gyi bsgrub pa gang// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// mchod brtson rnam rtog 'joms 'dod nyon// thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la// rang gar rnam rtog ma choms na// sarba sman gyi sgrub pa bstan// 'di yang sgrub chen khog nas dbyung// thog mar khol bu'i bsgrub pa la// mtshan ldan thod pa kha sbyar nang// sman rnams yongs rdzogs rigs brgyas gang yang lngar sbyar// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// dri chen glang sha dzA ti shar// byang sems seng sha bzang drug dbus/ sha chen rta sha ka kol lho// pad+ma'i rak+ta rma bya li shi nub// dri chu khyung sha gur gum byang// gzhan yang ga pur a bar skyur// thal ka rdo rje a ga ru// du ru ka dang snying sna'i tshogs// tsi tra ka dang zho

sha gsum// tsan dan rgun 'brum star bu dang// lce pog la sogs sman rnyed tshad// rtsa lo me tog 'bras bu dgod// cong zhi shug 'bru+u mkhan pa mtshe// dkar gsum mngar gsum la sogs bsag/ sman du gyur pa kun gyis bskor// chang chu 'o ma rin chen bsham// yon tan rgyas grub yin pa'i phyir// yur ba chu rtsa lug ru ser// gi waM 'od ldan skyobs su bsag/ gzung thag btags la dar gur dbug/ las kyi gzhung bsrang tshogs 'khor bya// bdag nyid yongs rdzogs skur bsgoms te/ thugs ka'i 'od 'phros sman sbyangs te// kaM las thod sgyed bum pa dgal// yaM las rlung byung raM me sbar// dam rdzas sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga// oM AHhUM swA hA/ muM laM maM pAM tA/ de nyid brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas// phyag 'tshal lngar gyur de nyid las// rigs lnga yab yum bcur gyur nas// sbyor mdzad byang sems bdud rtsir gyur// snang srid thams cad de ltar gsal// oM badzra a mr-i ta/ A+oM hUM hrIHTha/ spros la dga' na rigs brgya'am// thams cad rigs lnga'i ngo bor bsam// spros la mi dga' rdo rje sems// rigs gcig kho na'i ngo bor bsgrub// rtsa sngags bsnyen rjes sngags 'di bzlas// oM AM hUM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sA ya na ta na/ dza ya gu h+ya sid+d+hi hUM hrIHTha/ drang srong rnams la gsol ba gdab// khrol bu zhag gsum tshar rjes su// gong gi rigs lnga 'od du zhu// gnyis med bdud rtsi'i ngang du sbyar// thams cad gnyis med sems dpa' bsgom// oM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta badzra tsit+ta sa ma ya hUM/ mkha' gsang bdud rtsi bskyil cir dbab// mchod bstod dngos grub blang gis bsdu// thabs shes mnyam pa nyid du sbyang/ zhing steng gtun bzhag yab yum sbyar// oM AHhUM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ sman rnams btags btsag bdud rtsir sbal// thod par blugs te rgyas gdab dril// mtshams bcad nyul le drag tu bskrad// yi ge lnga yis sngar bzhin sbyang// yum gyis pho brang yab la 'bul/ gzungs thag bzung zhing dkyil 'khor bskyed// las gzhung tshogs 'khor dus drug bya// dkyil 'khor bdun brtseg bsgom pa yi// ting 'dzin sngar dang mtshungs pa las// bdud rtsi'i dkyil du bcud 'dus pas// khro rgyal dpal chen yongs rdzogs pa// che mchog bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sku/ ljang ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis ni// yum la 'khyud nas thal mo bzed// ye shes bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin// yab yum sbyor ba'i sbyor mtshams nas// ye shes bdud rtsi phab nas bskyil// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM hriHTha/ gsol 'debs tshig gis skabs skabs bskul// drang srong spyan drangs gsol 'debs ni// hUM tshangs pa dag gi gtso bo mchog/ dung gi thor tshugs khong gseng

can// tshangs pa kun sgrol chen po dang/ drang srong chen po ljang sngon dang// tsa ra ka dang nabs so skyes// tha skar bu dang lha skyabs dang// rgyun shes dang ni g.yon phyogs lha// thang la gnas dang me bzhin 'jug/ rkang gnyis spyod dang ka ya na// sher khyer dang ni ljang sngon bu// nyi ma zla ba klu ru bcas// bram ze gzhon nu'i sprin dang ni// rin po che dang go de shan// gzhon nu srid dang 'gro skyobs dang// rtsibs kyi mu khyud 'dzin la sogs// khyed cag 'khor dang bcas pa yis// sngon chad bsgrubs nas grub pa sbyin// yon tan bdud rtsi'i sid+d+hi stsol// zhes pa dus drug gsol ba gdab// de tshe grub rtags gzugs sgra 'od// dri chen du ba mang du 'phel// rloms sems mi bskyed dngos grub blang// de nas gang bu zhag gcig bsgrub// spog pa'i cho ga dag kyang bya// 'phro 'du'i ting 'dzin gong dang mtshungs// rtsa sngags stong bzlas dngos grub blangs// oM AHhUM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kA ya sid+d+hi oM/ wAka sid+d+hi AM tsit+ta sid+d+hi hUM/ sarba sid+d+hi hrIH/ drang srong gsol ba gdab rjes la// hUM/ rigs lnga yab yum mkha' klong du// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las// gnyis med byang sems 'phro 'du mdzad// snang srid rtsi bcud sman rnams ni// thams cad dag pas bdud rtsi che// bdud rtsi lnga ru ye sangs rgyas// bse phor dmar po mdzes pa dang// shel phor dkar po dri med mdzes// bdud rtsi lnga yi bcud blugs te// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i chu 'di ni// ye shes lha la phul ba'i tshe// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes// dam can rnams la mchod pa yis// srung ma rnams kyi thugs dam bskang// rig 'dzin rnams la phul ba'i tshe// dngos grub rgya mtsho thams cad ster// rnal 'byor bdag nyid myong ba'i tshe// dbang dang dngos grub yongs su rdzogs// bdud dang bgegs la phogs pa'i tshe// lus sems thal ba rdul du brlag/ e ma ho// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i chu 'di ni// 'thong ngam thos sam reg pas kyang// thams cad dbang phyug bdag gis thob// e ma thabs chen khyad par che// e ma thabs chen bla na med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad byung ba// lta ba rmad byung ngo mtshar che// spyod pa rmad byung ngo mtshar che// nyon mongs ma spangs ngo mtshar che// ye shes lnga rdzogs ngo mtshar che// sku lnga lhun grub ngo mtshar che// chos sku gcig la tha dad pa// rigs lnga'i dngos grub 'dir thob bo// yang dag 'chi med don brnyes so// zhes brjod lha rnams bdud rtsir zhu// bum gcig rdzas dbang bskur bya zhing// bde gshegs yongs rdzogs sman mchod bya// lce thog lan bdun dngos grub blang// rjes su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskyed// rin chen ga 'ur gter du stsal// 'di grub rgyal sras

dam par 'gyur// rtog pa ye shes sman sbyar pas// dug lnga sman gyur ye shes spyod// mnyam nyid rtogs pas yon tan rdzogs// rang byung rnam dag yon tan mchog/ dam rdzas bdud rtsi rtsa ba lnga// rang lugs spyad dam bsgrub na mchog/ rnam snang bdud rtsi phun tshogs gtso// spyi dang bye brag so so ste// rgyal blon 'khor tshogs phyi nang gsang// las tshogs dam bsrungs gags bsal na// yon tan 'bras bu thun mong rdzogs// rjes kyi cho ga sgrub chen bzhin// yon tan yongs rdzogs 'dis 'grub bo// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ dam rdzas yongs rdzogs bdud rtsi sman sgrub kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa dpal kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ mi rtog rtog bral kun tu bzang// dngos grub kun 'byung he ru ka/ dngos grub rdzas chen bam sgrub thabs// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs te// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// dpa' gtum nus pa ldan kun nyon// gzigs stangs lnga yi sgo nas bsgrubs// thugs rje'i yul dang slob ma dang// lha dang ru dra mchod rdzas so// mchod rdzas dngos grub mchog sgrub ni// ngan song gnas nas drang bsams pas// dngos grub 'byung ba'i bam brtags te// spang dang blang ba'i bam rigs gnyis// spangs pa dam tshig spun grogs dang// nad ngan 'go rims mdze 'bras sogs// spyi mched chos rigs kun kyang spangs// lnga 'das la sogs dam nyams spang// blang bya pho mo gang yang rung// rigs bzang rtsa lnga man chod lon// dngos grub ya mtshan chen po'i rdzas// skye ba bdun pa'i bam ni rab// rigs bzang bkra shis thum shi ba'i// na gzhon gtsang ma'i bam ni 'bring// so bdun byis pa yin kyang blangs// len tshe sngags g.yog blo brtan pas// rang lus yongs rdzogs lhar gsal gdab// rjes bzung dngos grub len bsam 'gro// rigs 'dzin dam can grogs su khrid// pho nya'i 'gros dang rdo rje'i 'gros// bgegs bskrad phyogs bskor ro gshed mnan// sgor blangs nyung phur dud pas gzir// yongs rdzogs bro yis rab tu gdul// 'dag chal sug chu'i khrus kyis bkrus// snying rjes rigs drug gnas nas drang// de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub rdzas rnams// gsang ba'i sgrub chen gong bzhin bshams// bskyed rdzogs mchod bstod rdzogs rjes su// bum tshigs rkang 'di med pa'ang 'dug dbang phan dang nus dbang bskur// ro de slob mar shes bya ste// dbang stegs khar bzhag dkyil 'khor du// 'jug dang rjes gnang me tog dor// de nas lhar shes

bya ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag rgyan spras te// spros la dga' bas gnas dgu ru// yongs rdzogs lha dgod 'phrau 'du bya// yang na spyi gtsug mgrin pa dang// snying ga lte dbus gsang gnas su// rigs lnga'i srog snying 'bru lnga bsam// de las 'od byung dkyil 'khor gyi// lha tshogs la thim thugs dam bskang// lha las 'od 'phros phyi nang gi/ bdud rtsi bkug nas rigs lnga yis// nang du spro zhing dgyes pa bskyed// ye shes chen po'i bcud tshur la// bam la thim pas dngos grub thob// 'od byung bdag gi snying gar thim// dngos grub yongs rdzogs thob bsam zhing// rtsa sngags sham bur 'di btags bzlas// dza s+pha ra Na phaT/ ma hA sid+d+hi hUM/ sarba sid+d+hi pha la sid+d+hi/ saM ha ra Na hUM aH/ stong stong bzlas shing stong tshig tu// bskang gso'i cho ga rgyas par bya// rjes la lha bsdu dngos grub blang// de nas bam de byang shar bzhag/ dgra bgegs ru dra bstim la bsgral// rgyab nas thig gdab rgyab nas bshu// gsil te rat+na'i gzhong pa ru// mgo dang sgal rus srog rtsa dbus// snying shar go ro tsa na lho// lce nub lto ba byang du dgod// gsang ba shar lho rgyab lho nub// nub byang brla g.yas rtsa chen la// byang shar rtsa chen g.yon pa 'god// glo mchin mkhal ma mtsher mkhris pa// gru bzhir gtubs te bzhi bzhi bskor// lag g.yas lho la g.yon pa nub/ rkang g.yas shar la g.yon pa byang// gnas bcu gnas brgyad yongs su rdzogs// las kyi gzhung bsang tshogs 'khor bya// de nas yongs rdzogs lhar bskyed la// 'dzab dang 'phro 'du gong ltar bya// lha tshogs sil bu'i mtshan brjod cing// thugs dam bskang zhing drag tu bskul// don gyi dam rdzas phud dkrol la// dngos grub blang zhing
