ting 'dzin bsdu// de nas sil bur mchod rdzas bya// sha khrag phud dkrol gtor ma gtang// rten bsdu rus tshogs sbyin bsreg bya// des ni nyams chag kun bskangs shing// dngos grub rnam gnyis 'phral du 'byung// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog rang sar grol// gsang spyod 'di la rab tu brnan// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ dngos grub rdzas chen yongs rdzogs bam sgrub kyi le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ 'chi med rdo rje kun tu bzang// tshe bdag chen po he ru ka/ tshe dbang rin chen mchog sgrub thabs// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// bla med gsang bsgrub rtse gcig nyon// tshe dbang rin chen mchog sgrub pa// bdud rtsi shel gyi bum bcud bshad// de

yang sbyor ba dngos rjes te// sngon du bsod nams tshogs chen bsag/ dngos gzhi bcud len tshul du'am// rgyas par sgrub chen khog nas dbyung// de la tshe dbang bcud kyi rdzas// 'byung ba cha snyoms 'di lta ste// rgyu gnyis rkyen gsum bdud rtsi bzhi// 'di spyad yon tan bsam mi khyab// tshe dbang rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub// de phyir legs sbyar bsgrub na mchog/ rgyu gnyis rigs lnga yab yum gyis// byang sems cong zhi brag zhun yin// cong zhi bzang rigs bre gang dang// brag zhun bzang po phul gang bsog/ rkyen gsum rtsi mar srang sum cu// sbrang bre do dang bur bre gsum// bcud bkrag stobs kyis gsos yin bsag/ 'chi med bdud rtsi rnam bzhi ni// shug pa ba lu mkhan pa mtshe// 'dab ma me tog bcud bsdus bsag/ de rnams sman mar sbyor legs bya// zos na tshe ring nad dkon te// khyad par tshe dbang mchog 'dod na// gsang ba sgrub chen pho brang dbus// lcags bar tsha la med pa ru// sman ril lha grangs mnyam byas blug/ par bu'i kha bsdam gzungs thag gdags// dar ser gur phub gu gul bdug/ bsnyen sgrub chog khrigs gong bzhin bya// tshe dbang 'phro 'du'i bsnyen pa ni// rtsa sngags sham bur 'di nyid bzlas/ oM badzra sa twa hUM b+h+rUM a b+h+rUM A yur hUM AHoM badzra sa twa hUM/ rat+na mu dra AH/ A yur gnya' na hUM hri ThaH/ de nas sgrub pa'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM badzra sa twa hUM/ bai ro tsa na oM/ rat+na mu dra trAM/ a mi de wa hrIHkarma badzra hA/ de nas las sbyor 'chi med sngags// 'di dag bzlas shing dngos grub blang// oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI wa hrIM/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pany+tsa AH/ oM A yur gnya' na ma hA puN+ya tiSh+Tha oM/ grub rtags 'od dang du ba sgra/ dri zhim yid du 'ong ba 'byung// skabs skabs kun tu drang srong rnams// spyan drangs tshe yi gsol ba gdab// de nas rang gzhan dbang bskur ba// bdud rtsi bum pa spyi bor bzhag/ rtsa sngags rigs lnga'i snying por bcas// brjod cing rim gyis gnas lngar gtugs// bdud rtsis lus gang rdo rjer bsam// oM badzra A yuHShe hUM b+h+rUM nr-i dzaHa b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ sman phud drang srong lha mchod de// 'ju stobs sbyar zhing rgyun du bza'// zas ngan bsrung zhing 'bru bcud gtang// mkhas shing man ngag ldan pa gces// tshe dbang phun tshogs 'dis 'grub pas// sman bcud yon tan bsam mi khyab// rgyu gnyis sman gyis sha rus rgyas// rkyen gsum stobs bcud bkrag kyang 'phel// rtsi bzhi'i tshe ring 'byung ba snyoms// rtsal ni seng chen stobs glang po// mdangs ni rma bya yang rtsal khyung// gsung ni tshangs pa bang ni rta// mkha' 'gro dbang sdud sde brgyad 'khol// tshe dbang phyag rgya'i rigs 'dzin 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa

rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ bcud len yongs rdzogs 'chi med tshe sgrub kyi le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ skyon gyis ma gos kun tu bzang// dri med dpal chen he ru ka/ dam 'gal nyams pa ji ltar bshags// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// nyams grib gnong 'gyod can nyon cig/ sems can las dang rkyen dbang gyis// rtsa ba yan lag nyams srid na// dbang zhu sgo gsum dad bskyed de// bshags thabs rmad byung 'di lta ste// lus ngag yid gsum sgo nas sbyang// sngags dang phyag rgyas lus nyams bshags// bla ma bde gshegs yongs rdzogs rnams// dbang po'i mngon sum 'dra bar dmigs// na rag dong sprug rkyang phyag 'tshal// e ma ho// phyogs bcu dus bzhi kun gyi bdag nyid che// bla ma zhi khro yongs rdzogs dgongs su gsol// 'dir gshegs nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// nyams chag na rag sbyang phyir phyag mchod bzhes// yon tan phun tshogs bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshang lo// dmigs med spros bral chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro mgon cir yang sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas lugs mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag mngon par byang chub sku la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs 'joms mdzad zhi ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// log lta tshar gcod khro bo'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// thabs mgon tshe bdag 'jam dpal sku la phyag 'tshal lo// skyon bral sgra sgrogs pad+ma'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag don ldan badzra thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// dug lnga'i nad sel bdud rtsi sman la phyag 'tshal lo// dregs pa 'joms mdzad phur pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// 'byung ba'i mnga' bdag ma mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// sa dang lam rdzogs rig 'dzin tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bstan pa bsrung mdzad dam can tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra bgegs bdud 'dul sngags bdag rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de rjes phyag rgya'i lha mchog bsgom// gang gis rgyal ba zhi khro yi// dkyil 'khor mtshan thos phyag btsal na// nyams chag ma lus kun byang na// mtshams med lnga la smos ci dgos// na rag gnas kyang dong sprugs te// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// sngags bzlas skyon mthol ngag nyams bshags// rdo rje sems dpa' gtsug tu dmigs// las sgrib nyams grib dag byed pa// 'khor ba dong sprug yang snying 'di dag bzlas// oM AHhUM

swA hA/ oM badzra sa twa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA lA ya/ badzra sa twa twe no pa tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shwi yAM ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho// b+ha ga wAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra mA me muny+tsa/ badzrI b+ha wa/ ma hA sa ma ya/ badzra sa twa a/ de brjod rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// ho bde gshegs yongs rdzogs dgongs su gsol// rgyal ba'i bka' dang bla ma'i lung// ji bzhin ma spyad slob dpon smad// rdo rje mched dang lcam dral la// lta log ngan sems ngan du smras// brdeg btsog gnod pa dngos su spyad// lha dang dkyil 'khor nyams ma gsal// 'dzab bzlas ma dag zur chag g.yel// gsang bar 'os dang gnyer gtad smras// gsang bcu bsgrags dang bla ma bslus// rtsa ba'i dam nyams mthol zhing bshags// gzhan yang spyad bya'i dam tshig lnga// mi spang lnga dang dang len lnga// shes bya lnga dang bsgrub bya lnga// yan lag dam nyams mthol zhing bshags// bsnyen bsgrub ting 'dzin dam g.yel zhing// nya bzhi dus drug dus mchod chag/ le lo gsog 'jog tshogs sbyang byas// phud lhag nyams shing kha tshar shor// tshor dang ma tshor rkyen dbang gis// sgo gsum bag med dam nyams bshags// yid kyi dam nyams lta bas bshags// de yang kun gzhi byang chub sems// yin pa med pa'i lta bas rtogs// min pa med pa'i sgom nyams lon// yin min med pa'i spyod pas rtogs// re dogs med pa'i byang chub ni// rtsa ba yan lag thams cad kyi// chag nyams ma byung ma skyes pas// bshag bya bshags byed gnyis med grol// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa brgyud kyi rgyal po las/ 'gyod tshangs yongs rdzogs na rag dong sprug/ bshags pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ rin chen 'od 'bar kun tu bzang// thams cad tshigs byed nam mkha'i mdzod// lha rnams mdangs kyis ji ltar bskang// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams rtse gcig nyon// rtsa lag dam tshig g.yel nyams nyon// le los dus mchod chag pa'am// lha dang 'khon gcugs sbyang ba dang// bsod nams tshogs chen bsag bya'i phyir// bskang gso'i rim pa 'di lta ste// dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bzhengs pa'i rtsar// lha bkram rten gyi tshogs kyang bsham// 'byor ldan yo byad gtor mchod bsham// skal ldan mi yi tshogs kyang bsham// phrin las tshogs 'khor gzhung

bsrangs rjes// dang po lta dgongs bshags pa bya// de 'og mchod rdzas rang rtags brjod// bla ma lha tshogs mtshan brjod de// mdangs bskang cho ga rgyas par bya// de nas phur gdab sbyor sgrol bskang// rjes su rkyen bzlog byol chen gdab// de rnams rdzas kyi phyi skong yin// dam can kun mnyes rkyen dbang bzlog/ nang ni ting nge 'dzin gyis bskang// rang nyid thugs ka'i 'od 'phros te// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhong pa ru// bcud kyi sems can 'dod yon spung// rig pa'i lha mo spros te bskang// gzugs spyan sgra snyan dri shangs dang// ro mchog ljags la reg bya sku// snang srid bcud kyis thugs dam bskang// 'dod yon dbang po lngar thim nas// lha mnyes phrin las bsgrub par bsam// des ni lha mnyes dngos grub ster// gsang ba gnyis med lta bas bskang// bskang bya'i lha sems skong byed kyi// mkhan po dag kyang rang gi sems// skong ba'i rdzas mchog sems yin pas// sems nyid gzhi rtsa bral ba la// mchod bya mchod byed gnyis med pas// gnyis med don gyi thugs dam bskang// ye shes lha tshogs kun mnyes nas// mchog gi dngos grub rgyun mi 'chad// ces bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las// thugs dam yongs su bskang ba'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ 'jig rten dbang phyug kun tu bzang// 'khor 'das mdos bdag he ru ka/ lha 'khrugs mdos kyis ji ltar bskang// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs te// ston pa chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'gro phan byams sems can rnams nyon// rnal 'byor dam nyams mkha' 'gro 'khrugs// de dag mdos kyis bsal phyir dang// nyams chag gso dang mtshon 'khrug gcod// nad gdon gnod pa zhi byed cing// tshe dang longs spyod bsod nams spel// snang srid dbang sdud dgra bgegs sgrol// don chen kun sgrub phur kha bzlog/ rtog tshogs lha ru ngo sprad cing// bla med 'bras bu 'thob bya'i phyir// yongs rdzogs gling bzhi spyi mdos bshad// rnam dag spros bral chos sku las// byin rlabs longs sku dpe byad ldan// thugs rje'i sprul sku bsam yas kyang// bsdu na bka' brgyad yongs rdzogs yin// las dang ye shes tshul du snang// lta spyod zung 'jug mdos kyis bskang// de la ngo bo nges tshig dang// dbye ba mthun dpe dgos ched dang// bsham thabs sngon 'gro dngos rjes kyis// nyams blangs thag bcad 'bras bu bstan// ngo bo gnyis med byang chub sems// nges tshig gar 'dod mdos kyis

sel// dbye na las dang ye shes kyis// bsdus te pho mdos mo mdos dang// yongs rdzogs spyi mdos rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba'i mdos su bstan// mthun dpe kun 'byung rat+na 'dra// dgos ched mchog dang thun mong dang// gnyis med bde chen don rtogs shing// phrin las bzhi sogs las kun grub// bsham thabs mdos dngos mchod rdzas rgyan// sa stegs 'dom gang gru bzhi pa'i/ steng du maN+Dal 'bru phye la// rat+na brdar te gong bu bcos// hUM raM yaM khaM laM b+h+rUM/ 'phro 'dus 'dod dgur byin gyis brlab// ri rab gling bzhi bzang por bsham// steng du pho brang gling dgu la// ye shes lha rnams dbang rdzas ni// snying phye'i dpal bshos rtse dgu la// sngags ldan phur nag dgu yang gzug/ dbus su dpal chen dgu po la// zhal mthun kun tu zhal dgu gzug/ spyi gdugs chen po gcig 'og tu// gdugs brgyad 'phan dang rgyal mtshan gzug/ mda' dgu rang rtags phyag mtshan bri// shing ris zhal dgu 'phan dgu dang// dar rgyang ru mtshon pho mo'i gdong// dar glud pho glud mo glud dgu/ 'khor los sgyur ba lta bur dgram// bang rim gsum pa yan chod du// yongs rdzogs spyi skong dam rdzas su// nam mkha' dbus mthing mtha' 'ja' ris// khri gzhad rma bya dar snas brgyan// stag gzig gung gi rgyal mtshan dang// ru mtshon dar rgyang mda' 'phang dang// shing ris dar 'phan la sogs te// stong dang lnga brgya brgya la sogs// rab 'bring tha ma gang spobs bsag/ khyung chen rma bya seng ge 'brug/ stag gzig glang chen rta mchog dang// skyes pa bud med glud la sogs// re re'ang stong sogs ci rigs bsham// bang rim tha mar sde brgyad rdzas// nam mkha' mda' 'phang rgyal mtshan dang/ gzugs glud la sogs so so dang// mthun par ci rigs skye 'gro bsag/ gling bzhi las kyi pho nya ste// srid pa'i dbang chen sde bzhi la// nam mkha' mda' 'phang rgyal mtshan sogs// gzugs glud dam rdzas tshang bar bsham// gzhan yang ri rab gling khengs par// 'phur dgu 'dzul dgu skye dgu sogs// mar me gser skyems rin chen dang// sna tshogs dar gyis bklubs la bzhag/ zor rdzas kun gyis mtha' ma bskor// phyi yi lha tshogs mnyes mdos yin// sgyu lus phung po'i ri rab la// rnam rtog phra rags rdzas kyis brgyan// nang gi lha tshogs skong mdos yin// b+ha ga'i gzhi la gsang ri rab// byang chub sems sprin rgyan gyis brgyan// bde mchog don ldan chos skur rdzogs// gsang ba'i lha tshogs mchod mdos yin// de ltar phun sum tshogs bshams nas// mdos kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni// phud gtang tsha chu mdo yang bklag/ las kyi gzhung bsrang 'dzab bzlas bya// dngos

gzhi 'jug khar chas gos gsol// che mchog dgu bstod nga rgyal bya// snang srid mdos su byin gyis brlab// mdos kyi mtshon pa la brten nas// las kyi lha rnams rdzas kyis bskang// ye shes lha rnams don gyis bskang// gnyis su med par thugs dam bskang// yongs rdzogs rjes su bye brag bsngo// phrin las rnam bzhi la sogs pa'i// gang bsgrub las gnyer so sor gtad// zor bsgyur sgo dbye lam bstan bya// tshe 'gugs bkra shis cho ga bya// dbyings nas mdos phyung 'gro don mdzad// slar yang chos kyi dbyings su thim// dngos grub thams cad mdo las 'byung// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ yongs rdzogs gling bzhi srid pa spyi mdos kyi le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ ji srid bar du 'gro 'dul ba'i// sku gsung thugs rten bzheng thabs gang// zhes gsol ston pas bka' stsal pa// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs yongs rdzogs// snod bcud tshul du bzheng thabs bshad// dang po snod kyi gzhal yas khang// yid 'ong dge zhing dul ba'i sar// sa yi sta gon sngon song nas// snod kyi 'jig rten rtog sbyang phyir// ri rab gling bcas cha mthun du// brtsigs te chos sgo bsam yas par// gzhal yas sgo mang chen por bzhengs// sku gsum yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir// mnyam nyid chos skur byin brlabs te// sa gzhi cha mnyam stong par sbyang// ma 'gags longs skur byin brlab phyir// yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor bzhengs la gdul// thugs rje sprul skur byin brlab phyir// pan rag brtsig par bya ba ni// pan rag steng nas rmang bres te// grub thob dge gnas sa sna dang// dpal che re bzang gangs rdo dang// lung bzang mdo dgu'i bye smyag dang// rat+na lnga yi phye mar sbyar// 'dam shig sngon song rgyu sbyangs te// gzhal yas phyi dbyibs mngon sum mthun// lha rnams theg pa yongs rdzogs dgod// de bzhin bzheng thabs rim pa yang// 'byung ba lnga brtseg cha mthun par// gdan ni rim pa lnga brtseg steng// ri rab ri bo mchog bzhin du// gzhal yas bang rim bzhi ldan la// khong seng khri rkang cha mthun du// sgo mo dgu bcu go gsum dgod// rnam rgyal khang bzang cha mthun du// pho brang gru bzhi bskor byas brtsig/ lha dbang gtso khang cha mthun du// bre bzang sgo bzhi ldan par brtsig/ yongs 'du+u sa brtol cha mthun par// srog shing bzang po ma thung gzug/ sum cu rtsa gsum cha mthun par// 'khor lo 'khor 'degs rim par brtsegs// 'og

min cha mthun char khebs tog/ bya ru la sogs mdzes par dgod// lcog mtshon grwa bzhir grwa lcog bya// ri bdun mtshon phyir 'khor yug tu// 'khor sa bang rim bdun gyis bskor// nyi zla'i tshul du sgrol ma dang// spyan ras gzigs khang shar nub brgyan// mtsho bdun rgya mtsho mtshon pa'i phyir// g.yu thang legs bya khron bu bru// gling bzhi'i gling phran tshul mthun du// sa steng gling gzugs bcu gnyis te// sprul sku'i mchod rten bcu gnyis btsig/ mu khyud cha mthun brag ris bskor// de la tshad med sgo bzhi dgod// rten gnas che chung spobs par sbyar// de ltar rten gnas de nyid la// brten pa bcud kyi 'jig rten dag/ sbyang phyir lha tshogs bzheng thabs bshad// stod rim gsum ni sku gsum zhing// nyan thos rang rgyal byang sems kyi// gzugs rnams rgyas bsdus ci rigs par// bang rim 'og ma'i sgo nang bkod// de ltar bang rim gsum sgo'i nang// kri ya u pa yo ga yi// lha rnams rgyas bsdus gang 'tshams dgod// bre bum bdag por gdugs tog nang// ma hA a nu a ti yi// lha rnams yongs rdzogs zhi dang khro// bka' brgyad bsgrub pa'i lha dgod de// kun bzang tog la bzang mo gdugs// 'khor lo rdor sems 'degs gsang bdag/ bre stod zhi lha bzhi bcu gnyis// bre smad nang sgo bcu gnyis gzug/ khrag 'thung lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dgod// bum dkyil bum pa'i phyogs mtshams su// bka' brgyad yongs rdzogs lha rnams dgod// sgo bzhi rgyal chen sde bzhi la// gza' brgyad rgyu skar bskor ba dgod// lcog bzhi gnod sbyin nor gyi lha// pho dgu mo dgu la sogs dgod// gdan rim lnga brtsegs steng nang du// klu dbang nyi nyid la yang zla brgyad bskor bzhengs// de 'og gru gsum dong nang du// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i dgra bgegs grub// 'khor sa rim pa bdun nang du// bskal bzang sangs rgyas stor rtsa gnyis// mdo 'dul chos mngon rgyud ris bris// nyi ma'i khang par thugs rje che// zla khang sgrol ma myur ma dgod// gling bzhi gling phran brgyad steng du// mchod rten chen po bcu gnyis nang// sprul sku'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis dgod// 'khor yug re re rwa ba'i nang/ bstan pa srung ba'i lha ma srin// chos skyong pho nya'i tshogs rnams dgod// sgo bzhir dbang chen sde bzhi dang// ha ri ka dang pany+tsi ka/ kang king lha mo mgon po nag/ sgrol ging dkar dang nag po dgod// lha tshogs de dag thams cad kyang// lugs 'bur ri mor gang lcogs bzhengs// sngags dang phyag rgyas smin par bya// spyi gtsug gdung gzhug mgrin pa ru// A li kA li gzhug par bya// thugs kar man shel hUM bcas gzhug/ srog shing rtse nas rmang yan chod// theg pa'i rim pa dang sbyar ba'i// rgyud lung

man ngag rim par gzhug/ srog shing nang du srog phur gdab// srog shing phyi la tshe dpag med// gzugs dang sngags su bcas pa dgod// kha dog phyogs mtshon gdul byar bstan// dar bzang la sogs na bzas bklub// bang rim dang po nas brtsams te// bsgrub rdzas mchod rdzas rkyen dbang bzlog/ bang rim gsum pa'i nang du bsag/ bum dkyil bsgrub khang rnal 'byor gnas// sgo rnams la ni 'khor rim bzhin// nyams len bsgrub pa'i gnas byas na// grub pa mthar phyin 'khrul pa sel// sku gsum rgyal ba zhi dang khro// gsang ba yongs rdzogs bde gshegs kyi// rten gsum yongs rdzogs ngo mtshar che// rten 'di ji srid gnas kyi bar// de srid sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyas// 'gro ba kun 'dul las sgrib sbyang// bsod nams phun tshogs yongs rdzogs shing// rgyu sbyor bzhengs mkhan ma lus kun// tshe 'dir bkra shis tshe ring 'phel// phyi ma zhing khams rnam dag thob// yul phyogs gling khams bkra shis 'byung// thabs mchog yongs rdzogs rmad du byung// bstan pa'i rim gro 'di kho na// dang du longs shig bsam pa 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rten mchog bkra shis sku gsum yongs rdzogs su bzhengs thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol ba/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ bde gshegs sku gsung thugs rten la// ye shes rab tu gnas thabs gang// zhes gsol ston pas bka' stsal pa// bde gshegs sku gsung yongs rdzogs rten// rab tu gnas thabs rnam gsum bshad// spros pa rgyas bsdus spros med de// rgyas mdzad bla ma mkhas pa la// slob bus yon dbul lan gsum bar// gsol ba gdab cing bla mas kyang// rtags sbyar rab gnas bsnyen pa bya// dus tshod gza' skar bzang po la// gsang ba sgrub chen skabs bzhin du// dkyil 'khor rten rdzas sngon song nas// dkyil 'khor de yi byang phyogs su// rten gsum gang yin khri la bzhag/ brab bdug bgegs bskrad srung 'khor bsgom// skyabs 'gro sems bskyed mchod sbyin bya// gsol ba gdab cing bsnyen pa bskyal// tshul bzhin bsgrubs te byin chen dbab// khrus dang nye reg 'thor 'thung bya// sngags kyis bgegs bskrad chal gyis bkru// ras sam dar gyis rdul phyis la// raM yaM khaM gyis rab tu sbyang// tsan dan gur gum a ga ru// dzA ti gla rtsi dri lngas byug/ sku dang mchod rten gang yin yang// sku gsung thugs dang rten 'brel snying// bde gshegs yongs rdzogs yang snying

rnams// rigs dbye sku yi gnas lngar gzhug/ sku gdung ring bsrel nor bu lnga// sman 'bru dar gyis bril te gzhug/ de nas dkyil 'khor legs bris te// bum pa la sogs mchod rdzas bsham// bskyed rdzogs las kyi gzhung bsrangs nas// mchod bstod bzlas pa tshul bzhin bya// bum pa byin brlab bzhu btul bya// rten la bgegs bskrad sku khrus bya// rten spyir bskyed rdzogs sngar bzhin bya// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs la// ye shes lnga yi dbang yang bskur// spyan 'byed snyan shangs zhal tshems drud// longs sku'i rten la na bza' gsol// dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba gdags// sprul sku yin na dbu skra bzhar// glegs bam dag la bde gshegs yongs// gsal dbyangs lnga bcu'i yi ge bsgyur// bde gnyis chos sgras 'gro 'dul bsam// mchod rten dkyil 'khor cha mthun par// nang du tshom dgu'i lha tshogs bskyed// de la ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug/ bstim brtan dgyes pa bskyed pa dang// phyag sogs mchod pa kun gyis mchod// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bla bre sogs// rnam bdun bkra shis rdzas brgyad dbul// bstod cing mnga' gsol 'phro 'du bya// rten gsum rim pa gang yin yang// ye shes yang yang dgu cing bstim// sngags kyi bzlas pa so sor bya// sku+u gsung thugs su byin brlab cing// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya// bum dbang gzhung bzhin bskur ba'i rjes// nas 'bru me tog dkar po la// rten 'brel 'bum bsnyen me tog dor// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+hA wa he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya wa data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA/ de rjes bu slob yon bdag la// bum dbang bkra shis rdzas bzhi dang// sna bdun rdzas brgyad dbang bskur bya// tshogs 'khor bzang pos zhal bsro bya// kha brda bzang smra spyod lam gzab// bkra shis skyid pa'i lha bro bya// rgyas pa'i sbyin bsreg smon lam gdab// phud gtor lha dang chos skyong mchod// rten gyi gnyer gtad drag tu bya// gtang rag mchod pa dga' ston bya// yon dbul dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo// spros pa nyer bsdu'i rab gnas ni// sngon 'gro khrus sogs yongs rdzogs rjes// gang la bya ba'i rten de nyid// cho ga gsum gyis sbyangs byas te// rang rang ye shes ngo bor bsam// de la dbang bskur me tog gtor// mchod pa bzang po mang phul nas// yi dam lhag pa'i rten du bzung// ji ltar bsam pa de bzhin yin// spros med don gyi rab gnas ni// bsnyen rdzogs rtogs ldan rnal 'byor pas// gzigs pas rab tu gnas pa 'chags// phyi nang snod bcud snang srid kun// ye nas chos sku'i ngo bor gnas// der shes dbyings las ma g.yos na// rnam dag rten mchog bla na med// snang (6)

ba sku la grag pa gsung// dran rtog thugs kyi rang bzhin yin// sku gsung thugs rten yongs rdzogs kyang// blo dman blo la der mi snang// shes rab blo ldan skyes mchog gis// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed kyi// sangs rgyas ma lus yongs rdzogs skur// rab gnas dam pa de nyid do// rang rig rang gsal rab gnas rab// rab gnas kun gyi rgyal po yin// rab gnas phun tshogs de dag gis// ji srid yun gyi rten byas na// bkra shis byin chen bsam legs 'grub// 'bras bu sku gsum zhing du sbyor// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rten gsum rab gnas yongs rdzogs kyi le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa// kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ sgo gsum bar chad kun skyob pa'i// bde gshegs kun 'dus srung 'khor gang// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa chen pos bka' stsal pa// bde gshegs bka' yi srung 'khor la// 'khor lo rdzas dang ting 'dzin te// kun thub 'khor lo'i srung ba la// shog shog ras sam dar dkar la// rat+na lnga sbyar snag tsha yis// dbus su thig bzhi ling tshe dgu/ re re'i nang du 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad khyud 'khor bzhi ldan bri// de dgu'i gong ras dgu po la// rigs kyi phyag mtshan gtams par bya// ling dgu'i phyi rol mu khyud ni// rim pa bcu ru bskor bar bya// de la sngags dgod rim pa ni// dbus 'khor dgu yi lte ba la// hUM dgu ming rus rak+Shar bcas// srungs shig 'dod gsol dang bcas bri// de'i phyi lte ba'i khyud dgu la// khro 'dus drag sngags so lnga bri// rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo dgu rnams su// dpal chen dgu yi skyed sngags bri// mu khyud phyi ru sras yum dang// bo d+hi bcu bzhi khyung sngags drug/ dam can 'dus pa bcu gcig bri// rtsibs mchan khyab par srungs shig bri// gong ras khyab par gsang sngags dang// rig sngags gzungs sngags stobs can dgod// gling bzhi'i phyi rol zla gam bzhi// rgyal chen bzhi yi rU pas bsrung// mu khyud bcu rim nang ma che// de la zhi khro bka' brgyad rdzogs// bde gshegs kun gyi yang snying la// che ge la srungs spel mar bri// de yi phyi rim dbyangs yig la// de'i phyi gsal byed rten 'brel bri// phyi rim mu khyud bdun pa la// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang// dbyug to rgya gram mtshon cha'i tshogs// me ri lnga yis 'khor bar bri// rdzas kyi bsrung ba'i skyobs ngar gdags// ga bur tsan dan gla rtsi dang// gu gur gum yang gul li shi shing kun

dang// a mr-i ta dang chang sbyar byug/ gtor tshogs gzhung bzhin bshams nas kyang// las rim gzhung bsrang lha rnams bstim// dbang bskur rab tu gnas pa bya// dar sna lngas dril tshon lngas bcings// dus tshes bzang la mgul du gdags// bkra shis mnga' gsol brjod par bya// ting 'dzin rang nyid he ru ka/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i nga rgyal bsgom// 'di las khyad 'phags srung ba'i thabs// 'jig rten khams 'dir sngar ma byung// mi 'byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// ci phyir 'di nyid yongs rdzogs yin// lus ngag yid gsum srung ba'i mkhar// rdo rje'i go khrab phub chen yin// nad gdon dug mtshon gnam lcags bsrung// mdor na 'jigs pa kun thub ste// phyogs ngan kun dang gnod las rgyal// tshe 'di bar do phyi ma yi// srung ba'i rgyal por 'di 'gyur te// ngan song gnas ngan kun las grol// 'di yod 'gro ba sangs rgyas yin// rgyal ba rnams kyi sras su gzigs// dam can rnams kyis mgon stongs mdzad// lha srin sde brgyad bran du 'khol// 'da' khar byang chub rtags la sbyor// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ bde gshegs yongs rdzogs bka'i srung 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ sgrub chen las bzhi'i don myur byed// sbyin bsreg las kyi rim pa gang// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// las rnams kun gyi rjes sgrub myur// rnam bzhi sbyin bsreg 'di ltar bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs bzhi ru// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i thab// zlum po gru bzhi zla kham dang// gru gsum la sogs gang mos bya// dkar ser dmar ljang kha dog bsgyur// byang chub skyer ldeng dug shing sogs// las mthun shing brtsig bsreg pa'i rdzas// phrin las gang bsgrub dang sbyar te// zhi la dkar gsum rgyas 'bru'i tshogs// dbang la sha chang dug khrag drag/ phrin las gzhung bsrang tshogs mchod bya// me yi lha bskyed mchod bstod bya// phrin las gang bsgrub dang sbyar te// lto bar yongs rdzogs lha bskyed de// ye shes bkug bstim rten mchod rjes// bkra shis bu tshas me spar te// sbyin bsreg rdzogs byas las sngags ni// rtsa sngags dag la 'di sbyar bskul// shIn+taM/ puSh+tiM/ pa shaM mA ra ya/ las bzhi'i 'dod gsol dang bcas bsreg/ zhi rgyas dbang drag gang bsam 'grub// ye shes sems gshegs dam tshig bsdu// rjes su las bzhi'i bro bzhi brdung// thal

ba rlung chu mnan pa sogs// so so'i las kyi dmigs dang bcas// me yis las kun myur du 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ las bzhi sbyin bsreg yongs su bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa// kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ las rnams rjes bstan dgra bgegs gzir// dpal chen rol pa'i bro rnams gang// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// gzir mnan bro yi las sbyor ni// dgra bgegs dam sri gnan gzir te// rnal 'byor dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas// dpal gyi chas kyis rab tu brgyan// yongs rdzogs lha yi nga rgyal bskyed// lag pa lu gu rgyud du sbrel// rkang stabs rdo rje'i 'gros su bya// dpa' brjid rngam pa'i hUM sgra sgrog/ glu yis spyan drang bros gzir gnan// phrin las rnam bzhi dmigs bsal bsgrub// dang po glu yis spyan drang te// hUM zhi khro yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor du// dpal chen che mchog sku sprul nas// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang rol pa ni// thabs shes gnyis su med par sbyor// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las// khro bo khro mo'i sprin 'phros nas// glu bro gar gyi thugs dam ste// rgyun chad med par brtan par bya// bro 'di 'bar ba'i phyag rgya ste// rgyal ba stong dang mnyam par sbyor// glu ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dren// ma dang mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskul// tshig ni don dam rtogs pa'i tshig/ chos sems gnyis su med par rtogs// 'di ni glu bro gar gyi brda'// gar ni khyab gdal chen po'i gar// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams khyab par byed// phyag rgya bsnol ba lu gu rgyud// dus gsum rgyal ba zhi khro bskul// khrag 'thung rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// che mchog yab yum sras dang bcas// mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas ma lus kun// sngon gyi thugs dam ji bzhin du// glu bro gar la gshegs su gsol// hUM hUM hUM badzra ma hA kro d+ha sarba A be sha ya pra be sha ya dzaHhUM baM hoH// de nas bro bskor gzir cing brdung// hUM zhi khro yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor 'dir// khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro gcig brdung// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams kun nas// khro bo khro mo'i bro brdungs pas// la la thabs dang shes rab bro// la la rdo rje pad+ma'i bro// la la dbang po yul gyi bro// la la 'jig rten dbang sdud brau// la la 'dul spyong rtags kyi bro// la la dregs pa 'dul sbyong bro// la la mos pa rgyan gyi bro// la la longs spyod dpal gyi bro// la la spor byed gnas kyi bro// la la sdud byed thabs kyi bro// bro la rnam grangs bsam mi khyab// glu la yon tan brjod mi

lang// tshig la man ngag sna tshogs gsal// bro 'di phrin las rgya mtsho'i bro// glu 'di lta ba rgya mtsho'i glu// tshig 'di 'du 'bral med pa'i tshig/ bro yi ming ni stam b+ha nan// glu yi ming ni pA sha hUM// tshig gi ming ni ang+ku sha/ rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor// kun gyi thugs dam chen po yin// hrIHhrIHhrIHhUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ hUM gsang ba yum gyi mkha' dbyings su// bde chen rol pa'i bro gcig brdung// sna la pad+ma rol pa'i bro// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis brdung// de nas shes rab thabs kyi bro// b+ha ga'i dkyil du dgra bgegs brdung// de nas dbang po yul gyi bro// lha mo brgyad dang thabs cig rol// de nas rdo rje pad+ma'i bro// phyag rgya chen por rgyas 'debs so// de nas gdul bya drag po'i bro// khrag 'thung rgyal po'i 'khor la brdung// de nas mos pa rkyen gyi bro// ma sring rgya mtsho'i 'khor la brdung// de nas 'dul byed thabs kyi bro// phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor ma lus sdud// de nas spor ba gnas kyi bro// rgyud drug rnam shes dbyings su sdud// thabs dang shes rab ldan byas nas// glu bro dam tshig rgyal po yin// brtan pas bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i bro// bro 'di bar chad med par brdung// lta ba dran par bya ba'i phyir// glu ni 'du 'bral med par blang// dkyil 'khor rang la gsal ba'i phyir// tshig ni snying po 'dzab tu bzlas// ye shes dpal gyi bro ra tshugs// bdud bgegs bar chad ming yang med// a la la ho dgyes pa che// hUM hUM hUM/ hUM che mchog 'khor bcas rol pa'i bro// dgra bgegs dam sri'i srog la brdung// badzra he ru rol pa'i bro// dgra bgegs dam sri'i snying la brdung// gshin rje gshed po rol pa'i bro// dgra bgegs dam sri'i klad par brdung// rta mgrin rgyal po ral pa'i bro// dgra bgegs dam sri'i lce la brdung// rdo rje gzhon nu rol pa'i bro// dgra bgegs dam sri'i lte bar brdung// bla med he ru rol pa'i bro// dgra bgegs dam sri'i gsang bar brdung// rig 'dzin thod rtsal rol pa'i bro// dgra bgegs dam sri'i spyi bor brdung// dregs pa kun 'dul rol pa'i bro// dgra bgegs dam sri'i brla g.yas brdung// stobs ldan nag po rol pa'i bro// dgra bgeg dam sri'i brla g.yon brdung// zhi khro bka' brgyad rol pa'i bro// g.yas su bskor te dgra la brdung// g.yon du bskor te bgegs la brdung// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab bro// ru dra dam sri thal bar rlog/ hUM stam b+ha rak+sha dgra bgegs nan// phrin las rnam bzhi bsgrub pa'i bro// bro bca' phrin las dbyibs su bca'// hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rdzogs pa'i dpal// gti mug bde gshegs 'khor dang bcas// de bzhin rigs mchog

ma lus kyis// 'jig rten khams 'di rab 'byams na// shin tu rmongs pa'i sems can kun// zhi ba'i thugs rje chen po yis// zhi bar ma gyur gang yang med// zhi mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal lo// nad gdon rnam rtog shIn+taM ku ru swA hA// hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rdzogs pa'i dpal// nga rgyal bde gshegs 'khor dang bcas// rin chen rigs mchog ma lus kyis// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// shin tu dbul ba'i sems can kun// tshe dbang longs spyod rgyas par mdzad// rgyas par ma gyur gang yang med// rgyas mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshe dang bsod nams puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA// hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rdzogs pa'i dpal// 'dod chags bde gshegs 'khor dang bcas// pad+ma'i rigs mchog ma lus kyis// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// shin tu chags pa'i sems can kun// thams cad dbang du sdud par mdzad// dbang du ma gyur gang yang med// dbang mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// lha 'dre mi gsum ba shang ku ru swA hA/ hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rdzogs pa'i dpal// zhe sdang bde gshegs 'khor dang bcas// rdo rje rigs mchog ma lus kyis// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// shin tu gdug pa'i sems can kun// rdul du+u ma brlags gang yang med// brlag mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra gegs gnod byed mA ra ya hUM phaT/ de ltar bro yi las rdzogs nas// nad sos smyo thul dam sri non// bar chod kun gyis tshugs mi 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las// gzir mnan glu bro yongs rdzogs kyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa// kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ sangs rgyas bstan pa mthar bskyang phyir// mngag pa pho nya yongs rdzogs gang// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// mdor na dpal gyi bkar 'dus pa'i// lha srin dam can bsam yas kyang// bkra shis dam ldan mthu che ba'i// sngags bdag ded dpon sum cu yin// pho nya yongs rdzogs 'di bsgrub na// dben pa'i gnas su sgrub rdzas bsag/ dkyil 'khor mnga' gang gru bzhi yi// dbus su khru gang gru gsum bru// ro ras sam ni dug shog la// 'khor lo sum cu rtsibs ldan bri// dbus su dmigs pa'i ling+ga bca'// rtsibs la srog sngags sum cu po// thod ngan kha sbyor nang du grub// pho nya mchod rten rten gtor du// ri rab bshos bu sum

cus bskor// a mr-i ta dang phud kyis bran// sngags la ba liM ta khA hi zhes// rtags byung bsngo zhing grub dus btang// yongs rdzogs bsnyen pa'i drag sngags la// pho nya'i drag sngags 'di btags bzlas// nyung dkar lcags phye'i thun la bstim// ma hA de wa/ u ma de wa/ ya ma rA dza/ ya ma dun ting/ ma ma ru lu/ e ka dza tI/ du phrag/ dun ting/ rA dza ging ka ra/ badzra sAd+hu tri/ rA hU la/ rak+sha/ rak+mo ra/ yak+Sha/ yag mo/ ma hA kA la/ rU dra/ mun mun/ ti ti ka/ de ba/ a se la/ tik+Sh+Na 'dre ru+u ma/ a b+hi shu/ tri pa sha li/ haM shaM tri/ byi nA ya ka/ d+ha ki ni naM/ nag po ti pa tsa/ nA ga/ kro d+hi shwa rI phuH/ sarba duSh+tAM hrIM hrIM dzaHdzaH/ nyams rtags rta ba mi reng sogs// dmag khrom 'du+u na spu gri gdags// sde dpon re re'i sngags gzhug tu// dgra bo'i srog la b+h+yoHnr-i mA ra ya rbad// bdag nyid yongs rdzogs lhar gsal nas// sde dpon rang rang cha lugs can// rab 'jigs lag cha sna tshogs thogs// dgra bo 'gugs gsod sha khrag rol// grog tshang 'bus snyigs lta bur bsam/ dus drug thun brab brnag pa skyed// skabs su mchod cing las la rbad// de yi nyams rtags pho nya yis// dgra bo dngos khrid gsod 'dzin dang// brag gshag shing gcod snying ston 'byung// de tshe dbus kyi ling+ga dbyung/ phur pa gdab cing bsreg mnan 'phang// de yis bstan pa'i ru dra sgrol// gtor tshogs mdos kyi gtang rag gtang// rtag tu mchod na khyi bzhin 'brang// de phyir dregs pa'i bdag por 'gyur// zhi khro bka' brgyad thams cad kyi// pho nya yongs rdzogs 'di nyid do// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las dam can pho nya yongs rdzogs kyi le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ sgrub pa'i yo byad phun tshogs phyir// 'dod yon nor sgrub yongs rdzogs gang// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// de dpon nor bdag gnod sbyin yin// gnod sbyin bye brag bsam yas kyang// nyer bsdus pho dgu mo dgu yin// gtso bo dzam la gcig pur 'dus// bsgrub lugs spyi chings snying khol las// spyi chings gnod sbyin srog 'khor te// mthing shog dag la rat+na lngas// phad 'khor sbrag ma 'dab brgyad bri// mu khyud lngas bskor lte dbus su/ hUM dzaM ba shaM hriM/ sngags 'chang che ge mo la puN+ya sarba sid+d+hi sdus/ de'i phyi lte ba'i mu khyud bar// dzaM dgu baM dgu spel mar bskor// tsakra rtsibs kyi nang brgyad du// oM dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+rA ya swA hA/ rtsibs mchan pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// oM ba su d+hA ri NI swA hA/

mu khyud nang ma yak+Sha brgyad// sid+d+hi hUM dang spel bar bri// de yi phyi rim las mkhan srog sngags bri/ oM tri'u tri'u myur shog ya tri drung drung tri A yuHpuN+ya sid+d+hi sa ma ya hUM AH/ de'i phyi rin chen zur brgyad bri// de'i phyi lcags kyu kha sprad brgyad// bar du 'dod don ming spel bri// legs bris gur gum dri bzang byug/ a ru rma med gser mdog la// gser gyi dzaM baM tri bris te// de nyid 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// dar lngas sgril te dkar gsum dang// mngar gsum 'bru sna lngar bcas pa// zangs ma'i ga'u 'tshams por gzhug/ yongs rdzogs rtsa ba'i snying po las// oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+rA ya swA hA/ oM ba su d+hA ri NI swA hA/ sarba sid+d+hi hUM AH/ de btags stong bzlas rab gnas bya// de nyid bcangs pas gnod sbyin rnams// 'dus nas nor gyi char pa 'bebs// de nas gnod sbyin thams cad kyi// nor gyi las mkhan snying khol bsgrub// g.ya' mtshams dben par maN+Dal gru bzhi yi// steng du srin bya'i shas brgyan pa'i// rtag gtor gcig bshams ras dkar la// byis pa'i gzugs legs rgyan can bri// mda' bzang bya rgod gcig la gdags// gzhan yang ras dkar gtsang ma'i nang// pha wang long bu shel byi ru// gser sbram dril te rten du gzug/ rang nyid lhar gsal zhag gsum du// srog gi snying po 'dis dgug bya// oM tri'u tri'u myur shog/ ya ti drung drung tri// mi tshig spangs te bzlas brtson na// dang po ltas 'khrugs de rjes dga'// tha ma byis pa mang po 'khor// de tshe nor 'gugs sham bu gdags// sid+d+hi sid+d+hi sa wa ya hUM/ dngos su ci 'dod nor rnams ster// mig mthong 'dod na sngags 'di bzlas// tsak+Shu tsak+Shu phye swA hA/ de yis mngon shes 'jig rten ston// dbang bsod 'dod na sngags 'di gdags// sarba ba shaM ku ru swA hA/ de yang sbags sgrub 'di kho na// rgyun tu bsgrubs pas bsam tshad 'grub// sid+d+hi tsak+Shu ba shaM ku ru+u sa ma ya swA hA/ dngos grub myur 'byung rgyun du bzlas// zhag gsum rjes la zas gtor sbyin// gter rnyed 'bru char 'bab pa dang// byis pa phyag 'tshal lo thog brda'// bzang rtags de yin kho khros na// mi nag mdze pho rtsod rgol cing// rgyan gtor sbrang po nor 'dod 'ong// dgongs pa bsar cing nyams pa bshags// gtor ma gtang shIng dbang du bsdu// tshe dbang bu nor bdag por 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las// gnod sbyin yongs rdzogs nor sgrub kyi le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ las can kun

la phan bya'i phyir// thun mong kha skong rim pa gang// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// thun mong las rim bsam yas kyang// kha skong las rim mdor bstan bshad// bsod nams tshogs gsog yongs rdzogs thabs// mchod dang chu sbyin chu gtor dang// lha khrus maN+Dal gsol 'debs bya// gtor ma chu sbyin bza' tshogs bza'// 'gro 'chag nyal 'dug rten la bskor// nyams pa gso zhing tsha tshwa gdab// skyabs chos zang zing gsum sbyin zhing// nad gdon bar gcod gtor mas bzlog/ 'gro ba'i zas skyed char rgyun dbab// dkon mchog sku gsum rtsa gsum la// skyabs 'gro byang chub sems gnyis bskyed// mchod phyir maN+Dal rten gsum dgod// mchod bshams mtshams bcad byin gyis brlab// dngos ni yul bskyed ye shes bstim// bzhugs gsol phyag sogs rim gyis mchod// 'jig rten lha rdzas ji snyed sogs// kun bzang blos sprul dag pas mnyes// sgrib byang dngos grub gnang bsam bstod// bshags dang chos 'khor yi rang bskul// bzhugs gsol dam bca' bsngo zhing smon// don bskul bskang bshags bzod par gsol// bkra shis smon lam bcas pa dang// gshegs bsdu dmigs med rgyas gdab bya// tshogs rdzogs byang chub nye ba'i rgyu// de dag sngags rim 'di dag ste// oM sarba d+harmAHswa b+hA wa bi shud d+ho\u0f85 haM/ oM badzra yak+sha hUM/ yak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM/ oM AHhUM/ badzra puSh+pe hUM/ badzra d+hU pe hUM/ badzra A lo ke hUM/ badzra gan+d+he hUM/ badzra ni bi d+yai hUM/ badzra A ha ra hUM zhes byung/ badzra shap+ta hUM/ oM b+h+rUM pad+ma ka ma la ya maN+Da la hUM/ oM na mo bud+d+ha ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsang+g+hA ya hUM/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ pra bar sat+ka ra pra tI ts+tsha swA hA/ ar+g+haM pra tI ts+tsha swA hA/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM/ sngags la rkyen sbyar dbyangs rim pas mchod/ badzra mu/ mchod sbyin gtor ma'i rim pa ni/ gnas gtsang mchod gtor cha gsum bsham// sbyang spel bsgyur thob byin gyis brlab// zhe sdang rdo rjes bskrad bsdu bya// dang po gtsang rigs bdun cu gnyis// bskyed 'gugs rang sngags phyag rgya yis// dbab cing spyan drang mchod bstod bya// dngos grub blang zhing las la bskul// oM AHhUM b+h+rUM/ oM pre ta yak+sha a sa pa i a ya ba ya ga/ bi nA ya ka swA hA/ de de de/ de de de de de/ phuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuH/ rA rA rA rA rA rA rA rA/ ya ya ya ya ya ya ya ya/ sngags la rkyen sbyar dang pos mchod/ bar bar rgyud lnga rigs drug spyi/ sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drang mchod// a nr-i su tri pre du badzra A gats+tsha hUM hUM dzaHdzaH/ sngags dang tshig sbyar bar du mchod// tha ma stong phrag brgyad bcu'i bgegs// chags 'jal sha 'khon sbyong rdzas brlabs// de wa

nA ga/ yak+Sha/ gan+d+harba/ b+hU ta ta ni ri ti/ ga ru Da/ gin+na ra/ ma ho ra ga/ pre ta ka/ ma nu Sh+ya/ a ma nu Sh+ya/ sa pA ri wA re b+h+yaHswA hA/ sngags brgya tshig gis spyan drang mchod/ chos bshad bden bdar bka' bsgo zhing// bskrad bsrung de yi thob tshul lo// chu yi gtor mas mchod pa'i thabs// gang zag gnas dus yul rgyu rkyen// rat+na'i snod bzhir chu gtsang sbyar// lnga tshan lnga rdzas me tog gdab// skad cig lhar bskyed lus bsrung bya// bdun po tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom// b+h+ruM las gnas bskyed de dbus su// stong nyid sa bon phyag mtshan las// sngags brjod ting 'dzin dam tshig bskyed// ye shes mdun dgug mchod bstod bsnyen// pad sdong 'khor lo rim bzhi la// sri zhu yon tan snying rje chags// mgron bzhi dgug la gral rim dgod// sngags rgyas sbyang spel mos par bsgyur// spyod dbang thob mnyes dbang du bsdu// las bcol ming gi bsngo ba bya// don brjod bden dar chos gsum sbyin// 'phags tshogs gshegs gsol mgron gsum dgyes// de rjes snang srid 'khor 'das chos// byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun la// bzang ngan rtog tshogs mchod rdzas spras// 'dzin bral gtor chen yongs la khyab// chos dbyings skye med rang rgyas gdab// de dag sngags rim 'di lta ste// oM swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he/ sarba d+harmAHswa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tat+khaM ut+ga te hi maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta a wa lo ki te/ oM sam+b+hA ra sam+g+hA ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na a wa lo ki te/ na maHsa man+ta s+pha ra Na/ rasmi b+ha ba sa ma ya ma hA ma Ni/ du ru du ru hr-i da ya/ dza la ni hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ gra he shwa ri pra b+hany+dza ti/ ma hA sa ma ya swAhA/ sngags la tshig dang phyag rgyas brgyan// byang chub sems chen spyod lam bya// gnyis rdzogs byang chub 'grub pa'i rgyu'o// rnal 'byor ldang tshe rim pa gsum// lus lha ngag sngags sems nyid ni// spros bral snang srid smig rgyur blta// khrus gsum chu gtsang dri chu dang/ sems nyid dag bya kho na yin// maN+Dal phyi nang gsang ba ste/ rin chen maN+Dal dri gtsang byug/ me tog ri rab gling bcas dgram// rin chen bdun gter nyi zlas brgyan// yang na zhing chen khrag byugs la// dbang po rnam lnga'i tshom bu dgram// nang gi mchod sprin gtibs la dbul// mtha' bral rang sems rtog tshogs dgram// rnam dag rang grol gsang mchod dbul// gsol 'debs gsum gyis nyams spel ba/ spyi gtsug bla ma rdo rje chos// rig 'dzin tshogs bskor byin chen la// lus kyis phyag sbyar ngag dbyangs su// 'bru+u gsum snying pos gsol ba gdab// rang rig bla ma chos skur bskyang// rgyun gtor gtsang ma ci 'byor

la// 'bru gsum sngags kyis spel sbyangs bsgyur// phyi ltar lha rdzas nang 'dod yon// gsang ba 'khor 'das zhen rtog bral// rtsa ba gsum stsogs sri zhu'i mgron// yon tan snying rje lan chags mchod// chos sbyin dmigs med rgyas gdab bya// chu sbyin bum nang chu ar bsam// 'bru gsum nyer gcig brjod sbrengs pas// bdud rtsis yi dwags kun tshim bsam// gtor bas rigs drug sdug bsngal grol// bza' tshogs rang nyid lhar gsal gdab// gnas gsum 'bru gsum rtsa gsum dngos/ 'od kyis bag chags sbyang spel bsgyur// bdag mchod kun mnyes tshogs 'khor che// 'gro na ye shes mkha' la 'gro// 'chag tshad bdud rtsir byin brlab sbyin// nyal tshad mi rtog chos dbyings nyal// 'dug tshad rnal 'byor gsum ldan 'dug/ bskor ba yongs rdzogs rten mchog la// 'gro kun 'khor rgyun gcad phyir bskor// ye shes 'khor lo rgyun mi 'chad// nyam gso mtshan don phyag 'tshal zhing// yi ge gsum gyi 'phro 'du bya// rnam dag ye shes nyi mas sbyangs// tsha tshwa phyi ltar 'byung ba dang// nang zas gsang bar sems la gdab// skyabs sbyin nyen 'jigs kun la bskyab// chos sbyin gdul bya'i blo mthun bshad// zang zang sdug phongs re ba bskang// nad gdon kun gyi gnyen por ni// sku gsung thugs kyi snying pos gzhom// oM gyis pho gdon mkhres tshad 'joms// AHyis mo gdon grang bad sel// hUM gis klu gdon rlung 'dus sel// bar chod kun sel gtor bzlog ni// dkyil 'khor khrag byug e khram steng// gtor chen khrag zor rtsang bcas dgu// rtse la stobs chen brgyad sprul gzugs// sbyor dngos las kyis gzhung bsrangs la// dpal dgu'i snying po sham bur bcas// so lnga'i drag sngags phur btsug bzla// spyi dang sgos bskul b+h+yo bzlog bcas// phur thun tshom bu bskul cing bzlog/ dus min 'chi dang zor ltas ltas ngan yang bzlog/ lo tog smin cing rdzogs byed pa/ char pa 'bebs na klu yod sar// maN+Dal legs byas klu mchod bya// rjes su klu sman bag byi sbyar// ril bu sgong 'dra zangs gzhong gang// ril bu re la sngags stong stong// bzlas te chu mig khyab par gzhug/ oM nA ga phuH/ pra te pra de yang badzra dun te/ mi li mi li swA hA/ char phob la/ oM nA ga shu li ni swA hA/ char phob/ mang du bzlas pas gdon mi za// dka' na gzir te dbab par bya// yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsnyen phur la// rtsa sngags sham bur 'di bcas bzla// na mo bud+d+ha ya/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ nA ga du tsan+d+ha tsan+d+he/ mi li mi li/ nA ga du hUM phaT/ char phob ya b+h+yo// khri tsho gcig sngags chu dmigs gzir// char pa chen po gdon mi za// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po

las/ yongs rdzogs thun mong kha skong ba'i rim pa ste so gsum pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye// thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ thun mong las khyad las brgyad dang// ser ba shwa dang char ngan gyis// lo thog ma rungs bsrungs thabs gang// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// thun mong nyid las khyad par brgyad// rig byed skye bdun de nyid dang// gi hang gur gum ki na ra// rgya tshwa pi ling tsher rgod zwa/ ga pur dang sbyar sngags 'dis bstim// oM AHhUM/ sarba sid+d+hi saM gra yang sad+g+ha hUM// khri bzlas ri lus las kun byed// rgya rigs skye bdun snying rkang mar// ra mo shags kyis yang bcud sbyor// oMoM oM oM yang AMHA tut+tA re swA hA/ 'bum bzlas zos na mkha' la 'phur// rje rigs de nyid rta shar sbyar// bya rgod tshil la gsang sngags khri// oM AHhUM/ gr-id+d+ha mu ta rbad yaM/ rkang mthil byugs pas sa rnams gcod// nya phyis rgya spos rus sbal snying// sbrul mgo thog lcags bcud la sbyar// oM AHhUM bag shi ta ki la d+ha ra ya/ 'bum brjod longs spyod gter rnams rnyed// 'dre mthong ku ku dkar mo'i snying// 'ug srin mig sbyar khyai'u skyes zhos// legs sbyangs sngags 'dis mig la byug/ oM AHhUM/ u lU tsak+Shu dz+nyA na thol// khri stong gis bsgrub mngon shes 'char// lding lhing yang nag khyi snying sog thil dang// khwa ta'i sgro dang yungs sur yang kar sbyar// oM AHhUM/ muM khraM muM khril hral shu yang/ hi shu/ bdun 'bum gyis bsgrub gser du dril// lce rtsar bcangs na sgrib shing che// thar nu lcags phyi ser tshur dang// sbyar rtsa'i dngul chu mu zir sbyar// oM AHhUM/ so na ra ga sarba le// stong tsho gsum gyis bsgrub ste bsreg/ lcags sam zangs nyid gser du 'gyur// ku ku dkar mo sna dmar la// khyi gu de 'dra skyes pa'i zho// rdo rigs gsum dang mtshe chu dang// cong zhi brag zhun ra shag bcud// snyoms sbyar gser gyi bum par bsgrub// oM AHhUM a mi de wa badzra A yu She hUM b+h+rUM/ zla drug sngags zos drug brgya thub// de ltar las brgyad gang bsgrubs kyang// rnal 'byor rdo rje sems dpar bsgom// thabs shes rdzas ldan ma lus 'grub// ser ba gang bsrung yul de yi// lha srin yul lha thams cad la// mchod bstod phud gtor gsol kha bya// seng ldeng phur pa bcu dag la/ rtsa sngags brgya bstim las sngags ni/ re la stong bstim gu gul 'dug/ A+oM badzra dun te mi li mi li/ phye shag phye shag swA hA/ mtho bcu phur par bcas te dgram// rab gnas byin brlab mchod pa bya// ser sprin 'dus na yongs rdzogs bsgom// sngags bzlas phus gdab mdzub ris bya// ser bas

tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// char ngan dang ni gzhung chu yi// gnod pa sel na seng ldeng gis// phur pa sor brgyad lnga gsum la// rtsa sngags stong bsnyen las sngags 'di// khri'am 'bum bstim phyogs su bstim// na ma b+hud d+hA ya/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ nA ga pu tsan+d+he/ mi li mi li/ nA ga ni swA hA/ nA ga ma la shig pra prag yang du/ nA ga ma la shig swA hA/ kha char gcod cing chu 'gyur bzlog/ shwa log bzlog na zangs lcags la// 'brug pho 'brug mo kha sbyar la// sngags gzhug gong bzhin bzlas bstims nas// chu snar sbas pas nges par bzlog/ ces bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ khyad par gyi las chen brgyad bsgrub cing/ shwa ser chu dmag yongs rdzogs zlog thabs kyi le'u ste so bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ tshe 'das rigs drug nas drang phyir// bdun tshigs 'dren pa yongs rdzogs gang// de skad ces gsol bka' stsal pa// tshe 'das ngan song gnas sbyang phyir// dkyil 'khor mchod rdzas bum pa stsogs// gsang sgrub chen po'i skabs bzhin te// dkyil 'khor lho ngos rigs drug gi// maN+Dal dbang stegs bcas pa dang// lha bshos gtor ma drug drug bsham// rten nam mtshan byang dri rten dgod// bskyed rdzogs gzhung bsrang 'dzab rdzogs nas// tshe 'das dgug cing gshed dang dbral// rigs drug las byang gnas nas drang// khrus bya lan chags gtor ma gtang// mi rtag chos bshad dbang bskur bya// 'khor ba'i 'brel bcad lam yang bstan// rgyas gdab dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo// mtshan byang bsregs la tsha tshwa gdab// dkyil 'khor bsdus la rdzogs rim bsgom// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ yang bdun tshigs 'dren thabs yongs rdzaugs kyi le'u ste so lnga pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa// kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ dpyang chad 'byung 'dus zhig pa'i ro// bag chags sbyang phyir bsreg thabs gang// de skad ces gsol bka' stsal pa// ro bsreg sbyong gi rim pa ni// sa bdag klu gnyan med pa'i phyogs// maN+Dal mda' gang 'dom gang bsham// 'dom gang nang du dkyil 'khor bzheng// phyi zur grwa bzhir ka bas bteg/ thog phub steng du bsreg khang ni// mda' gang gru bzhi gser du bya// de nas phrin las rnam bzhi yi// thab khung steng nang gru

gsum la// de steng zla gam gru bzhi zlum// shing rnams rim pa de bzhin brtsig/ de nas ro de khrus byas la// dgug dang gshed dbral rigs drug drang// bsreg khang ro gzhug gdugs gsum dbub// zur bzhir 'phan bzhi phyogs bzhir dar// rol mo'i bye brag kun gyis mchod// ro yi snying gar 'khor lo ni// pad+ma tshon spel brgya ldan la// dbus su yongs rdzogs rtsa sngags bri// pad 'dab brtsibs la yig brgya dgod// 'khor lo'i lte bar gzungs thag gdags// ting 'dzin sems dpa' sum brtsegs bsgom// rtsa sngags yig brgyar bcas bzlas shing// spro bsdu sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyang// ro yi snying nang 'khor lo ni// de bzhin bsgoms te lte ba yi// dpa' bo rigs lnga'i 'bru lnga la// me lce brgya 'bar gzung 'dzin gyi// bag chags rtog sgrib sbyang bar bsam// me nyid me lha yongs rdzogs kyi// lha ru bsam te mchod pa'i tshogs// phyi nang kun gyis mchod pa bya// me spar bsreg rdzas nyung dkar dang// til dang shug ti zhun mar la// rtsa sngags yig brgya stong sngags te// oM swa b+hA wa ag+na ye/ ma ma sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ma ma sarba karma A wa ra na bi shud+d+he shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ dgang blug dag gis rim par mchod// las bzhi rdzogs nas bsdu bya zhing// smon lam gdab cing dge ba bsngo// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ ro bsreg bsnyen pa mnyen po yang yongs rdzogs kyi le'u ste so drug pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ thabs ldan yun gyi rten gyur pa// tsha tshwa gdab thabs rim pa gang// zhes gsol ston pas bka' stsal pa// de nas tsha tshwa gdab pa ni// sbyor dngos rjes kyi cho gas te// sbyor ba skyabs 'gro sems skyed nas// dngos gzhi lha yi rnal 'byor pas// smin pa'i sa brkos spos chus sbyang// oM a sa me/ hri sa me/ ma hA sa me swA hA/ 'bi 'bi snum ldan chos kyi sku/ d+harma kA ya A/ brkos phor zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs// oM sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM/ bi sho d+ha ni/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ de nas rtsa sngags brjod cing gdab// tsha tshwa sprul sku 'gro don mdzad// oM ka ni kA ya swA hA/ tiSh+Tha lhan zhes bzhugs su gsol// phyi ni gzhal yas nang yongs rdzogs// lha tshogs 'gro ba 'dul bar bsam// 'byung bzhi gzhan la de bzhin gdab// des ni sku gsum lhun grub ste// ma grub bar du 'khor lo bsgyur// chos skyong rgyal chen nyid du 'gyur// zhi rgyas dbang drag las bsgrub na// zhi ba'i brkos phor zlum po thogs// rtsa

ba'i sngags dang 'di sbrel bzlas// oM badzra ka ni ka che ge shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ zhes gdab nad gdon rnams rtog zhi// rgyas pa'i brkos phor gru bzhi thogs// rtsa ba'i sngags la 'di sbrel bzlas// swA rat+na ka ni ka che ge mo puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes gdab tshe dbang 'byor drug rgyas// dbang gi brkos phor zla gam thogs// rtsa ba'i sngags la 'di sbrel bzlas// A pad+ma ka ni ka che ge mo ba shaM ku ru swA hA/ zhes gdab khams gsum dbang du sdud// drag po'i brkos phor zur gsum thogs// rtsa ba'i sngags la 'di sbrel bzlas// hA karma ka ni ka che ge mo mA ra ya phaT// bdud dang dgra bgegs kun tshar gcod// de ltar rnam bzhi'i tsha tshwa la// srog shing ya snying me tog dbul// yongs rdzogs lha dang gzhal yas khang// dkar ser dmar ljang 'od zer gyis// gang 'dul zhi rgyas dbang drag gi/ phrin las thams cad 'grub par bsam// gal te tshe 'das don byed na// rus pa'i phye ma 'jim par sbyar// gdab thabs gson dang mthun pa la// gdab pa'i dmigs pa 'di dag sbyar// oM kaM ka ni kaM ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ trA sa ni hrA sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/ sarba karma pa raM pA ra Ni me swA hA// ngan song gnas drangs brkos phor bstim// chos dbyings rgyas gdab rgyal sras su// rang shar 'gro don byed par bsam// na rag ngan song dong sprug 'gyur// de nas tsha tshwa gang yin par// rab gnas dam tshig mchod bstod la// ye shes spyan drang mchod rten bstim// rten 'brel snying po brgya rtsa brgyad// nas la sngags te rab tu bstim/ phyag 'tshal phyi nang mchod pa 'bul// yun gyi rten du gsol ba gdab// bkra shis bsngo ba smon lam bya// don ldan rten mchog 'di la 'bad// byang chub mchog gi 'bras bu thob/ ces bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ tsha tshwa rten gsum yongs rdzogs kyi le'u ste so bdun pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ dam nyams log lta tshar gcad phyir// bsad mnan rlung 'khor rnam gsum gang// de skad ces gsol bka' stsal pa// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// sangs rgyas bstan la sku dgra dar// de tshe log lta tshar gcod pa'i// bsad pa srog gi las sbyor ni// dkyil 'khor mda' gang grub bzhi'i dbus// khru gang gru gsum 'brub khung nang// dgra bo du yod ling+ga ni// nal bu rkyal ba'i nang du brub// lte bar 'bri ru g.yas pa gzug/ lcags phur brgyad kyis tha ma bskor// skye tshe shang tshe thun gyi rdzas// 'bri ru nang blugs sngags kyis brab// nal

bu'i lte bar mi rkang gzud// nang nas thun sngags bcas pas brab// zhag grangs bdun gsum nyer gcig tu// spu gri ngar ma'i sngags rgod 'dis// ma yengs sel med thog ltar 'phangs// mA ra ya thun b+h+yo// sngags 'di rnams dpe 'dra min mang a pra sib pre/ i nad phu ni/ i sa tra bo ri/ khin na khin na/ a bud ti sad ta sad ta/ khrid ta khrid ta/ drag sngags bdun pa de bzlas pas// dgra bo dngos nyams khrid nas gsod// gsod mkhan nga yi gdan 'og gi/ mu stegs rab 'jigs kho na ste// bsad pa'i mthar thug de kho na// dgra bgegs mnan pa'i las sbyor ni// drag po'i sbyin bsreg thal ba dang// dgra bo'i zag rdzas dug chus sbrus// dgra bgegs gzugs byas rgyab sprad la// 'gugs 'dren byas la re bas gril// snying gar dug gi phur pa gdab// mnan sngags khri 'am stong gis brubs// rgya lam mchod rten them 'og tu// spyi tsher bcugs la tsha tshas mnan// dgra bgegs lcags khang sgo med brub/ de nyid chu srin gre bar brdzang// ri rab 'og tu mnan par bsams// yongs rdzogs rtsa sngags sham bu ru// oM laM hUM laM dgra bgegs gnod byed che ge mo kA ya bA ka tsit+ta stam b+ha ya nan// zhes bzlas phrin las bro bzhis mnan// bskal pa'i mthar yang ldang mi srid// stobs ldan rlung gi las sbyor ni// ya tha rdo rje sems dpa' nas// ma tha the'u brang yan chod po// bsnyen bsgrub las sbyor stobs bskyed ni// bzlas brjod rlung la bcol bas 'grub// gang zag gnas dus phun tshogs nas// grub thob bsnyen rdzogs phags pa la// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud ni// bdun dang bcas pas bri bar bya// rtsibs bzhi dbus lngar phyag mtshan la// rigs lnga yab yum sa bon sngags// ming rus 'dod gsol bskor bar bri// oM lAM hUM mUM swA mAM AM pyaM ha trAM/ mu khyud dang por dbyangs yig ste// gnyis pa gsal byed sngags rten 'brel// kun gyi sham bur 'dod gsol gdags// gsum pa yongs rdzogs rtsa ba'i sngags// bzhi pa phan yon che sngags dgod// lnga pa dam can ye shes pa// drug pa bka' srung 'jig rten pa// rtsa sngags sham bur phrin las bzhi// gang byed bsgrub cing dmod pa bri// bdun pa mtshon cha lnga yi gur// seng ldeng phur pa'i srog shing la// dpal zung bzhi la sgro gzug ste// rlung lha sha zhon dar thogs bri// rlung khang gru bzhi rlung sgo can// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor gang byed kyang// sngags rnams bklag phyogs 'khor bar bya// dbang sdud rgyas byed g.yon du bskor// bsad bzlog zhi ba phyi bskor shes// de la yongs rdzogs lha tshogs bstim// gzhung bsrang tshogs 'khor rab gnas bya// skabs skabs kun tu mnga' gsol nas// gang bsgrub stobs ldan rlung gis (7)

bsgrub// 'di las rgyas 'bring ci bde bar// yongs su rdzogs dang bye brag la// gsang sngags gang bsgrub 'di skabs sbyar// rlung stsogs 'byung bzhi'i las bcol 'grub// dper na nor bu+u rin chen 'dra// 'di ni gsang ba'i 'khrul 'khor yin// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las// bsad mnan rlung 'khor yongs rdzogs kyi le'u ste so brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ 'jig rten ye shes gang bsgrubs kyang// srog gzer kha bsgyur rim pa gang// de skad ces gsol bka' stsal pa// ye shes 'jig rten gang bsgrubs kyang// srog sdom gzer bzhis ma thebs na// nam yang don med yug pas kyang// drang don rdzun gyi 'khrul 'khor yin// yongs rdzogs dpal gyi srog 'phrog thabs// gcig shes pas ni kun srog thob// dper na sgra gcan 'dzin gyis khas// nam mkha'i nyi ma gcig zin pas// chu bran stong gi nyi ma kun// ma bzung bar yang stong srog thob// de phyir srog gi gzer bzhi gces// dben pa'i gnas su maN+Dal bsham// dbus su mtshan ldan ka pA lar// dpal chen sku gcig gsal bar dgod// bskyed rdzogs gzhung bsrang 'dzab rdzogs rjes// mi rtog bya bral so mar gnas// de nas dpal gyi srog 'phrog thabs// ting 'dzin gzer dang snying po'i gzer// dgongs pa'i gzer dang 'phro 'du'i gzer// ting 'dzin gzer ni thod sku la// rtse gcig sems gzung yengs mi bya// yul gsum gyad du gyur pa dang// dpa' ldan he ru dngos dang mjal// bzlog pa he ru kas mi spyod// ting 'dzin mi 'gyur gzer med na// sku ni nams kyang mthong mi 'gyur// snying po sngags gzer yongs rdzogs kyi// gtso bo'i sngags dag sel med bzlas// thugs srog hUM la rtsa sngags bskor// gsal ba'i 'phro 'dus srog sngags bgrangs// de tshe dpal byon lung yang ston// nus pa'i rtsal rdzogs lha rnams 'khor// srog snying bsnyen rdzogs gzer med na// lha dang dam can 'khor mi srid// dgongs pa'i gzer ni zhi khro'i lha// yongs rdzogs dpal chen rang sems las// gud na med cing ru dra yang// logs na med do rang gi sems// sems nyid stong pa chos kyi sku// gsal la ma 'gags longs spyod rdzogs// sna tshogs rang shar sprul pa'i sku// snang ba yab la stong pa yum// snang stong dbyer med ye shes sku// 'gyu dran rnam rtog bsam yas kyang// yongs su rdzogs pa dpal gyi 'khor// bsam gyis mi khyab ye sangs rgyas// rang bzhin nyid las

g.yos pa med// dgongs pa mi 'gyur gzer med na// dpal chen grub kyang thun mong las// mchog mi 'grub cing ru drar gol// 'phro 'du'i gzer ni dmigs pa yi// bsgyur kha shes na 'dod dgur 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phro 'du yis// sems kyi nus pa rtsal rdzogs te// gang ltar bsam pa de ltar snang// sngags dang phyag rgya'i byin rlabs mthus// zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod sogs// phan gnod las ka gang yang 'grub// dper na nor bu gcig nyid la// gsol mchod rkyen gyis bye brag tu// ji ltar 'dod pa so sor bskang// 'phro 'du sna tshogs gzer med na// dmigs gtad gcig la don mi 'grub// 'phro 'du'i las kha bsgyur shes na// the'u rang tha chung gcig kyang gis// phrin las thogs med las kun 'grub// thams cad sems kyi cho 'phrul yin// kha bsgyur gnad kyi man ngag 'di// yongs rdzogs dpal chen he ru nas// 'gong po grong rgyug yan chad po'i// ye shes 'jig rten gang na yang// gcig la bsnyen rdzogs grub thob na// las kyi kha bsgyur gang yang 'grub// dper na lcags rdo ngar btul na// go khrab mtshon cha cir bsgyur nyan// rdo ma thul ba lcags yin kyang// ma bsgyur dngos kyi bzo mi btub// de phyir lha 'dre gcig bsgrub na// kha sgyur gang la zhugs kyang grub// dang po tshe sring kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan du// tshe chang tshe mar ri lu blug/ kha ni tshe zan zlum pos bcad// de la gzungs thag btags byas la// yongs rdzogs rtsa ba'i sngags de la// tshe yi yang snying 'di sbrel bzlas// A yuHpha la sid+d+hi hUM a/ rtags ni khol dang lud pa 'byung// de ltar byung na tshe bstim la// tshe 'brang za zhing tshe chang btung// de yis tshe bsring 'chi bslur 'gyur// rmongs po srid spel kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// 'di nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par srin rdo khab len dang// bud med mngal khrag bye ru dang// de rnams le brgan dar du gril// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de dang// srid spel yang snying 'di sbrel bzlas// pu tra A yuHpha la sid+d+hi hUM/ ra lug gang shi'i gta' ru gzhug/ mchod bstod gsol la rab brtson bya// bud med lnga bcu lon gyur kyang// bu tsha rnyed cing 'phel bar 'gyur// dbul sel nor bsgrub kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par rin chen ga'u ru// gser dngul zangs lcags sna lnga blug/ nor lhar gyur tshad gzungs sngags

brub// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de la// nor sgrub yang snying 'di sbrel bzlas// rat+na pha la sid+d+hi b+h+rUM nan kha d+he puSh+tiM sid+d+hi hUM/ zas nor gang 'dod gsol ba gdab// longs spyod phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// mig mthong mngon shes kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par 'ug pa smug po'i mig/ byi la'i mig dang lung thang dang// de rnams ra dkar 'o mas sbru// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de dang// rno mthong rtsa ba'i sngags sbrel bzlas// oMHma d+ha ma d+ha la tsak+Shu tsak+Shu pra be sha phaT/ rdzas de mig la byugs pa na// srid pa gsum yang mthong bar 'gyur// 'byung po 'dul byed kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par gtor tshogs bzang po bsham// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de la// 'dre 'dul sngags 'di sbrel la bzlas// 'byung po 'dul byed sha truM tsu lu tsu lu phaT phaT/ chos skyong bskul zhing dbang yang gzug/ phur thun sngags kyis brab pa na// gnod byed skad ngan tser tser 'ong// mna' bsgag 'gags bsdam rjes gcod bya// 'dre gdon thams cad byer bar 'gyur// ser ba srung ba'i kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par zas gtor phyir mchod de// bden pa bsgo rjes mtho skor bya// de nas ser rkang nam shar tshe// bdag nyid yongs rdzogs dpal chen bskyed// dregs pa thams cad bka' nyan bsam// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de la// ser srung yang snying 'di sbrel bzlas// yo ger yor ge yang sad raM raM sad phur phura'ur 'ur yang sad// thal chen nyung dkar dag la bsngags// gdong du gtor na bzlog par 'gyur// dkor nor srung ba'i kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par nor rdzas yul khams rnams// ming gzugs lha yi rten la bcing// kho la nor rdzas bsrung ma bcol// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de la// nor srung sngags 'di sbrel la bzlas// trig traM baM tsin+d+ha yA/ rat+na ra sti nor srungs shig/ de byas nor de gzhan khyer na// nor phyir cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'breng// skabs skabs gsol ka bcol gtad bya// rang gis stong tshe zhu gsol bya// mi dang nor 'phel god bsrung 'gyur// sbyor ba nag po'i kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// 'di nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par sngags 'dis rgyun tu bsrung// yang snying

rtsa ba'i rgyun rjes la// dug 'joms gsang sngags 'di brgya bzlas// oM b+hi sha g+ho li ra mi ya u be swA hA/ yang na nyer re nang re bzlas// des ni bdag srung rgyal por 'gyur// 'on te byung zin gzhan bsrung na// sngags 'di chu la mang bzlas blud// oM ha sing ha sing/ ka ling ha sing/ ka ma ra tri ye swA hA/ gang la dogs pa'i zas kun la// sngags 'di sbrel gdab dug 'joms nges// mtshon cha srung ba'i kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par sngags 'di btags pas bsrung// yang snying rgyun bsnyen spyi gtsug gdags// mtshon kha snyol byed yi ge khrom// mthing shog dag la gser gyis bris// dar sna lngas gril rab gnas bya// de 'dra gsum byas spyi gtsug dang// mgrin pa snying gar gdags par bya// oM rno sod bzlog chum dril swA hA/ sa la nyer gcig sngags byas te// nam dgos dus su gtor bas grub// ngag gnon sgrol ba'i kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhug bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par mtshan ldan thod pa'i nang// chang dang a mr-i ta sbyar te// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de la// ngag 'grol sngags 'di sbrel la bzlas// a shig shig phyung phyung khrol khrol swA hA/ brgya dang rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang// de nyid bdud rtsi lce rdo rjer// bsam te thigs pa lan gsum gzhag/ de yang spyi gtsug mgrin pa dang// snying ga rnams su gsum gsum gzhag/ sgo gsum bcings pa kun grol bsam// mnan gtad ngag mnan kun grol 'gyur// pra phab pa yi kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de la bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de yi gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par 'phying dkar ras dkar steng// nas kyi g.yung drung bris byas nas// pra rten khye'u bu mor rung// yul chos ma gos gtsang ma bzhag/ srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de la// pra dbab sngags 'di sbrel la bzlas// mu shri ku shri pra ma da na ti b+ha ga sid+d+hi g+har khug/ nga'i bu mo dgar chug kho'i bu mo smyor chug/ nas la bsngags te pra rten gzir/ legs nyes gang dris smra bar 'gyur// mdze nad gso ba'i kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// chos skyong bskang zhing phrin las bcol// 'brub khung nang du sbal pa'i gzugs// gang gnod sa la byas te gzhug/ lus po tshon skud dra bar gzhug/ sug bzhi phur pas stod la gzir// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags nyid dang// sde brgyad gnad sngags 'di yis gzir// nA ga rA dza sa ma

ya snying la khrag du rmugs/ da ma dza dza/ nA ga rAk+sha rAk+sha mA ra ya rbad rbad// zhag grangs nyer gcig thun gyis brab// sbal pa skad ngan tser tser yong// mdze nad mi bzad sos par 'gyur// dgra bo gsod pa'i kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// 'di nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par nyung dkar nyung nag dang// zangs lcags rdo yi phye ma dang// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de dang// gsod pa'i sngags rgod 'di sprel bzlas// che ge mo sha truM a mu kaM/ srog rtsa dmar po hur thum mA ra ya rbad rbad// mdor na las kun rtse gcig ste// 'di yang zhag grangs nyer gcig bsgrub// dgra srog myur du 'chad par 'gyur// ser ba 'bebs pa'i kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par nyung dkar gu gul dang// khrag sna tshogs tshad gtsod khrag la// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de la// ser ba'i yang snying 'di sbrel bzlas// khrom khrom hril hril shar shar phob phob// gnam mi mthong bar nyer gcig bsgrub// thebs dus mthun de dgra yul gtor// skyin thang khrag tu 'bab par 'gyur// gnam lcags thog 'bebs kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par gser dngul thig po dang// thog mded nyung dkar thun la bya// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de dang// thog gi drag sngags 'di sbrel bzlas// raM raM hril hril phrom phrom shar shar phob phob// nyer gcig bsgrubs te thun rgod ni// dgra bo'i khang pa dag la gtor// dgra bo thog gis mgo 'gas 'gyur// gtad khram gzhug pa'i kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par gro ga shog shog la// ling+ga ming rus ldan bris la// tha ma sbrul nag 'khyil pas bskor// zhi ba rA'am sbal par gzhug/ drag po mdze thod rkang du brub// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de dang// klu yi drag sngags 'di sbrel bzlas// nA ga rA dza sa ma ya khug sprig sprig nr-i dza/ nA ga shig srog rtsa chod sa ma ya/ drag las mdzod// skye tshe shang tshe la bsngags brab// las la sbyar ba'i thal bar bcas// la chas kha bsdam gting rdo gdags// byang bltas chu mig sngo mtshams gtad// dgra bo mdze 'bras lhog shir 'gyur// ltas ngan cho 'phrul kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par wa spyang dom dred dang// 'ug pa srin bya

khwa ta dang// ltas ngan snying khrag sna tshogs dang// nyung dkar nyung nag thun rdzas la// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de dang// ltas ngan sngags 'di sbrel la bzlas// li phrim raM kar rma ri// she'u re'u/ he dun tsa phob/ khyung rtsa he phaT/ gang 'dod sngon du rang la 'ong// rdzas rnams phyogs sam khang par bskyal// ltas ngan cho 'phrul 'byung bar 'gyur// ngan thabs sel nag kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par khyi phag spyang thod dang// sha zan bya yi mchu sder dang// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa la// drag po'i ming rus yul mkhar dang// nor rdzas che bran thams cad brub// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de la// sel sngags 'phung byed 'di sbrel bzlas// tsakra rak+Sha tshal pa kyi khyer/ rtsad chod drung phyung rmang nas shig/ ste shog ya// rdzas rnams dril te dgra bo yi// khang sa zhing sa dur sar sba// mkhar 'gyel zhing skam dur rnams 'khrug/ dgra rnams phung zhing brlag par 'gyur// seng ge kha 'thab kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par 'dag pa'i seng ge gnyis// khong stong byas la so btang la// gcig dkar gcig nag so sor phyug/ dkar po'i nang du rang bsten pa'i// lha dang srung ma'i ming gzugs rnams// dpa' brjid dmag 'dren tshul du brub// srog sngags bsnyen bsgrub las dril gzhug/ nag po'i nang du kho yi ni// lha srung sngags ming gzugs bcas bris// sde brgyad dag gi ming byang bri// de gnyis kha 'thab bar du ni// ban d+he kho yi ling+ga gzhug/ srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de la/ seng ge kha 'thab rgyal sngags bzlas// nr-i mA ra ya ni nr-i hur thum// ban d+he la rbad kha tham// che ge mo'i srog snying dmar po hur thum dza mA ra ya rbad// zangs lcags nyung dkar nyung nag la// bsngags shing ling+ga de la brdeg/ zla drug lon tshe de 'chi 'gyur// rbod gtong zlog pa'i kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par kho yi rkang rjes dang// dri ma dag la ling+ga bya// ming rus bris la snying gar glan// mchog phur sor brgyad snying gar gdab// rang gi mal 'og gru gsum nang// nya bo dug khrag byugs la bzhag/ dong kha rgya gram g.yam pas bcad// de steng rang nyid lhar gsal 'dug/ srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de la// bod gtong zlog sngags 'di sbrel bzlas// pa ra tsakra hrIHSh+t-IHa pa na ya/ che ge mo'i rbod zor sarba bzlog bzlog ya ya/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la gcig thub// stong rtsa

brgyad kyis de thub 'gyur// khri tsho gcig gis rtag tu thub// sbod gtong thams cad des bzlog 'gyur// mu stegs ngag gnon kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par kho yi chu rjes la// chu la 'bogs pa'i rjes sa la// kho yi gzugs ni kha bde bya// shog shog lce dpyang og mar drang// btsan dug mu zi tshur nag byug/ rdo rje rgya gram bris nas ni// dkyil du mchog phur sor bzhi gdab// rang gi ro stod 'og dag tu// gru gsum dong gi nang du gnan// lcags kyi pha bong ri rab kyis// kho yi lce mnan 'gyur med bsam// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de la/ a bA ga rbad/ tsit+ta stam b+ha ya nan// ngag ldib ldib ngag nan// nyer re nub kyi rigs la bzlas// de nas jag 'ching kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par spre'u'i so dang khrag/ mi khrag nyung dkar gu gul nag/ skyes pa grir shi'i khrag rnams las// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de dang// mi rgod jag 'ching sngags sbrel bzlas// dar du har du rbad/ g+hu pa ha du shig tsag tsag chings chings// khri phrag them nas mgul khug bcang// dgra byung tshe na thun gtor na// brgyal ba dang ni rengs par 'gyur// dam sri gnon pa'i kha sgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung// de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par dam sri mo yi gzugs// ling+ga mig rus ldan bris nas// rabs chad thod pa'i ag tser brub// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de dang// dam sri mnan pa'i sngags 'di sbrel// dgra bgegs dam sri nr-i tri rbad thum/ d+ha ra ya d+ha ra ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya nan/ mchod rten rnying pa'i 'og tu mnan// dam sri'i bar chod rgyun chod 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ srog ser kha sgyur yongs rdzogs su bstan pa'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ bsgrub rten 'byung 'dus sgyu lus 'di// 'chi ba brtag bslu 'pho 'jug gang// de skad ces gsol bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor 'chi ba'i ltas brtag pa// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid de// zla ba gang rung nya yi nub// sprin med dang dus snga dgongs dus// gcer bur nub tu kha bltas te// grib ma'i snying gar mig yid gzung// mig sbrid dus na mkha' la blta// rang gi grib 'dra mi yi gzugs// sngo skya rkang lag ma

nyams 'char// de ni gnas lugs 'chi brtags med// de yi 'char 'gyur rtags mang yang// gzugs de ro thum 'dra ba'am// mgo bo chad dam mgo gzhug log/ lo gcig zla drug nang du 'chi// 'phred la bstan na chag sgo yod// rmi lam brtag pa thur 'gro zhing// bag ma blangs sam bag mar 'gro// yul mkhar 'gyel lam gshin dang 'grogs// skyas nag sgo gnon sme can 'bebs// mdor na ngan sems kun rmis na// sad rjes snying mi dga' na 'chi// spre'u 'am ni bong bu zhon// mi dkar khrid de shar lho ru// phyin nas ma log rmis na 'chi// ngan pa rmis 'phro bzang rmis thub// gzugs dang dbang po skad kha dog/ rkyen med sngar bas nyams 'gyur dang// dri log dri mi tshor yang rung// me mar shi dri mi tshor 'chi// mig btsir bad med rna 'brug med// spyi bo'i tsha 'grib zhag bdun yol// srin lag sa nas thegs na 'chi// rkyen med glo bur dug lnga rags// chos brgyad lhag par sred pa dang// gar bsdad su dang 'grogs skyo zhing// sngar dang spyod lam go log ngan// dge sbyor gang la blo mi 'jug/ gnyid che gnyid chung go log dang// bsod nams lhag par skye 'bri rung// bla ma mched la snang log 'chi// mdor na sngar gyi gnas lugs la// sems nyid las su mi rung 'chi// dus min 'chi ba'i slu thabs bshad// maN+Dal steng du rus sbal dgod// 'bru sna'i phye la rang mnyam glud// don snying dbang po glud rdzas brgyan// pho shing mo shing rang dang sbyar// lo grangs khram btab sgyur dmod bri// mda' dkar bcas te g.yas g.yon gzug/ lo grangs glud dang sha mar zan// 'dod yon zas rnams yongs bskor te// 'dab brgyad rus sbal dal dbus gzhag/ gzhan yang mthun pa'i gto yas bsag/ rang nyid gshin rjer rab gsal bas// sngags dang phyag rgyas spel sbyangs bsgyur// 'byung ba'i nad gdon kun 'dul ba'i// zhi byed 'chi slu'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM ma hA ka li mo ha ye swA hA/ oM ma ma raM raM ye swA hA/ oM ma ma khaM khaM yaM sal yer pa swA hA/ oM su su ma ma tang tang ye swA hA/ oM ma ma kar kar ye swA hA// oM ma ma sngo ta sngo ta ye swA hA/ kha zhu kha zhu swA hA/ shi ma ga la swA hA/ oM a raM a traM swA hA/ a te na ma ma hA gra ha ha na ma b+h+yo// na ti phu na swA hA/ oM traM hUM hUM phaT/ oM byi sha ma ye swA hA/ oM dru mu dru mu swA hA/ oM 'dzi mi 'dzi mi mu si pag sham saM rbad to ma hA ma hA yag sha/ b+ho d+he par shang/ yaM ki ro ki ro hUM phaT/ oM sa ma ya ye me ya yi du be/ du pe mi sti sta ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ a na ru sham pa 'dus sarba a ya sha/ g+ha tsha g+ha tsha phaT/ a ka ni ni ka ni/ a byi la ma d+ha li ma d+ha li ye swA hA/ brgya'am stong du bzlas nas kyang// lha srin kun la ming gis mchod// rang

gi lo spar dus keg la// 'dre lnga sdod pa'i phyogs su bskyal// de ltar byas na tshe zad kyang// lo gsum shol gyis thebs pa yin// dus yin 'chi bslu smos ci dgos// lus stag go log thams cad bzlog/ des kyang dka' na slu thabs ni// bla ma khyad par bshes gnyen la// lo grangs tsam gyi yon dbul zhing// lo grangs bka' la 'don klog bya// lo grangs gtsug lag khang yang mchod// gsang sgrub chen po'i dbang rdzogs zhu// tshogs 'khor mang la grangs med gtang// tshe sgrub bcud len skabs bzhin bya// de rnams kun gyis bzlog dka' na// 'khor gsum yongs dag spong thag bya// dben par mtshams bsdam bag klod la// blta bsgom 'chi med snying po bskyang// 'chi bslu'i rgyal por de 'gyur nges// gal te slu thabs kun rdugs nas// dus la bab na 'pho 'jug ni// mtshan med mtshan bcas gnyis yin te// mtshan med rnal 'byor blo rab kyis// 'chi 'pho kun brtags 'jig rten chos// rang byung ye shes 'chi med la// 'chi 'pho'i rnam rtog rang sar grol// de nyid rtogs tshe 'phos pa yin// de las mi 'da' grong 'jug yin// mtshan
