bcas rnal 'byor blo 'bring mthas// dben par maN+Dal gtsang ma'i dbus// yi dam sku+u gsar bris la bzhag/ rang nyid lhar gsal rlung bsgoms pas// hUM mthing sna rlung g.yas nas drang// bris sku'i thugs ka'i hUM la thim// yang yang sbyangs rjes gsal dus na// de nyid la 'phos sa bcu yi// byang sems su 'gyur rang byung don// ye shes ngo shes sa non 'gyur// de yang dka' na maN+Dal dbul// mtshan ldan dum gcig thod pa'i nang// baiDUr hUM mthing bris nas kyang// sngar bzhin rlung 'byin rig hUM bstim// de 'grub brtan na grong 'jug ste// rigs bzang rig gsal na gzhon la// nad ngan gri lngar ma shi ba'i// zhag gsum tshun chad shi ro blang// dri bzangs kyis bkrus brgyan rnams gdags// dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag tshogs gtor bya// bgegs bskrad gsol gdab 'dun pa gzhug/ nyams can mched kyis ro de gzung// sna rtse mdzod spur hUM re bris// rang rig hUM zhes hUM de nyid// mdzod spu'i hUM la yang yang bstim// de brtan sna rtse'i hUM la bstim// ro la drod dang mdangs kyang 'byung// de nas ro dang kha sbyar te// rang rig hUM dang rlung du bcas// sna bug g.yas nas rtsal bskyed de// ro yi sna bug g.yon nang brgyud// ro yi snying gar hUM du gnas// yang yang bstim zhing brtan par bya// de nas ro 'gul ldang zhing smra// grogs des bur chu mngar gyis gso// zhag grangs nyer gcig brtas su gzhug/ de nas bag chags mkhyen pa dran// sngar dang 'dra bar gyur pa'i tshe// snga ma'i phung po bsreg sbyangs te// tsha tsha mchod rten

bzheng par bya// khyad par bar do grong 'jug lnga// rang bzhin ngo ltos ting nge gnas// rmi lam mtshams sbyar skye 'chir bzla// srid pa bar dor las 'phro 'thud// ces bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las// 'chi brtag 'chi bslu 'pho ba grong 'jug yongs rdzogs su+u bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang// thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ rgyud chen dgongs 'brel bstan 'tshal na// bcom ldan 'das dang bde gshegs gsang// thams cad kyis ni sku gsung thugs// gsang ba ye shes snying po dang/ thams cad yongs rdzogs bsdus don gang// zhes gsol ston pas bka' stsal pa// bdud rnams kun 'joms yon tan ldan// bde bar gshegs pa'i tshul brjod na// gzung 'dzin nyon mongs mi gnas bde// 'bras bu sar gshegs bde bar gshegs// thams cad kun khyab skye 'gag med// gnyis med sku gsung thugs yin te// gab sbas nges gsang des shes shing// mu bzhi mnyam grol snying po'i don// spros dang spros med don thams cad// rgyud 'dir yongs rdzogs 'dus pa'i don// ji snyed pa yi bde bar gshegs// rang rig sems kyi rgyud la rdzogs// de phyir yongs su rdzogs zhes bya// zhes gsungs 'khor gyis yang gsol pa// dpal dang gsang ba 'dus pa gang// rgyud dang chen po ji lta bu// zhes gsol ston pas bka' stsal pa// mthar thug gnas skabs thams cad du// bde 'bras rang shar don byed dpal// thugs kyi dgongs pa gab pas gsang// don gyi snying po 'dus pas 'dus// phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir na rgyud// de las 'phags pa gzhan med che// zhes gsungs 'khor gyis yang gsol pa// ngo mtshar phun tshogs rgyud mchog gi/ ngo bo gang yin nges tshig ci// dbye ba mthun dpe ldang tshad dang// dgos ched dang sbyar mtshan 'dogs gang// zhes gsol ston pas bka' stsal pa// ngo bo rang rig ye shes te// ma bcos ma bsgyur bslad pa med// skye 'gag rtag chad 'gro dang 'ong// yod med mtha' bral dbyer med pa'o// nges tshig 'bral cing ma tshang med// dkrugs dang yongs rdzogs phun sum tshogs// dbye ba tshig rgyud don rgyud do// mdun dper rin chen dra ba 'dra// ldang tshad gleng stsogs dngos po bcu// bstan rim lta sgom spyod 'bras dang// bsnyen dang bsgrub chen dbang dam tshig/ mtha' rgyas man ngag la sogs pa// gleng gzhi nas bzung rgyud gtad par// dbu zhabs yongs su rdzogs par bstan// dgos ched dang sbyar mtshan don

ni// bdud bcom dpal ldan skyon grol bas// bcom ldan grol rgyud ces kyang bya// lam bde 'bras bu'i sar gshegs pas// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud du gsungs// snang stong gnyis med gnyis snang ston// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud ces bya// gab sbas spros bral don gsal bas// spros bral don gsal rgyud ces bya// rgyal ba zhi khro yongs rdzogs pas// yongs rdzogs chen po'i rgyud du gsungs// dpal chen kun gyi gsang 'dus pas// dpal chen gsang 'dus rgyud ces bya// ma rig mun pa'i tshogs 'joms pas// nyi zla kha sbyor rgyud du gsungs// rigs drug 'khor ba dong sprugs pas// 'khor ba dong sprugs rgyud ces bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs 'dus pas// dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud du gsungs// bsnyen bsgrub phrin las yongs rdzogs pas// phrin las yongs rdzogs rgyud ces bya// gzhi lam 'bras bu'i gsang rdzogs pas// gsang ba yongs rdzogs rgyud du zung// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rgyud kyi dgos 'brel mtshan yongs rdzogs su bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams mgrin gcig tu/ rab tu spro ba'i sems kyis ston pa kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka la rdo rje glu yis bstod pa ni// hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha/ ho ho ho/ kye kye kye/ e ma ho hUM/ bcom ldan dpal chen che mchog mi bzad he ru ka/ chos sku skye med dbyings nas bzhengs nas kyang// gzugs sku rab 'jigs cha lugs gtum rngam khro bor ston// sangs rgyas kun 'dus yon tan dbang phyug bdud 'dul rgyal// gsang ba'i yum mchog khro mo gnam zhal bde chen sbyor ba'i yum// dus gsum bder gshegs rgyal ba ma lus kun 'dus bskyed mdzad ma// gnyis med mnyam sbyor yon tan sna tshogs 'gro ba 'dul// che mchog yab yum rol pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM che mchog sku ni gshin rje gshed// che mchog gsung ni rta mgrin dbang// che mchog thugs ni dpal rdo rje// che mchog yon tan yongs rdzogs nyid// che mchog phrin las ki la yA// che mchog rbod gtong ma mo'i gtso// che mchog rig 'dzin thod pa rtsal// che mchog pho nya dregs pa'i gtso// che mchog dmod pa sngags bdag gtso// che mchog sprul pa sras mchog tshogs/ che mchog bka' sdod dam can ma// yongs rdzos dpal chen 'khor bcas rnams// ye nas rang dang gnyis med phyir// gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshal bstod// ces mngon par bstod do// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las// ston pa kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka la yongs rdzogs su bstod pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o//// de

nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la/ ston pa kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka rab tu dgyes nas/ rdo rje zil gnon bde gshegs 'dus pa'i glu bro gsungs pa// hUM nga ni che mchog he ru ka/ zhi khro bde gshegs yongs rdzogs sku// rdo rje'i glu gcig gnam nas len// steng gi lha rnams zil gyis gnon// rdo rje'i glu gcig sa nas len// klu gnyan sa bdag gzil gyis gnon// rdo rje'i glu gcig phyogs bcur sgrogs// phyogs skyong dregs pa zhabs 'og gzir// rdo rje'i glu skad tser re re// hUM gi 'brug sgra ldi ri ri// phaT kyis gnam lcags tshal le tshal// drag po'i bshug glus khams gsum g.yo// shangs kyi hUM sgras srid gsum sgrol// snyan nas 'brug sgras stong gsum 'gengs// ljags las glog 'gyu bar snang khyab// spyan nas chu byung stong gsum 'khru// zhal nas mche gtsigs bdud bzhi sgrol// glu bro 'khor gsum chems se chem// glu bro 'khor gcig dang po yis// gzugs med mu bzhi zil gyis gnon// glu bro 'khor gnyis bar pa yis// gzugs khams bcu bdun zil gyis gnon// glu bro 'khor gsum tha ma yis// 'dod khams nyi shu zil gyis gnon// rdo rje zil gnon glu bro yis// lha srin sde brgyad dbang du sdud// dregs pa'i tshogs rnams 'bub cing rgyal// rdo rje'i 'gros stabs chems se chem// khro bo'i gar stabs log ge log/ bro ni dregs pa bdud 'dul bro// glu ni khams gsum dbang sdud glu// tshig ni don dam mtshon pa'i tshig/ zhabs g.yas thabs kyi bro brdungs pas// khro bo'i tshogs rnams dbang du sdud// zhabs g.yon shes rab bro brdungs las// khro mo'i tshogs rnams dbang du sdud// g.yas g.yon thabs shes bro brdungs pas// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// dgra ni dum bur gtub pa'i bro// dam sri thal bar rlog pa'i bro// hUM hUM hUM/ zhes log lta'i dregs pa zil gyis gnon cing// tshar bcad de gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ho 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// rdo rje 'dzin pa tshur nyon cig/ dgos 'dod re skong yid bzhin gyi// rin chen lta bu'i rgyud chen mchog/ dpal chen gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud// snying nor yin no mig 'bras yin// theg pa yongs rdzogs rtsa rgyud 'di// gtams so gtad do thub par chongs// dam nyams rnams la shor srid do// g.yo sgyu can la shor srid do// snod med rnams la shor srid do// bstan pa'i snying 'di thub par srungs// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rgyud don yongs rdzogs 'khor la gtad pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams

cad kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba ye shes kyi snying po thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing 'dus pa/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ u rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma saM b+ha was sgra rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba rdzogs so//// bar 'dir zla gsang nag po ngan thams cad rtsa ba'i rgyud 'dzud/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsan+d+ra gu h+ya kA la tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud/ 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed po lha mchog ya mAn+ta ka/ lho phyogs gshin rje'i gnas dur khrod chen po gtum drag tshal zhes bya ba na/ rgya khyon dpag tu med pa/ rmang gser du snang ba/ logs g.yu ru snang ba/ rtse mo gnam lcags ur mo ru snang ba// 'khor lo gtams pa'i bad btags pa/ 'khor lo dang gnam lcags kyi 'od phyogs bzhir 'phro ba// 'od dang 'od zer rab tu 'khrugs pa/ mchog chen dang rkang chen mchog phra mo'i bral gtang ba/ bam chen gyi ka ba la chu srin gyis ka zhu can// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i ka gdan can// gnam lcags thog gi tsha tsha 'phro ba/ thod pa brtsegs pa'i 'bur phyung ba// zhing chen po'i bla re dang/ chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang/ 'phan gdugs dang/ dpal dar phyogs bzhir bkram pa/ tsit+ta dmar po sprin du gtibs pa// rtse na me ri sna tshogs pas brgyan pa// keng rus kyi dur khrod dang/ gnam lcags kyi khang bzangs dang// 'khor lo'i gzhal yas dang// ro myags kyi dur khrod la sogs pa dur khrod kyi gnas stong yod pa/ nyi ma me shel dang/ zla ba chu shel dang/ skar ma phra men gyi mthongs yod pa/ gza' skar mang pos brgyan pa/ mtsho chen po'i rlabs dang// rlung nag gi grib so dang/ keng rus kyi ri rab dang/ me ri'i rlabs yod pa/ mtha' lcags ri nag pos bskor ba de lta bu'i gnas de na/ dur khrod kyi ro bam pa mang po brtsegs pa/ mi gtsang bas yongs su gang ba rnam par ro rul ba dang/ phyed rul dang/ bam pa dang/ rnam par rul pa dmar ba/ rnam par bam pa dang/ ro rengs pa dang/ rnam par rengs pa dang/ keng rus phyed pa dang/ rus pa brul ba dang/ 'khums pa dang/ rnam par 'khums pa dang/ langs pa dang/ gan pa dang/ bub pa dang/ 'gyel ba dang/ dur khrod kyi ro la 'dral ba dang/ gshog pa dang/ gtub cing 'tshed pa dang/ ro la longs spyod cher spyod pa dang/ dur khrod kyi btsas pa mnam pa dang/ khrag dang/ rnag dang/ chu ser 'dzag pa dang/ mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa dang/ de lta bu'i gnas de na stag dang/ gzig dang/ dom dang/ dred dang/ bya rog dang/ kang ka mchu ring dang/ byan lag gshog rdebs dang/ spyang ki rdzi rnon dang/ ce spyang ro rngam

khra dang 'ug pa dang// ling du khra dang srin bu ka ka ri// de la sogs pa sha za khrag 'thung dang// rus pa 'cha' dang ldag myong byed pa dang// blta dang dgod dang ngu dang cho nges 'debs// ku co 'don zhing mchong rgal byed pa dang// drag po'i rkan rdebs ltas ngan skad sgrogs dang// gzugs mi sdug dang 'dzum pa'i mdangs ston dang// 'khor lo'i bro brdung lcags kyi mda' 'phen dang// bshugs pa'i glu len mi mgo'i dung 'bud dang// dar nag g.yab 'dor rang la rang khro dang// sha za khrag 'thung drag po'i rkan rdebs dang// brda dang gar bsgyur rdo rje'i thog 'phen dang// gti mug sha yi dur khrod ri ltar spungs pa dang// 'dod chags rak+ta'i dur khrod rba klong 'khyil pa dang// rab tu 'jigs shing skyi g.ya'i gnas de na// 'jam dpal lha tshogs ya mAn+ta ka ni// phyogs bcu dus gsum bde gshegs 'khor rnams dang// phyogs skyong gshin rje yab yum 'khor rnams dang// 'jig rten rlag byed gshin rje gshed bzhi dang// stong gsum mun par gtong par pho bdud mo bdud dang// 'jig rten mes bsreg btsan po btsan mo dang// smyo 'bog gtong bar byed pa'i ging gi 'khor tshogs dang// drag po gnam lcags 'bebs pa lhag dang sman gyi 'khor// chu 'khyags khrag tu 'bebs pa khyab 'jug gza' yi 'khor dang// mdze nad dz+wa la gdug pa klu yi 'khor dang// srog gcod spu gri thogs pa gnod sbyin 'khor tshogs dang// yams dang nad gtong ma mo'i 'khor tshogs dang/ gzhan yang dri za'i rgyal po kha thun rak+sha la sogs dri za'i 'khor sde dang// shan pa nag po la sogs gshin rje'i 'khor sre dang// nA ga dza la la sogs klu yi 'khor sde dang// yak+sha mgo dgu la sogs gnod sbyin 'khor sde dang// stong gsum kun nyul srid pa khram 'debs la sogs ma mo'i 'khor sde dang// ha nu bag sha la sogs bdud kyi 'khor sde dang// shu bo srog len la sogs btsan gyi 'khor sde dang// dkar po snying 'byin la sogs srog bdag 'khor sde dang// gzhan yang lha srin sde brgyad rang rang 'khor na yang// nad gtod khram 'debs bsam gyis mi khyab dang// gzhan yang 'dod pa'i bu mo'i tshogs rnams la// rgyal mo dang ni rgyal mo'i yang rgyal mo// blon mo dang ni yang blon mo// bran mo dang ni g.yog mo'i tshogs// de dag la sogs 'khor na yang// 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad bdag mo// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad gtong tshogs// bsam gyis mi khyab thabs cig bzhugs// be tA lI dang ral gcig gnyis// g.yas nas 'khril te gnyis med bzhugs// g.yon nas mdun gyis bltas te bzhugs// gzhan yang gshin rje'i 'khor tshogs 'di lta ste// ya ma rA dza 'chi bdag dmar po dang// kong tse

brag gyon a ba glang mgo dang// ya ba ti dang mig dmar dang// mig dmar tel ba lha mchog dang// chos kyi rgyal po ral pa tshar dgu dang// thod dbyug la sogs 'khor dang bcas// e ka dza ti be tA lI/ mi srin nag mo mgo 'phyangs dang// brag srin nag mo mgo 'phyangs dang// sa bdag nag mo mgo 'phyangs dang// mi bzang bdud mo mgo 'phyangs dang// mtshan mo nag mo mgo 'phyangs dang// byin ling nag mo mgo 'phyangs dang// bdud mo nag mo mgo 'phyangs dang// sa srin nag mo mgo 'phyangs dang// klu srin nag mo mgo 'phyangs dang// lha mo nag mo go 'phyangs dang// de ltar yum yang thabs cig go/ yab yum 'khor yang 'di lta ste// ya ma rA dza 'khor rnams dag/ bdud kyi rgyal po dregs can gsus po che dang// gshin rje dmar po'i 'khor dag na// srog bdud mched gnyis gnas pa ni// srog bdag gnod sbyin dmar po dang// bdud kyi rgyal po stag dgu spyan gcig dang// gzhan yang kong tse brag 'joms 'khor dag na// bdud kyi rgyal po stag thabs gnas// a ba glang mgo'i 'khor dag na// bdud kyi rgyal po u 'bi gnas// lcogs pa mgo dgu'i 'khor dag na// bdud kyi rgyal po gur bdud dang// bdud kyi rgyal po 'jug med gnas// ya ba ti yi 'khor dag na// bdud kyi rgyal po be'u log nag po dang// bdud kyi rgyal po nag po spyi ring gnas// tel pa'i 'khor dag na bdud kyi rgyal po gling bzhi phur byed gnas/ phya sangs kyi 'khor dag na bdud kyi rgyal po phya bdud dkar po dang/ bdud kyi rgyal po phya bdud dmar po dang/ bdud kyi rgyal po phya bdud ljang nag dang/ bdud kyi rgyal po phya bdud nag po dang/ bdud kyi rgyal po phya bdud sngon po dang/ bdud kyi rgyal po phya bdud phung byed 'ug pa'i mgo can dang/ bdud kha tong me 'bar dang/ bdud mi lag spre 'u'i mgo can dang/ bdud rngam chen mi lag dung gi rna cha gnas/ ral pa tshar dgu'i 'khor na bse'i skyes bu gdug pa can gnas/ stag mgo can gyi 'khor na klu bdud nag po sbrul gyi rgyu ma can dang/ gri thogs ging gi pho nya bcu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje yang mdun gyis bltas te bka' nod pa'i tshud du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos khams gsum dbang du bsdus srid gsum zil gyis mnan/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig ten gyi khams thams cad mun nag tu gtibs te/ thugs ye shes kyi rtse las 'khor lo'i tshogs dang gnam lcags kyi gzer dang// lcags kyu dang zhags pa'i tshogs dang/ lcags sgrog gi tshogs dang/ dril bu'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phros te/ hUM hUM dang phaT phaT (8)

dang ha la ha la dang/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ e A ra li hriM hriM dzaHzhes 'brug stong gi sgra dus gcig tu ldir ba tsam gyi sgra bsgrags nas dbang du bsdus pas rang gi 'khor rnams kyang bred/ rab tu bred/ kun tu rab tu bred/ 'dar rab tu 'dar/ kun tu rab tu 'dar/ sngangs rab tu sngangs/ kun tu rab tu sngangs nas thams cad bde ba la bkod do// 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste skabs dang po'o//// de'i tshe dus na bcom ldan 'das la mthu stobs kyi bdag po la sogs te/ gdug pa can gyi 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho 'jigs byed chen po lags// bdag cag gdug byed 'khor rnams kun// snang srid 'jig rten khams 'di ru// stong gsum mun par gtong ba dang// 'jig rten khams kun bsreg pa dang// log rtog 'joms dang gnam lcags lce// smyo 'bog yams nad srog gcod dang// mdze rigs gtong ba'i las 'di dag/ bdag cag rnams kyi rang las lags// dpa' bo chen pos ci la bkyon// thugs rjes bred yang mi mnga' 'am// dpa' bo chen po khyod nyid ni// thugs rje byams pa'i mnga' bdag na// 'di lta'i cho 'phrul ci la ston// gdug pa'i gsung sgra ci la sgrog/ thugs rje'i sprul pa ci la 'gyed// 'jigs byed chen pos bdag cag la// bka' 'bab mi 'tshal 'bangs su mchi// 'bangs la nan tan ma chung zhig/ ces brjod de// so sor rang rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM sngags sor bzhag A kro d+hi ka ya mAn+ta ka ya ma rA dza dz+wa la raM pa ya hUM/ ni kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la raM hUM/ ya tra trag sha dz+wa la raM pa ya hUM/ ra rag mo kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM/ oM a rak+sha dz+wa la raM pa ya hUM/ rag mo kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la raM ni hUM/ oM tra trag po dz+wa la raM pa ya hUM phaT/ tsit+ta kro to la kod+hI shwa rI dzra la raM pa ya hUM/ oM raka sha ga ma ya snying rtsa ra ya dz+wa la raM hUM/ oM ni ra tsa ru tsa kro d+hI shwa rI ti ni dz+wa la raM/ oM tra trag sha rag po dz+wa la raM pa ya hUM/ oM shrI dz+wa la raM pa kro d+hI shwa rI dza hUM/ oM tra trag sha ni dz+wa la raM pa ya hUM// oM tra trag mo rak+sha kro d+hI shwa rI hUM/ oM many+dzu shrI nag po trag tra sha ni ya hUM/ oM nag mo rak+sha kro d+hI shwa rI ni hUM/ oM many+dzu shrI badzra ma ro trag sha dz+wa la raM pa ya hUM/ oM nA ga kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la raM pa ya hUM/ zhes phyogs skyong gi gshin rje rnams kyis phul lo// ru tra pa tra mu khrag dza ra khrag tsa pa ti yar pa dun hab swA hA/ sa ma ya A be sha/ ru tsa rak+sha chal pa a nr-i tri mA ra aM ku sha dza dza/ oM bi sha wa du ru du ma shi kha dza la a ta swA hA/ hri shag ru rag raM nA ge tsit+ta traM ma ma yong za 'graM ha ha ga shal dzaHdzaH/ ma snying kha rag snying kha rag ma ma rag sha ma ma rag mo thun thun/ snying la thun dza dza/ snying la dza/ ru lu ru lu dza

dza/ rA dzA sa ma ya dza hUM hUM dza/ ra li pra ma ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ tri tri rA dza tsa pa la a shug me dza dza/ b+hA hu yag sha pu ro tso to ra hU ra ma trig be tshil ma khug yag sha thang ma thang me ya dza dza/ oM nA ga ra dzA ma hA kA lA ti pa tsa sa kha sa kha shra ru hUM dza dza/ nA ga rA dza dzaHdzaH/ de dag la sogs 'jig rten khams dag na// gnas pa'i lha dang lha ma yin// nam mkha' lding dang dri za dang// mi'am ci dang lto 'phye'i rigs// gnod sbyin srin po yi dwags dang// sha za 'byung po grul bum dang// srul po dang ni lus srul po// skem byed dang ni 'jigs byed dang// smyo byed dang ni grib gnon dang// gnon po dag ni nam gru dang// de dag la sogs 'khor na yang// sha za khrag 'thung bsam mi khyab// bka' nyan zer zhing srog snying phul// gnas pa'i 'khor rnams mgrin gcig tu// thal mo sbyar nas gus phul ba// dur khrod me tog sna tshogs ni// srin po ro dang ro chung dang// mi ro dang ni rta ro dang// ro phyed gzhogs ni phyed pa dang// ro yi phreng ba ro brtsegs dang// bam dang rul dang rul pa brul// b+han+da de bzhin sgal tshigs dang// dbang po rkang dang rgyu ma dang// sha khrag la sogs tshil bu dang// go ro tsa na la sogs te// gzhan yang ro yi rnam pa ni// phye bye ba yang ma la sogs char du phab/ lhan cig 'dug nas 'di skad brjod// he he dpa' bo 'jigs byed gdong// bdag cag rnams kyi srog tig ste// dpa' bo lha rjes bzhes su gsol// bdag cag rnams kyi rang las dang// 'tshal skal 'dul skal gang lags pa// dpa' bo lha rjes bzhes su gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// hUM hUM/ nga ni dus gsum rnam pa ru// thams cad ma lus 'dul ba'i bdag/ nga yis bka' rnams khyod kyis nyon// sems can yongs la 'tshe ma byed// khyed cag rnams kyi rang las ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang// chos 'khor 'joms pa'i rU'u tra rnams// khyed kyi 'dul skal zas skal gyis// zhes bka' stsal to// bka' bzhin nyan par zhal gyis bzhes te/ rang dmar rang gis bcas so// de'i tshe de'i dus nam thu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje gdan las bzhengs te/ dam tshig rdo rje rtse dgu thugs kar bzung ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// legs so legs so ston pa'i 'khor// de ltar dus gsum thams cad du// sems can rnams la gnod pa dang// 'jig rten khams su sbyor ngan ma btang bar/ ston pa'i 'khor du 'dus nas kyang// rang rang tshul bzhin bsgrub pa dang// las thabs bya ba gang yin pa// da lta nyid du dbul bar gyis// zhes gsol

te rang gi gnas su 'khod par gyur to// de nas dregs pa can gyi 'khor rnams kyis// e ma 'jigs byed chen po lags// bdag cag rang rang bsgrub pa dang// las dang bya thabs thams cad byang// byams mgon chen po nyid la 'bul// dpal chen po yis bzhes su gsol// zhes gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po dgyes pa chen por gyur te/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bka' yi phyogs skyong gshin rje dang// gdug byed lha srin pho mo rnams// nyon cig khyod rnams gus par nyon// ngas gsungs pa la sems thud cig/ da lta dus gsum thams cad du// sems can rnams la gnod pa dang// 'jig rten khams su sbyor ngan ma btang bar// nga yi dam las ma 'da' zhig/ 'on tang sems can thams cad kyang// bde la khyed kyang bde bar 'gyur// khyed kyi zas skal las thabs kyang// lnga brgya'i tha ma byung ba dang// sangs rgyas bstan pa mi gnas shing// chos nyid bden pas mi 'dul te// bstan pa thams cad nub pa dang/ las ngan mtshams med byed pa dang// zas ngan lci ba za ba dang// gos ngan dug hrul gyon pa dang// ma gshin bstan pa byung ba dang// mu stegs bstan pa dar ba'i tshe// khyed kyi zas skal thams cad kyang// dus der 'byung bar ngas bshad gyi// nga yi dam las ma mda' zhig/ ces bka' stsal to// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ gleng bslang ba'i skabs te gnyis pa'o//// de nas phyogs skyong gi gshin rje rnams kyis thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ched du// bcom ldan 'das la phrin las zhi ba'i sgrub thabs 'di phul lo// rab tu dkar ba'i yul dag la// mgu ba'i sems dang ldan byas te// dad pas mgu pa'i las bya zhes// gshin rje gshed po nyid la phul// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad zhi bar bya phyir du// sa gzhi gnas dang ri brag dkar// zlum po nyams dga' bkra shis gnas// zhi ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// zlum po dkar ba'i dkyil 'khor bris// lte bar bcas pa'i rtsibs brgyad la// mkhas pas bsgrim ste bri bar bya// dkar dang ldan pa'i zla gam la/ gcig dang gsum nas mgo btsugs nas// khams gsum rab tu mgu ba'i phyir// nyams su len par byas la bsgrub// dbus su ye shes bdag po la// shar du nag 'joms chen po ste// lho ru+u ya ba ti zhes bya// nub tu khro bo rmig pa la// byang du bdud 'joms dgod par bya// shar lho lho nub nub byang dang// byang shar mtshams su dgod pa ni// glang mgo kong tse gcod sbyong rje// las grub brgyad de go rim bzhin// steng 'og dmar po nag 'joms

gnyis// yab yum gnyis med bris te dgod// zla gam gsum la ma mo gsum// sgo bzhir sgo srung ma rnams bri// de ni yum dang bcas pa rnams// khro bo yab dang sku mthun pa'o// sems dpa'i 'dug stangs gnas byas la// sgeg mo g.yon du brten byas la// sngags g.yog mdzes pa tshogs par byas// mgu ba'i phrin las brtsam par byas// skye tshe thal ba rus pa la// dzam b+ha la yi gzugs lta bur// byas pa'i snying gar bri ba ni// a ma sa la sid+d+hi'am// gang 'dod pa yi yi ge de// phaT dang swA hA mda' ltar bya// ming byang gang ltar bris byas la// gang ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du gzhag/ de la 'di yang rab tu brjod// oM a kro badzra shAn ti nA ga badzra swA hA/ oM a kro te ka shAn ting ba la tsuM zhes brjod nas/ snying gar brgyab na thams cad mgu nas dad pa'i sems kyis zhi bar gyur to// des ni zhi ba'i las byas zin nas phyogs bcu'i gdug pa zhi bar byas te/ bdag la mi dga' ba med na las 'grub pa yin no// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ thams cad zhi bar bsgrub pa'i skabs te gsum pa'o//// de nas phyogs skyong gi gshin rje rnams kyi phrin las rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs 'di/ thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i ched du/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed chen po la phrin las rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs phul// rab tu ser zhing gser las grub// btso ma 'dra ba'i dbyibs can la// dpal rgyas sems dang ldan byas la// rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su// rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs bshad par mdzod// ces pa gshin rje gshed la phul// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad rgyas par bya phyir du// sa gzhi gnas dang ri rab ser// gru bzhi khod snyoms btso ma 'dra// rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa yi tshul// ldong ros chag chag btab byas te// rnal 'byor dam pa blo ldan pas// thig ni gdab par rab tu brtsam// gser las grub pa'i thig skud la// dpal dang gzi mdangs bsod nams tshogs// 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i sems dang chas// slob ma dam pa las grub par// bsams la thig ni gdab par bya// pho brang gser la rtse mo g.yu// rdo rje'i brtsig pa gser las grub// gru chad sgo snams lcags las grub// rnal 'byor sngags pa blo ldan pas// thig bzhi re cha brgyad du 'gyur// mtha' nas thig gdab man ngag can// de la sogs pa bsam par bya// rin chen skyil krung 'dug byas la// rin chen rigs kyi ngos su blta// dbus su gsang sngags bdag po ste// phyogs phyogs sgo ba dam pa rnams// snga ma bzhin du bsgoms nas kyang// rang sngags skyes bus de bskyed

do// oM a kro te ka puSh+tiM pha ya ni hUM/ oM a kro te ka puSh+tiM ti ba ta na s+t+waM/ zhes pas bdag po yab yum la/ 'khor bcas 'bru re ba las bsam// rang rang bskyed pa dam pa ste// sngags dang ldan par ting 'dzin bsam// gzhug dang brtan dang mchod pa dang// phyag byed pa la sogs pa yi// las kyi bya ba ma lus pa/ thams cad ma lus tshang bar bya// bskyed dang grub pa'i 'bras bu ni// rgyas par bsnyen te thag mi ring// rang grub 'bras bu de lags so// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yis// dngos grub dam pa rab ster zhes// 'dren pa dpa' bos yang dag bshad// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas la// sa zhag gser las grub pa las// gzugs ni dam pa rab tu bya// phyir rgan gan rkyal mnan byas nas// hUM puSh+tiM A yu She swA hA/ snying gar bris nas brjod bya ba// snying po sngags kyi dam pa ste// bla med dam pas rab tu bshad// oM badzra puSh+tiM A yuHpha la ba shaM shrI puSh+tiM swA hA/ brjod na thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ro// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i skabs te bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang phyogs skyong gi gshin rje rnams kyis/ phrin las dbang gi sgrub thabs 'di// 'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed po la phul lo// rab tu dmar zhing zangs las grub// zangs las 'brel ba'i yul dag la// rang dbang med par dbang bsdus nas// 'du ba'i sems dang ldan byas te// dbang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod// ces pa gshin rje gshed la phul// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad dbang du bsdu phyir du// zangs sam dmar po'i sa dag la// dkyil 'khor snga ma gong dang 'dra// legs par khod snyoms zin pa dang// thig ni rab tu gdab par bya/ lte ba tsan la rtsibs brgyad la// kun tu zla gam dbang gis mdzes/ lte dbus gzhu bdungs bris byas nas// de steng bdag po dam pa gzhag/ thams cad ma lus mchog tu dgug/ ci la bya yang thogs chags med// ces ni yang dag bla med des// bshad par byas te rab tu bstan// gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya ba// sems kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// bla med yang dag nges pa'i lam// sangs rgyas byang chub la sogs rnams// gzhung las 'byung ba'i tshig don rnams// ma nor gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du// bsgrub na 'grub par bshad pa'o// de dag dgug par 'gyur bas na// phal pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sdud dang 'dren pa byang chub lam// 'di dag go 'phang thob bya'i phyir// nyung dkar rkang rjes sa'am gzhan// khrag gsum thal chen bsres byas la// ga bu'i nang du blugs byas la// ga bu gnyis ni kha

sbyar la// skud pa dmar po zangs la sogs// bcings nas bsdams te dam dkris nas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni thog tu gzhag/ nyung dkar zangs ni bsres byas te// dud pas ga bu de la bdug/ de la bdug par gyur pa dang// bzlas pa'i snying po brjod bya zhing// lan grangs khri tshar du ma ru// brjod na sangs rgyas la sogs rnams// 'gugs par gyur na phal pa gzhan// smos ci dgos te nges par 'gugs// oM badzra a kro many+dzu shrI ba shaM ma ho sarba ti la b+h+rUM/ lan grangs mang du brjod byas na// ji ltar bsam pa thams cad 'gugs// rgya shug bkrus pa'i khu ba dang// mi yi lag pa'i khu ba gnyis// snga ma bzhin du dgug byas na// 'gugs par gyur zhes dpa' bos bshad// yang na rang gi lag kyang rung// zhes gsungs pas thams cad ma lus par dbang du 'dus pas dper na phyogs phyogs thams cad nas// mtsho la sbrang ma 'du ba ltar 'dus te bdag gi dbang du gang la bya ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// zhes pa gshin rje gshed pos gsungs so// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ thams cad dbang du bya ba'i skabs te lnga pa'o//// de nas yang phyogs skyong gi gshin rje gshed rnams kyis phrin las drag po'i bsgrub pa 'di bzhin gshin rje gshed la phul lo/ rab tu gnag cing gnam lcags 'dra// mon nag sog po khros pa'am// srin mo'i mdung rtse gshibs pa 'dra// khro bo chen po'i tshul chen gyis// gdug pa'i sems dang ldan byas te// drag po'i dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod// ces pa gshin rje gshed la phul// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// phyogs skyong gshin rje ma lus kun// khro bo'i tshogs su 'dul mdzad de// rang bzhin mthu chen 'di brjod do// 'byung med ye shes dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas te// bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste// yum yang de bzhin de yi 'od// yab yum gnyis med byin rlabs las// thams cad shes rab 'phro 'du las// thig skud rgyus pa dag las byas// de ni las kyi thig ces bgyi// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// kun tu gru bzhi gru chad can// gru chad rgyan ldan dur khrod rgyan// mdzes par bris te gzhan du min// bsten pa'i lha ste snga ma bzhin// bskyed pa'i sngags 'di brjod byas pas// bdag dang 'dra bar bskyed par bya// oM a kro te ka hUM a badzra be tA lI rag sha man// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yoH/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yoH/ zhes brjod pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag g.yos so// rab tu kun tu g.yos so// rab tu kun tu ldeg go/ rab tu

kun tu 'ur chem mo// dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag nyid des 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rab tu gsung gi gsang sngags gsungs pas bdag cag spro lags so// 'jig rten du mthu chen 'di lta bu la bdag zhu ba lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin khro bar mdzad pa de la/ bdag mngon du sems can thams cad kyi don rab tu yang zhu bar 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen pos 'dul bar mdzad pa des 'di skad ces gsungs so// oM shrI pa ra yak+Sha g+hu h+ya sarba ta ki badzra kA la rU pa mA ra ya phaT ces gsungs pas 'jig rten na dbang che ba dang/ mthu che ba la sogs pa btul nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang// gsung du med pa'i chos nyid la// rang sems 'phro 'dur gyur pa las// phyogs bcur gsungs pa de dag yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po'i sgrub thabs te thams cad btul nas cho 'phrul bstan pa'i skabs te drug pa'o//// de nas nan tan bskyed byas te/ 'jig rten gshed pos drag po'i tsham rngams bshad par bya// 'jig rten bcud kyi gdug pa kun// tsham rngams glog ltar 'gyu ba las// ngo mtshar ya mtshan bsgrag par bya// e ma'o yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dkyil nas// phyogs bcur 'phro ba byang chub sems// rigs kyi yab dang de bzhin btsun mo ni// rtag par bsgom ste de bzhin shes par bya// rdzas dang phyag rgya sngags dang bcud rnams ni// gzugs dang 'dod pa'i 'bras bu gang 'dod 'grub par rol// mi dge bcu dang ldan pa yis// rnam par 'dren pa des byas te// sngags dang phyag rgya rdzas rnams dang// ga bu pad+ma dam pa dang// kham sa pa yi 'jim pa ni// khrag sna gsum dang gi wang ngo// de dag phrin las mchog yin te// 'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// bla med dpa' bos yang dag gsungs// phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus kun// 'dul bar 'gyur te the tshom med// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po'i skabs te bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'gal ba cham la 'bebs 'dod na// dur khrod lung dang mthun pa'i gnas// dgon pa lta bur song nas ni// thog mar bsod nams tshogs kyang bsag/ phyir bshags 'bul la sogs pa gdon// tsha tsha nye 'don la sogs bya// ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya// bA gI shwa ri 'bru drug 'don// 'jam dpal mtshan ni yang dag

pa// rtag tu gdon par dam yang bca'// grub pa'i nyi ma gang yin la// bsod nams tshogs ni ci nus bsag/ de nas drag po byed 'dod na// tha chung bzhi yi mar ngo la// maN+Dal gtsang ma dris byugs la// dka' thub drag pa'i sdom pa byas// ku sha'i stan la 'dug nas ni// mgo bo rma bya bzhin du dgug/ ru rak+sha yi phreng ba bgrang// mgon po nyid la gus byas te// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa ni// yi ge bcu bdun nus thang gis// drug 'bum dag tu bzlas pa bya// de ni bsnyen pa dang po yin// phyis ni ri rab rtse mo la// gsum 'bum dag tu bzlas pa bya// de ni bsnyen pa gnyis pa yin// de nas dkyil 'khor gtsang ma'i steng// khri'u 'am dkyil 'khor gtsang ma'i steng// 'jam dpal sku gzugs ri mo'am// gzhug pa'i spyan sngar nyis 'thum bzlas// de ni bsnyen pa gsum pa ste// bye ba gcig 'bum thon pa dang// me tog la sogs mchod pa bya// phyi dang nang gi mchod pas mchod// bstod pa la sogs ci rigs bya// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas rtags rnams 'byung// 'jam dpal sku yi zhal 'dzum mam// rtags ni bzang po 'byung ba ni// dngos grub la sogs blang bar bya// de nas drag po'i sbyor la 'jug/ dur khrod ma la yar song la// mi skra re tshil rab blangs te// khrag chen dag tu spang bar bya// khrag sna tshogs kyi khu+u bas bkru// btsir la thal chen sa dkar gyis// mdog bsgyur phur bzhis brgyang la bskam// zla ba nag po'i tshes drug nas// brtsams te phyi gtor la sogs gtong// mtho gzug dpang gzug gser skyems gtong// srid pa'i lha 'dre sde brgyad la// bden bdar rgyab brten ma byed bsgo// khram dmar btab la khrag nag la// gshin rje'i drag sngags dag dang bsgrag/ sho rde'u dkar nag brdeg par bya'o// bsnyen pa'i snying po hUMHSh+tIHbzlas// zla ba nag po'i tshes drug ni/ nyi shu gcig la dbu btsug nas// nyi shu drug ni tshun chad du// nus thang su ni bzlas pa bya// oM hrIHSh+t-IHbi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ nyin phyed tshun chod bzlas pa bya// mchod dang bstod pa la sogs bya// brgyangs pa'i ras chen blangs nas su// gzhan med sol ba thal ba gnyis// ka na ka yi khu ba dang// pra rtsisogs dang dug sna tshogs// til dang nyung dkar mar khu dang// rang gi srin lag khrag sna ni// rnyed na phyi sa ra khrag dang// ske tshe sa dkar tsan+dan dang// rgya skyegs ldong ros yung bas bris// mA ra gshin rje'i lto bar bcug/ dbang ni chung ma'i snying gar bya// zhi ba tsan+d+ra'i dbus su bya// rgyas par 'dod na glang pos so// bde 'dod rta dang ma he'i 'phongs// bskrad 'dod rnga mo'i 'phongs su bskyon// lkugs pa lug gi khog par bya// gnan pa ri rab 'og tu bya// so

so'i rdzas dang las rnams ni// rig pa can gyis shes par bya// gshin rje zla gsang nag po 'di// zla ba gsang bar sngags pa yin// phrin las bya ba'i rim pa ni// gsang ba'i las su shes par bya// 'khor lo bca' ba'i rim pa ni// brgyangs pa'i ras la dug byugs la// ma dA ldum bu thang phrom dang// kha shog dug sna tshogs rnams la// rang gi srin lag khrag dang sbyar// snag tsha byas la bri bar bya// smyug gu bya rog 'ug pa'i sgro// mi grir shi ba'i skra la yang// pir la sogs pa bya bar gsungs// sgro rtsa skud pa sngo dmar bcing// 'khor lo bri ba'i rim pa yang// gsang ba'i las su shes par bya// 'khor lo bri nas smon lam gdab// rang gi a mr-i ta la sogs// mchod cing bstod pa la sogs bya// bdag nyid ya mAn+ta kar bsgom// sku mdog stang zil nag po'am// chu rlabs nag po'i sprin dang 'dra// kham nag ral pa gyen du brdzes// sma ra kham la smin ma ser// glog 'gyu smin ma zhal bgrad pa// ljags 'gril tshems gtsigs gsus khyim tshe// lus dang yan lag nA gas dkris// ro nye kha nas 'dzag kyang 'dzab kyang zlos// gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// de lta bu ru bdag nyid bsgom// mkhas pas rang gi rig pas dpyad// thod pa 'og ma khri steng ngam// za ma tog gi khri steng gzhag/ steng ma'i thod pa smyug ma la/ sngon dmar brgyangs la yas man gdab// nyi shu bdun gyi snga dro la// nyi ma ri rab rtser shar nas// stag lpags bgo zhing bgrod dkar 'gro// ru rak+sha yi phreng ba bgrang// dbyug to thogs la sdigs mdzub bsgreng// phyag kyang mi 'tshal lam mi bzur// phrad na gang yin brlag par byed// smra bcad byas te khri khri bzlas// rnal 'byor nang la gtam zer na// lag gi brda yis gdab par bya// skom dang zas ni 'dod pa'i phyir// lag gi brda yis blang bar bya// smras na rnal 'byor rang don zad// de yi phyir na lag brda bya// de yi tshe na 'di yang gdon// yA ma ra tsas do me ya che ge mo phra ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas dmar thag chad bar du// khri khri bzlas pa bya ba yin// dmar thag chad nas snga gzhug bcad// phur bu gdab dang nyung dkar brdeg/ pho nya bcol bskul drag tu bya// ma nyes dpang btsug cho nges gdab// nyin gnyis pa la 'di yang gdon// ya me do ru Na yo da ya che ge mo rak+ta tsa ra hUM phaT/ dmar thag chad nas sngags gzhug gcad// las kyi rim pa gong dang 'dra// nyin gsum po la 'di yang gdon// ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya che ge mo mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ dmar thag chad nas sngags gzhug gcad// las kyi rim pa gong dang 'dra// nyin bzhi pa la 'di yang 'don// yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya che ge mo zhig mA ra ya hUM phaT/ dus ni 'brug dang 'tshubs mas gdab// gdags yig nyi shu

rtsa lnga ni// mnan pa'i 'khor lor gzhug par bya// mnan pa'i gzugs ni ri rab bri// thod pa rabs chad nag po'am// ngag dig glen pa bkra mi shis// nang du bcug la re bar gril// lha khang them pa'i 'og dag gam// ro khang dur khrod dag tu gnan// gtad pa gshin rje nyid la ste// dong ni ral pa tshar dgu'o// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og tu gnan// gnan pa'i lha ni ral pa tshar dgu ste// chu nag 'dra ba'i gzugs chen la// ma he nag po dag la bskyon// gshin rje'i dbyug pa nag po thogs// de lta bu yi dngos po la// bdag gis ral gri'i phyag rgya bcas// sa gzhi chen po gshags nas ni// gshin rje yi ni lag tu gtad// ri rab chen po nyid kyis mnan// don yod grub pa'i pho brang gdab// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po bca' gzhi'i skabs te brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drag po'i las dag byed 'dod pas// yid 'ong mthun pa'i gnas lam du// rnal 'byor mos dang dad pa yis// bla ma mnyes byas dbang dag mnos// lung dang man ngag thob nas kyang// brtson 'grus chen pos myur du bsgrub// gnas dang gzungs ma dag dang ni// lta spyod ldan pa dag gis kyang// 'khor lo'i rgyu dang snag tsha'i rgyu// smyug gu'i rgyu dang dus phyogs dang// mkhas pas zla gsang rgyud nas bshad// drag po sa yi maN+Dal yang// bskrad dang gzung dang bslang ba sogs// mkhas pas zla gsang rgyud las so// drag po'i dkyil 'khor bri ba yang// thig g.yog mtshan ldan gzungs ma la// ba su ta yi thig dag thal chen tshon rgyu dang// rgyu dang man ngag shes pas bya// shar nub lho dang phyogs dang mtshams// phyogs cha rig pas blta bar bya// stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi la// chag chag gsum dang skyang nul yang// zla gsang rgyud las shes par bya// byin rlobs gnam sa thig btab pa// zla gsang las las shes par bya// thig ni brgyad kyi cha ru bya// thig skor bzhi dang ldan pa la// thig skor gsum la thig gsum gdab// le'u tse dag ni dgu ru 'gyur// phyi rol thig skor rdo rje'i rwa// thig skor gnyis pa dag la ni// bcu gnyis rtsibs dang ldan par bya// ya ma me da k+She zhes bya// phyogs bzhi dbus kyi le'u tse// drag po sngags kyi yi ge dgod// bcu gnyis rtsibs dang ldan pa la// rA dza sa do bzhi dag dgod// ru Na yo ni dag dang yang// ra ya tsa ni zhes pa ni// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la dgod par bya// thig skor gsum pa dag la ni// bcu drug rtsibs dang ldan pa la// hrIHSh+t-IH'i sngags kyi yi ge dag/ bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel la dgod// rdo rje rwa ba'i phyi rol du// sgo dang sgo khyud ldan pa bya// dbus ni drag po

gru gsum gnag/ ling tse bzhi ni phyogs dang sbyar// sa stong mdzes pa'i tshon du gtang// bcu gnyis drag po bcu drug rgyas// rdo rje lcags la gru chad ljang// mtha' ma lcags ri sgo ni phyogs dang sbyar// gshin rje lha ni lho shar byang// bu don lho yi phyogs su dgram// sha khrag rdzas dang me tog sngo// lho yi phyogs nas dbul bar bya// drag po rdzas kyi ga bu de// mnga' gsol dbang bskur byas nas kyang// dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs su gsol// 'khor lo bcu gnyis rtse la yang// phur pa bcu gnyis rim gyis so// 'khor lo bcu drug rtse mo la// ke seng bcu drug phur pa dgod// sgo bzhi bse mo'i phur pa bzhi// nyi shu rtsa brgyad rtsad la yang// dbang phyug mnga' gsol bar khyams la'o// bsgrub bya'i dam rdzas gtor ma yang// bsgrub bya'i lha ste dpal la gcig/ bsnyen pa'i lha ste ya mAn+ta kar gcig/ las su gnyer ba'i lha ste nyi ma bzhi pa la gcig/ phrin las gnyer ba'i lha ste gri thogs ging dang khram thogs bdud la gcig/ ma mo'i tshogs la gcig kyang dbul// zhi khro'i lha la las gzhung bsrang// de nas 'chi bdag las gzhung bsrang// zhes pa gshin rje gshed pos bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gyi bca' gzhi'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces zhus so// he he dpa' bo 'jam pa'i mgon// phyogs skyong 'dul ba'i gshed po ste// dpa' bo'i 'khor du 'dus pa rnams// tshul bzhin bsgrub pa'i don bshad kyang// phrin las gzhung bsrang ji ltar bsrang// ting 'dzin rnam gsum ji ltar bskyed// spyan drang bzhugs mchod ji ltar bgyi// 'jam dpal mgon las bdag mnyan 'tshal// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos phrin las kyi le'u 'di ched du brjod do// dmar nag brag gam sog po khros pa 'dra// mi ro mang po yod cing rkang gcig shing gi rtsar// gcan gzan mang po 'grul zhing 'dab chags mang po 'du// lha 'dre mang po tshogs sar drag po'i gnas btsal te// mchod pa bshams la dkon mchog gsum po spyan drangs la// mnyes par bya phyir mchod pa rnam lnga 'bul// sa bdag sa srin mang po spyan drangs la// gtor ma chang phud mchod rdzas byin brlabs te// bsngos la sa slong tshig kyang brjod// nga rgyal rdo rje khro bo yis// rdo rje 'gros kyis sa bskor te// sa bslang sa gzhi spyang ba ni// bdag nyid khro bor gyur pa'i thugs ka nas// raM las ye shes me yis dngos mtshan kun bsregs te// yaM las rlung gis gtor nas khaM las chu yis bkrus// don dam stong pa'i dang du bsgom// de nas kun rdzob mtshams bcad

de// dkyil 'khor rgya bcad dbus su bskor bar bya// rin chen sna lnga ldan pa'i chang phud sba// phung shul sa blangs mi rta'i khrag gis ljib// sa sbyangs grub nas dur khrod chag chag gdab// rdo rje dri chu rak+ta dang// dug la sogs pa'i chag chag rab tu gdab// de nas thig gdab thig gi rgyu bstan pa// zhing gi rgyu ma yugs mo'i skra// gri bo log non ro sha kha ral skras// thig skud byas la byin brlab thig kyang gdab// shar dang nub dang de bzhin byang// de bzhin byang shar mtshams su bya'o// shar lho nub byang lho nub dang// de bzhin byang shar mtshams su'o// dbus kyi shar nub dbus kyi lho dang byang// snam bu brgyad la gnyis gnyis bcu drug dag tu bshad// mtha' thig la sogs bri ba'i las su shes// dang po dur khrod ras brgyangs te// 'khor lo bri ba man ngag las su shes// mA ra ya yi gzugs bcas la// dri chen dri chu rkang rjes sa// ngar snabs gos kyi dum bu la// nang du tsher ma rus pas dgang// ming rus mgo dang snying gar gzhug/ lus la dug chu tsha ba gsum gyis byung// skud pa sngon dmar byad sngags bzlas// skud pa nag po dag gis ske nas gdags// de nas thod pa mtshan ngan zhig btsal te// lus kyi ngos la yab bri spyi bo'i ngos la yum// de bzhin gzugs de 'khor lo'i bar du gzhug/ 'khor lo thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ mi lpags phreng bas rgya gram bcing// de nas phur pa bcu gcig la// gu gul dud pas rab tu bdug/ yungs kar rgyal po dag kyang brdeg/ gru gsum dbyings nas khro bo chen por bskyed// spyan drang bzhugs su gsol te rang rang gdan la dgod// shar du kong tse brag gyon dri za 'dul// lho phyogs 'chi bdag ya ba ti// nub tu klu bdag rmig pa 'dul// byang du lha mchog gnod sbyin 'dul// shar lhor glang mgo me lha 'dul// lho nub mig dmar srin po 'dul// nub byang tel pa rlung lha 'dul// byang shar las grub dbang ldan 'dul// steng du nag 'joms tshangs pa 'dul// 'og tu dmar po sa bdag 'dul// de dag gshin rje'i yum rnams kyang// phur pa rang rang grib la gnas// ku ma da ri bdud 'dul shar// k+Shu ma da ri btsan 'dul lho// kang ka da ri gza' 'dul nub// tsa mun da ri klu 'dul byang// phur pa bzhi yang sgo bzhi la'o// gshin rje'i bris sku lho ru dgram// thod pa 'khor lo bcas pa ste// gru gsum phub ste steng du bzhag/ g.yang gzhi 'phan la sogs pas brgyan// sha chen tshil chen keng rus dang// khrag chen la sogs ci mang sbyar// ske thag gshin rje'i phur la gdab// gtor ma la sogs gong bzhin gzhag/ nyung dkar ske tshe dug khrag rnams// g.yag g.yon dag tu gzhag par bya// mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma

gsum// chang phud la sogs bshams nas kyang// dkon mchog gsum po spyan drangs la// mchod dang sdig pa bshags pa bya// de nas chos kyi srung ma rnams// lha mgon klu mgon la sogs dang// bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu dang// 'gro ba drug rnams la sogs par// gtor ma bsngos la bden pa bdar// 'di yi grogs ma byed par bsgo// dkyil 'khor bskor zhing dpang yang gzug/ mtha' ma rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bskor// bgegs rnams bskrad la mtshams rnams gcad// de nas lho ru kha yang blta// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang// rgyu dang ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom// e yang ra suM keM raM b+h+ruM las// gzhal yas gdan bcas gsal bar bsgom// de nang lha rnams gsal bar bsgom// dbus kyi ma he'i gdan thog tu// mthing nag 'bar ba'i hUM gcig bsgom// de las 'od zer 'phros 'dus pas// phyag mtshan rdo rje gcig tu gyur// de las 'od zer 'phros 'dus pas// rdo rje mthing nag 'od du gyur// A+oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ka la rU pa badzra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'od las ya mAn+ta kar gyur// zhal gsum phyag drug mthing nag la// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// ral pa'i rtse las me 'bar ba'i// ral pa'i sked nas khrag 'dzag pa'i// ral pa'i rtse nas rgya mtsho 'khrugs// sdigs mdzub rgyu zhags lcags kyu g.yas/ dung dmar mdung thung gsal zhing g.yon// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum ma he brdzis// dur khrod rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan// klad par oM bsam mgrin par AMH/ tsit+ta'i nang du hUM gcig bsam// ye shes lnga ru byin brlabs te// A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+ha dz+nyA na pany+tsa swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs te/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya swA ka tsit+ta At+ma ko\u0f85haM// khro bo'i nga rgyal bskyed pa la// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ya mAn+ta ka ma hA kro d+ha hUM/ de nas hUM zhes rab brjod pas// khro bo'i thugs kar hUM bton te// g.yon phyogs zhing gi gdan steng du/ hUM de 'phros shing gnas pa las// oM AHhUM be tA lI rak+sha man// brjod pas hUM nyid yum du gyur// khram bam g.yas la b+han+da g.yon// sku mdog nag mo gsal bar bskyed// yab kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje ste// oM las nor bu bu gar phaT// de nas yum gyi gsang gnas su// paM las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// e las nang du gru gsum ste// 'di skad brjod la gsang sgo dbye// pad+ma gu h+ya pra we sha phaT// ces brjod gsang sgo phye ba yis// yab yum rol pa mdzad pa dang// lhag pa'i byang chub sems nyid de// rdo rje'i lam nas rab byung ste// yum gyi mkha' la 'phros pa dang// de la hUM zhes brjod pa yis// byang sems hUM bsgril bcur gyur te// mkha' las

bton nas 'khor lo yi// rtsibs kyi steng du gdan steng du// hUM hUM bsgril ma re re bsam// 'khor lo shar gyi rtsibs gdan la// hUM hUM bsgril ma de nyid las// oM ya man badzra kro d+ha hUM// oM ya man badzra kro d+hI hUM/ brjod pas hUM las khro bo'i sku// kong rtse brag gyon kham rgya ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag/ dur khrod rgyan dang ldan pa ste// g.yon pa b+han dmar yum la 'khyud// g.yas pa gdug pa'i mtshon cha 'dzin// yum yang g.yas kyi yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar yab la stob// dur khrod rgyan rnams yab dang mthun// rtsa ba'i sngags de brjod nas kyang// phyogs skyong yab yum kun kyang bskyed// rgyan dang cha lugs phyag mtshan rnams// gong bzhin thams cad gsal bar bskyed// g.yas kyi hUM las yab tu bskyed// g.yon gyi hUM las yum du bskyed// ro ka ma dun b+h+yo/ tsa mu ti dun b+h+yoH/ nam gru ma dun b+h+yoH/ b+h+yo las dur khrod ma mo gsum/ zla gam gsum la bskyed par bya// sgo bzhir rdo rje bse mo bzhi// ku la d+ha ri shar du bskyed// k+Shu la ng+ha ri lho ru bskyed// kang ka d+ha ri nub tu bskyed// tsa mun d+ha ri byang du bskyed// ke'u seng dbang phyug ging dang bdud// man ngag las su shes par bshad// spyan drang phyag 'tshal bzhugs mchod 'bul// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po'i phrin las kyi skabs te bcu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos drag po 'khor lo'i skabs 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ro ras rnying pa'am// gr-i bor shi ba'i ro shun la// mi tshig la sogs mi smra bar// ske tshe lan tshwa nyung nag mar// dug dang nim pa'i lo ma dang// ka na ka yi khu ba dang// ro bsregs pa yi sol ba dang// rang ngam phal gyi mdzub mo'i khrag/ de rnams sbyar la snag tsha bya'o// bya rog hu lu'i sgro rtsa la// 'khor lo bri ba'i smyug gu bya// 'khor lo rtsibs can gnyis khris te// srid gsum sems can thams cad kun// gshin rje'i lto na yod rtags su// 'khor lo rim pa gsum du bri// dbus su re'u mig dgu par bya// phyi rim rtsibs ni bcu gnyis bri// tha ma dag la bcu drug bya// yab yum 'khor lo dag la bskyon// 'khor lo'i nang du sngags bri ba// re'u cha dgu dang bcu gnyis la// nyi ma bzhi yi gshed bzhi bri// bcu drug hrI Sh+t-IHdaM daM daM daM'adi med pa mang/ dam tshig sngags// phyi rim ka kha bzhi bcu gnyis// yang rim dbyangs yig bcu drug bri// de yi phyi mar yang rim la// dzaHhUM baM hoHbri bar bya// yi ge re ga re mig tu// de yang pho yi 'khor lo na// yi ge'i kha rnams phyir la bstan// mo yig rnams ni nang du bstan// ya dang [文档 ]mnyam ma dang [ 文档 ]// rA dang [文档]mnyam dza dang [文档 ]// sa dang

mnyam do dang Do// me dang tsha mnyam ya dang ya/ ya dang ya mnyam me dang [桌面文档 ]// do dang Do mnyam ru dang// Na dang na mnyam yo dang [桌面文档 ]// da dang Da mnyam ya dang ya// ya dang ya mnyam da dang Da/ yo dang yo mnyam ni dang N-i/ rA dang [ 桌面文档 ]mnyam ya dang ya// k+She dang [桌面文档 ]mnyam ya dang ya/ ya dang ya mnyam k+She dang [桌面文档 ]// ya dang ya mnyam ts+tsha dang [桌面文档]// ni dang N-i mnyam ra dang ni/ ma dang ma mnyam ya dang [桌面文档]/ g.yas skor g.yon skor pho mo gnyis// ma nor ma log bri ba gces// dam tshig yi ge dgod pa yang// o~M dang [桌面文档]mnyam hrI dang [桌面文档]// Sh+t+r-I dang [桌面文档 ]mnyam bi dang b-i// kri dang [桌面文档 ]mnyam tA dang TA// ni dang Na mnyam na dang Na/ che dang [桌面文档 ]mnyam ge dang [桌面文档 ]// mo dang [桌面文档 ]mnyam hUM dang [桌面文档 ]/ hUM dang [桌面文档 ]mnyam phaT dang tas// swA dang [文档]mnyam hA dag[ 文档 ]/ dam tshig yi ge dgod par yang// ka kha dbyangs yig la sogs te// yi ge rnams kyi dgod phyogs so// gnyis ka rnal mar bris gyur na// yab yum cho rol song gyur te// 'khor lo log nas rnal 'byor phung// de la dgug dang gnan dang myos// bskrad dang myos 'bros la sogs pa// zla gsang las las shes par bya// de ltar 'khor lo bri ba dang// rabs chad pho mo'i thod pa dang// 'khor lo gong ma ltar bris la// de yi bar du bcug byas la// tshon skud nag pos phyogs bzhir bcings// gzhan yang zhi rgyas las byed na// kham sa'i gab tser gong bzhin gzhug/ so so'i rigs kyi gzungs thag gdags// de yis gang yang gdon mi za// las rnams 'grub ces gshed pos gsungs// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bca' gzhi'i skabs te bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dang por ting 'dzin rnam gsum gyis// las kyi bya ba gzhan zin nas// ting nge 'dzin la rab 'jug pa// ngas gsungs pa la sems thud cig/ hUM/ log rtog gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i chos nyid de// sems kyis brtags pas cir yang mi snang ste// mi g.yo mi bsam chos kyi dbyings nyid ngang// rig pa spros bral mi rtog bsgom// oM ma hA shU'u n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ hUM/ dbyings nyid nam mkha' stong pa'i rang bzhin las// rang sems maM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te// 'od kyi thig le nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// ma sUr+ya maN+Da la hUM/ hUM/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi dkyil 'khor te// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga rab 'bar ba// brtan cing mi g.yo rdo rje 'bar bar bsgom// badzra (9)

zhes 'phros 'dus pa las// rdo rje'i gur dang sa gzhi bsgom// hUM/ 'jig rten khams gsum ma lus kun// raM yaM khaM gis bsreg sbyangs nas// ye shes 'bar ba lnga ni rim gyis bsgom// e yaM raM baM suM keM e/ nam mkha' stong pa'i rang bzhin la// brtan pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom// de steng raM las gru gsum me// baM las bdud rtsi ngo bo las// smin pa sa yi dkyil 'khor bsam// keng rus ri rab steng dag tu// ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom// b+h+rUM las ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas mchog/ gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// dkyil 'khor tshul du gzhal yas bsgom// b+h+rUM dz+nyA na tsakra b+h+rUM// gzhal yas dbus su nyi zla'i steng// chu skyes steng du sems nyid d+hIH/ 'phro 'dus ral gri d+hIs mtshan pa// 'od zhu 'jam dpal rdo rjer bsgom// oM a ra pa tsa na d+hiH// 'jam pa'i rdo rje gzhon tshul zur phud can// sku ni gser mdog zhi ba'i cha lugs 'chang// zhal gcig phyag gnyis shes rab ral gri g.yas// gzhon nu sku sprul phyag g.yon ut+pal te// mi 'gyur shes rab po tis mtshan par bsgom// snying dkyil nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor d+hIHlas ni// 'od 'phros phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs spyan drang nas// nyi ma la zhugs mgon po nyid dang ni// bde gshegs spyan drangs 'od kyi gong bur bsam// 'od phung de nyid kha dog nag po'i hUM// 'phro 'du'i tshul gyis rdo rje rtse lnga gnag/ shin tu 'bar zhing brtan pa nyid du bsgom// badzra de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// rdo rje phra mo'i 'phro 'du las// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// dbu gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gyad kyi 'dor thabs yi dwags gnon// tri shUl ral gri dbyug dgra s+t+wa// 'byin pa'i phyir na phyag brgyad pa// lcags kyu'i mtshon cha phyag na bsnams// thod pa shag ti to ma ra// sdigs dang zhags pa g.yon pa ste// las la gsang ba'i yum gnyis kyang// g.yas g.yon gnyis su bsam pa yang// lus dang grib ma'i tshul du bsgom// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ be tA lI yak+sha rak+sha hUM hUM// pad+ma rdo rje byin brlab pa// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa// baM las pad+mar byin brlabs nas// brda' yis bskul ba tshul bzhin bya// sa ma ya hoH/ sa ma ya hoH// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ra ho haM/ rA ga yA mi// hUM/ hUM/ hUM/ hUM/ hUM/ hUM/ yab yum mkha' la hUM bcu gnyis// gshin rje bcu gnyis gsal ba'i rtsa// 'khor rnams bsam pa'i dbang gis bskyed// spyan drar bzhugs mchod tshul bzhin bya// gshin rje gshed pos gsungs pa'i don// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ bsgom khog gi skabs te bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang

mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so// gshin rje gshed pos gsungs pa'i don// bdag sdud 'di yi don shod cig/ bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag bshad pa dang// bsnyen pa dang ni nyer bsnyen po// dngos grub len dang bsgrub pa dang// 'chi bdag bdud dang gshin rje'i bsnyen pa dang// bsad pa las kyi bsnyen pa gang la bgyi// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsol cig/ gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lag na rdo rje 'dzin// 'chi bdag rnams kyi bshad bya ba// ngas gsungs pa la sems thud cig/ dang por yid 'thad gnas btsal nas// tsha tshwa nye'u 'don 'bum la sogs// bsod nams dag pa'i tshogs bsag pa// tshad med bzhi dang yan lag lnga// bdun gyis kun rdzob sems bskyed la// don dam byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa// rnam par mi rtog ngang du ci rigs bsgom// de ltar ma rtogs rnams la snying rje bskyed// ting 'dzin gnyis kyis rang rgyud dag sbyangs nas// rig pa'i ye shes yi ge muM du gsal// spro bsdus 'jam dpal sems dpa'i skur bskyed de// gong ma lta bu'i las dag bya ba ni// bsod nams tshogs kyi las dag go/ rdo rje sems dpas rab tu sems la zhog/ dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag gi skabs te bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal gshin rjes 'di skad brjod do// yid 'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag tu// gong gi bsod nams tshogs la gnas pa yang// phyi nang gsang ba dag gi mtshams bcad nas// zhi khro la sogs bskang bshags dag par bya// de nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum spro bsdu yis// bdag nyid gshin rje'i gshed kyi skur bskyed la// g.yon du yum skyed mdun du sras mchog bskyed// g.yas su yum bskyed la sogs rab byas te// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs pa dang// ye shes chen po lnga ru dbang bskur nas// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor spyan drang dang// mchod bstod la sogs rdzogs pa dang// bdag thugs phyag rgya bzhi las mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi// spros te spyan drangs phyag 'tshal gzhug pa dang// mchod pa la sogs lha mo bzhis byas te// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa'i 'dzab grangs dbul ba ni// rang rig ye shes gnas su dag pa'i rtags// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang// bcud kyi 'jig rten lha yi 'khor// dbyings nyid gting mtha' med pa las// skye 'gro gzugs su snang ba las// gshed po yab dang yum du ma gyur gang yang med// dper na til 'bru mar gyis gang ba bzhin// bdag nyid tsit+ta'i gzhal yas khang// rin chen gur phub 'dra ba ru// bdag nyid zla ba'i maN+Dal

bsam// rig pa'i ye shes yongs su grub pa'i rtags// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang gsal bar bsgom// thugs kar rdo rje rtse lnga bsam// de yi bum pa dag la yang// sngags kyi sa bon yi ge hUM// de mtha' bcu bdun bskor bar bsgom// lha rnams thugs kar de bzhin ci 'drar bsgom// de nas bdag nyid thugs ka nas// sngags bzlas ljags steng sngags 'phros pas// 'dom gang pha rol phyin tshad du// sku rnams phra mor gyur nas kyang// de dag zhal nas gsang sngags bzlas pa las// 'od zer mchod pa'i lha dang lha mor gyur// phar 'phros 'phags pa rnams la 'od zer phog/ sku gsung thugs nyid mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'bul// 'od zer de dag bdag la tshur 'dus pas// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs bdag la thim par bsam// de ltar bsnyen pa drug 'bum byas pa ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa ste// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// lha yi bsnyen pa bgyi ba'i skabs te bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// yid 'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag tu// maN+Dal chag chag legs btab la// me tog bris sku la sogs bkod nas kyang// gong ma lta bu'i bsnyen pa gsum 'bum bzlas pa ni// nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin zhes gshed pos bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i skabs te bco lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// yid 'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag tu/ gong ma'i las rnams mthar phyung ste// nye bsnyen las la gnas nas kyang// des ni rtags bzang mthong bar 'gyur// grub pa'i rtags ni byung ba dang// khyad par dngos grub rdzas bsags te// dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang// mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba dang// dngos grub rdzas rnams bkod nas kyang// bdag gi thugs las 'od zer phar 'phros pas// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs dam bskul// bris sku dngos grub rdzas la thim bsams shing// 'bum phrag gcig gi bzlas pa bya'o// g.yal dang sbrid pa brkyang bskum gnyid kyang spang// de bzhin spangs pas ci bsam 'grub ces bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa chen po'i skabs te bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// ngas gsungs pa la sems thud cig/ yid 'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag tu// 'bum phrag gcig gi bsnyen pa yang// snga ma'i las su bya bar gsungs// bdag nyid gshed po'i mthu ldan pas// mdun gyi ri rab bsam pa dang// de bzhin

gshegs pa'ang bsam byas te// bdag gi thugs kar yi ge ya// nag po me 'dra 'od 'bar bsam// de mthar bzlas pa'i yig 'brus bskor bsam la// de bzhin bdag gi thugs ka nas// sngags ni rab tu bzlas pa las// 'od 'phros las kyi gshin rje la// de yi 'od zer phog gyur pas// thugs dam bskul nas dar cig kyang// 'dug pa'i dbang med 'ong bar 'gyur// gshed po'i bka' nyan gsung sdod bsam// las la sbyor ba'i bsnyen pa ste// 'chi bdag las kyi gshin rje rnams// gnas su gtong ba gshed pos bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'chi bdag bdud dang gshin rje'i bsnyen pa'i skabs te bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// gsad pa las kyi bsnyen pa ni// yid 'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag tu// gong gi las la gnas byas te// de yang 'chi bdag bsnyen pa ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis dril ba bzla zhes bshad// las la sbyor ka'i dus de ru// sna la ro tshas ras btsal te// mas yar bgrang ba'i tshes brgyad dam// nyi shu gnyis kyi nub mo ni// dur khrod gling nas ras blangs la// sme khrag gsum du bcug byas la// 'chi bdag gshin rje de la bstim// yab yum las la sbyor ka yi// sngags 'di nyid kyang rab tu bzlas// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI// a kro te ka kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ ces bzlas la// nyi shu drug gi snga dro la// ro ras bkru dang brgyad spyad bya// nyi phyed man chad snag tsha mnye// dbang du bsdu ba'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM du man+ta ka ra hUM hUM phaT phaT// ces brjod// snag tsha mnye ba'i las zin nas// de bzhin dgod ka 'khor lo bri// bri ba zin nas lhar phyag 'tshal// bka' bden pa 'grub par gyur cig ces bya// yang na dur khrod ras med na// thod pa dag la 'khor lo bri// ag tse'i ngos su 'chi bdag gzugs bris la// gzugs kyi snying gar ming byang bris// dgra yi ming rus thod par gzhug/ 'khor lo dbus kyi ya las kyang// 'chi bdag gshed po'i sku ru bskyed// phyogs kyi ya ma me de k+She// bzhi las gshed bzhi'i skur bskyed pas// bdag gi mdun du ri rab las// gser gyi ri bdun bcas pa bsam// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po yi// rnal 'byor chu byad ldan byas la// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong yang// chang par bcug la be con bsam// ri rab bdag gi spyir brdeg ste// ri rab rgya gram gas par bsam// de bzhin sngags 'di rab tu brjod// oM na mo bud+d+ha d+harma sang g+he b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga ta kro d+ha bi dzA ya ag+ni dz+wa la ni dzi hwa bre ta shi ya hUM hUM phaT phaT ces brjod pas// ri rab rgya gram gshag bsam

zhing// gnas kyi gshin rje 'gugs bsam zhing// thugs ka'i yi ge ya nag po// tha ma dbang sdud sngags kyis bskor ba las/ 'od zer 'phros pas 'og phyogs su// 'chi bdag gshin rje gtso bo 'khor// 'bum phrag bcas la 'od phog pas// rang dbang med par de bkug nas// de la sha khrag sna tshogs kyis// gtor ma rdzas kyis mchod par bya// b+han+da 'brub khung nang bcug la// dbang du bsdu ba'i sngags bzlas la/ bdag las 'phros pa'i gshed po dang// grangs med 'phros pas 'chi bdag tshogs// rang dbang med par bkug byas te// thod pa'i nang du bcug pa la// zhabs g.yas rdo rje'i phur pa yis// gzir bas skad ngan 'o dod 'bod// rang dbang med par dbang du bsdus// bka' nyan ci gsungs brjod par bsgom// skya rengs dang po shar ba la// 'chi bdag gshin rje 'khor bcas la// gtor ma byin te gshin rje nyid// pho nyar bkye la dgra bo dgug/ lha dang dbral la sogs pa bya// nyi ma rtse la shar ba dang// b+han+da dkyil 'khor gru gsum steng du bzhag/ de bzhin bsad pa'i sngags bzlas te// bdag nyid thugs kar yi ge ya// sngo nag gnag la 'tsher ba bsam// tha ma drag sngags 'bru bdun pa// me lce 'bar ba 'dra ba bsam// gsad pa las kyi sngags 'di bzlas// oM hrIHSh+t+rIHbi kr-i tA na na che ge mo sha truM nA sha ya hUM phaT/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya che ge mo a mu kaM pra ma ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas// 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskur gyur nas// gshed po ya ma rA dza bskul// de yis phyogs skyong gshin rje bskul// de yis ma mo mkha' 'gro dang// rdo rje ging pho ging mo dang// bdud la sogs pa dbang med bskul// de bzhin gzas po dngos bkug nas// thod par bcug ste gnas pa las// gsad ba las kyi sngags bzlas pas// star tshan rtsi sbur mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// dgong gi dmar thag chad pa dang// gshed chen ya ma rA dza la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma bshams// be con phyag rgya bcas nas kyang// gnag pa'i spyi bor de brgyab pas// tshangs pa'i rtsa bcad mgo 'khor bsam// nyi shar rtse nas las brtsams te// bdag nyid thugs kar yi ge ya/ 'bru bdun me ri 'bar bar bskor// gsad pa las kyi sngags 'di bzlas// oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHbikr-i tA na na che ge mo sha truM nA sha ya hUM phaT/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ che ge mo a mu kaM mu+u ra tsa ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas// 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskul nas kyang// de yis myos byed 'bar ba bskul// de yis phyogs skyong gshin rje bskul// de bzhin ma mo mkha' 'gro dang// ging bdud 'dug pa'i dbang med bskul// de

bzhin dmigs pa'i dngos bkug nas// 'dug pa'i dbang med thod par bcug/ gsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas pas// star tshan rtsi sbur mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// de bzhin dmar thag chad pa dang// gshed po myos byed 'bar ba la// mnyes pa'i sha khrag gtor ma sbyin// gshed la bcol bskul drag tu bya// phyag rgya gong bzhin bcas nas kyang// be con lte bar brgyab pas ni// lus brgyal yid 'khrugs 'chi bar bsam// bdag gi thugs ka'i ya nag po// drag sngags bdun gyis bskor ba la// gsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas te// oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi kr-i na na sha truM nA sha ya hUM phaT/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya che ge mo a mu kaM rak+ta tsa ra ya hUM phaT/ 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskul nas kyang// gshed chen Ar+ya ma ru bskul// de yis phyogs skyong gshin rje bskul// de bzhin ma mo mkha' 'gro dang// ging dang ging mo bdud la sogs// 'dug pa'i dbang med bskul bar bsam// de yi gzas pa po bkug nas// dbang med thod par bcug par bsam// gsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas pas// star tshan rtsi sbur mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// de bzhin dmar thag chad pa dang// gshed chen Ar+ya ma ru la// sha khrag mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'bul// be con mgrin par brgyab pa yi// khrag tsar lhug gis song bar bsam// bdag gi thugs kar yi ge ya// drag sngags 'bru bdun bskor ba la// gsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas te// oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi kr-i tA na na sha truM nA sha ya hUM phaT/ ya k+She ya ts+tsha ni rA ma ya// che ge mo a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskul nas kyang// de yis ral pa tshar dgu bskul// de yi phyogs skyong gshin rje bskul// de bzhin ma mo mkha' 'gro dang// ging pho ging mo bdud la sogs// 'dug pa'i dbang med bskul bar bsam// gzas pa bkug nas thod par bcug/ de bzhin gsang ba'i sngags bzlas pas// star tshan rtsi sbur mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlags par bsam// dgong ka'i dmar thag chad pa dang// gshed chen ral pa tshar dgu la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma sbyin// drag po'i phrin las bcol bskul bya// de bzhin be con phyag rgya yis// snying gar brgyab pas srog bcas nas// dbugs kun phyi la phyung bar bsam// gsad pa mA ra'i man ngag 'di// gshin rje gshed po bdag gis kyang// thugs kyi sgrom bu kha phye nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la byos// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba las kyi bsnyen pa'i skabs te bcwo brgyad pa'o//// de nas mthu stobs kyi bdag po

lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// he he dpa' bo chen po 'jigs byed gshed// drag po gsang ba'i 'khor lo la// skyod pa'i rta dang 'bebs pa'i sngags// sdebs pa'i grogs dang rno ba'i rdzas// de bzhi'i rkyen dang ma ldan na// 'dam la btab pa'i phur pa'am// khri mun nang nas g.yu 'tshol 'dra// mthu stobs bdag pos 'di skad gsol// skyod pa'i rta ni gang la bgyi// 'debs pa'i sngags ni gang la bgyi// sdebs pa'i grogs ni gang la bgyi// rno ba'i ngar ni gang la bgyi// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' stsol cig/ gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad brjod// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// drag po gsang ba'i 'khor lo la// skyod pa'i rta dang mi ldan na// rlung nag 'tshubs ma 'phyos pa 'dra// 'debs pa'i sngags dang mi ldan na// nam mkha' sprin gyis 'gags pa 'dra// sdebs pa'i grogs dang ma ldan na// dpa' bo gting gnon med pa 'dra// rno ba'i ngar dang mi ldan na// mtshon cha rtse mo rtul ba 'dra// de bzhin grogs rnams ngas bshad kyi// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung// bka' dang gzhung bzhin ma nor ba'i// bsrung ba'i sdom pa ma nyams par// rdzas dang lag cha ldan pa dang// bsam ldan bzlas brjod sran tshugs shing// dam tshig bsrung zhing drag shul spyod// lta spyod bsgrub pa ldan pa yi// dpa' rtul can gyi rnal 'byor pas// bstan pa gnyen po bsrung don du// dgon pa chen po gnas mal der// bya byed zang zing 'du long spang// 'tsho ba'i yo byad dpags te bstar// bya ba thams cad zin nas ni// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa de// ting 'dzin gsal dang brtan pa yi// lha yi rnal 'byor rtse gcig bya// thun mong dam tshig bsrung zhing bsgrub// khyad par dam tshig spyod cing dor// bsnyen bsgrub phrin las gzhung bzhin bya// tshang zhing rdzogs pa'i grangs bsnyen la// 'khor zhing phyin pa dus bsnyen yin// mthong ngam thos sam nyams su len// mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// zhi rgyas gnyis kyi 'khor los mchod// dbang drag gnyis kyi 'khor los mnan// zhi rgyas gnyis kyi bsrung phan gdags// dbang drag gnyis kyis bsgral bar bya// 'khor lo gzhan yang ci rigs par// dbye bskrad dgug sogs gzhung bzhin bya// gang 'dod las de bsgrub byas na// 'khor lo'i rgyu dang snag tsha dang// phyogs dang bsam sbyor rim pa dang// kha dog so so'i mthun rdzas ni// rim pa can gyi de shes bya// de la 'khor lo zhes grags pa// ngo bo nges tshig rnam grangs so// ngo bo spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur zhing 'gro// so so rang gi mtshan nyid ni// gang la btab pa de ltar snang// nges pa'i tshig kyang de bzhin te// rnam

par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba dang// mi 'khor 'khor zhing 'gro ba dang// lte ba 'khor shing rtse mos gcod// de la grangs ni mtha' yas te// mdor na rnam pa gsum du shes// thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor lo dang// las dang srid pa'i 'khor lo dang// 'jig rten phan gnod byed pa yi// bya ba bsgrub pa'i 'khor lo'o// dper na mo 'phang mgal me dang// glog dang sgra ldan 'khor lo dang// shing rta zo chu'i 'khor lo sogs// las dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni// thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor los ni// nyon mongs gcod cing sdug bsngal 'joms// bsgrub dang bsgrub par bya ba yi// sems bskyed pa dang rgyud dgrol zhing// ye shes sems mtshon rnal grol byed// de las rnam pa gzhan du yang// zhi dang rgyas dang srung ba dang// dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang// dbye bskrad dgug dang smyo 'bog dang// gsad dang gnan pa la sogs pa// de yi rkyen dang rtsol ba dang// dus dang las thabs byed pa yi// 'phen zhing bskyod pa nus pa yi// 'khor zhing gcod cing 'bigs pa dang// bsnur dang 'khrul zhing sdud pa dang// gzir zhing gnan zhing 'bigs pa dang// brdeg cing rnam par 'joms par byed// las dang srid pa'i 'khor lo ni// las kyi 'phen pas srid par 'khor// phyi nang rten 'brel 'jig rten bskyed// nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal gyi// rnam pa gsum dang 'khor zhing 'gro/ 'das dang da ltar gnas pa dang// 'byung dang ma 'ongs phyis 'byung dang// skad kyi 'byung ba'i rgyun gyis na// skad cig ma yi rgyun gyis 'khor// de bzhin phyi rol don rnams kyang// dbyar dgun staun dpyid zla ba los// bskal pa du ma 'khor zhing 'gro// ngo bo nges tshig rnam grangs su// 'khor lo'i rang bzhin bstan pa yin// bde gshegs bka' la gnod pa la// 'chi bdag 'khor lo nag po bya// yi dwags grong khyer bcom byas la// snel gri'i mu su'i mgo thod blangs// yi dwags gos la khram bris te// dbyibs ni zla ba lta bu ste// kun nas yongs su zlum pa ste// rim pa gsum ldan le'u tshe dgu// bcu gnyis bcu drug rtsibs bcas te// le'u tse dgu dang bcu gnyis la// bcu bdun la sogs sngags kyis mdzes// 'di lta bu yi 'khor lo ni// phyin ci log gi bcings pa yi// log pa'i shes pa ldan pa des// rgyu mthun mtshan ma'i 'khor lo la// man ngag can gyi rnal 'byor pas// kha nas drag po'i sngags bzlas te// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa'i// las kyi shan pa'i go bkram ste// lcags kyu shag ti to ma ra// kha T+wAM ber ka la sogs pas// brdeg cing 'joms par byed pa ni// 'jab cing rgyug cing 'ded pa dang// 'dzin cing gsod par bsam pa yis// gang la bya ba'i rnam shes de// log pa'i stabs kyis

gnas su mthong// khro bdag gshin rje gshed po ru// bdag nyid bsam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mtshan ma'i ming rus bcas pa la// ske tshe dug dang nyung nag dang// thal chen gu gul nyung dkar gyis// brab dang gzir dang dbab pa dang// dgug cing rdo rje'i mtshon gyis gdab// sngon dmar byad du gzhug byas la// ga'u kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ smra bcad zhi khro'i sngags bzlas pa'i// drag po'i sngags kyis phog 'gyur na// gang la dmigs pa'i bsgrub bya de// mgo 'khor pa dang khrag skyugs pa// myos par mA ra gdon mi za// drag po'i las rnams rdzogs pa dang// mtshan ma ming rus bcas pa rnams// thod pa nag por rgyas btab la// sme bas bkrus pas tshan chus byug/ mu sa la yi g.yogs shing gtums// kha ral ma yi zhabs mas gril// yi dwags grong ngam sme brtseg khyim// mchod rten 'og gam lha khang sgo// rgya mtsho'i 'gram mam lung mdo du// rdo la ri rab gzugs bris la// steng du laM dang d+h+ri yis mnan// gshin rje'i lag tu gtad khram bya/ bzlas pa'i tshe dang bklag pa'i tshe/ 'dra min 'dug 'di'i mchan bu 'di gang la sbyar dgos ma shes pas dpyad/ thun kha brgyad kyang brdab par bya// sbos pa dug thun lkugs pa kha// nyi ma dang po'i thun gyis mnan// gzer ba mda' thun brla la gzer// nyi ma gnyis pa'i thun gyis brab// lkugs pa khrag thun myos pa phur// nyi ma gsum pa'i thun gyis brab// gsang ba nyung nag sa yi tshon// nyi ma bzhi pa'i thun gyis mnan// mtshan ngan thod pa khrag gis byug/ khrag sna dug sna sbyar byas nas// shan dmar dug skyogs dug thun bzlas// glen lkugs thod pa'i kha thun te// lcags mda' lcags gzhu mda' thun bzlas// gri bo'i thod par mtshon brdar pa'o// mkhris nad thod par sa ser gser// gla ba gser thun sngags kyis so// smyo ba'i thod pa khrag thun dang/ smyos pa phur thun bzlas pa bya// rabs chad thod pa nyung thun dang// sa tshon thun du shes par bya// chu shel sgron ma rlabs po che// lkugs pa mon mo'i lag g.yabs kyi// srid pa'i dmag dpung ra mda' bzlog/ ya ma rA dza'i g.yab kyis g.yab// gsur dang sme ba'i dud pas bdug/ gcer bu spyi tshug ngu 'bod bya// mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag tu// gzir gnon drag po'i mngon spyod bya// drag po'i thun sngags kha nas bzlas// zhung thun ya rbad na thun ya rbad phung phur yang thun ya// khrag thun ya rbad// dang po dang lo lo kyi gye// srog la yaM yaM snying la thun// kha brgyad thun yang brdeg par bya// lha srin sde brgyad la sogs pa'i// srid pa'i dmag dpung phab nas ni// drang srong dmod pa'i sngags zor dang// sna tshogs sngags kyi sbyor ba dang// lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pas bya// khru gang gru bzhi zabs yod

par// ga bu rdzas kyi sbyor ba de// 'byung po'i gtor ma gshin rje la// byin la lag tu gtad khram bya// rang gi yi dam bsgom bya zhing// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma ni// sa sros tshe na lho phyogs gtang// sgrol ba'i drag sngags brnag pa'i lung// bstan pa bsrung ba gnan pa'i gter// phr-in las drag po sngags kyi mtshon// 'khor lo thun sdebs sgrol ba'i 'phyong// rdo rje sems dpa' gzungs shing chongs// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// 'khor lo thun sdebs kyi skabs te bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad brjod// bstan pa srung ba brnag pa'i lung// thugs kyi man ngag sngags zor mchog/ sgrol ba'i phrin las sbyor thabs su// 'khor lo byad sdebs man ngag 'phyong// bka' yi bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// rang sems dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas// snying rje dag tu srog ltar brten// byams dga' btang snyoms de bzhin du'o// mdo sogs 'don zhing bsam gtan bya// rgyun gyi yi dam rtse gcig pas// bla ma dag la rtag tu bkur// des kyang dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin gzhug/ theg chen dam tshig sdom pa bshad// rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya bsten// sgrub thabs man ngag legs par blang// de nas mchod pa cho ga bzhin// nyin re dag tu byas nas kyang// sku gzugs dang kyang 'bad de bya// bde ba'i stan la lus sems gzhag/ sum 'bum mi skyo'i bar du bzlas// de 'og ri rtser gnas byas la// rlung za zhing ni bzlas pa bya// 'bum bcu'i mtha' ru phrin las brtsams// nam mkha'i sgron ma mar dus tshe// yi dwags grong bcom shi gos la// yi dwags 'khor lo gdug pa yi// 'khor lo gdug pa'i lte ba la// re'u mig dgu mi mtshams bor te// bcu gnyis 'khor lo gdug pa'i nang// bcu bdun la sogs gsang sngags dang// zlum pos bskor ba'i phyi rim na// hrIHSh+t+r-IHming yig dbyangs tshogs rnams// dur khrod sol ba dug gsol gyis// srin mtheb gung 'dzub sbyar ba yis// khru gang gos gnyis ras mchog la// gdug pa'i yi ge g.yas g.yon bzlog/ de nang chud pa'i skyes bu gnyis// zhal bgrad spyan bzlog 'khor lo 'dzin// phyag zhabs mgur chu ro nye brgyan// mi smra dbang po bsdams te bri// gnyis sbyar rgyab la ro nye yis// bsdams pa'i tshul du mkhas pas bri// gdug pas bzung zhing gdug pa zung gcig thod nang du/ yang 'dug thod nang du// dril byas sngon dmar byad kyis bsdams// gdug pa'i thod nag ltos 'phro bri// mngar dang klu sman rtsi mchog gis// mchod cing snal la mgu bar bya// gdug pas bzung zhing thod par gzhug/ sngon dmar byad thag bzhis btab la// bzung ste nyin mtshan ma nor bzlas// kha nas drag

po'i sngags bzlas pas// rdo rje rlung lcai sbyar ba las// sngon dmar gdug pa'i ro nye'i tshogs// dur khrod sol bas dug sogs sbyar// lcags sam 'ug pa'i sgrau rtsa yis// gsang ba'i sngags dang ming rus bri// dug can nad kyi bsgrub bya la// dug lce nag pos bsdams par bsam// 'chi bdag bshan pa'i yi dwags tshogs// gtum po dug gi kha rlangs can// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pas// 'dzab cing skugs shing bzung nas ni// gshin rje gdug pa'i khang pa ru// dbang med las kyi 'jug par bsam// hriHSh+t+r-IHgdug pa'i sngags kyi mthar// hUM dang ming spel A kar Sha// dza gnyis dgug pa'i gsang sngags bzlas// ske tshe dug nyung sngags kyis brab// zla ba nag po'i mar dus tshe// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi gru gsum ste// lcags khri nag po'i steng dag tu// yi dwags gdug pa'i ga bu gzhag/ ya sogs gdug pa'i gsang sngags rnams// zhi khro rdzogs nas ga bu de// rdza mkhan sa la ga bu rgyu// gdug pa'i ga bu shang ba'i tshad// gnyis byas nang du ro nye gnyis// phyi nang gnyis su 'bur du bya// ga bu dag la 'khril pa'i tshul// me yi smin ma ga bu gnag/ gdug pa'i thod nag ga bur gzhug/ sngon dmar gnyis kyi thi gus bsdams// shar nub lho byang phyogs mtshams su// gdug pa gnas pa'i yul dag la// sgo bltas khyim nas 'dom gang du// rdo la 'jig rten gzugs bris la// sa sgo phye la khyim bdag rbad// mthun pa'i rdzas sbyin mgu bar bya// ga bu gdug pa'i sbyor ba de// legs sbas steng nas 'jig rten gzhug/ gang la bya ba'i dus dang lo// gnyen po gang shis mkhas pas dpyad// zla ba nag po'i mar dus tshe// drang srong rgyu ba'i sa phyogs su// byad stems 'khor lo'i btsan dug spyo// khyab 'jug mchod cing khyim bdag rbad// gcer bu spyi tshugs 'o dod 'bod// ma nyes dpang gzug ru dung 'bud// mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag tu// bso shing mchod cing gtad khram bya// khyab 'jug gdug pa'i dmod pa bor// yi dwags gdug pa'i smon lam gdab// nA ga gdug pa'i dmod bcol bya// rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// dkar po rdo rje rgya bsam la// sa sgo bcad la rgya yis mnan// sdom la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// g.yeng ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// phrin las rdzogs dang gsang sngags bzlas// bsgrub bya'i gzugs phung ma zhig par// gdug pa sbrul gyi sems 'dra bas// ma zhig bar du gtang mi bya// zhig ste mngon du gyur pa dang// spar zhing g.yo ba'i cho ga bya// bskyed dang spyan drang mchod bskul rnams// bsgom rgyud mdzes thun nang du'o// bla ma'i gdams ngag dam pa yang// yid la nan tan gzhag par bya// byang chub sems nyid sems la bzhag/ dam

tshig bsrung sdom mi nyams bsrung// bka' la bshad pa rjes mthun par// rdzas dang lag cha mthun bsdebs shing// rtag tu dur khrod dgon par dga'// dus dang lo tshigs dam bcas pa// mi 'da' gzhung ltar byed pa ste// mtshan ma mthong dang bzlas pa rdzogs// rgyun gyi yi dam che ba ste// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor pa// bden pa grub pa'i nus pa yod// shes rab snying rje rab ldan pa'i// dbang thob dam tshig srog ltar bsten// mi 'jigs dpa' bo brtul zhugs can// man ngag yod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rang don phran tshegs ma yin pa'i// dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod pa dang// bstan la zhe sdang gnod byed pa// bka' gsang ston pas bshad pa yi// drag po'i mngon spyod zab mo'i lung// gshin rje gshed po bdag gis kyang// thugs kyi sgrom nas bton pa 'di// 'khor lo byad stems brnag pa'i lung// man ngag can gyis de shes bya// las kyi bya ba thun tshags rnams// man ngag don gyis shes par bya// cung zad mi mthun mchod bstod rnams// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud dag las// gsang ba mdzes thun gzhung ltar bya// de la mchod pa gsungs pa ni// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// dkyil 'khor chen po yang pa yin// tshigs bcad bcu drug tha ma la// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/ 'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis// sman par dgongs te bzhes su gsol// tshig gnyis btags la dbul bar bya// bstod pa la sogs byed pa na// de bzhin rtsa ba mtshan brjod las// 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung// bdud sogs kun gyis bstod byas mthar// mtshan gyi sngags brjod bstod chen bya// sngags mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal// zhes pa nas// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// srid pa'i dra ba 'joms
