pa po// zhes bstod pa tshig rkang drug pa dang// drug cu rtsa bzhi bstod pa 'bul// yang na 'dud pa nyi shu nas// mtshan sngags brjod la bstod chung bya// yang na mdzes thun gzhung bzhin bya// bskal pa sbrul nag 'khyil ces gtad// 'khor lo byad stems gsad thabs 'di// dkon mchog gnod cing bstan pa 'jig/ mngon spyod thugs rjes bsgral ba'i phyir// mi tshig tha snyad tsam du brjod mi bya// chu srin mgrin par rin chen chud pa ltar// khong du sbas te yongs su bsgrag pa min// gshin rje gshed po'i thugs kyi yong bcud 'di// phyag na rdo rjes rab tu gzung zhing nyon// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyun las/ tshon gyi gru gu sngon dmar byad stems kyi skabs te nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// las kyi bya ba gzhan zin nas// drag po'i

'khor lo mnan pa 'di// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung// shin tu dgon pa'i gnas nyid du// dur khrod gling nas ras blangs te/ 'khor lo rim pa tshul bzhin du// mA ra ya yi ling+ga nyid// ji bzhin 'dod pa'i dbyibs su bca'// gong ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// 'khor lo thabs kyi dam rdzas de// mchod rten 'og tu gnan par bya// bdag nyid gshed por bsgom byas la// mchod rten de nyid ngo bo yang// ri rab gling bzhi chas par bsgom// ri rab lto na bzhugs pa ste// sgrol ba'i yum dang sbyor ba'i yum// shar dang nub tu gnas par bya// byang na sras mchog gnas par bsgom// de bzhin rab tu mnan cing gzir// ri rab zur bzhir laM ser bzhi// de las gling phran bcu gnyis bsam// ri rab 'og tu gzas pa po// gshin rje ral pa tshar dgu yis// lcags thag sngon pos bcings pa de// bam ril mnan nas lcags phur la// dpag bsam shing tsam btags pa ste// sgra sgrogs kha nas khrag skyugs gan bub cing// mig rtsa rig rig 'o dod 'bod// ci mdzad thong zhig zer zing mnan par bsam// 'khor lo bri ba'i dus su yang// dmigs pa'i ming dag gzhug pa ni// 'khor lo nyid la mi shong zhing// mi btub pa rnams gud du bri// de dag bris te gdags par bya// gnas dang thabs ni 'di yin te// ya la sogs pa'i yi ge lnga// gra bzhi hUM phaT bar mtshams bzhi// rtsibs kyi re'u cha bcu gnyis dang// mtha' bskor ming bris le'u tse brgyad// de dag nyi shu rtsa dgu la// gud du ming gi mjug tu yang// mA ra ya zhes bris pa'i 'khor lo gnyis// kha sbyar ba yi nang du gzhug/ 'khor lo skud pas sbrel la bzhag/ ngan sngags bzlas pa'i dus su yang// bzhi pa'i ngan sngags khri phrag 'don// de dag bton pa'i rjes la yang// yi ge bcu pa nus tshad bzlas// de tshe mchod pa 'bul ba dang// de tshe gtor ma gtong ba dang// ye shes lha la thugs dam bskul// las kyi gshin rje ma mo rnams// rak+ta gsol zhing dgug pa'i phrin las bya// 'khor lo sgreng pa'i dus su yang// gshin rje dag la gtad pa ni/ can gyi dang chas kyi yang snang/ 'di'i mchan bu 'di gang gi yin ma shes pas dpyad/ rdzas kyi mchod pa bsham pa dang// bdag nyid gshed por bsgom pa dang// 'chi bdag dgongs su gsol ba dang// rang gi las kyi ltang brtsi dang// bsgrub bya'i chad pa brtsi ba dang// gshin rje rgyal po spyan drangs nas// dam tshig phyag rgya rab bstan cing// dam tshig snying po rab tu bzlas// de bzhin dam la mi 'da' dang// dam rdzas mchod pas mnyes byed dang// las kyi phyag rgya bca' ba dang// dam tshig bskul te las kyi gnyer gtad dang// mnas bsgags rnams kyis gtad pa'i las rdzogs te// 'khor lo sba

ba'i dus su yang// gshin rje dag la gtad pa ni// drang srong dmod pa'i smon mal gdab par bya// de la mnan rdzas bsag pa ni// mi khrag ra khrag dug la sogs// pho rog 'ug pa pu shud sgro// srin bya'i snying dang 'ug pa'i mig/ btsod dang btsong yang la phug ske tshe dang// g.yer ma bra bo sga dang nas// de la sngags te mnan pa'o// spyir na gnan pa'i las byas na// gshed po'i dgongs pas gnan pa dang// phyag rgya'i stobs kyis gnan pa dang// gtad khram bcu gnyis cho gas mnan pa dang// ya stags gdug pas mnan pa dang// de dag rdzas kyis gnan pa'o// drag po'i sngags kyis gnan pa dang// smon lam gdab cing gnan pa dang// drang srong dmod pas gnan pa'o// 'di nas lho yi phyogs rol na// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong pha rol na// thod pa lcags kyi grong khyer na// yi dwags kun gyi sde dpon po// ma mo kun gyi tshogs rje mo// gson gshin gnyis kyi zam kha pa// gson po skos la 'debs pa po// shi ba rnams kyi gshin bu rje// dge ba can gyi ltang 'dzin la// sdig pa can gyi chad pa mkhan// legs nyes chos bzhin gcod pa yis// chos rgyal gshin rje zhes bya ba// mngon shes rdzu 'phrul mthur ldan pas// 'khor bcas khyed la gtad par bya// de dag rab tu mnan gyur na// de yi cho ga 'dir ma bshad// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo mnan pa'i skabs te rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan gshin rje'i gshed pos 'di skad ces brjod do// bdag don ma yin gzhan don nam// dkon mchog bla ma'i don ched du// rU tra gdug pa tshar gcad na// sngags kyi dngos grub thob nas 'grub// dper na dpa' bo skyes bu yis// g.yul ngo bzlog par 'dod pa yis// go dang mtshon la nan tan bskyed// des ni g.yul rnams bzlog par 'gyur// go mtshon mgar la rag las phyir// dpa' bos mgar la brten par bya// mgar gyis rdo la lcags su bzhu// lcags la go dang mtshon cha brdung// de nas 'thar la nan tan bskyed// til mar ngar yang yid 'thad blud// de nas brdeg thabs shes par bya// de bzhin rnal 'byor chen pos kyang// thogs mar bla ma mnyes bya'i phyir// rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// gnang bar dka' ba'i dbang yang mnos// man ngag gnang nas smyur la bsgrub// snying po don thabs lhar shes bya// drug 'bum gsum 'bum gcig 'bum dang// gzhan yang 'bum gcig shes par bya// de nas mkhas pas phrin las bya// dus dang phyogs ni mkhas pas brtag/ khri khri bar du spyi rgyug bya// phrin las dag la rnam pa gsum// 'khor lo sbyin

bsreg gnan pa'o// dang po 'khor lo'i las byas nas// de nas gnan pa'i las shes bya// tha mar me yi las bya ste// me lha bsnyen pas las rnams 'grub// dang por bsnyen pa rdzogs nas kyang// 'khor lo bskor ba'i las byas nas// gzhung las 'byung ba'i 'khor lo yi// gnan pa'i las thabs byas nas ni// ham dang bsreg pa'i las bsham pa// thab khung gru gsum brtseg pa la// rdo rje rgya gram nag po bri// gzas pa'i ling+ga gzhag par bya// de nas hom shing tsher ma can// bam po bsgred dang gru gsum brtsig/ dug chu khrag gis byug par bya// gzhan yang rak+ta'i ar+g+haM dang// sman phud til dmar 'bru bshos dang// mtshe thun lcags phye zangs phye dang// rdo phye dug chu 'bru nag po// sha chen rus pa gtub pa dang// de dag la sogs mdun du gzhag/ gos nag gyon zhing thod nag bcing// rak+sha'i phreng ba ser la kha// dpral bar me long zhig gi stan// rus sbal 'dug stangs lho phyogs blta// lcags sam mi rkang gzar bu thogs// dri chen dri chu gos dum gyis// sa la dmigs pa'i gzugs byas la// snying gar ming dang rus bcas gzhug/ gzhan yang ming yig mang po dang// mi bsad mtshon gyis ling+ga gtub// dum bu re dang ming byang re// sha chen gtub pa re spag la// brag po'i sngags kyis khros la brdeg/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ni// ting 'dzin rnam gsum tshig bshad dang// bcas pa'i phrin las gzhung bsrang bya// oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+haHsarba d+harma swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ chos rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin sbyang// de yi ngang nas nga rgyal lha// ya mAn+ta ka gsal bsgoms te// zhal drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis te// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal bar bsgom// thab khung e las 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// drag po 'bar ba'i gnas su gsal bar bsgom// yugs sa rdo nag shing nag gtsubs pa'i me// rlung g.yab nag pos g.yab pa'am// drag po sngags kyis rab tu spar// me yi nang du raM nag me yi lha// rgyan dang cha lugs nag po gsal bar bsgom// ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phro 'dus gnas nas kyang// 'od zer lcags kyus ye shes me lha de// spyan drangs gnyis su med par bzhugs par bsam// me yi lha nyid sngags 'dis spyan drangs te// oM ag+ni ha bya dzaH/ ag+n-i ka bya dzaH/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sku mdog nag po ra skyes kham pa zhon// ra la 'ja' tshon sna lnga 'khyil// zhing gi ya mgal snga ru+u la// zhing gi ma mgal phyi ru la// zhing gi bags pas sga g.yogs bgyis// sbrul nag gis ni gong rmed bgyis// phyag na dril bu bgrang phreng bsnams// dbu la me yi thod bcings shing// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// shar lho mtshams nas gnyis su med par (10)

bzhugs// de nas yang oM pra mo ha/ pra mo ha/ zhes pas me yi mdun rgyab sta zur bzhir/ pra mo ha spyan gsum phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas dang po na chu srin rgyal mtshan bsnams pa/ g.yas par ma na ye shes kyi me mgal bsnams pa/ g.yon dang po na me dar bsnams pa/ tha ma gnyer gnyis dril bu bsnams par bsgom/ bskul zhing phr-in las bcol/ bsreg rdzas dbul/ ag+ne dmar ser me yi lha/ zhes pas bstod/ dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo hom sbrel gyi skabs te rtsa gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad brjod do// e ma ho lag na rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod// dus ngan tha ma byung ba'i tshe// dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod pa'i dus// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig pa la// sngags kyi yang snying 'khrul 'khor bshad// snod dang ldan la bstan gyur na// 'dzam gling nyi ma shar ba 'dra// snod min kun la bstan gyur na// dus min bar ni srog zad skems// sngags la bye brag mang bzhugs kyang// rtsa ba'i snying po lngar 'dus te// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po dang// yon tan phrin las lnga ru 'dus// bzhi ni nye bar bsten pa dang// bsgrub dang las la sbyor la 'jug/ rgyun du grangs shing las la sbyor// las la sbyor kar 'bum phrag re'o// grangs te rtsa gnyis pa ru bshad// tha ma phrin las snying po ni// las la sbyor ba'i sngags kyang gdab// thugs kyi yang thugs nyi ma bzhi// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du gsungs// de la gsum gsum dgu ru bshad// phyi yi nyi ma bzhi pa la// yi ge 'bru brgyad g.yon du bskor// phyi yi nang ni bzhi snying dril la bskor// phyi yi gsang bar bskor ba ni// bzhi snying dril la g.yas su bskor// nang la gsum du dbye ba ni// phyi yi dus su bskor ba ni// a ko te ka bcu bdun pa'o// nang gi nang du bskor ba ni// ya ma me da bcu bdun pa// g.yon du bskor te bzlas pa'o// nang gi gsang bar bskor ba ni// ya ma me da k+She la sogs// yig 'bru bcu bdun g.yas su bskor// gsang ba'i gsum du phye ba las// phyi yi dus su bskor ba ni// bsgrub pa'i drag sngags bcu bdun pa// g.yon du bskor te bgrang ba'o// gsang ba'i nang du bskor ba ni// gsang ba'i drag sngags bcu bdun pa// g.yas su bdun bskor bgrang ba'o// gsang ba'i gsang bar grangs pa ni// rtsa ba dam tshig yang snying ni// las la sbyor ba'i dus su yang// gzhi snying dril la nub mo bzlas// A+oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka/ a mu ka/ ya ma rA dza/ a mu ka/ sa do me ya/ a mu ka/ ya me do ru/ a mu ka/ na yo da ya/ a mu ka/ ya da yo ni/ a mu ka/ ra ya k+She ya/ a mu ka/ yak+Sha yats+tsha/ a mu ka/ ni rA ma ya/ a mu ka/ oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT/ sa ma ya/

hrIHSh+t+r-IHsa ma ya/ rak+sha badzra sa ma ya/ sa ma ya/ oM a oM a hrIHma ye s+t+waM d+h+ri ma e sti/ oM wA gI shwa ri muM/ rtsa ba nyi ma shar ltar grangs/ a bya rgod gzan la bcum ltar grangs// dam tshig yi ge bcu drug la// hrIHSh+t-IHla sogs sngags rnams ni// btson bu lcags su bcug ltar grangs// bsgrub pa'i gzhi rtsa dam tshig sngags// gzhi snying gcig tu dril ba dang// dbyangs gyi yi ge li li'i tshe// skyes bu go mtshon bstar ltar drangs// nyi ma bzhi ba g.yon du nyin bdun bskor// nub dril sngags su a mu ka/ lcags kyi gzer bu btab ltar grangs// a mu ka yi tsho dgu pa// gser gyi thog chen brgyab ltar grangs// g.yas su bskor dang ka ba ye// spu gri so 'debs bzhin du grangs// gdags pa so so'i sgo yi sngags// nyin gyi las su drag sngags grangs// nub mo dril sngags ka ba ye// mtshan rtags sbyar la rab tu bsgrub// de dag don rnams man ngag sbyar// a kro te ka rgyun gyi sngags// de dag bsgrub pa'i dus su yang// mi lus phra men mgo can rab// spun dang bran khol pha ma dang// mchod rten chen por ston pa dang// me chen rtag tu 'bar ba dang// rgya mtsho dag la mi nub rnams// de dag ma byung bar du grangs// bsgrub pa'i mtshan rtags byung ba dang// sbyor ka nyi ma bzhi la 'jug/ khug pa'i mtshan rtags byung ba dang// g.yas skor gsad pa'i drag sngags dang// nub dril drag sngags las la 'jug/ rtsa ba'i lha rnams ma grub par// phrin las sngas kyang chud zos pas// lha grub nas ni las dag bya// khugs nas de dag g.yas bskor bya// de ltar byas na gdon mi za// gshin rje gshed pos gsungs pa'i don// ma khugs bar du g.yas bskor na// lha rnas dred nas las mi 'grub// khugs nas g.yas skor byed dus su// g.yon bskor byas na sngags log nas// rnal 'byor 'khor du rkyen du 'gyur// ro langs las 'di gang gi sngags 'khrugs na yang 'dug drag po'i sngags sngas na// sngags pa rang nyid 'chi bar bshad// sa ma ya dag ma bsrungs na// tshe srog bar chad dag tu 'gyur// dbang du ma 'dus rtseg log tshe// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzlas par bya// ting 'dzin zhen na slar tshur gnod// chos nyid dag la rgyab kyang gtad// ma khugs pa la khugs drag na// dred nas rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur// ldog 'dra dam tshig khugs chud na// ro khugs chen po bya bar gsungs// gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad gsungs// sngags bdun 'gyur sngags dag gi tshad ma ni// bdag gi tshad ma dag ni ting nge 'dzin// yeng yeng seng seng byed na ye mi 'grub// myos shing nyid che 'thibs pa na// sgrib pas phog pas bshags pa bya// snying 'phyo mi dga' sngags nor dang// 'bru chad ma tshang pa ru bshad// tshig tshig gsal

na theb pa yin// dga' zhing gsal na 'grub pa yin// dgra bo'i tshad ma bka' stsal pa// mi go mi gsal bying ba ni// rgyab brten yod pas myur mi 'grub// bdag pas kho dag zor mtho na// brgyab pas ma mor bskang bzlog bya// g.yag ru byung nas gsad na lo ru 'gor// ting 'dzin gsal zhing dngos byung na// lo phyed tshun chod 'grub par bshad// ting 'dzin gsal zhing 'tshig byed na// zla ba tshun chad 'chi bar bshad// de ni mi 'gyur pa yi rtags// phyi ma rnams ni yid mi brtan// g.yon gyi dril sngags dam tshig yang snying las// sngags 'di dril la bya bar bshad// rtsa ba yang snying drug po dang// 'bru dgu po na sku bskyed dang// de dag nye bar bsnyen pa'o// srog gi rtsa ba mjug sdud do// yang snying bsgrub dang las bsgrub pa'o// dbyangs dang dam tshig de kho nyid// las de gang byed mjug la gdags// sbyo 'bog lkugs pa lhog pa dang// pho lhog glang 'thab gzer nad dang// khrag skyug rims nad mdze shu dang// ltas ngan cho 'phrul thog ser dang// gso bsad dbab bcad gang byed kyang// rtsa ba dam tshig yang snying dang// dbyangs kyi yang snying mjug dag la// so so'i srog gi snying po dang// las gang byed pa'i sngags dag ni// 'bru re btags pas 'grub par bshad// phyi nas bsnyen pa rdzogs pa na// nyams su lon dang gsang rgyab dang// su yang rung ste the tshom med// bzlas pa las su rung ba dang// brdabs shing sprugs pas 'grub par bshad// ces pa gshed pos rab tu bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ sngags kyi yang snying 'khrul 'khor gyi skabs te rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas bsad pa las kyi yang snying 'di gsungs so// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba yang// 'khor lo bzhi la be con bzhi// 'khor lo brgyad la ral gri brgyad// gong ras rdo rje be con dang// ral gri la sogs dgod par bya// rdo rje dag gi rtse mo la// mA ra ya yi ming dang rus// gru gsum nang du ling+ga gzhag/ zla gam gsum la rdzas gzhag pa// nag po dag la dug thun gzhag/ dmar po dag la khrag thun gzhag/ ser po dag la nyung thun gzhag/ 'khor lo de dag kha dog kyang// grir shi'i khrag gis dmar por byug/ med na ra dkar gnya' nag gi/ khrag gis dmar por byug par bya'o// yang na ra rog glang rog gam// khyi nag snying dkar khrag gis bya// gsad pa las kyi sngags 'di bzlas// oM shri ya mAn+ta ka/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me dau ru Na yo da ya ya da yo ni/ ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta la mA ra ma hUM phaT/ oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA dza dza/ ya mAn+ta ka e ka dza ti dza dza/ tsit+ta khar rbad rbad/ ba shaM du tsit+ta gug li rbad rbad/ dgra bo nr-i

dza dza/ oM shri many+dzu ya ma rA dza be tA lI kro d+hI shwa rI/ snying kha rag sa ma ya thum ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya khrag la do ru me ya/ dgra bo'i klad pa la ha re ho re bam ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru k+Sha ya/ snying go chod sha che ge mo glo snying rtsa la mA ra ya rbad/ do ru me ya ces brdeg go/ gsad pa las kyi yang snying ni// ya da me yis gsad do// gshin rje'i bya tsa ye/ sing+ha ye/ hri ta ye/ ma mo'i/ tsit+ta ya/ bya tsa ya/ ha la ye/ yi ge 'bru dgu gsad pa'i ngan sngags 'di// yang snying gsang ba nam mkha'i thog dang 'dra// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ yang snying gsang ba'i skabs te rtsa bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad gsungs so// a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ o au/ aM aH/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ sngags kyi 'phrul 'khor man ngag la// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bshad// de la gsum gsum dgu ru bshad// phyi yi phyi ltar grangs pa ni// nyi ma dang po dag la yang// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ a mu kaM pra ma ya nr-i sha ku ru hUM phaT/ nyi ma gnyis pa dag la yang// ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ a mu kaM rak+ta tsa ra ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gsum pa dag la yang// ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ a mu kaM mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma bzhi pa dag la yang/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ de dag las kyi mtha' sdud ni// A+oM many+dzu shrI a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ka la ru pa nr-i sha ku ru ni hUM phaT/ ces bzlas te// las kyi mtha' sdud nyi ma bzhi pa'i kha skong ngo// phyi yi nang du grangs pa ni// ya ma ra dzA sa do me ya/ ya me do ru/ Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni/ ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ gzhi snying dril la g.yon du drang// phyi yi gsang bar grangs pa ni/ ya ma ra ni tsa yak+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni yo ta ya/ ya yo ni ru do me ya/ ya me do sa dza rA ma ye/ gzhi snying dril la g.yas su bskor// nang gi phyi ltar grangs pa ni// rtsa ba mi 'gyur snying po ste// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa ni// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hUM phaT/ nang gi nang du grangs pa ni// nye bar bsgrub pa zhes kyang bya// las la sbyor ba'i snying po khri yang bzlas// ya ma me da k+She ra tsa sa do ru Na yo ni ra yats+tsha ni/ nang gi gsang bar drangs pa ni// 'phye bo'i 'gros zhes bya ba dang// gsang ba'i phrin las gsad pa la/ ya ma k+She da me rA ni ts+tsha ya ra ni yo Na ru do sa dza zhes g.yas skor du grangs so// gsang ba'i phyi ltar grangs pa ni// bsgrub pa'i drag sngags 'bru bdun pa// g.yon du 'bru bdun grangs par bya// nyi ma dang po dag la yang// ya ma rA dza sa do me// ma rA dza sa do me ya/ rA dza sa do me

ya ma/ dza sa do me ya ma rA/ sa do me ya ma rA dza/ to me ya ma rA dza sa/ me ya ma rA dza sa do// nyi ma dang por khri khri bzlas// nyi ma gnyis pa dag la yang// ya me do ru Na yo da// me do ru Na yo da ya// do ru Na ya da ya me// ru Na yo da ya me do// Na yo da ya me do ru// yo da ya me do ru Na// da ya me do ru Na yo// nyi ma gnyis par khri khri bzlas// nyi ma gsum pa dag la yang// ya da yo ni ra ya k+She// da ro ni ya ya k+She ya// yo ni ra ya k+She ya da/ ni ra yak+She ya da yo// ra ya k+She ya da yo ni/ ya k+She ya da yo ni ra/ k+She ya da yo ni ra ya// nyi ma gsum par khri khri bzlas// nyi ma bzhi pa dag la yang// yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma// k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya// yats+tsha ni rA ma ya k+She/ ts+tsha nI rA ma ya k+She ya// ni rA ma ya k+She yats+tsha// rA ma yak+She yats+tsha ni/ ma yak+She yats+tsha ni rA// nyi ma bzhi par khri khri bzlas// g.yon du mgo gcod de bzhin bskor/ dang po'i nub mor grangs pa ni// ya ma me da k+She hrIHSh+t+r-IHa mu kaM che ge mo pra ma ya rbad ya/ nub gnyis pa la grangs pa ni/ rA dza sa do hrIHSh+t+r-IHa mu kaM che ge mo rak+ta tsa ra ya rbad ya/ nub gsum pa la grangs pa ni// ru Na ya ni hrIHSh+t+r-IHa mu kaM che ge mo mu+u ra tsa ya rbad ya/ nub bzhi pa la grangs pa ni// rA yats+tsha ni hrIHSh+t+r-IHa mu kaM che ge mo mA ra ya rbad ya/ gsang ba'i gsang bar grangs pa ni// gsod pa'i drag sngags bdun pa ste// g.yas su bdun skor grangs par bya// ya ma rA ni ts+tsha yak+She// ma rA ni ts+tsha ya k+She ya// rA nits+tsha yak+She ya ma ni tsa yak+She ya ma rA// ts+tsha yak+She ya ma rA ni// yak+She ya ma rA ni ts+tsha// k+She ya ma rA ni ts+tsha ya// nyi ma gnyis pa man chad la// g.yas su bskor bas steng yang gcod// gsang ba'i gsang bar grangs pa ni// nub ni dang por grangs par bya// ya ma k+She da me hrIHSh+t+r-IHka pa ye dgra bo pra ma ya rbad ya// nub gnyis pa la grangs pa ni/ rA ni tsa ya hrIHSh+t+r-IHka pa ye/ dgra bo rak+ta tsa ra ya rbad ya/ nub gsum pa la grangs pa ni// rA ni yo ni hrIHSh+t+r-IHka pa ye/ dgra bo mur tsa ya rbad ya/ nub bzhi pa la grangs pa ni// ru dos dza hrIHSh+t+r-IHka pa ye/ dgra bo mA ra ya rbad ya/ rtsa ba'i dam tshig yang snying las la sbyor/ gzhi snying gcig tu dril ba ni// gsang ba'i gsang bar grangs pa ni// drag po gnam thus zhes kyang bya// dus dang tshes dang las zad dang// bsod nams zad dang skal ba zad// yi ge zad ces bya ba'o// de ltar byas na su na su// ga na gang la byas kyang rung// ru khugs chen po zhes kyang bya// drag po sngags mchongs zhes kyang bya// bya rog khu 'phrigs zhes kyang bya// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las la 'jug/ nyi ma dang po dag la yang// tshangs pa'i mgo bcad bskor ba'i phyir// sngags dang be con phyag rgya bca'// nyi ma gnyis pa dag la yang// kha nas khrag skyugs gzhug pa'i phyir// sngags dang lus bral phyag rgya

bca'// nyi ma gsum pa dag la yang// tsit+ta gzer du gzhug pa'i phyir/ sngags dang snying gshag phyag rgya bca'// nyi ma bzhi pa dag la yang// gzugs phung brlag par bya ba'i phyir// mA ra ya nyid gdon mi za// sngags dang 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bca'// rang rang drag po'i sngags rgod la// dad pa dag la lha bsnyen pa// sku gsung thugs kyi bsnyen pas bsnyen// khugs pa'i rtags rnams byung ba dang// gzas pa dgug pa'i las byas te// nyi ma dang po dag la yang// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya// che ge mo ni A kar+Sha ya hUM dza/ nyi ma gnyis pa dag la yang// ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ che ge mo A yur+dz+nyA na A kar+Sha ya hUM dza/ nyi ma gsum pa dag la yang// ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ che ge mo tri nr-i yang nr-i ma A kar+Sha ya hUM dzA/ nyi ma bzhi pa dag la yang// yak+Sha yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ che ge mo rU pa skan+d+ha A kar+Sha ya hUM dza/ de nas dbye ba'i las bya ste// nyi ma dang po dag la yang// srog lha dag dang dbye bar bya// bya rog 'ug pa'i gung ru la// mA ra ya yi ming rus bskyon// gu gul dud pas bdug bya zhing// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya de ba shag srog gi lha dang phyis shig/ gnyis pa dag la pho lha dang// gsum pa dag la yul lha dang// bzhi pa dag la dgra lha dang// lha rnams dag la phya zhes bya'o// phyi nang gsang ba'i sngags kyis kyang// nyung dkar dag la sngags shing brdeg/ ya mAn+ta ka gsal bsgoms la// phur bu dag gis brdeg par bya// A+oM nr-i mA ra ya du ya ma snying ya ma khrag tshal pa/ baM ril dum bu dum bu gshin rje nag po de ba kuM khug dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ oM nr-i ma ra ni hri da ya na ta ki rA tsa be tA lI kro d+hI shwa rI snying mgo chod/ rtsal zhen khrag la mgo chod/ khrag la kI li kI la ya baM ril rbad// ya ma rA dza sa do me du na b+h+yo/ ya me do ru me ya/ ya da yo ni/ snying la k+She ya me/ baM ril rbad/ rab tu khros te phur pa brdeg/ gang la bya ba thogs med kyis// mthu stobs bdag pos rab tu zung// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khrul 'khor man ngag gi skabs te rtsa lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces ched du brjod do// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod// thugs kyi snying po ka bzhi gdung brgyad 'dis// ma nor bzlas na ci yang 'grub par nges// ya ma rA dza'i snying po ka ba gcig pa ni// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ myos byed 'bar ba'i snying po ka ba gnyis pa la// ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ Ar+ya ma ru'i snying po ka ba gsum pa la// ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ral pa tshar dgu'i snying po ka ba bzhi pa la// yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ de ni 'degs pa'i ka ba bzhi pa ste// tshangs pa'i mgo dang mgrin pa dang// lus dang lto ba bzhi nas 'degs// yang na yan

lag bzhi nas 'joms// gdung brgyad rlag byed 'joms pa'i las// rtsa chen brgyad dang rnam shes brgyad// de dag rim gyis 'joms par byed// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru+u Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ zhes pa ka bzhi gdung brgyad do// gdung re la yang ka chen bzhi// rtsa rlung bzhi dang rtsa chen bzhi// ka bzhi rtsa rlung bzhi yang 'joms// gdung brgyad rtsa chen brgyad kyang 'joms/ ya mAn+ta ka/ ya ma rA dza/ sa do me ya/ ya me do ru/ Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni/ ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha/ ni rA ma ya/ ya la sogs pa bcu gnyis ni// ya mAn+ta ka yab yum gnyis// phyogs skyong bcu yi snying po yin// phyi ma lha gzhan snying po ste// yig 'bru sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// 'phrul gyi yig 'bru sum cu gnyis// ya stsogs brgyad pa zhes kyang grags// tshogs brgyad 'joms pa'i phung sri ste// ye shes lha yi snying po dang// 'jigs byed lha srin kun gyi snying po ste// shin tu gsang bar gshed pos bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ ka bzhi gdung brgyad kyi skabs te rtsa drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ thugs gsang ba 'bru shag grong khyer 'di gsungs so// ya/ ma/ rA/ dza/ sa/ da/ me/ ya/ ya/ me/ do/ ru/ Na/ yo/ da/ ya/ ya/ da/ yo/ ni/ ra/ ya/ k+She/ ya/ ya/ k+She/ ya/ ts+tsha/ ni/ rA/ ma/ ya/ ya/ ma/ rA/ dza/ sa/ do/ me/ ya/ ya/ me/ do/ ru/ Na/ yo/ da/ ya/ ya/ da/ yo/ ni/ ra/ ya/ k+She/ ya/ ya/ k+She/ ya/ ts+tsha/ ni/ rA/ ma/ ya/ ya/ ma/ rA/ dza/ sa/ do/ me/ ya/ ya/ me/ do/ ru/ Na/ yo/ da/ ya/ ya/ da/ yo/ ni/ ra/ ya/ k+She/ ya/ ya/ k+She/ ya/ ts+tsha/ ni/ rA/ ma/ ya/ yi ge gshin rje'i 'bru shag ste// yi ge gshin rje'i 'bru shag yin// rdo rje 'dzin pas rab tu zung// 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'bru shag grong khyer gyi skabs te rtsa bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// ngas gsungs pa la sems thud cig/ lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// bstan pa 'dzin skyong bsrung dang gsum// bstan pa bshigs pa'i dgra de la// drag po las kyi mthar bya ba// dus ni rang byung dgra la bya// dus dang khams dang gyur pa dang// rang byung don de bzhi ru 'dod// de la bskul ba rnam bzhi bya// rdzas dang sngags dang ting 'dzin dang// bskul ba'i don de bzhi ru 'dod// de yi sngon du bsnyen bsgrub bya// bsnyen bsgrub song nas bskul ba ni// 'khor lo dang ni ling+ga dang// nyi ma dang ni gshin rje dang// gsang sngags dang ni ting 'dzin dag dang drug/ 'khor lo la yang rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba gsum

du 'dus// 'khor lo de dag re re la// bri dang sgra dang las dang ni// rang gi ngo bo dag dang lnga'o// de bzhin ling+ga dag la gsum// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// ling+ga de dag re re la// rgyu dang bca' dang sgra dang las// rang gi ngo bo dag dang lnga'o// de bzhin sngags la rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// de bzhin drag sngags re re la// rgyu dang btu dang las sngags dang// bzlas dang nga ro sgra dang las// nyi ma la yang rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// nyi ma de dag re re la// rang gi ngo bo rgyu dang gnas// sgra dang las de rnam pa lnga'o// gshin rje la yang rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// gshin rje de dag re re la// rang gi ngo bo rgyu dang sgra// gnas dang las te lnga ru bstan// gshin rje de dag gnas pas na// gshin rje'i grong khyer zhes kyang bya// grong khyer de ru sems can kun// khri dang dgug dang gnas pas na// srid pa gsum gyi gnas sa yin// ting nge 'dzin la rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// gsum po de dag re re la/ byin brlab bzlas pa ting 'dzin dang// ngo bo rgyu dang las dang sgra// de dag rnam pa drug tu 'dod// pho dang mo yi mtshan nyid kyang// g.yas dang g.yon gyi bye brag gis// 'gro ba'i chos bzhin gcod par byed// drag po'i ngan sngags phung byed 'di// gshin rje gshed pos rab tu bsngags// rdo rje 'dzin pas rab tu zung// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ nag po gsal byed sgron ma'i skabs te rtsa brgyad pa'o//// gshin rje gshed kyis gsungs pa'i don// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// gsang bar brgyud du brnag pa'i lung// don gnyis dag tu shes par bya// bsnyen bsgrub dang ni phrin las so// bsnyen pa la yang rnam gnyis te// sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga ste// bsod nams bsag par bstan pa dang// bsnyen pa dngos nyid bstan pa'o// thabs dang dgos pa rnam gnyis kyis// bsod nams bsags pa'i cho gar 'dod// ngo bo dbye ba nges pa'i tshig/ dgos ched rnam pa bzhi yin no// bsnyen pa'i dbye ba bstan pa yin// bsgrub pa la yang bcu gnyis te// gnas dang brtul zhugs mtshan ma gzhag/ mchod rdzas gzhag dang dngos grub rten// dam tshig ting 'dzin 'phro 'du dang// grub pa'i rtags dang blang ba'i thabs// bar du gcod pa'i bgegs dang ni// sgrub pa'i dus dang spogs pa'i thabs// spogs pa chen po'i cho ga ste// drag shul ting 'dzin bcu gnyis kyis// dngos grub blang ba'i cho gar 'dod// phrin las dag la rnam gsum ste// 'khor lo bskor dang gnan bsreg pa'o// dus dang gang zag bskor ba'i gnas// ngo bo dbye ba nges pa'i tshig/ 'khor lo rgyu rkyen

mthun pa'i dpe// sgrub byed grogs dang ma grub skyon// grub pa'i thabs dang spogs pa'i thabs// dbye ba bcu gsum ma yi ngag/ ces gshin rje gshed pos rab tu brjod// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ las kyi mdo byang gi skabs te rtsa dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dus tshod mtshon cha rnon po la// rdo rje slob dpon sku dgra sogs// the tshom med par bsgral bas 'grub// phag sbrul ston dpyid ra ba la// byi ba rta ni ston dpyid 'bring// ston dpyid tha chung glang lug la'o// stag sprel dbyar dgun ra bar shes// dbyar dgun 'bring po bya yos la'o// khyi 'brug dbyar dgun tha mar 'grub// de ni lo gshed zla ba'i keg par nyi ma'i gshed gnyis te// dbyar rlung 'jug cing dgun rlung 'byung// de yi dus su gsad pa shis// zhag gi gshed du gyur pa yang// ra ba bzhi la bcu bzhi shis// 'bring po bzhi yi bco lnga la// tha chung bzhi yi bcu drug go/ tshes bzhi brgyad dang bcu gcig dang// bco lnga bco brgyad nyi shu gnyis// nyi shu lnga dang nyi shu dgu/ dus ni srod dang snga dro dang// 'jing dang nam gung gung chung dang// nyi myur skya rengs shar ba dang// nyin mtshan zhag gi go rim bzhin// de phyir ma gshin 'tshol phyir rgyu// btsal nas gsad pa'i dus bstan pa// dpyid ra tshes bdun dag la shis// 'bring po bcu bdun dag la shis// tha chung nyi shu bdun la shis// dbyar ra tshes brgyad 'bring po ni// bco brgyad tha chung nyi shu brgyad// ston ra tshes dgu 'bring po ni// bcu dgu tha chung nyi shu dgu/ dgun zla gsum yang de bzhin te// dus su gsad pa'i las la 'jug/ sa yi khams sa dpyid zla gsum/ shing gi dbyar zla ston zla me/ dgun ni lcags khams 'chi ba'i dus// de dus zhag gshed rgyu bar bya// ra ba bzhi ni rta la dang yang gcod// tha chung dus su 'bring ra chung yang bzhi ste// tha chung khra la brdeg par bya// dgun gsum skar ma gsum 'char te// skar ma'i gshed kyi dus su ni// sbyor ba thams cad rab na yang// khrag thun la sogs zor rnams shis// lo zla zhag gi dus bstan nas// dus tshod rnon po bstan par bya// sems can yid ni gnyid log pas// de dus rgyu zhing 'khyam pa'i tshe// kun kyang rnam rtog las byung bas// sbyor ba'i stobs bskyed gsad par shis// sha ba srod dang nam phyed na// lug dang gnyan gyi bla yang rgyu// phag pa tho rangs bya nyid ni// nyi ma zer la rgyu bar bshad// ra bla nyi ma nub ka ste// bya bla nyi ma zer la rgyu// g.yag dang glang bla srod la rgyu// rta bla nyi ma gung la rgyu// de dag dgug cing gsad par shis// thun mong bsgral ba'i thabs su gsungs// dngos po gcig kyang 'gyur

ba'i tshe// 'gyur ba'i bla dang sbyar te bya'o// khams kyi gshed du bstan pa ni// sgrub pa po dang lo zla dang// dus tshod kyis ni gsod par byed// keg ni gshed po glang dang lug/ lo dgra bya dang sprel nyid de// dgun zla dbyar zla tha chung gnyis// dus tshod nyin phyed nam phyed yol// ha la sman gyis gsod 'gyur na// bsgrub pa'i sbyor bas smos ci dgos// khyi 'brug ji yi gshed po ste// phag dang byi ba lo dgra nyid// mi mthun bdun zur the tshom med// zla gshed ston dpyid tha chung ste// zla ba'i bdun zur rdo rjes gcod// tho rangs srod la gsod par byed// bsam ngan tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur na// sbyor bas bdun rgyud the tshom med// gung la khyi 'brug shing khams pa// shing dang kha dog 'dra ba ste// gsod pa'i las la the tshom med// stag dang yos bu dar ba dgra// bdun zur gshed du gyur pa ste// tshangs pa'i me bzhin gsod par byed// zla gshed srog dang mi mthun pa'i// bdun zur gsod de the tshom med// dus tshod nam phyed dus la shes// shang gi khams te gshed chen po// shang gi gshed dang 'u yi tshig thog ma chad/ 'dus pa sa yi khams la gcod// lo dgra glang lug gnyis kyis te// mi mthun bdun zur shin tu 'joms// dus tshod mtshan ma rang sar shis// de nas mthun 'phrod bshad pa ni// bzang zhing 'grub par bya ba'i las// bdud rgyal nyi ma bdun po la// drag sngags tshogs kyis cham la dbab// nyi ma gru sogs bre ru 'byor// bi rdzi bya gzhus zla bar 'byor// mig dmar khrums smad la ro sman// gza' lhag sgrog dang smin drug 'dzom// phur bu rgyal stod rgyal smad mthun// pa sangs bya gzhug rta chung nyid// spen pa sa ri sa ga ste// de ltar mthun sbyor dus su ni// ngan pa'i las kyang 'byung 'gyur bas// de phyir bzang po'i las la 'jug/ bdud kyi nyi ma bshad pa ni// nyi ma lag sor bya cha spyad kyang skyor gsum// zla ba rgyal smad bre ru gsod// mig dmar bre dang sgrog gis te// gza' lhag dbyug pa nyid kyis 'jig/ phur bu mgo ru 'byor bas 'jig/ pa sangs wa dang lag sor gsum// spen pa bya ma bdud kyi nyi// bzang po'i las kyis gsod 'gyur na// ngan pa'i las kyis smos ci dgos// mi 'phrod bdun du bshad pa ni// nyi ma khrums smad zla ba dang// sa ga mi 'phrod mig dmar dang// lag tu mi 'phrod gza' lhag dang// gru sog mi 'phrod phur bu sgrog/ pa wa sangs dang bre mi 'phrod// spen pa dag ni khrums stod dang// de lta'i mi 'phrod bdun po la// phan gdags las ni gcig mi 'grub// nyi ma dang ni sa ga 'jig/ zla ba dang ni bi rdzi ste// mig dmar sgrog tu 'jig par bstan// gza' lhag byi'u 'jig pa ste// phur bu la ni be'u rdzi 'jig/ pa wa sangs

la bya gzhug 'jig/ spen pa la ni bya ma 'jig/ mi 'phrod bdun dang 'jig pa bdun// bdun kye nyi mar gsad pa shis// 'tsho byed yul lhas skyob pa ni// g.yag dkar mi dkar tshul gyis 'gegs// bud med rtug pa bsreg nas kyang// 'chi bdag rnams kyi bla rkun bzlas// zhang blon bzang po lta bu ni// pho lhas 'ges pas de dus su// glang rog ra bsreg gong bzhin bya// khra'am spyang ki lta bus skyob// dgra bla yin te gsur chen btang// khyi lud bsreg pas 'bros par byed// bud med sha ba lta bu ni// ma lha ma sman 'go ba ste// ra dang rta sbangs tal nag bsreg/ ting 'dzin mi gsal bying rmugs na// pho lhas 'geg pa yin par brjod// til nag nyung nag gu gul ni// sbyar mas bsreg na 'bros par byed// ma 'phrod dbye ba'i thabs bstan pa// bya rog 'ug pa'i gung ru la// gro gar a dang shog shog nr-i// go rim bzhin du glan bar bya// yug sa mo yi rkang dreg dang// 'bog dang glang rog ra khrag sogs// sme ba'i dud pas dus gsum bdug/ 'di ni dbye ba'i mchog tu gsungs// nag po gsal byed sgron ma las// bya thabs nyams len nying khu 'di// rang byung dgra la bya ba'i dus su gsungs// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ bya thabs nyams len nying khu'i skabs te sum cu pa'o//// de nas 'jam dbyangs khro bos phyogs skyong gshin rje las la skul ba 'di gsungs so// bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa'i// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// steng phyogs gshin rje nag 'joms ni// nag po g.yas na dgra s+t+wa bsnams// chibs su lkugs pa lug la chibs// khro mo srin mo mgo 'phyang ma// nag mo chen mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la bskul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya/ dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// steng phyogs gshin rje phya sangs ni// dkar po lag na bum pa thogs// chibs su ban glang dkar po chibs// khro mo kham rgya mthu mo che// nag mo mgo 'phyangs ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma

ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// shar phyogs kong tse brag gyon ni// dkar po tshe srog bum pa bsnams// chibs su dri za sgeg pa bcibs// brag srin nag po mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mo dkar mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// shar lho a ba glang mgo can// smug nag tri shUl rtsa gsum thogs// chibs su 'gugs byed dre'u la chibs// mi bzad bdud mo mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mo smug nag ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// lho phyogs gshin rje ya ba ti// sngo nag gsod byad dgra s+t+wa bsnams// chibs su gshin rje sgeg pa chibs// mtshan mo nag mo mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mo dred kyi ab sham can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya/ dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// lho nub gshin rje mig dmar ni// dmar po gcod byed ral gri bsnams// chibs su smyo byed sha ba chibs// byi ling chen mo mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mo dmar mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// nub phyogs gshin rje rmig pa ni// smug nag dbang sdud

zhags pa thogs// chibs su klu brgyad sgeg pa chibs// bdud mo chen mo mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mo smug nag ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// nub byang gshin rje til pa ni// nag po 'byed pa'i dbyug to bsnams// chibs su rta nag ma he chibs// gza' srid nag mo mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mo nag pa ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stabs// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// byang phyogs gshin rje lha mchog ni// ser po bum pa rgya gram bsnams// chibs su rgyas pa'i rta la chibs// klu srin nag mo mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mo ser nag ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod/ dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// byang shar chos kyi rgyal po ni// dmar po thod pa mda' gzhu bsnams// chibs su skrod byed rnga mo chibs// nam gru chen mo mgo 'phyangs ma/ khro mo dmar mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di longs la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// 'og phyogs ral pa tshar dgu ni// smug nag lcags kyu ri rab bsnams// chibs su ma he sngo nag chibs// lha mo nag mo mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mo smug nag ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi

gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di longs la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// 'og phyogs gshin rje thod dbyug ni// nag po lag na tho ba bsnams// chibs su sa bdag sgeg pa chibs// sa bdag stong khyab mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mo nag mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di longs la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// ces bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'khor rnams las la bskul te// so so'i gshed bskos so// 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ phyogs skyong gi gshed bsko ba'i skabs te so gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ nyin bzhi'i lha'i ging bzhi la phrin las bcol ba 'di gsungs so// rA dza ha la 'khor lo'i lha// 'khor lo nag po mA ra'i bdud// dug gi mtshon cha sngags kyi them// rdzas kyi sbyor ba thabs kyi ngag/ bsnyen pa bya ba gsang ba'i thabs// hrIHSh+t+r-IHsbyor ka ma yi dag/ 'khor lo bskor ba man ngag gter// zla gsang nag po gces pa'i grogs// bar bar spyi rgyud thabs kyis phul// dmar nag khram bdag man ngag thabs// gshed po bdud kyi man ngag gter// las grub gnan pa rang gi snying// drang srong dmod pa phyogs med grogs// de bzhin spyi rgyud thabs kyi phul// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa// nyin bzhi lha yi ging bzhi bskul// hUM/ nyi ma dang po'i rtsis byed ging// bra ma rA dza srin po ste// bar snang khams la yid kyis rgyu// gsang bar dbang bskur ging gi bdag/ stag zhu stag ral sku la mnab// phyag na sho rdel rtsis byed ging// bdag gis ma nyes 'di yis nyes// sho rdel nag po'i rtsis su chug/ srog chod snying phyung smyo 'bog thongs// gtad do ma btang sho ra re// nyi ma gnyis pa'i rtsis byed ging// ya ma rA dza gshin rje'i ging// zhal bgrad mche gtsigs kha dog nag/ thod sbrul g.yang gzhi sku la gsol// ba glang chu sbrul yang nag po chibs su chibs// phyag na sho rdel rtsis byed ging// bdag gis ma nyes 'di yis nyes// sho rdel nag po'i rtsis su chug/ srog

chod snying phyung smyo 'bog thongs// gtad do ma btang sho ra re// nyi ma gsum pa'i rtsis byed ging// da sha grI ba bdud kyi ging// nag po sha zan sha zhu can// nag po snying dkar chibs su chibs// mi sha za zhing snying khrag 'thung// dug mda' 'phen zhing mi sha za// rta nag zhon pa 'bum khrir bcas// phyag na dkar nag rtsis byed ging// bdag gis ma nyes kho yis nyes// sho rdel dkar nag rtsis su chug/ srog chod snying phyung smyo 'bog thongs// gtad do ma btang sho ra re// nyi ma bzhi pa'i rtsis byed ging// yak+sha rA dza gnod sbyin ging// zhon pa gza' rta nag po zhon// zab slag nag po sku la gsol// bdud zhags nag po dgra la 'debs// dbu la dom zhu nag po gsol// phyag na dkar nag rtsis byed ging// bdag gis ma nyes kho yis nyes// sho rdel nag po rtsis su chug/ srog chod snying phyung smyo 'bog thongs// gtad do ma btang sho ra re// bdud tri rbad thum ri li li// ya tri rbad thuM ri li li// d+ha sha grI ba rbad thuM ri li li/ yak+sha rbad thuM ri li li/ zhes ni rab tu sho rdel bgrang ngo// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ nyin bzhi lha'i ging bzhi la phrin las bcol ba'i skabs te so gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'jigs byed chen po la 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis shin tu dgyes pa'i yi rang nas/ mgrin gcig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod do// hUM gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha// nyi ma 'bum las lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod// phyag mtshan mang po bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i sku+u la mu dbang rab brgyan cing// gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags rlon na bzar gsol// mi mgo thod rlon phreng bas sku+u la brgyan// brkyang bskum tshul gyis gshin rje zhabs kyis gnon// mi bsad khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug hUM sgra can// phaT kyis khams gsum sngangs mdzad zhal drug gdangs// sha za'i mgo bcad dbu yi thod du bcings// spyan bzlog tsam gyis bdud kyi ser chen 'bebs// ljags 'gril tshems kyi rtse nas rdo rje thog chen rab 'bebs shing// 'khor gyi ma mo rnams ni 'dar zhing 'dud// de bas lha klu gnod sbyin gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rkan sgra gtogs pas lha chen khyab 'jug kyang// bub 'gyel bcas pas khrab skyug nyid la 'dud// stong khams mid par byed pa'i zhal gdangs shing// khro gtum tsham rngams chen po bstan pas kyang// tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rngul gyi thigs 'dzag cing// nad gtong srin mo'i tshogs rnams 'dar zhing 'dud// rgyu phreng khrag dang bcas pa'i zhags thogs nas// phyag na tri shUl mi mgo rab bsnams shing// dngos grub dur khrod yin nam (11)

mchog gi klad khrag zhal du gsol// khyung dang 'ug pa lta bu'i khra bsnams shing// dam las ldog pa ngag la gtong bar byed// gnod sbyin mi srun phreng bas sku la brgyan// rdo rje brjid pa'i stangs stabs gar byas pas// dur khrod chen por mtshan mor rab rgyu ba'i// ro langs mgo bcad so yis chem chem bza'// ngo mthong tsam gyis dma' 'bab zhabs la gtug/ yon tan bye bas brgyan pa'i lha khyod la// blta bas bzod por dka' yang bdag 'dud na// gdug pa'i sems kyis bdag dang bdag gi 'khor du gtogs pa la// gnod par byed pa'i mi dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs// zung zhig non cig sgrol mdzod gshin rje gshed// yun gyi lhar yang khyod la gsol 'debs na// ri rab gser gyi ngos la bya gnas pa// bya yi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang// thams cad khyed kyi skur ni bdag bsgom pas// bdag gi rang bzhin bor nas khro bor gsal// lha mchog khyod la yi dam sus brten pa// mi yi tha mal rnams kyang mchog tu gyur// de bas 'di dang pha rol gnyis ka ru// srog gi phyir yang lha khyod mi gtang na// byams pa'i zhal bzang bdag la bstan pa dang// thugs rje'i spyan gyis bdag la gzigs su gsol// khyed ltar bdag gyur de phyir bstod phyag 'tshal// yun ring gong nas lha khyod bdag bsgrubs na// khyed kyis dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// kA la rU pa che ge mo b+ha ga hrIHSh+t+r-IHna hUM phaT/ gang dag gshin rje gshed po yis// de las be con phyag rgyar gsal// 'di ni phyag rgya'i srog mchog pas// yang dag bstan pa yang dag gsal// phyag rgya bcings par gyur pa 'di// khro bo'i snying por bsngags par byed// mtshon cha mi lus pa yi gtso// bdud dang dgra bgegs zhi bar byed// na mo bud+d+ha d+harma sang g+he b+h+yaH/ oM sarba ta thA ga to ti byi dzA ya/ ag ne dz+wa la ni hrIHSh+t+r-IHhUM phaT/ ces 'khor rnams kyis rab tu bstod do// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ gtum chen la bstod pa'i skabs te so gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po la 'khor rnams kyis rang rang gi dgyes pa'i bstod pa phul nas mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje dang/ stong gsum mun par gtong ba rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// he he dpa' bo yab gcig mchog/ 'jigs byed chen po gshin rje gshed// dpa' bo'i 'khor du 'dus 'khor 'dud// gshed pos bskos pa'i bka' rnams nyan// bdag cag 'khor gyi bdud po rnams// phyin ci log rnams 'dul slad du// tshul bzhin bsgrub na ji ltar bsgrub// rdzas dang yo byad gang la brten// las la gtad na ji ltar gtad// log pa'i sbyor ba ci

ltar bya// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsol 'dud// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ shin tu rngam pa'i sgra 'brug stong ldir ba tsam dus gcig la bsgrags nas/ bdud kyi tshogs thams cad dbang du bsdus zil gyis mnan nas// 'di skad ces brjod do// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// nag po bdud kyi tshogs rnams kun// phyin ci log rnams gdul slad du// bya ba'i las dang bsgrub pa dang// bsten pa'i thabs dang bskul ba'i thabs// mi mthun sbyor bas gsod 'don na// ngas bshad pa la sems thud cig/ ces brjod do// de nas bcom ldan gshed chen pos// phrin las myur du bya ba'i phyir// bdud kyi sgrub thabs 'di gsungs so// thog mar dang ba'i dad pa rab tu gces// bka' yi gnas sam dga' ba'i gnas dag tu// dbang thob bya phyir bla ma mnyes bya zhing// dkyil 'khor bris nas dam tshig dbang dag nod// dgos pa bsgrub phyir man ngag thob par bya// man ngag thob nas bsnyen bsgrub mtha' ru dbyung// bsnyen pa bya phyir mthun rdzas 'bad de bsag/ lung gi gnas su sa yi dkyil 'khor bya// 'dom gang gru bzhi dug khrag chag chag gdab// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gru gsum zla gam gsum// gru chad sgo bzhi lcags ri lugs bzhin bya// thod pa'i phreng ba rdo rje ra ba gur// bskal pa'i me ri smug nag rlung 'tshubs ldang// gru gsum dbus su gshin rje gshed po ste// zla gam gsum la yum gnyis sras dang gsum// seng ldeng la sogs mchog gi phur pa dgod// yab yum mnga' gsol dbang bskur byin brlab bo// lcags phur la sogs mchog gi phur pa bcu// khram thog bdud po bcu ru mnga' gsol la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dag la dgod par bya// dar nag cod pan rim gyis dbang bskur gdags// steng du 'bar ba ya chen te// shar du rol po ral can no// lho ru khrams bdag srog bdud ste// zla bdud yor po zhags can nub// byad du srog bdud sta re can// shar lho khram bdag thog po rje// lho nub bar btsan gri bo rje// nub byang se 'dzin sdings pa rje// byang shar ro langs nag po rje// 'og tu 'bar ba nag po rje// sgo bzhir bka' nyan ging chen bzhi// rtsang bzhi dag la dbang bskur dgod// mthun pa'i rdzas dang mchod rdzas dang// mi sha rta sha'i gtor ma ru// rus pa sna tshogs brgyan byas la// gshed po yab yum sras la gzhag/ bya nag rta nag lug nag snying// khyi nag phag pa rog po'i snying// g.yag nag glang dang ra rgod snying// sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang// mi shas brgyan la zangs bu gang// bdud po bcu la dgod par bya// sha sna khrag sna'i gtor ma la// spyan gzigs dkor chas brgyan pa bzhi// sgo bzhir

ging chen bzhi la gzhag/ sman dang rak+tar sbyar ba yis// snang srid srog la bdud dbang bskur// mi gsur rta gsur rgyun du gtang// rgyal mtshan chen po bzhi yang gzug/ dar nag gur phub khyi nag g.yang bzhi brdab// lug nag 'ben bca' ra rog dmigs pa'i rten// skyer pa stag pa la sogs dag pa yang// mgo mjug ma nor bzhogs la khram shing bya// drag po'i sngags bzlas rim par khram la gdab// yi dwags gos la 'khor lo bris byas te// dug dang thod pa mkhas pas bri bar bya// gzi brjid 'phags pa 'jam dpal yab yum dang// bka' nyan nyi ma bzhi pa'i lha bsgrub mchod// khram thogs bdud rnams las la bskul phyir rbad// thod pa mtshan ngan ra rog khrag blugs la// rang srog ming bris thod pa'i nang du'o// dpral bar mthongs bzhag re bas gril byas la// khram gyis dkrug cing khram sngags bzlas par bya// oM dgra bo ni tsi dum mug/ khram thor tha che ge mo mA ra ya gug ling swA hA/ zhes bzlas shing khram gyis skabs su dkrug dgug kyang/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum gsal bsgom la// dbang chen 'byung ba rim brtsegs la// b+h+rU~M las 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud ldan// gru chad bar khyams mu khyud ldan// shar phyogs rus pa'i gzhal yas khang// lho phyogs me yi gzhal yas khang// nub phyogs khrag gi gzhal yas khang// byang phyogs dbus kyi gzhal yas khang// dbus su ya ma chen po ste// gshin rje ma he bsnol ba'i gdan// hUM las bshed po'i skur gyur te// stang zil mdog 'dra gnag la 'tsher// stag lpags gang chen sbrul nag chun po dang// thod pa la sogs dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// zhal drug bcu gnyis phyag dang ldan par bsgom/ g.yas g.yon yum dang mdun du sras mchog ste// rgyan dang cha lugs phyag mtshan gsal bar bsgom// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad steng du nr-i bsam ste// nr-i las dgra bgegs bsnol ba'i gdan du bsam// de steng ya bcu gdan steng 'od dang zer 'phro ba// sgro bsdus ya las khram thogs bdud po bcu// steng gi bdud po 'bar ba ya chen ni// g.yu 'brug gzhon pa glog gi zhags thogs bsgom// shar gyi bdud po rol po ral pa can// rnga mo zhon nas ral gri thogs pa bskyed// lho phyogs khram bdag srog bdud mche ba can// bdud sha zhon nas zhags pa thogs pa bskyed// nub tu zla bdud yor po zhags pa can// 'brong bu zhon nas gnam lcags phur thogs bskyed// byang du srog bdud gser gyi sta re can/ khyung chen zhon nas sta re thogs pa bskyed// shar lhor khram bdag gnam btsan thog po rje// rta la zhon nas gnam lcags 'phen pa bskyed// lho nub khram bdag par btsan ri bo

rje// rlung lha zhon nas rlung nag g.yab 'debs bskyed// nub byang khram bdag se 'dzin sdings pa rje// phag pa rtar zhon khram shing thogs pa bskyed// byang shar khram bdag ro langs nag po rje// chu glang zhon nas sta re thogs pa bskyed// 'og phyogs nag po yab rje khrag 'thung ni// stag dmar zhon nas sprul dmar zhags thogs bskyed// re re'i 'khor na bdud kyang bsam yas te// rang bzhin gnas nas 'khor bcas spyan drangs pas// grub pa'i gnas su de 'dra byon par bsam// sgo bzhir nyin bzhi lha yi ging bzhi yang// bka' nyan byed pa'i 'gugs byed dza las bskyed// de ltar bskyed pa'i bdud po de rnams kyis// bstan pa bshig cing sku la brdo ba rnams// zhags pas bcings shing la las khram la 'debs// la las mtshon 'debs la las thun du 'dzud// gan bub rngul nag 'thib cing khrag tu skyugs// mig rtsa rib rib 'o dod tsor tsor 'bod// ci mdzad thong thong zer zhing gsod par bsgom// ting nge 'dzin gyis de ltar gsal bskyed la// drag sngags 'di bzlas bdud rnams myur bar bskul// ru tra pa tra mu khrag tsa ra pa te po ra pa dun hab swA hA// khri'am 'bum na bdud rnams mngon du byon// mon dang btsun pa skad rigs mi mthun pa// ldab ldib smra zhing las la mngon du byon// gtum chen bstod la bdud rnams las la bskul// hUM/ bskal pa snyigs ma'i lnga brgya la// khro rgyal gshin rje'i spyan sngar dam bcas pa// mi bzad chen po srog bdag kun 'dul byed// 'jam dpal gshin rjes dmar gyi ar+g+ha dang// bdud rtsi dmar gyi dam rdzas dam pa 'di// khram thogs bdud la byin nas dbang bskur bas// bdud 'khor yongs kyis sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung// lus kyi dam tshig a ra yaM// ngag gi dam tshig ni ra yaM// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// steng phyogs bdud kyi gzhal yas nas// 'bar ba ya chen bla med ni// g.yu 'brug sngon po'i rta la zhon// lag na glog dmar thog zhags thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad// dug mug khram tor ta rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya 'di rnams la gug kyang 'dug khug ling swA hA/ zhes brjod cing khram la rim gyis gdab// rak+ta sbrengs shing bdud rnams las la rbad// mun nag 'thibs pa'i gzhal yas nas// nag po yab rje khrag 'thung ni// stag chen dmar po'i rta la zhon// lag na sbrul dmar zhags pa thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad/ dug mug khram tor ta rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya

khug ling swA hA// shar phyogs rus pa'i gzhal yas nas// shar bdud rol po ral pa can// phung sring rnga mo glog 'gyu zhon// lag na gnam lcags ral gri bsnams// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// dud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad// dug mug khram tor ta rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya khug ling swA hA/ lho phyogs me yi gzhal yas nas// khram bdag srog bdud mche ba can// bdud sha nag po ru bcu chibs// lag na 'dzin byed zhags pa bsnams// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad// dug mug khram tor ta rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya khug ling swA hA// nub phyogs khrag gi gzhal yas nas// zla bdud yor po zhags pa can// 'brang bu nag po rta ru zhon// lag na gnam lcags phur bu 'debs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad// dug mug khra ma tor ta rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya khug ling swA hA// byang phyogs dbugs kyi gzhal yas nas// srog bdud gser gyi s+t+wa re can// chibs su khyung chen dar ma chibs// lag na gser gyi s+t+wa re bsnams// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes bu dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad// dug mug khram tor ta rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya khug ling swA hA// khram bdag gnam btsan thog po rje// chibs su bdud kyi rta la chibs// sku las gnam lcags thog 'phen pa// sku las 'od zer 'phro ba 'khrugs// ched 'ga' sprul pa'i tshogs// 'brug ser chems se chem// glog dmar ljibs se ljib// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad// dug mug khram tor ta rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya khug ling swA hA/ khram bdag bar btsan gri bo rje// chibs su rlung sha'i rta la chibs// phyag na rlung nag g.yab kyis 'debs// stong khams ma lus rlung la bskur// ched 'ga' sprul pa'i tshe// grang rngabs rta ru zhon// skyib ser bun ne bun se rig bse rig 'dra min yang// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu me yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// khram sngags bzlas shing rak+ta sbreng// khram bdag se 'dzin sdings pa rje// chibs su dur phag rta ru chibs// 'khor du bse dregs 'khor dang bcas// lag na khram nag khram shing thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la

ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya/ bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob/ khram sngags bzlas shing rak+ta sbreng// khram bdag ro langs nag po rje// chu glang nag po'i rta ru zhon// lag na gnam lcags s+t+wa re thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya/ skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad// dug mug khram gtor ta rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya khug ling swA hA/ gshin rje nag po'i dus la bab// 'bar ba nag po'i dus la bab// sha za nag po'i dus la bab/ nag po rkya gsum dus la bab// rol po rkya gsum dus la bab// spyang sngon 'bar ba'i dus la bab// rgya bo mig bzhi'i dus la bab// ces pas rbad cing khram la gdab// rak+ta sbrengs zhing phrin las bcol// nyung dkar nyung nag dug khrag la// drag sngags 'di yis brdeg par bya// ru tsa pa tsa thun khrag/ shri khri ma ma ro thun khrag/ mi sha ro la thun khrag/ khrag to rA dza thun khrag/ stong ska ku ba thun khrag/ ma ku sa ra thun khrag/ che ge mo mA ra la thun khrag/ ces ni rab tu khros pas brdeg/ gtad pa'i las su bya ba yang// khram dang 'khor lo thod par brub// chu mig nub tu bstan par gtad// gtor ma gtang zhing smon lam gdab// bsad pa nyin bzhi'i ging bzhi ste/ 'phang ba dug khrag thun khrag 'phang// bsreg pa khram shing thod pa ste/ tsher ma can gyis shing btus la// grog po phug rdug phyin la bsreg/ mnan pa khor lo chu mig mgor// nag po klu yi lag tu gtad/ gdab pa rang rang phur bas so// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ stong gsum mun par gtong ba'i bdud phyi ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te so bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ stong gsum mun par gtong ba bdud nang ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dang po dang ba'i dad pa rab tu bskyed// bka' yi gnas sam dga' ba'i gnas dag tu/ sa bdag lha klu zhi bar rab byas te/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ mthing nag gru gsum zla gam gsum gyis bskor// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gru chad sgo bzhir ldan// mthing nag dbus su ya mAn+ta ka dgod/ zla gam gsum la yum gnyis sras dang gsum// 'khor lo brgyad la bdud kyi rgyal po brgyad// bar khyams dmar po bdud kyi lcam mo brgyad// sgo bzhir bdud kyi yang khol bzhi// lho nub mtshams su grir shi'i g.yang gzhi gzug/ nub byang mtshams su spyang ki'i g.yang gzhi gzug/ byang shar mtshams su bya rgod g.yang gzhi gzug/ shar lho mtshams su lug nag g.yang gzhi gzug/ dbus su khyi nag dar nag zhing gi gur// phyi rim bong rgya nag po dag gis

bskor// lha rnams grangs dang mnyam pa'i phur pa dgod// dbus su yab yum gtor ma gzhag bya ba/ bse gab mon thod 'khar gzhong la sogs su// mi sha rta sha'i gtor ma bshams// lho nub mtshams su rje rigs thod pa ru/ mi yi snying khrag bsreg pa'i gtor ma bzhag/ nub byang rta snying rta khrag bsres pa gang// shar du sbrel gyi snying dang phag khrag bsres la bzhag/ bdag nyid mthing nag ber gon te// srog gi snying po rgyun du drangs// oM sha ra na sha ra tri/ khar na sha ru du ma/ sdum bu sha tri na/ mi ra tan tu ta ra na/ a pa tsa ra tsa ga tsu ru sha/ mu ra to sha mu ra to sha/ a ya ba dug su ru na/ he he yan dza/ yo rum ra na sha du ru/ mA ra ya hUM/ ba ba byi ya hUM/ ya ba ya de la ba ra de la ba ra da/ bdud kyi snying po de rnams dang/ lcam dral 'khor bcas dril ba ni// oM hra no mo hi b+h+yo li/ ma khu ri pu ma/ ru ma bu nu/ tra tra tra du ru du ru tra dza dza hUM dza/ stong ngam bye ba sa yar bzlas// stong gsum mun par gtong byed na// mun pa'i dus su dug khrag la// nyi ma gsad pa'i drag sngags bzlas// rang sngags mjug tu mun gtibs brjod/ stong gsum bdud kyi lcam dral gyis// skad cig tsam la g.yo 'gul gtong// las la sbyar te gsod 'dod na// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru// dug dang klad khrag sbyar ba yis// gtum khro bstod la bdud rnams rbad// hUM/ nam mkha' yangs pa'i klong yangs nas// yab rje shan pa dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ gnas 'dir mun gtibs dam la shog/ mun pa gtibs pa'i klong dkyil nas// yang zher nag po 'brug thog sku// gnas 'dir mun gtibs dam la shog/ shar phyogs rus pa'i zhing khams nas// shar bdud rol po ral pa can// zhe sdang mun gtibs dam la shog/ lho phyogs me yi zhing khams nas// srog bdud sngon po mche ba can// srog la mun gtibs dam la shog/ nub phyogs khrag gi zhing khams nas// gla bdud yor pa zhags pa can// bla la mun gtibs dam la shog/ byang phyogs rlung gi zhing khams nas// srog bdud ser po sta gri can// srog la mun gtibs dam la shog/ tshe bdud skyin gyi ral pa can// tshe la bar gcod dam la shog/ srog srid pa 'phrig pa yang ta khris ba sems kyi bdud// yid la mun gtibs dam la shog/ dkar po 'bang ma spyan gcig ma// sngon mo srin mo ta rI yang ti ra ma mo 'khol// dmar mo g.yug gtsug glu gnyan 'khol// nag mo dred mgo ma yams 'khol// ser mo rlung gshog dbang ldan 'khol// dkar ljang 'ug mgo dri za 'khol// sngo nag sreg byed ya ma 'khol// dmar mo sgeg mo srin mo 'khol// sngo skya zhags thogs rlung lha 'khol// dgra bo'i rnam shes brgyad la mun nag gtibs// ha na ha na

sti ta sti ta/ ru tra ma ma/ sa ma ya hUM/ kha tra dza/ mi tra dza/ shon tri dza/ yag sha dza/ ma tri dza/ da tri dza/ sha tri dza/ da tri pra tri dza/ dza byin dza/ kar ma dza/ ha du dza/ li sha dza/ yag+sha dza/ pu li dza/ kho dar dza/ dza hUM rbud/ rbud kha shed rbud/ pha ni rbud/ so la ku+u nan rbad/ du du rbud/ khal khu rbud/ shed tsit+ta gong chod/ kha la rug tig mur rta rbad rbud swA hA/ za za nad kuM thum ri li li kha le kha shag thum// ka nan ha ra rbad chums khug ril// kug rma ma khrag ril srog rtsa rbud ril// de dag gsad cing gzir ba dang// gnan zhing 'phang dang bsreg cing gtad// 'khor lo bri bya yi ge dgod// dbye dang dgug dang bstim pa'i las// man ngag bzhin du byas gyur na// the tshom med par brlag par byed// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ bdud nang ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te so lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos// bdud gsang bar bsgrub pa'i tshul gsungs so// thog mar dad pa rab tu bskyed// bsod nams tshogs kyis yan lag bsag/ nag po brag gi rtsar phyin la// lhor bltas rtsa nas chu 'bab tu// gur nag nang du+u sa blangs la// stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi brtsigs// mi khrag rta khrag khyi khrag dang// rgya sol bsres la chag chag gdab// dbus su gru gsum mkhyid gang bru// zla gam dmar po thod phreng dkar// gru chad ljang nag sgo bzhi ser// bdud po ha nu bag sha kha// dar la gzugs bris dbus su dgod// lcags sam mchog gi phur pa la// gshed por byin brlab dbus su dgod// dpal dar nag po lce bzhi la// phyogs bzhir bdud bzhi'i gzugs bris dgram// shar du he le khyab pa dgod// lho ru nag po bkrag med dgod// nub tu so 'dar 'khrig pa dgod// se mo rtsa skom ral pa spyi ching yang byang du dgod// dri za khyung btsun shar du dgod// phag skar nya ring lho ru dgod// rang zan rang gza' 'phan skar yang phang skar nub tu dgod// na bun smug po byang du dgod// bka' 'khor skyong ba'i gnod sbyin bdud// phyag brnyan bcu gsum khrag gi dong ral can// sprul pa bcu gsum stag dang gzig chas can// mon bu bcu gsum bdud kyi rta nag can// pho nya bcu gsum stag seng mthong ga can// phyag brnyan nag mo re ba'i go lcog can// sprul pa mo rnams sol ba'i lan tshar can// mon mo bcu gsum zha ne'i lan tshar can// pho nya mo rnams 'gron bu'i thod skabs can// gru chad khyams dang sgo la dgod// de la dam rdzas bshams pa ni// rabs chad mon gyi thod pa ru// bra sran gtor ma cha gcig tu// lug nag spyi dkar bya rog dang// rta nag snying dkar gsum gyi snying// srog pa rtsa dang ma bral nang// dgra bo du yod ming rus rnams// gro ga

shing shun bris la gzhug/ bya rog gsob dang skyur ka'i gsob// brgyad ste shar nub kha bstan bzhag/ chang phud nang du gser brdar la// dngul skyogs gang yang gzhag par bya// g.yab dar nag pos g.yab tshul bya// lug nag lcags ru gser mig la// re ba'i sgye ni khal du bkal/ g.yas su pho rnams ming rus gzhug/ g.yon du mo rnams ming rus gzhug/ sngo dmar skud pos gong rmed bya// ra la dar lce mthing nag gdab/ mig gnyis nang du rin chen brdar/ dar dkar yug gis mig gnyis dgab// dkyil 'khor byang shang gra ru dgod// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bca'// thod pa dug khrag bsres la dgang/ gos nag gyon la thod nag bcings// bdud kyi g.yab dar lag tu thogs// gtum chen bstod la bdud rnams rbad// drag sngags 'di bzlas mngon du 'gyur// hUM phaT pa hUM le ma pa sha sta ha sta pa ba le rang ba mang sha pa ra ya hUM ma he pa mang ga la ya hUM phaT/ sum 'bum bzlas na gang yang 'grub// de bzhin bsgrub na mngon du 'gyur// dpal 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ bdud gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te so drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshed pos 'jig rten gyi khams mer bsreg pa'i btsan phyi ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so/ brag dmar rtsa'am dur khrod du// sa bdag zhi bya klu gtor gtang// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa// ra dmar khrag gis chag chag gdag/ dbus kyi lte ba dmar po la// zla gam dmar po brgyad kyis bskor// lcags ri nag po me 'od 'bar// zla gam re la mA ra ya// ra dmar bse 'gram phyi rten bca'// dbus su bshos bu gru gang gzhag/ ra khrag dag gis dmar por byug/ za 'og dmar po mda' gang gdags// ra lpags dmar po mda' gang la// zer mo ldem pa'i phod kyis brgyan// dbus kyi zla gam steng du gzhag/ de 'khor zla gam brgyad po la// bshos cha brgyad la mda' dmar brgyad// dar dang ra lpags dmar po dang// zer mo'i phod kyi brgyan pa brgyad// phyi rim zla gam brgyad la dgod// gser brdar chang phud bya'o dgu// 'bras dang til nag la sogs pas// zla gam dgu la phul dgu gzhag/ dur khrod ras la 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad pa ru bya bar bshad// oM la li pra ma ni ri tse thal ba ni/ tri nyi nyi shaM tri mu tri ri tri tri/ re tri haM shaM staM sarba karma se pa be ba swA hA/ 'di ni dbang dang drag po'i sngags// dgug dang rbad pa'i sngags 'di brjod// srog la li pra na ma ni baM ril dgra bo nr-i dza/ srog rtse thal ba nr-i/ baM ri li li dgra bo nr-i dza/ kro d+hi ko ya baM ri li li dgra bo nr-i dza/ kro d+hI kI la ya sha la baM ri li li dgra bo nr-i dza/ oM tri gam sham mA ra ya baM ri li li dgra bo nr-i dza/ mu

tri mA ra ya baM ri li li dgra bo nr-i dza/ re tri mA ra ya baM ri li li dgra bo mA ra ya nr-i dza/ haM shaM staM bu mA ra ya baM ri li li dgra bo nr-i dza/ rang gsang dpon g.yog dgu'i snying brjod par bya'o// srog la li pra ma ni dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dzaH/ srog la mA ra ya nr-i dam nyams dgra bo'i srog la dza dz+wa dzaH/ srog kro d+hI kI la ya mA ra ya dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dz+waH// srog kro d+hi sho la ya ya mA ra ya dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dzaH/ srog kaM ti kaM shaM mA ra ya dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dzaH/ srog gi shaM tri mA ra ya dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dzaH/ srog mu tri re'u tri dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dzaH/ dmigs pa'i gzugs la sngags kyis brdeg/ gshin rje bstod la btsan rnams rbad// hUM/ 'dzam gling 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// me 'od 'bar ba'i zhing khams nas// mi ring dmar po mthu rtsal can// dbu la skra med bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar// 'jig rten khams kun me yis bsreg/ smin ma lcags gyu 'khril ba 'dra// spyan rtsa dmar po dam nyams dgra la bzlog/ sku+u la le brgan dmar po'i 'jol ber gsol// g.yas nas btsan gyi rgyu zhags dgra la 'debs// g.yon na hu lu'i ltas ngan dgra la 'bebs// zhabs la lcags lham yu thung gsol// sbrul nag stong gi chun bskor can// sbrul nag gzhibs pa'i sku regs bcings// skar chen dmar po'i tshar tshar can// bzhugs ni gling bzhi khyab par bzhugs// nam gyi gung la rgyu tsa na// brag gi wa mo kha nag chibs// nyi ma'i zer la rgyu tsa na// chibs su ltas ngan gla ba chibs// nyi ma'i gung la rgyu tsha na// chibs su bra bo rting dkar chibs// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di longs la// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' 'byung gis// 'khor gyi btsan rnams las la bskul// 'jig rten khams su me yi bskal pa thongs// dgra bo'i rnam shes brgyad po thal bar rlogs// skyes bu chen po dgra la ya// rang gsang mched dgu dgra la ya// btsan gyi zhags pa da sdogs la// tha ram dgra la da thob cig/ khrag skyug gze thabs pur gyis thob// ces phrin las bcol tsa ra bam rog rten du bca'// lo dang zla bar brlag par 'gyur ro// be'u rdzi wa dang rta chung dang// lag sor rnams la gong bzhin bskul// chang phud gtor zhing las gnyer gtad// rtags phyin pa dang gtang rag gtang// gsob dang bshos cha dbul bar bya// gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten khams kun mes bsreg pa'i btsan gyi zla gsang phyi ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te so bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos// btsan nang ltar sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// gong gsum kha'am

brag dmar rtsa// dur khrod nags tshal 'thug po ru// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dug dang khrag gis chag chag gdab// dbus su gru gsum thur du brko// mu su ra yi thod pa ru// rdo sol spra ba ras la sogs// til mar bsres te gzhag par bya// de la zla gam gsum gyis bskor// phyi rim 'dzam bu'i gling bzhi bris// lcags ri la sogs me 'od bris// dbus su ya ma gshed po ste// zla gam gsum la yum sras dgod// zla gam steng du btsan gyi rgyal// rdo rje reg bya gser mig dgod// lho ru rdo rje grags mchog dgod// nub tu rdo rje mgyogs byed rtsal// byang du rdo rje shu bo 'bar// yab yum rdzas su bshams pa yang// mi sha rta sha'i gtor ma dang// snying chen gcig la brten te bsgrub// phyogs bzhir gtor ma bzhi byas la// shu bo mched bzhi'i rdzas su dgod// rang mar snying dang bya se'i snying// rta mtshal snying la btsan rnams brten// bya rgod mda' la le brgan dar// lag tu thogs la rtag tu g.yab// gri bo'i thod par tha ram bca'// rtag tu ra gsur rgyun tu gtang// gser skyems la sogs gser sbyar bas// rtag tu btsan la mchod pa bya// spyugs pa'i glu blang rnga gling 'bud// rtag tu nyung dkar nyung nag la// sngags bzlas gru gsum thod par gsib// rnam gsum ting 'dzin btsan rnams bskyed// a bi shu+u sa ma ya rA dza be ni a na Na sta tri shal rbad dz+ha ra ga ting san d+ha ra shu+u na tsit+ta b+ha smi ku ku dza dza/ khri'am 'bum du bzlas gyur na// sku yang dngos su ston par 'gyur// gzhan yang rta med srab sgra dang// mi med spyugs pa di re 'ong// de bzhin las la sbyor bar bya// gshed po bskul la btsan rnams rbad// 'jig rten me yis bsreg 'dod na// rdo sol rdzas sbyar dam rdzas la// rtsa ba'i sngags la raM raM sbyar// de yi sngags rnams rab tu bzlas// zla gsang bu la shes bya zhing// gsad pa'i las kyang gong dang 'dra// gtso ru rang gi dam tshig bsrung// ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod lam bya// yengs na gang yang mi 'grub ste// rtag tu mi dang nye mi bya// tha ram bcas pa'i thod pa de// gong gsum btsan gyi 'du sa'am// brag btsan mu btsan yod sar sba// gang la bya ba 'joms par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten gyi khams mes bsreg pa btsan gyi zla gsang nang ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te so brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos btsan gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dgon pa dur khrod lta bu ru// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum brtsigs// dbus su rabs chad thod pa ru// khrag sogs dug sogs rdo sol dang// dur khraud ras dang til gyi mar// ra dmar snying dang ra

khrag blugs// ming dang rus bris thod par bzhug/ bse phor zangs gzhong gtor mas dgang// zung gzhag srog snying tshad du grangs// oM des tri mang gan dza mus mus mA ra na ya mA ra ya na ya/ dgra bo che go mo'i srog breng breng thum b+h+yo dza dza/ 'di ni rab tu mi 'grub bsgrub yang sngags// thod pa'i nang du 'bum dubazlas// thod pa nags rdzob 'thug po'am// ri la sbas na ri mes tshig/ khyad par rgya mtsho lta bu'am// chu mig sbas na chu yang khol// dgra yi gdung gseb sbas gyur na// khyim dang khang pa 'jig par 'gyur// de nas sngags de nyid 'od zu'i sdong po la// lan stong du bzlas nas byin na smyo bar 'gyur ro// d+ha du ra'i lo ma dang sha pra ba de dang/ ka ka ri la bzlas nas byin na mdzer 'gyur ro// be'u be dang ka ni la bzlas nas byin na/ skrangs 'bur nad kyis 'chi bar bshad/ za'i 'bras la bzlas nas phyogs su gtor na/ sbrul chen po khang pa'i nang du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rdo sol la bzlas nas b+han d+ha'i nang du chang dung sbyar nas rtsa gseb bam shing gseb tu sbas na yul khams 'tshig par 'gyur ro// rdo sol la bzlas te chang gral du grogs po'i chang la btab na mer rang gis 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bse zho dang btsan dug sbyar la btab nas dgra'i lus sam sha la reg pa'i gos la bskus na lhog pa dkar pos 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten mes sreg btsan gyi zla gsang gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te so dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos/ chu 'khyags drag tu dbab pa khyab 'jug gza'i drag sngags 'di gsungs te/ gza' phyi ltar bsgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa// thog mar dad pa rab tu bskyed// ri gsum rtse'am dur khrod du// dbang thob bya phyir bla ma mnyes bya zhing// dkyil 'khor bris nas dam tshig dbang dag nod// dgos pa bsgrub phyir man ngag thob par bya// man ngag thob nas bsnyen bsgrub mtha' ru dbyung// bsnyen pa bya zhing mthun rdzas 'bad de bsag/ khyab 'jug las kyi go rim ni// gzhan dang mthun par cho ga dang// mchod dang gzu dpang gsol ba gdab// gtor ma la sogs cho ga bya// dbab gsad las kyi go rim ni// chos grangs phyogs dang dus tshod dang// sprul pa yan lag 'jug pa'o// go rim bzhin du so sor sbyar// bzhi la nub nas shar du srod// ma mor sprul te rkang pa g.yas// brgyad la shar lho mtshams nas su// nyi ma dros te nub byang du// dgra lha'i rgyal mor mjug ma sprul// bcu gcig 'jing la byang nas lho// bdud tu sprul te lag pa gnyis// bco lnga nam phyed lho nub nas// byang shar mtshams su rgyu ba ste// srin por sprul te mgo bo

rgyu// bco brgyad nam yol shar nas nub// dmu ru sprul nas dpung mgo g.yon// nyi shu gnyis la nyi ma myur// nub byang mtshams nas shar lho ru// gshin rjer sprul nas lag pa g.yon// nyi shu lnga la lho nas byang// skya rengs chas te dpung mgo mig/ klu btsan gdon du sprul te rgyu// nyi shu dgu ste myur chung na// byang shar mtshams nas lho nub tu// gza' bdud chen por sprul te rgyu// de yi dbab gsad sbyor ba ni// phyogs kyi gdon sprul re re la// gsad pa'i sbyor ba so sor bya// gdon sprul so sor rgyu ba ste// ma mor sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan ni// nag mo chen mo ral pa can// 'jigs pa'i rgyan cha mang po dang// lag na thod khrag 'thor zhing rgyu// rlung drag thog dang rdzi kha rgyu// rgyal mo sngo skya ka dar thogs// sngo skya zhon te 'jigs pa'i gzugs// sgra dang ser ba mtshan mo'o// sprul pa dud ni mdog nag po// lag na gri nag zhags pa thogs// rta nag zhon te gdon dang bcas// btsan thabs drag po'i nad rnams dang// dus med mtshan ma mang du 'byung// 'jigs pa'i srin po sngo nag la// mig rtsa dmar la sdang mig bgrad// mche ba gtsigs te za ba'i tshul// mda' gzhu thogs te gdon dang rgyu// rlung nag 'tshubs mar bcas te 'ong// sprul pa dmu ste thog ser 'bebs// dmar po khrag gi thig le can// ba glang zhon te 'jigs pa'i gzugs// mtshan ma thob dang sprin nag 'khrugs// klu gdon drag por sprul pa ni// sprul nag chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'khyil ba'i tshul gyis rgyug cing 'phro// chu drag glog dang chas pa'o// nag po chen po 'khor lo thogs// gdon gyi gtso bor sprul te 'ong// rgyu ba'i dus dang mtshungs nges na// mtshan ma myur du phung bar 'gyur// de la dbang gsang sbyor ba brgyad// nges par rgyu ba'i dus su bya// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// gru bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus su e/ phyogs mtshams brgyad la e brgyad bkod// e dgu nag po'i 'khor lo bskor// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la sprul pa brgyad// bskyed la dbab gsad sbyor ba bri// dbus su gshed po yab yum ste// khA hir bcas pas gtor ma sbyin// phyogs mtshams brgyad kyi sprul pa la// so so'i las kyi bya ba brtsam// dgug dang brdeg dang bstab pa'i las// 'grogs pa'i tshul te gdong tshugs min// bsreg dang mchod pa la sogs pa// phyogs mtshams brgyad nas drangs te dbul// phyogs mtshams brgyad du gsad pa ste// dbus kyi e la bsreg pa'o// sprul pa'i mgo bo rgyu ba'i tshe// brnag pa'i dpral ba'i dbyings su gdab// rkang pa g.yas g.yon rgyu ba ni// bol gong g.yas g.yon gnyis su gdab// sprul pa yan lag go

rim bzhin// gdab pa'i las kyang de bzhin gdab// tsher ma can gyi shing la bsreg/ rgyu ba'i dus su mtshungs nges na// phung bar 'gyur te gdon mi za// gdon dang phye ma rnam pa gnyis// gdon gyi rdzas la nus pa yod// phye ma gdon gyi bya ba de// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las gsungs// gza' bdud rgyu ba'i dus nges na// rjes dang dri ma'i 'dag pa la// gos dum dri ma rnying pa dang// gdug pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhi byas te// rnam grangs nang du gsad byad na// gong ma'i rdzas dang tsha ba gsum// bsres te gzugs brnyan bya bar gsungs// myur du gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// gong ma'i steng du ha las bya// gong ma bzhi la lcags phye dang// khrag gi sbyor bas gri nyid du// til dang ske tshe nyung nag dang// khrag sna zi ra gu gul dang// gong gi rdzas kyis ma nges bsad// dur khrod ras sam shing shun la// skyang nul byas te smug nag gam// yang na so nag dmar por bya// de la brnag pa'i sbyor ba bya'o// myur du dbab pa'i las bya na// dam sri yul gyi chu sogs bsag/ yugs sa mo'am rabs chad thod// yang na mdzecan thod pa ru// mi khrag khyi khrag ra khrag dang// mngal khrag la sogs dme khrag sogs// ba dkar 'o ma mdzo dang ra'i// 'o ma la sogs sbyar ba bya// sngo sna dug sna gu gul sbyar// gar 'bebs chu mig klu yod sar// bsregs sam bskol na klu rnams dang// dus tshod gza' yi gdong thug na// chu 'khyags khrag tu 'ong bar nges// ma hA tsan+d+ha rak+sha tri tha ni ma tha ya// che ge mo la tri b+h+yo/ zhes pa ni sprul pa srin po'i gdon gyis dbab cing gsad pa'o// nA ga rA dza be ni ne a nan sta/ nA ga rA dza ra sha ting san d+ha ra k+Shu na/ tsit+ta/ bAsmi ku ru/ klu'i gdon gyis dbab cing gsad pa'o// rmu+u tri tsa d+ha duM duM buM buM kha la rak+sha thum ri li li/ kha shag bam raka stam thum ri li li// dmu bdud sprul pas dbab cing gsad pa'o// ma ma sa ma ya ma trag sha ma tra 'ga' nas kha ya ku ru te tso pA la ya a/ yu shwa ha ra d+ha ra/ u ma ma dam ni sha tru nA sha ya ni dza dzaH/ ma mo'i gdon gyis dbab gsad pa'o// tri dkar mo tri dul dul snying khrag la ril ril/ chom chom tsa la thun shig mA ra na dza/ rgyal mo sngo skyas dbab gsad pa'o// ya ma tsan d+ha d+hi ta dza la tsakra d+ha ra na sha ya dgra bo nr-i mA ra ya sod sod chom chom shig shig/ gshin rje'i gdon gyis dbab gsad pa'o// ma hA bid+he ba tra biSh+Nu tsan+d+ha tu ba ni rA hu la dgra bo'i tsit+ta la/ shun tsa to khA hi/ he ka li ma hA tsan d+ha mA ra ya nr-i khug khug dza dza/ gza' bdud chen pos dbab gsad pa'o// bdud tri ni ri tra pa na tri ya/ ma tri tri ya b+ho/ khaM khaM so baM wang/ srog rtsa thun che ge mo nr-i nr-i dzaH/ ces bzlas gar dmigs thogs pa med// gtum chen nyid la rab bstod

cing// gza' bdud chen po rab tu rbad// hUM/ ri rab phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad nas// lha srin sde brgyad bskul re ran// khyab 'jug chen po sku bzhengs shig/ gtum po chen po bskyod tsa na// gza' bdud 'jug cing ki kang 'bebs// de yis ki kang 'bebs byed na// gza' bdud chen po mi srin pa// khyab 'jug chen po kun tu rgyug/ 'jigs byed rog ti sprul pa'i lus// lus po gcig la mgo bo dgu/ mgo lus med bar mig gis khengs// ro stod mi la ro smad sbrul// lus ni brjid pa'i dud kha la// lag na chu srin zhags pa thogs// pha ni srin la ma ni klu// klu srin tshogs pa'i mthu bo che// lho nub mtshams nas sku bzhengs nas// zla ba'i rjes gcod shar du rgyug/ nyi ma'i rjes gcod nub tu rgyug/ nyi mo rgyu zhing mtshan mo 'joms// bar snang khams nas rgyu tsa na// 'jig rten khams kun sgrol bar mdzad// lo nyes 'khrug pa yams nad gtong// nyi ma zla ba lto ru za// rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas pa'i tshe// klu rnams kun kyang 'khrug ces slong// thog ser sa g.yos ki kang 'bebs// 'jigs byed chen po mi srun pa//
