ming brgya pa la mtshan stong po// dus tshod tshes grangs kun gyis bdag/ lha srin kun gyi nang dbyen byed// lha srin sde brgyad dmag dpon byed// 'byung ba lnga yi bdud chen po// mtshan ni rnam pa dgu ru grags// steng 'og phyogs 'tshams thams cad nas// kun nas rgyug cing ki kang 'bebs// lho nub mtshams nas bskyod pa'i tshe// srin po rak+sha bi trI ba// ki kang ba ta chen po bya// srin po'i ki kang chen po 'bebs// shar lho mtshams nas bskyod pa'i tshe// drang srong chen po rA hu la/ drang srong gi ni ki kang 'bebs// ki kang bdag nyid can zhes bya// byang shar mtshams nas bskyod pa'i tshe// 'jigs byed chen po sgra gcan 'dzin// byi na ya ga pho nyar 'gyed// ki kang 'bebs pa'i las la brtson// nub byang mtshams nas bskyod tsa na// du ba mjug rings chen po bya// 'jig rten khams na mthu bo che// 'jig rten g.yo 'gul byed pa'i bdag/ lho yi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// khyab 'jug chen po bya ba ste// dus tshod tshes grangs kun tu rgyug/ sprul pa'i sku ni ki kang 'bebs// shar gyi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// dmu bdud chen po ha li ka/ byi nu ra tsa'i ki kang 'bebs// dmu yi ki kang 'bebs par byed// byang gi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// bdud po rog ti 'bar ba'i gzugs// bdud kyi ki kang 'bar ba 'bebs// ki kang 'bar ba tsa ra ka/ nub kyi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// srid pa'i ma mo rnams dang rol// ma mo'i ki kang kun gyi bdag/ ljang sngon chen po'i ki kang 'bebs// lho nub mtshams nas bskyod tsa na// rog ti bya rog mgo (12)

brtsegs te// skar chen 'bar ba'i 'od chen po// sngon du su phrad khyur mid za// khyod ni khro chen sprul pa ste// lho nub mtshams nas sku bskyod nas// lha srin sde brgyad dmag dpon byed// nub nas shar du bskyod tsa na// srid pa'i ma mo'i dmag dpon byed// nad ngan ki kang dbab pa'i dus la babs// shar lho mtshams nas bskyod tsa na// dgra lha'i rgyal mo dmag dpon byed// thog dang bu yug ki kang ni// dam sri gdug pa'i snying la 'bebs// byang nas lho ru bskyod tsa na// bdud dmag kun gyi dmag dpon byed// bdud kyi ki kang hur thum 'bebs// bdud kyi ki kang dgra la ya// byang shar mtshams nas bskyod tsa na// srin po 'bum gyi dmag dpon phyed// srin po'i ki kang dgra la ya// gri thabs sna tshogs ki kang ya/ shar nas nub tu bskyod tsa na// dmu bdud yongs kyi dmag dpon byed// dmu rdo 'bebs pa'i las byed cing// gar rbad dmu yi ki kang gtong// nub byang mtshams nas bskyod tsa na// gshin rje yongs kyi dmag dpon byed// skye 'gro yongs kyi bla tshe sdud// gshin rje'i ki kang dbang med 'bebs// lho nas byang du bskyod pa'i tshe// klu btsan kun gyi dmag dpon byed// thog dang ser ba'i sna 'dren cing// thog ser mdze nad ki kang 'bebs// nub byang mtshams nas bskyod tsa na// gtib grir gsod pa'i ki kang 'bebs// mdun du gang byung khyur mid byed// ki kang sna tshogs 'bebs pa'i bdag/ ki kang sna tshogs dgra la ya// zhes brjod cing rak+ta sbreng phrin las bcol// gsad na bla phur gzugs la brdeg/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ shi kri bi tri kI li kI la ya/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ mu lu mu lu/ ku ru ku ru/ thum bu thum bu/ ba ra ta thum ru thum ru pa ra pa shU dan ta pa ra pa ta ya/ ru ti ru ti sha sa yA/ shan ti ku la tri dza/ zhes ni gsad pa'i las sbyor bya/ chu 'khyags drag tu 'bebs 'dod na// sngags kyi man ngag zhag gcig bya// oM me kha kha thun kha thun/ raM yaM raM yaM/ na bu ta na Na kha le ra thun ra thun tu/ zhes pa'i sngags bzlas khro tshul bstan// mig bzlog kha bskrad mig sbrin las// khrag sprin dmar pos 'khrigs shing 'dril bar bsam// rdzas rnams gtor zhing lus sprugs pas// ser ba drag tu 'ong bar 'gyur// gnam sa ri brag kun tu yang// 'ba' ri sha yas gdon mi za// 'jam dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ chu 'khyags ser ba dbab pa khyab 'jug gza'i drag sngags skabs te bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ chu 'khyags drag tu dbab pa'i phyir// rog ti gza' yi nang bsgrub gsungs// dur khrod la sogs dgon pa ru// dkyil 'khor gru gsum sbrag ma bya// gru gsum sbrag ma'i nang

rol du// snel gri'i thod pa 'og tu gzhag/ mngal khrag la sogs khrag sna tshogs// dug dang snga sngo dkar gsum blug/ rabs chad thod pas steng nas dgab// gru gsum nang du gzhag par bya// bsnyen pa bya ba'i thabs dag la// lha bsnyen sum stong byas nas ni// tshe bzhi bco lnga brgyad dus la// gza' chen nyid kyi snying po bzlas// stong rdzogs thun la nyung gis brab/ oM bya sha me ke du ru ma shi ri kha ra dz+wa la a ka ta swA hA/ stong rdzogs thun khrag dag la bstim// oM dza pa ti rA hu ma hA kro d+ha sha ra na hUM phaT// sngags la stong ngam khri ru bzlas// bzlas pa rdzogs nas nyung gis brab// nyi shu dgu'am tshes gcig la// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas sa gtsang sba// thun gcig gnas su rten tu bca'// mis ma 'phrigs par gsang sngags bzlas// oM kro d+hi tra lo glo bur skyi 'dang phob// trag rak+sha snying kha rag b+h+yo/ khrag ma mu sha ma b+h+yo/ ku li na ma b+h+yo/ tsan d+ha rak+sha ma b+h+yo/ btsan bdud khrol khrol b+h+yo/ gnam mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol// mi reng sod// rkyang rje rkyang mo tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ de nas zor sngags mdzub bstan la// yul gyi phyogs su bzlas pa bya// ri bo'i rtser song thab zor 'bad// chu skyes zla ba tshes bzhi nas// nyi shu dgu mthar bsnyen rdzogs nas// chu 'khyus zla ba kun tu dbab/ de ltar las rnams byas gyur na// chu 'khyags khrag tu 'bab gyur te// skyi 'dang ri rnams nyil bar byed// 'jam dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ chu 'khyags khrag tu dbab pa'i zla gsang nang bsgrub kyi skabs te zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// 'gal ba cham la dbab slad du// khyab 'jug gza' yi gsang bsgrub gsungs// sgra gcan chen po nyi zla'i gnyen// drag po chen po rA hu la/ khrag tu dbab pa'i las 'di yin// dur khrod la sogs gnas dag tu// maN+Dal chag chag thig gdab bri// dbus su gru gsum brtsegs ma bri// mu khyud zlum po thod phreng can// sgo bzhi rigs dang mthun par bri// sprul sngon dag gi shun pa la// rdzas kyi phud blugs ming rus gzhug/ 'khyil pa'i tshul gyis ga 'ur gzhag/ gru gsum dbus su bzhag la bsgrub// dkar thab dmar thab sngo thab gsum// gru gsum rgyab ma dag la gzhag/ sha rul khrag rul btsos dang rjen// ra mchen sgrub sman gu gul nag/ la phug til sgog pha ltar ba lus kyang mos// snel gri'i thod par blugs la gzhag/ dkar gsum klu sman mngar gsum dang// gu gul dkar po 'bras chen rnams// ma ltar mos pas 'khar gzhong blugs// mthun rdzas bsdus la thod par gzhag/ tsa ra rog po'i rwa la ni// sngags bris steng du ming byang gdags// lha srin sde brgyad

mchod rdzas dgram// thun rdzas thod phreng steng du gzhag/ rang nyid gshin rje gshed po ste// yi dam bcas pa rdzogs pa dang// srog snying 'di ni nus thang brjod// oM bi sha la du ru+u ma shi kha dz+wa la a ta swA hA/ stong rdzogs thun la mchod pa bya// hUM/ 'jigs byed chen po rA hu la/ sku mdog dud kha mig gis khengs// gshin rje gshed po'i zhabs drung du// rgyal ba'i bstan bsrung khas blangs pa// dus 'dir 'da' bar ma byed par// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di longs la// dam nyams srog rtsa gcad pa dang// yul du lo nad ser ba phob/ hab ba sha mi ki du ru ma shi ki dz+wa la ti a tsi ti swA hA/ dus tshod brgyad la gtor ma sbyin// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma rnams// gzhung mthun nyams su lon pa dang// drag po thun gyi rdzas kyang blang// ga bu'i nang du sngags 'dis brab// oM mu ka ye ka pa ye a pa ye hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi krin te yul 'di'i lo thog la/ tsa pa tri rA hu la ma hA kro d+ha ka pa ta/ shar shar ro shal te hUM phaT/ thig nig gcig med gnyis trag/ brgyad bcad dud phrom gnam mthongs phye// lcags sgrog khrol// mi reng sod/ rkyang rje rkyang mo tsu ru hUM phaT/ stong ngam khri thon rdzas kyis brab// de nas lha srin sprul pa brgyad// sngags kyis gong gi mchan du brab/ trag rak+mo hril shag rbad/ ser 'dril shar rbad// de ni ma mo'i drag sngags so// oM a sa le ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma ma trag rak+sha hril hril shar b+h+yo// dgra bla'i rgyal mo'i drag sngags so// oM pa sha mi ki rA hu la hUM/ shag shar shar hril b+h+yo/ de ni bdud kyi drag sngags so// oM ser khrag la mu sha gtub swA hA/ de ni srin po'i drag sngags so// oM raM traM thuM shag ril raM shar b+h+yo/ de ni mu'i drag sngags so// oM ya ma rA dza raM hri la shar raM raM/ de ni gshin rje'i drag sngags so// oM nA ga hril sen shag sad dun sa ma ya hril b+h+yo/ de ni klu btsan gyi drag sngags so// ya ma snying ya ma khrag rA hu la hril hril shag shag sen sen ya ya b+h+yo b+h+yo raM raM hril hril/ de ni bgegs kyi drag sngags so// zla gcig dus brgyad phyogs nas brdeg/ ling+ga bsnur zhing thun rdzas brdeg/ gtum chen bstod la gza' mchog rbad// bla phur ling+ga dag la brdeg/ tshes grangs thems nas grub rtags 'byung// rdzas dang thun zor sngags dang ming// dbus kyi rabs chad thod par blugs// sa gzer yul dbus la sogs su// skya rengs gzer du btab la bzhag/ de nas thun gyi zor bya ste// dam rdzas maN+Dal gong bzhin bya// dam sri yul gyi chu sogs bsags// lha bsnyen bsgrub sngags phyed du ste// phyed ni man chad sngags 'di bzlas// oM mu ka ye ka ba ye a ba ye hrIHSh+t+r-IHba krin te yul 'di'i lo thog la dud phrom/ kar phrom/ shu ti phrom/ yug ti smin/ shar shar drag tu phob/ dz+wa la ti rA hu la/ a

kro te ka phob/ shar shar ta phob hUM phaT/ tsa ra mu ye/ ag ne rag mo ko ra te swA hA/ rkyang rjes rkyang mo tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ ho ho phrom mur mur sha ru ru phrom/ gong gi thig nig btags nas kyang// de la sham bu 'di yang gdags// ma mo sing ga ye// ma mo bya tsa ye/ ma mo tsit+ta ye/ ma mo srog tsa ye/ dgra bo'i lo thog snar mo la mA ra la hUM phaT/ snying po sngags kyi bar bar du// mchod cing gtor ma dbul bar bya// ra bsgral thabs kyis thugs dam bskang// thon nas gnam gzer ri la bya// dkar thab dmar thab sngo thab gsum// gcig tu dril la bzhi ru bya// dmar ring zor ni phyogs su 'phangs// gong gi sngags bzlas mdzub ris bya// nyi shu dgu la 'joms par 'gyur// yang na chu bskyes rdzogs pa la// khyab 'jug gtor ma rtag tu btang// bla phur btab la gsad las bya// bar bar lha lnga dbye bar bya// de ltar byas na rab 'bring gi/ gnam lcags lce dang dmu rdo dang// chu 'khyags khrag tu dbab par bya// de la 'di yi las ni dus gang yang rung bar yang/ khrag dang gu gul dang lcags zangs kyi phye ma rnams la bsngags la yul gang yang rung ba de'i lha rten nam chu mig tu sbas na/ yul de rlung gis khyer te 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang rdzas de rnams la bzlas te ri lu byas nas dgra'i khang thog tu bsgyur na// khang pa rdib par 'gyur ro// yang de rnams la brjod nas chu mig kha byang du bltas par sbas nas gang ltar drangs pas shwa ser 'ong ngo// srin rdo dang 'khar ba chag pa la bzlas nas khyab 'jug rgyu ba'i dus su brag kha byang du bltas par sbas na/ thog drag po 'bebs par 'gyur ro// 'bru sna tshogs pa dang/ 'brug gi rus pa dang chu srin gyi sder mo la bzlas nas 'og tu sbas nas phyogs su gtor na/ ser ba drag tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro// ka ka na se dang/ khyi nag po'i mche ba la sngags nas dgra phyogs su gtor na skrang nad du 'gyur/ de la sogs te las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ser ba bzlog pa dang shwa bzlog pa yang de dang 'dra ste// nyung dkar la sngags nas gtor na bzlog par 'gyur// mang ga ya ti la ma ga ti'i bye ma la yang brjod nas gtor na thog bzlog par 'gyur ro// gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ chu 'khyags drag tu dbab pa gza'i drag sngags gsang bsgrub kyi skabs te bzhi bcu zhe gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po gshin rje gshed pos/ 'jig rten khams su thog dbab pa'i phyir lha dbang phyug chen po phyi ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// lhor bltas brag chen seng ge mchongs pa 'dra// yang na a ya yang dmar lo ma 'dra ba'am// dur khrod la sogs dgon pa'i gnas dag tu// rnal 'byor goms pas

yo byad ldan byas te// 'phags pa la sogs mchod cing gtor ma gtong// dra phying gtsang ma mda' gang gru bzhi la// mtshal lam ldong ros dag gis thig btab ste// le'u tshe dgu pa dag gi tshad du bya// dbus su ga pur dag gi chus bkrus la// dar ram ras sam dkar la 'jam pa la// lha chen dbang phyug dag gis gzugs bris te// smyug ma gtsang ma dag la dgod par bya// steng nas dmar po dar gyi gdugs kyis dgab// de yi mtshams bzhir ljang gu'i 'phan bzhi gzug/ phyogs bzhi'i le'u tshe bzhi po dag la yang// lha yi blon po bzhi yi gzugs bris dgod// shar du dri za'i lha nyid dgod par bya// lho ru gshin rje nub tu klu gdon lha// byang du gnod sbyin lha ste bzhi po dgod// de yi phyi rim me tog sna tshogs bskor// mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma gcig/ nang du rta tshil khrag dang snying yang stsal// snying gi srog rtsar dmigs pa'i ming rus bri// khre'u cu tse dag la dgra gzugs bya// snying gar thig le'i dkyil du ming rus gzug/ ske nas sngon dmar skud pas gdags byas te// lag pa g.yas kyi srin lag rtse la dgal// chas gos ljang nag mgo la thod nag bcing// dur khrod ras sam bram ze'i pags pa la// ldong ros chu rtsas kha dog ser por bsgyur// dug dang khrag gis 'khor la rtsibs brgyad bri// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshin rje'i snying po bri// dbus kyi lte bar lha chen snying po dgod// phyi rim thog gi dbab sngags dag gis bskor// 'khor lo mnga' gsol dbang bskur smon lam gdab// bram ze la sogs mdze can thod par gzhug/ de yi nang du gser dang lcags zangs dang// dngul dang snying sna khrag sna mang blugs te// le'u tse'i dbus su man 'ji'i kha la gzhag/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim gyis tshul bzhin bskyed// dbang chen rim brtsegs steng du b+h+rUM gcig bsam// b+h+rUM las 'bar ba'i lha yi gzhal med khang// phyi dang nang nas kun tu gsal bar bskyed// dbus su ma he bam chen bsnol ba la// nyi zla 'khor lo rab tu 'bar ba'i steng// ya las 'jam dpal gshed po 'bar ba'i sku// zhal drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis gsal bar bskyed// de yi 'khor na lha yi tshogs gnas te// ma hA de ba hUM zhes brjod pa yis// dbus su lha chen ma hA de ba yang// sku mdog nag po spyan gsum mche ba can// rtse gsum 'bar ba khyung gi rgyal mtshan g.yas// zhags pa be con rdo rje g.yon pa na// smin mtshams glog 'gyu bskal pa'i thog 'bebs bsgom// 'khor gyi lha yang rta zhon thog 'bebs pa'o// de bzhin ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal bsgoms la// gshin rje gshed pos lus bsrung dbang du bsdu// hUM/ las rnams rim gyis bgrod pa'i yang rtse nas// smon lam dbang gis

bstan pa 'phel mdzad cing// ma ha de ba lha chen dbang phyug gtso// bstan pa bshigs pa'i dgra rnams bsgral ba dang// sangs rgyas bstan bsrung dkon mchog bstod pa'i phyir// 'khor bcas ma lus gshegs su gsol// oM pra ma na rag sha e h+ye he dzaHhUM baM hoH/ dga' zhing gus pa'i thal sbyar pus btsugs nas// lha mchog khyed kyi yon tan rab brjod cing// tsam pa ka dang pad+mas rab gtor nas// deng 'dir bstod de khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyi thugs ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'dra zhing// 'od zer cha las 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// thogs med mkha' lding ngang pa'i gdan steng su// brtan par bzhugs nas bdag la dngos grub stsol// 'khor gyi lha chen mi bzad thog 'bebs bzhi// shugs kyi thogs med ta mchog gdan la bzhugs// ma hA de wa pra ma na tsa ra zhi sa ma ya tiSh+Tha ldan// lha yul gtsang ma dag la rab bshams te// bram ze mtshan ldan chags pas rab tu mchod// 'bras dang ku shar bcas pa'i yon chab dang// ga pur gur gum gla rtsi ce pog sogs// til mar bsung can rab gsal mar me'i mchog/ du ru ka la sogs pa de yi chu// lags na mar dang bcas pa'i bu ram bshos// dung dang bye ru zangs dang kra shel dang// rnga ting rdza lnga mun dza ti mi li// cha lang pi wang tam bu rgyud gcig pa/ glu gar rtsed 'jo rol mo dag la sogs// bde ba'i yo byad thams cad ma lus kun// mchod par 'bul lo thugs rjes bzhes su gsol// oM sarba pU dza puSh+pe d+hu pe A lo ke gan d+he ba liM pU dza hoH/ sku mdog nag po spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs// drang srong cha lugs pad+ma'i phreng bas brgyan// zhal bzhi gling bzhi yongs la khyab par gzigs// snyan pa'i dril sgra gsung gi gdangs skad can// dbang phyug chen po khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor gyi lha yi blon po bzhi// rta la zhon nas ral gri bskor// thog ser 'bebs pa'i las la brtson// khyod la bdag cag bstod phyag 'tshal// sngags 'dis lhan rnams rab tu bsnyen// oM ma hA de wa ti dza ti dza laM pra ma na pra ma na rak+sha kang kang la yang hUM/ de ba rA tsa dza mA hA ni dgra bo che ge mo ni thum thum rbad// shag len san sen yang sa na dzaHdzaHhUM hUM/ de skad bstod la bsnyen pa bgyi// rang gis ma nyes dbang yang gzug/ nyes byas bris sku'i mdun du bshags// 'o dod 'bod cing g.yab 'dor bya// gshed po bstod la lha rnams bskul// g.yas nas bskor zhing thugs dam bskul// 'dod khams nyi shu'i yang rtse nas// gzugs khams lha yi dga' tshal nas// phau brang bde ba'i gzhal yas nas// chos kyi rgyal mtshan dbang bskur ba'i// lha chen dbang phyug chen po ni// sku ni dmar ser 'bar ba la// tshad med dbu bzhi

gling bzhi 'joms// g.yas kyis pad+ma skyon dang bral// tha mas bgrang phreng rig sngags spel// g.yon gyi gun+d+hes dgos 'dod skong// tha ma blug snod dgra bgegs sbyong// dad pas bsam par yud kyis phyin// pad+ma ser pos brgyan byas nas// ras kyi kha tshar mgul rgyan can// thugs dam drag tu bskul byas nas// log pa'i dgra bgegs 'joms pa'i tshe// sku ni sngo nag chen po la// zhal gyi mche ba gdangs pa yis// dgra bo bdun rgyud rtsad nas gcod// smin mtshams glog 'gyu thog chen 'bebs// thal mo brdab pas thog chen 'bebs// mdzub mo bskul bas gling bzhi 'khrug/ ljags brkyang srid pa g.yo bar mdzad// dkon mchog gsum gyi sku dgra 'di// thog chen 'bar bas lnga phung shig/ tshe srog chod la bdun rgyud chod// 'khor gyi blon bzhi las la bskul// bar snang thog chen 'brul du chug/ dbang po rnam lnga kha long kha// bu smad 'khor g.yog nor phyugs la// gser thog lcags thog tsa la la// 'khor lo'i bro brdung 'u ru ru// zangs thog 'khar thog rams se ram// me 'od glog dmar khyugs se khyug/ 'khor rnams shugs chen rta zhon cing// ral gri me 'od klad la bskor// ki kang gshed bzhi'i las la 'gyed// ral gri bskor ba'i 'od 'phros pas// thog chen sna tshogs skar ltar 'khrugs// nyams pa'i dgra la thog mda' yA// skad cig tsam la phung bar gyis// zhes rta snying bstab cing rak+ta sbreng// rtags su 'brug dang ser ba dang// glog dang thog dang shwa bud 'ong// grub pa'i rtags byung thog gta' gzhug/ mkhar rmang lha rten chu mig gam// mchod rten lha khang 'gram 'og tu// lhag par dgra yi gro ga'am// nyal ba'i sngas sam stan 'og tu// 'khor lo bcas pa'i thod pa sba// drag sngags 'di bzlas thod par gsib// oM sa ma dur bu rak+sha pra ma Na/ ma hA de wa dgra yi yul khams su// ro kha du kha ba hUM phra ba swA hA/ zhes pa ni thod pa'i nang du bzlas// gtor ma gtang zhing smon lam gdab// bris sku dag la rten bcas la// dra phying maN+Dal dag la dril// rtag tu lha rnams mchod gyur na// yid la ci bsam 'grub par 'gyur/ gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten du thog dbab pa lha'i zla gsang skabs te zhe gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po gshin rje gshed pos 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i slad du// thog 'bebs lha yi nang bsgrub gsungs// srid par ma srid mgar gyis ma brdungs mtshon// ye srid byang chub sems kyi dpal ngar can// rlung gis ma blud gshags pa'i ngar// ye blud chen po'i mtshon dpal ngar can des// 'byung ba gzhan gyis mi brdzi mi tshugs shing// nyid kyis gang la thogs chag med par

'joms// de nyid bsgrub phyir dur khrod la sogs su// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dbus su gru gsum e brtsigs te// 'khor lo bzhi dang rol mtsho bdun// gser ri'i dbus su ya mAn+ta ka ste// steng du lha chen dbang phyug yab yum dgod par bya// 'khor lo bzhi la lha yi blon po bzhi// khrag zhag mar khu chang dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang// rgya tsho'i chu la sogs pa'i mtsho bdun no// lha chen lnga la phur pa lnga dgod de// dngul gyi phur pa sor brgyad shar du dgod// dri za lha yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// gser gyi phur pa lho yi rtsibs la dgod// gshin rje lha yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// zangs kyi phur pa nub kyi rtsibs la dgod// klu dbang lha yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// lcags kyi phur pa byang gi rtsibs la dgod// gnod sbyin lha yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// mkhar ba'i phur pa dbus kyi e la 'god// dbang phyug chen po ma hA de bar mnga' yang gsol// gro ga shing shur ras sam dar dkar la// lha rnams rang rang rtsa ba'i snying po dang// dbab pa'i sngags dang dmigs pa'i yul ming bri// sngon dmar skud pas phur pa'i mgul du gdags// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa kha sbyar la// thod pa'i phyi nang med par khrag gis byug/ steng gi thod pa yab tu mnga' yang gsol// 'og gi thod pa yum du mnga' yang gsol// thod pa steng mar yab kyi sku yang bri// thod pa 'og mar yum gyi sku yang bri// thod pa'i rtsibs rim dmigs pa'i ming rus bri// dpral bar rus bri kha ru ming yang bri// snying gar nr-i bri 'doms su bla dgas bri// de yi tha mar lto sbyar dza yis bskor// gro ga shing shun zhing gi pags pa la// dgra bo'i gzugs bris dbang phyug yum la glan// 'khar ba'i phur pa thod pa'i nang du gzhag/ gro ga shog shog shing gi lo ma la// lha chen tshogs bdag dbang phyug chen po khyod// khyed kyi btsun mo mA ra ya 'dis sbyar// 'khor gyi lha rnams myur du skul mdzod la// 'di la drag po'i thog chen phob ces bri// phur pa de yi mgul du gdags par bya'o// thod pa'i nang du dme khrag skam po dang// gser phye zangs phye lcags phye 'khar phye dang// dngul dang thog lcags thog grir shi ba yi// snying dang rus pa sha yang stsal// thod pa kha sbyar mi yi rgyu mas bcings// sgyed gsum kha la gru gsum steng du bzhag/ chu skyes me tog sna tshogs dang// rin chen sna lnga sman rnams dang// 'dod pa'i longs spyod zas rnams dang// rgun chang sbrang dang 'bras chang dang// 'bru chang dang ni a su sha// de dag mchod pa'i rdzas su dgram// sna tshogs snying dang khrag tu sbyar// bu ram 'bras kyi gtor ma bzhi// lha yi blon po bzhi la dgod// ling+ga ji ltar 'dod pa'i

dbyibs// gzugs ming byas pa mdun du bzhag/ sngags kyis brab cing gsad las bya// ting 'dzin gzhal yas gdan dang bcas pa bskyed// ya mAn+ta ka gsal bar bsgom// gdan du yi dwags gding bar bya// dbang phyug chen po gsal bsgoms te// 'khor gyi lha bzhis bskor bar bsam// oM ma hA de ba kA la hUM/ zhes brjod dbang phyug chen po yang// nag po chen po mche ba rab tu gtsigs// phyag mtshan rtse gsum khyung gi rgyal mtshan g.yas// zhags pas 'dren tshul be con rdeg tshul g.yon// chibs su 'brug rta sngon po chibs// gser gyi ral gri 'bar ba klad la bskor// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i shang lang glo la btags// de 'dra rab tu gsal bsgom bya// shar phyogs lha yi phyag na dngul gyi gzhu bdungs shing// dngul gyi mda' ltong dngul gyi 'khor lo bskor// 'brug rta zhon nas ki kang 'phral la 'jug/ dngul gyi thog 'bebs ser ba'i skyi 'dang gtong// lho nas gser gyi thog chen gong bzhin 'bebs// nub nas zangs thog byang nas lcags thog 'bebs// de 'dra gang la bsgoms la yengs par mi bya'o// hUM/ rnam snang mdzad nyid mi g.yo gtsug tor brtan// byang chub chen po mchog gi phyag rgya ni// bdud 'dul chen po'i sku ru sprul pa'i rgya// byang shar mtshams nas shin tu sku bde bstan// me lce bar snang sprin gtibs dkyil 'khor nas// sku stod sngo nag mi bzad 'bar ba'i 'od phung can// shin tu khro brjid dbang phyug gtum bag che// thugs rje sprin ltar gtibs shing nam mkha' gang bar khyab// gzir gnon stabs kyis dregs pa gzir zhing gnon// bdud po nag po spyan gsum mche ba can// bstan pa 'jig pa'i srog la spyan 'dren na// dbang phyug lha chen 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// dbang phyug chen po gnas nas bskyod tsa na// rtse gsum 'bar ba khyung gi rgyal mtshan phyar te gshegs// zhags pas 'dren cing be con snying la brdeg/ nag po spyan gsum sdang mig bzlog pa'i bdud// dbu skra 'bar ba phrog gzer ral pa can// sku lus mon pa spyan gsum ser ba 'dril// rno dpal mche ba zla tshes gyen du 'khyil// spyan mig bzlog pas skyi 'dang rma 'dang 'bebs// shangs nas rlung ni 'thor 'bud bu yug 'khrugs// mdung dang gri rkang sku yi rten du bcas// spyan mig mi mthun las kyi zla ba 'dril ba ltar// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gshegs su gsol// e h+ye he ma hA kA la ma hA kA la tri dza ka ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hoH/ sa ma ya stam/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ hUM/ lha chen dbang phyug 'khor ba'i g.yul bzlog pa// sprul pa'i rlabs chen lha yi dmag dpung sdud// dbang phyug legs ldan nag po'i 'khor gyis bskor// dbang phyug lha chen sku la

phyag 'tshal lo// dbang phyug bsod nams gzi byin 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// ston pas lung bstan 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang phyug nyi zla'i 'od ltar zhal gsal zhing// ma rig sgrib pa ma lus sel mdzad pa'i// 'khor bcas lha yi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// me tog phreng la sogs pa dang// rin chen dbyig dang sgog btsod dang// la phug la sogs kun dang ni// 'bras bu yid bzhin sna tshogs zas// phyogs bcu chu skyes dang ni longs spyod rgyan// ris su ma chad mchod pa'i longs spyod dbul// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// zhal zas bdud rtsi dza gad sman gyis mchod// e h+ye hi ma hA ka ru Ni pa ti ma hA rak+sha du pa kha kha khA hi/ pra tIts+tsha/ ma hA pe tA lI kha kha khA hi hUM/ dbang phyug chen po 'khor bcas la// mchod sprin la sogs sna tshogs dang// rdzas dang yo byad dpag mi lang// bla med dang bas mchod 'bul bstod// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i 'od// gdug pa ril mid mdzad pa'i khro gnyer can/ dug gsum rtsad gcod mche ba gtsigs pa po// ye shes spyan gsum nyi zla'i ga'u la// ston pa'i bka' brgyud bla med lung bstan dpal// dam tshig chos kyi 'khor lo rnam snang mdzad// bla re cod pan brjid pas bcings pa na// nges par ston pa bcu yi bdag po 'phags// rtag tu dur khrod 'bar ba'i gnas na bzhugs// dur khrod gnas na ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// nad gtong shrI'i tshogs rnams kun mchod nas// bstan pa bshigs pa'i mdangs 'phrog thal ba'i rdul du rlog/ stobs chen glang po'i pags pa gos su gyon// lha klu gnyan gyi grong khyer thams cad du// lha chen 'dud dpung che btsan gsum pa nas// log 'dren dgra bgegs gzir gdul gnon pa'o// dpa' bo chen po stag gi pags pas mtshan// 'khor du lha yi blon po bzhi yis bskor// phyogs rnams phyogs cha kun tu rnam grangs la// smon lam khyad par mang po'i mthus sbyangs la// sgyu ma lta bur rnam par thar pas rol// phan mdzad dmag dpon khyod la yang// sdug bsngal tsha bas gdungs pa'i sems can la// drag po'i thog chen lu gu rgyud du 'bebs// lha chen dbang phyug khyod la bdag 'dud skyabs su mchi// sngags 'dis lha rnams srog kyang bzung// oM ma hA de ba kA la ka sti dza re sde ri i na hrI se ban dza nA ga ru ru te be kan phu pe he se rbe da de bu pe na de ba te na mA ra ya// khri tsho re zhing bskul bskyed bstod// 'od dang sgra dang dri zhim dang// 'brug dang glog dang thog dang shwa// de rnams 'grub pa'i rtags su ste// dbang du bsdu zhing phrin las bcol// thog rje thag bdag bskul zhing rbad// gnam lcags thog chen 'bebs pa'i lha// chibs su 'brug rta sngon po

chibs// rol du khyung dang seng ge khrid// kha rlangs sprin dang na bun gtibs// shangs nas bu yug khu 'phang 'dril// lcags kyi ser chen ljibs se ljib// shel gyi khu 'phang ri li li// gser thog lcags thog chems se chem// gnam lcags ral gri klad la bskor// gser gyi shang lang glog chen 'khyug/ 'khor gyi lha chen thogs 'bebs te// shar phyogs 'dri za'i zhing khams nas// dri za lha yi blon po yang// dngul gyi gzhu bdungs mda' ltong ste// lag na dngul gyi thog chen 'bebs// dngul gyi thog chen 'u ru ru// ki kang pho mo khral la 'dzud// thog ser skyi 'dang glo bur 'bebs// de bzhin phyogs kyi blon bzhi bskul// thog gi dbab sngags thod par bstim// 'ur chom rbad nal raM shar shar b+h+yo dza rak+sha tsit+ta mA ra ya snying ling rbud/ tsit+ta bam ril kha rag tshal pa bam// rak+sha yak+sha tsit+ta rbad su dza/ 'ur chom rbad nal/ raM shad shad/ rag sha nag po srog la chum chum bob bob// nal shig mA ra ya/ de ni lcags thog dbab po// 'ur chom rbad nal raM raM shad shad de ba srog la chum chum/ rbad rbad 'ur rbad nal shig mA ra ya/ de ni gser thog dbab pa'o// 'ur 'ur chom chom shig shig/ mA ra ya ril ril kha la rbad pu dzaH/ ma hA rA dza kha la rak+sha tsig tsig tsig hril hril bob ya/ des ni zangs thog dbab pa'o// de bzhin thod pa kha sbyar te// dmigs pa'i yul gyi dbus su sba// lcags phur mkhar gyi rmang du sba// zangs phur yul lha'i rten sar sba// de bzhin sbas nas bab gyur na// sbas pa'i rten sar dus su 'bebs// de la the tshom bag mi bya// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ thog dbab pa'i lha'i zla gsang gi skabs te zhe bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos bstan pa gnyan po bsrung ba'i phyir// thog dbab lha'i gsang bsgrub gsungs pa// rma bya dag gi rgyal mtshan la// dmigs pa'i ming rus 'og tu gzhug/ smyug rgod rtsad sor bzhi bzhog la// ling+ga dag gi ske ru gdags// phying dkar gtsang ma gru bzhi gcig/ stegs bu'i steng du bting nas kyang// nas sngon phul gang shar du spung// nub tu til nag phul gang spung// dkyil du rgyal mtshan gzugs par bya// nyin mo sngags bzlas nas kyis brab// nub mo sngags bzlas til gyis brab// sngags rdzogs ri gsum rtser song la// e brkos ming rus nang du gzhug/ rtsang dang mnyam pa'i khung brkos la// dgra la brtse bstan res mos gzhug/ dbang phyug chen por las bcol la// 'o dod bos te gsad cing gnan// myur du thog chen 'bebs 'dod na// rnam par smin pas shi ba'i mgor// ha la ba la ta ka dang// de bzhin sna tshogs nyung dkar nag/ zhing chen lpags pa mtshan

ngan la// yul gyi ming dang brnag pa'i ming// de bzhin bris te der bcug la// spyan drang bzhugs mchod bstim par bya// drag sngags 'di dag rab tu bzlas// ma hA tsaN+Da rak+sha be sha a na ya phob// ha ra tsaN+Da ma hA tsaN+Da yak+sha rak+sha phob// rak+sha ma hA yak+sha b+h+yo/ shar shal hal hal dan d+ha dra tse phob/ pra tse pra tse ha ri ha ri dza ru ti b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rA ga rak+ta tsaN+Da ma hA shag ti nan// d+ha ra tsaN+Da pa tsa pa tsa ha la ha la da ra da ra phaT/ rak+ta tsan ti ma hA yak+sha ti b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ badzra tsi ra badzra d+he wa ha na ha na b+h+yo/ gar 'dod gnas kyi yul lha'i rten// bdun 'bum bzlas bya khru gang gnan// dus min thog chen 'bebs par nges// dung dang a ru dang ni li ga dur rnams la sngags te dgra phyogs su gtor na mdzer 'gyur ro// bag zan la sems can gyi gzugs ci 'dod pa byas la khrag gis byug nas khang pa'i thog tu bzhag na/ sems can de nyid mang por byas nas khang pa'am zhing gseb tu skad ngan 'don cing 'ong ngo// sman 'bri rta sa 'dzin dang/ gi wang la sngags nas rdza mar blugs na gru bu grum bu dang grul bum 'dra yin nam dang srin bur 'gyur ro// phru bar blugs na tshod ma bra mar 'gyur ro// tshon rtsi lnga la sngags nas khyim du bzhag na byi bas khyim dang zhing ldum ra la za mi nus so// mu tig la sngags nas mid na bud med la bu mang po 'ong bar 'gyur ro// smyug shang la sngags nas dbang phyug chen po la mchod nas phyugs 'gab nyung ba'i sker btags na 'gab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rma bya'i rgyal mtshan la sngags nas rtag tu lus la bcangs na mdze 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten khams su thog dbab pa lha'i zla gsang skabs te zhe lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// bstan pa gnyen po bsrung ba dang// 'gal ba cham la dbab pa'i phyir// nad ngan bdag mo ma mo'i zla gsang gsungs// dur khrod la sogs dgon pa'i gnas nyid du// sa bdag mnyes bya ma nyes mkhyen pa gsol// phung ba'i shul nas sa blangs dkyil 'khor brtsig/ mngal khrag rims khrag la sogs chag chag gdab// dug gis dpal bskyed sman gyis dri yang dbyung// dbus su gru gsum brtsegs ma gting du bya// zla gam dmar po 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir ldan// mu khyud zlum po thod pa'i phreng bas bskor// gru chad bar khyams sgo bzhi rigs dang sbyar// gru gsum rtse drug dpal gyi zhal drug bri// dbus su 'jam dpal yab yum sras bcas dgod// 'khor lo bzhi la phung byed ma bzhi dgod// zla gam gsum la nag mo phung gsum dgod// gru chad bzhi la sring mo gdong mo bzhi// rtsibs mchan bzhi la shan pa ma bzhi

dgod// bar khyams dag la sa bdag mo bzhi dgod// lcags ri nag po dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod// de ltar lha re phur pa'i snying po re// dbus su thod pa nag po'i nang dag du// dgra bo'i ming rus gzugs dang bcas pa gzhug/ 'jam dpal yab yum sras kyi gdan du bting// gru gsum rtse mor rabs chad thod pa gsum// gcig tu mi rta ra dang khyi yi khrag/ rims khrag la sogs brgya rtsa brgyad du sbyar// btsan dug la sogs brgya rtsa brgyad du sbyar// thod pa gcig tu yungs kar nyung nag dang// ske tshe lan tshwa thal chen khrag skam sbyar// thod pa gcig tu zangs phye lcags phye dang// rdo phye la sogs mang du sbyar la gzhag/ dug khrag thod pa bal tshon sna lngas bcad// gri mor shi ba'i pags pa'i steng du yang// ra khrag dug sbyar gru bzhi thig kyang gdab// gong bzhin 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i pho brang bcas// gong bzhin bkod ltar rang rang snying po dgod// mtho do sor bzhi'i rtsang gi rtse la brgyang// dkyil 'khor dbus su gur du phub la gzhag/ gtor ma sha chen yod pa bse gab gang// ya mAn+ta ka gshin rje nyid la dbul// g.yas su snel gri mo yi thod pa bum bu lnga pa ru// sgrol ba'i bdag mo e ka tsa ti la// shes rab mtshal dang snel gri'i snying la brten// g.yon du sbyor bdag nag mo re ti la// yugs mo'i thod par mi dbang sha khrag dang// sman dang snying dang khrag tu sbyar la gzhag/ zla gam gsum la nag mo phung gsum la// skyes pa dar ma grir shi'i b+han+da ru// glang nag snying dang pad+ma rak+ta dang// sbrul nag snying dang 'ug pa'i mig 'bras dang// phag rog snying dang bud med klad khrag gzhag/ 'khor lo bzhi la phung byed ma bzhi la// gzhong pa gru gsum nang du yang// khrag sna gsum dang stag seng glang// sad bdag rgyal po'i snying bzhi gzhag/ rtsibs mchan bzhi ru shan pa ma bzhi la// mdze mo'i thod pa'i nang dag tu// snying dang khrag gi gtor ma gzhag/ gru chad gdong mo bzhi yi dam rdzas su// yugs sa mo yi ldan phor du// stag dom ban glang mi snying dang// rang rang khrag tu sbyar la gzhag/ bar khyams bse mo bzhi la yang// ba men rwa'am dung phor du// mar khu sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang// khrag sna mang po sbyar te gzhag/ de ni bsgrub pa'i dam rdzas so// de nas dkyil 'khor byang shar du// sman phud rak+tas sbrus pa la// mchod rten mtho gang gru bzhi pa// dur sol nag pos bskus la gzhag/ de bzhin las kun zin pa dang// dug khrag ming rus bcas pa rnams// mchod rten bum pa'i nang du stsal// lha phyag bya zhing sngags kyang bzlas// mchod rten ma mo brnag pa gsum// chu mig nya lcibs can du sba// ma nyes dbang gzugs mkhyen par gsol// gtor ma gtong ba'i dus tshod

ni// nang par skya rengs shar ba dang// dgang gi dmar thag chad pa la// ma mo'i gtor ma rim par gtang// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang// snang la rang bzhin med pa yi// chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du bsgom// de bzhin rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin// mthing nag hUM gcig gsal bar bsgom// spro bsdus bde gshegs thugs dam bskul// 'gro ba'i don byas slar 'dus pas// gser gyi rdo rje rtse lngar gyur// ya mAn+ta ka badzra ma hA kro d+ha zhes brjod pas// gtum chen ya mAn+ta kar gyur// dbu drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis pa// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal bar bsgom// g.yas su k+Sha las sgrol bdag mo// e ka dza ti gsal bar bsgom// g.yon du ma las sbyor bdag mo// nag mo re ma ti ru bsgom// yab yum sbyor ba'i byang sems las// lhag par yi ge ma gsum 'phros// stong gsum mas khyab 'gro don byas// slar 'dus zla gam gsum la babs// yig 'bru gsum gyis dbang bskur te// nag mo phung gsum gsal bar bsgom// 'khor lo bzhi la phung byed bzhi// rtsibs mchan bzhi la shan pa bzhi// gru chad bzhi la gdong mo bzhi// bar khyams bzhi la bse mo bzhi// lcags ri la yang dbang phyug ma// sku mdog cha lugs gsal bar bsgom// de bzhin bsgoms pa'i ma rnams la// spyan drang phyag 'tshal bzhugs mchod dbul// dgyes bstod bcol bskul phrin las bcol// tha ma las kyi sbyor bas gsad// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka kA la ru pa hUM phaT/ oM sa ma ya shrI many+dzu ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka tsa ti dza dza/ trag rak+sha kha mun tra mu ru mu ru hUM b+h+yoH/ rag mo te ke tsa tsha kha la b+h+yo ru lu ru lu ma ti b+h+yoH/ ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me dza dza/ du ni dun ting du ya ya dza dza/ du ru dza la ha na dza dza/ du ma ra he de dza dza/ rus snying khrag kha la rak+sha rbad thuM li li// nr-i sha ku ru rak+ta kha raM ni/ ku ni ku ru ku ru khaM raM rbad thuM ri li li// snying la rak+sha ni sha sti sta rbad na thuM ri li li// trag rak+sha mu tra snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ oM ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me b+h+yo/ ma rak+mo rak+mo snying rtsa la b+h+yo/ rag mo dgra snying kha rag b+h+yo/ rag mo tsan mo b+h+yo/ khrag la mu sha ma b+h+yo/ ku ma d+ha ri b+h+yo// k+Shu la d+ha ri b+h+yo/ tsa mun d+ha ri b+h+yo/ kaM ka d+ha ri b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ de rnams srog gi snying po ste// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe dang// rdo phye lcags phye'i rdzas rnams kyis// stong stong bzlas shing thun la bstim// de bzhin grub pa'i rtags rnams 'ong// me dang sgra dang du ba dang// rdzas dang 'od dang skad 'don dang// rmi lam rtags dang nyams su ston// gang tshe rtags kyi drod tshad gzung// gang nye dag la gtor ma gtang// las dang rbad sngags srog bzhin sbyar/ ya mAn+ta ka/ ya ma rA dza ma ma e

ka tsa ti nr-i dza b+h+yo// ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me b+h+yo/ du ni dun ting du la ya b+h+yo// ma ru trag rak+sha ma ma b+h+yo// ma ma ru ru rag mo b+h+yo// snying kha rak+sha ti stam b+h+yo// rag mo ma mo khong gi snying la ya b+h+yo// rag mo tsa pa/ khrag la mu sha snying tsa ro ru tsa pa la ma b+h+yo// snying shig dmar mo dun b+h+yo// snying rtsa la dmar mo dun b+h+yo// snying khrag la dmar mo dun b+h+yo// tsit+ta phyang dmar mo dun b+h+yo// de ni ma mo'i rbad sngags te// rang rang grub pa'i rtags dang sbyar// de nas gsad pa'i las bya na// rang rang grub pa'i rtags dang sbyar// ma mos gsod pa'i thun sngags dang// rang rang rims nad dbab pa'i thabs// gshin rje gshed pos dbang bsdus la// e ka tsa tis rgyu gzer dbab// gong gi rjes blangs sngags 'dis brdeg/ trag rak+sha kha mun tra ma ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rag mo te ku+u ma tsa tsa kha ya ma ting b+h+yoH/ ru lu ru lu ma ti b+h+yo/ rak+sha thun b+h+yo dza dza/ shi ri thun/ mang sa thun/ d+ha ru la thun// b+hi ma ru tse dgra bo la thun b+h+yo// phaT pha Ta/ ru ru+u bi ma ru tse kha thim mo nag mo rtsal yaM/ srog la thun snying la thibs// gong gi drag po'i rdzas blangs la// e ka dza tis mdze nad gtong// trag rak+sha kha 'dar kha 'dar so chum so chum// na ga rA dza ma ga mug sdom// baM ri li li// baM ri li li// dgra bo mA ra ya dza dza/ de bzhin drag po'i rdzas blangs la// re ma ti yis nad ngan dbab// myog myog shig shig tsit+ta baM shig shig tsit+ta baM/ myog mug ti ri rgyob/ tsit+ta baM byung/ chod cig thums shig long long thuM long/ yer yer/ mer mer sod/ ru ru shi tri tri ma ru sod sod// srog thum mug sod// ma ra du rbad ya sod// kha rug sha sha ma sod// srog thuM nr-i ni rbad sod/ nr-i ni ya tsa thuM sod/ gang grub rtags dang sbyar te gsad// de nas thun dang 'khor lo de// mchod rten bum par stsal bar bya// chu mig nang gnan dpang yang gzug/ yab yum 'og gi gzugs ming la// rang rang phur pa'i sngags kyis gsad// dkyil 'khor 'brub khung nang du gnan// snying la rten bca' gtor ma gtang// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ nad ngan dbab pa ma mo'i zla gsang skabs te zhe drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'gal ba cham la dbab slad du/ ma mo stong gi las mkhan ma// nag mo mi pham srid gsum mgon// dpal ldan nag mo re ma ti// nad kyi bdag mo'i zla gsang gsungs// dang por mchod dang sdig bshags sogs// rim pa ji bzhin stong mthar bsgom// 'byung ba rim lnga'i gzhal yas bskyed// sems kyi rang bzhin gshed po ste// snying las 'phros te spyan drangs te// sbyangs spar rtogs pas gtor ma brlab// srog gi snying po dbul bar bya// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho de yis brlab// bar du skul tshig (13)

gang rung bskul// de nas bsgrub par bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// zla gam dmar po gsum gyis bskor// gru chad bar khyams sgo bzhir ldan// shin tu drag po'i snod nang du// tsit+ta dang ni rak+ta dang// btsan dug rnams ni blug par bya// nal bu'i sha dang shes rab mtshal// nal bu'i b+han+da nang du blugs// nal bu'i snying la rtag tu bod// bya nag lug nag rten du bca'// nal bu'i gsob gos la yang la rma bya'i gdongs// dar nag 'phur lce btags te bzung// gtor ma spyan gzigs ldan pas bskang// 'bod pa rbad pa bsad pa'i sngags// nyung dkar nyung nag rdzas rnams la// bdun 'bum grangs ni tshang gyur na// rims nad sna tshogs char bzhin 'bebs// lha mo srog gi yang tig 'di// snying nas 'dren pa'i mchog yin no// ma ma trag rak+sha snying kha rag tsit+ta srog dung dung dza dza hUM phaT/ ma mo rbad pa'i dgu tig 'di// snying nas 'dren pa'i mchog yin no// ma raka mo thum ril snying rtsa 'dus// srog phrig phrig shaM shaM khyer b+h+yo// snying khrag rtsa srog breng breng rbad rbad// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ ma srog rug rug khrag la snying rbud/ ma srog thun snying la ma b+h+yo/ mA ra ya ni phaT/ kha thuM ni dza dza/ ma mo gsad tig nag mo 'di// rims nad khrag skyugs nad kyis gsod// ma mo rang gi snying khrag gis thuM ril rbad// thang mu le thang mu le che ge mo'i tsit+ta la rbad rbad// tsa thang tsa thang che ge mo'i tsit+ta la rbad rbad// muM sni muM sni che ge mo'i tsit+ta la rbad nan nan// rag mo ni rag mo ni kha long tsit+ta rbad// dug sni dug sni kha long tsit+ta rbad// kyi kha lo kyi kha lo tsit+ta rbad rbad// swa sti tsa ti tsa ti yang/ swa sti tsit+ta rbad rbad/ nr-i sti nr-i sti tsit+ta mug mug thuM thuM sub sub ti sta rbad rbad/ kha 'dar yed yed thuM thuM rbad rbad se kha lo mu kha lo rbad rbad swA hA/ bdag nyid gshin rje gshed por rab bsgom ste// bdag nyid gshed po'i thugs las ma 'phros te// yi ge mthing nag ma yis stong gsum gang// phar 'phros bde gshegs rnams kyi thugs dam bskul// slar 'dus sems dpa'i ma la thim par byas// de 'phros maN+Dal ma la lhan gyis 'bab// yig 'bru gsum gyis dbang bskur byin brlabs nas// ma las lha ma nyid kyis skur gyur te// sku mdog nag mo shin tu gtum pa la// shin tu sgeg pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// ral gri b+han+da dmar 'khyil g.yas rim bzhin// shak+ti tri shUl mgul nas dar dpyangs g.yon// ral gcig sbreng ba'i lan bu g.yon du 'khyil// skra sked sbrul la thod pa'i phreng thod can// rna ltag me tog dar nag cod pan 'phur// snyan g.yas sbrul gyi gdengs ka yi// mgul nas sil snyan 'khrol ba la// snyan cha g.yon pa seng ge 'phyo// thod pa skam rlon do shal byas// bong bu+u gwa pa'i chibs

la zhon// gzhan yang che ba'i rgyan dang gdug pa'i rgyan// stong gis brgyan pa gsal bar bsgom// ting 'dzin sems dpa'i sku las 'od zer ni// lcags kyu 'bar ba'i 'od zer phar 'phros te// bdag nyid chen mo'i srog nas rab bskul te// srid pa'i ma mos stong gsum khengs par byas// gshin rje'i tshogs kyang de bzhin te// srog la rngam pa kun gyis bskor bar bsams// de lta bu ni yang nas yang du ste// de ltar thib thib yod snyam cho 'phrul 'byung// de lta bu yi bar du bsgom par bya// yengs par gyur na cis kyang mi 'grub po// gtso mo la sogs srid pa'i ma mo yis// gang la bya ba'i snying nas rab bzung ste// skra grol mig rtsa rig rig 'o dod tse re re/ gan bub bsgyel zhing kha nas khrag skyugs 'byung// ci mdzad 'on tang zer zhing dbugs dang bral la khad// thun khung nang du rab tu 'jug par bsam// de ltar bsgom la gshed pos dbang du bsdu// mnyes pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa 'di skad dbul// dpal ldan nag mo mi pham srid gsum mgon// bdag don rnam thar gsum la thugs gzhol yang// snying rje'i dbang gis rjes la thob ba yi// shes rab sna tshogs dag gis 'gro don mdzad// lha mo sku mdog nag mo char sprin mdog/ mtshan mo nag mo shin tu gtum pa'i sku// shin tu sgeg cing keng rus lus 'chang ma// zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis rab tu brjid// ral pa gcig sbreng lan bu g.yon du 'khyil// skra sked sbrul la thod pa'i phreng thod can// rna ltag me tog dar nag cod pan 'phur// khrag gi chang gis ra ro spyan gsum dmar// mi ro rengs ba khar bcug mche ba bzhi// rnam par gtsigs nas shin tu khrag la dgyes// snyan g.yas sbrul gyi mgul nas dril gsil zhing// gdug pa brtul nas tshangs pa'i sgra sgrogs ma// snyan cha g.yon pa seng ge ral pa dmar// dpa' mo seng ge sgra sgrogs ma// phyag bzhi g.yas kyi dang po ral gri bsnams// 'og ma thod pa b+han+da dmar bskyil 'dzin// g.yon gyi dang po mtshon cha shak+ti bsnams// 'og ma tri shul mgul na dar nag 'phyangs// shak+ti ral gri mtshon chas bcad pa yi// lha ma yin la sogs pa'i thod pas do shal byas// glang po po che yi stod g.yogs gos su mdzes// smad ni ban glang ko bas dkris pa la// phyed ni re lde sngon po'i sham bu can// klu yi dbang po bzhi yis sked bcings can// zhabs gnyis lcags sgrog dag gis mdzes par brgyan// khrag zhag thig le mang pos tshom bur bris// bong gwa zhon nas mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu// bong bu'i rmig pa glog gi shugs 'chang ma// khams gsum skad cig tsam gyis 'khor bar byed// skad ni dung dang 'brug gi sgra sgrogs shing// ma mo mkha' 'gro sha

za dbang du sdud// lho phyogs gshin rje'i pho brang rtag tu gnas// dam pa'i sa nas gzugs sku gnyis gzigs ma// ting 'dzin dbang thob gzugs khams gnas su byon// tshangs pa'i rgyal po sogs kyis phyag byas ma// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ya thar byon pa'i tshe// dbang phyug chen po'i sku la dgyes 'khril ba// sum cu rtsa gsum tshal bzhir byon pa'i tshe// lha rnams dbugs phyung brgya byin phyag byas ma// lha ma yin rnams phung bar byed pa'i tshe// lha min rgyal po kun gyis phyag byas ma// sku mdog ri rab che dang 'gran pa'i tshe// lte ba'i thad ka'i phyogs nas nyi zla 'char// rgyal chen phyogs skyong lha yis phyag byas ma// rgya mtsho'i gting nas me 'bar mtsho skyem ma// sa 'og dbang po kun gyis phyag byas ma// lha mo khyod kyi cho 'phrul skur bstan pas// bdud dang gshin rje'i rgyal po 'dar zhing 'dud// ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za sngangs shing brgyal// tsit+ta rin chen gur phub gzhal yas na// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ga bur 'bar// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten drug gi bcud bsdus nas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim mdzad ma// dug gi rlangs pas nag po'i phyogs rnams kyi// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad ni khong na bslangs// de phyir nad kyi bdag mo dam la 'du// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bdud rtsi'i bcud bsdus nas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim mdzad ma// bdud rtsi bslangs pas dkar po'i phyogs rnams kyi// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad ni rtsad nas gcod// de phyir bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal mo dam la 'du// gang zhig khyod la dad na ma bas byams// de phyir ma gcig nad 'joms sman gyi gtso// lha mo khyod la rtag tu bdag gis bstod// rgyal ba shAkya thub pa'i spyan snga ru// dus 'dir bdag gis dam bcas ji srid du// dkar po'i phyogs kyi nad dang sdug bsngal sogs// zhi bar byed cing tshe dang longs spyod sdud// nag po'i tshogs ni dgug cing dbang du sdud// smyo 'bog lkugs pa'i las 'di myur du bgyis// bstan pa bsrung phyir myur du grub par bgyi// 'di las 'das na rgyal ba'i bka' bslus pas// dus gsum rgyal ba'i rdo rjes mgo dang snying 'gems shog/ de skad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar dam bcas pa'i// dam bcas bzhin du phrin las myur du gyis// rnal 'byor bdag dang bdag gi 'khor rnams la// khyed kyi zhal nas bdud rtsi'i char phob la// nad sogs sdug bsngal tshogs ni zhi bar mdzod// tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod 'phel bar mdzod// zang zing longs spyod 'bru yi phung po dang// rin chen rkang 'gros phyugs rnams 'phel bar mdzod// bla ma smod cing dkon mchog dbu 'phod smod// bdag la dge ba'i bar chad byed pa'i dgra// khyod

kyis khong nas dug gi rlung bus la// 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad ni 'du ru chug/ bag gzhi sa la lhung nas rdebs su chug/ don snying rnam lnga khong nas khrag skyugs chug/ las ngan 'khor tshogs cho nges brdung du chug/ mkha' lding rgyal po'i tshogs kyis ltas ngan phob/ dam bcas bzhin du phrin las myur du grub par mdzod// ces bstod cing phrin las bcol gyur na// gang 'dod rims nad phyogs su 'bebs// ma mos srog bsdus te gsad par bya'o// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ yams nad kyi bdag mo ma mo'i zla gsang gi skabs te zhe bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad gsungs so// 'gal ba cham la 'bebs 'dod pas// nad ngan sna tshogs dbab pa la// ma mo gsang bsgrub zla gsang gsungs// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud dag la// thabs kyi sbyor ba mang yod kyang// bsdu na rnam pa bzhi ru 'dus// bla med bsgrub mthu rang byung ste// 'jig rten bsgrub pa 'don gyi mthu// rten 'brel sgyu ma'i sbyor ba bzhin// rdzas kyi nus pa dag las 'byung// gdon dang rdzas su bcas pa las// rnam grangs ma nges khyad par mang// rnam pa gnyis ni gsal bya ste// rdzas dang gdon du bcas pas bstan// myur du gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// gang yang 'di las yod ma yin// ma mo nag smug dkar mo dang// dmar mo tshogs kyi nang dag nas// rims nad gtang ba mang yod kyang// kun gyi phyag brnyan re ma ti// 'di dag bsgrub ste las sbyar na// rims nad gang 'dod stong gsum 'gengs// 'di yi las ni 'di ltar bya// rgyu gzer dag gis shi ba'i khrag/ btsan dug thar nub sres nas kyang// bse zho dag dang mar du sbyar// sngags 'dis btab ste ltor yang gtang// ru ru shi tri kri ma du sod srog thuM mugs sod/ ma rag ru rbad ya sod// ni ya ni ya tsa thun sod/ sha rbud snying phyung/ snying rgyud srog chod/ srog thun dbugs longs/ ma ma thum thum sod sod/ ces 'bum 'bum bzlas te ltor gtang na/ rgyu gzer khrag tu bshal te 'chi/ de nas yang bse zho dang btsan dug la sngags 'di bzlas/ ru ru ti rbad ya/ ba la du du rbad ya/ chuM chuM ni ma tsa rbad ya/ shag pa du du ya chems chems rbad ya/ rbad bu shag rbad ya/ rag thum mugs rbad ya/ ru ru ra pa ni du+u ma ma ti rbad ya/ zhes 'bum bzlas te lus la reg pa'i gos la bskus na lhog pa dkar pos 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang bse zho dang btsan dug dang bya ba tsha tshong dang mdze khrag dang mdze bo'i shu+u ba kun sbyar la mar dang dri ma bsres/ da du+u ma sha khug du sha ma ma baM gol du/ du tri ma ma snying phyung/ sa ma ya ma ma srog chod/ du shag du ya ma ma ti ru ma ti ya/ sha sha ma ma rbad bu ya ya/ nr-i

nr-i b+h+yo b+h+yo sod sod/ ma ru ya ma ru ya tshal pa rbad yed yed sha thuM sha thuM rbad/ tsa dur ma ma du rbad/ sha thuM ya ma b+h+yo/ sha sha tsa thuM ma ya b+h+yo/ zhes khri'am 'bum du bzlas/ sha la reg pa'i gos la bskus na mdze dang phol 'bras kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro// mdze khrag chang dang sbyar nas stor btang na snying la babs te rus mdze dang mdze nad 'thor bas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang dug rdzas dang rims khrag sna tshogs sbyar nas gong gi sngags rnams drag tu zlas te/ yul khams gyi lha rten nam/ chu mig klu btsan yod nges pa'i sa'am/ brag klu btsan yod pa'i sar gtor na rims nad sna tshogs na bun bzhin gtibs nas 'ong ba dang/ thog mer 'ong ba dang/ ser ba drag tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ nad ngan sna tshogs gtang ba'i skabs te zhe brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'gal ba cham la dbab pa'i phyir// smyo 'bog ging gi zla gsang gsungs// dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// bla ma mnyes pa'i rim gro bya// lta ba yangs shing spyod lam goms// slob dpon mnyes pa'i thugs gzung nas// man ngag thugs la phur te bsgrub// ri gsum rtse'am brag dkar ram// lha khang dur khrod spe'u dang// yang na brag phug shar bltas su// rtsa na phrag yod rtsi shing skyes// shar du kha bltas zur gsum 'dra// rgyab ri mchad pa seng ge spungs// de ru gnas btsal sa chog bya// sa bdag lha klu zhi ba'i phyir// gser skyems btang la bden pa bdar// 'di skad brjod la bsgom par bya// bdag ming 'di zhes rnal 'byor pas// phyogs 'dir sgrol ba'i ging chen po// srog bdag dkar po snying 'byin zhes// rnal 'byor rnams kyi dgra bla che// rig 'dzin srog shing 'di bsgrub pas// deng 'dir sa bdag lha klu rnams// gnas gzhan dag tu 'pho bar gyis// sa gzhi 'di yang bkra shis mdzod// ma nyes dpang gzug yus ka gsol// de nas stegs bu brtsig pa yang// dra phyir ras sam dar bting la// nas 'bras 'bru yi gcal yang dgram// ga pur dza ti pha la dang// rgya spos la sogs dri spos dgram// yol ba bla re 'phan gdugs bres// srog bdag dkar po snying 'byin ni// ras la bris sam lugs sku gcig/ shar nas nub tu gzigs pa gzhag/ 'bras la sogs pa'i bshos cha la// lha bshos ri rab tshul 'dra bya// de yi phyogs bzhir mar khus byug/ dbus su smyug ma tshigs gsum la// bya rgod ldem phod za 'og dang// bse dang gser dang byi ru dang// pags blud dkar pos brgyan pa gzug/ gzhan yang sha dang nya sha dang// thud khrum la sogs spyan gzigs kyis// de yi mtha' ma bskor te

dgram// spos dang me tog mar me dang// rnga gling pi wang dung la sogs// sku gzugs de yi mtha' mar bzhag/ tsan+dan dkar po'i chu la sogs// dung phor 'khar phor bkang ba gnyis// sku gzugs de yi tha mar dgram// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe yang// drag po sngags kyi mtshon du gzhag/ gzhan yang sgor nga sna tshogs dang// khur ba'i rnam grangs mang po nang// sgog pa sman dang dri spos rnams// bris sku de yi mtha' mar dgram// gshin rje gshed po'i skur bsgom la// snying po brgya rtsa brgyad du gdon/ oM a kro te ka ya man+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ oM kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+t+r-I bi kr-i tA nan hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bdag la byin brlab lus bsrung bya// de nas dbang du gyur pa dang// rgyal po btsun pa'i las bya'o// spyan drang phyag 'tshal bzhugs su gsol// phyag chab gsol dang gdan skyems drang// mchod pa 'bul zhing bstod pa bgyi// 'dzab bzlas dam tshig drag tu bsre// rgyal po'i srog snying 'di skad brjod// oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka dza ti nri dza dza/ tri tsa pa la a shug me swA hA/ shes ni khri 'bum grangs bsnyen bya// rdzas kyis mchod cing rtag tu bzlas// grub nas sngags 'dis rab tu rbad// ha li hu li baM ril nr-i dza/ la li pra ma ni/ ri rtse thal pa ni/ kro ti ko la ya/ kro ti ko la sha/ sham tri sha mu tI/ mu ri re tri/ tri raM tri/ haM shag haM shag ru// che ge mo tsit+ta la dza/ de bzhin rgyal po drag tu rbad// gal te las byed ma btub na// rgyal po shi sa 'di yis bstan// ma ra na pra ma ra tsa tsi ta pa li a li sa ma ya aM ku sha dza dza/ phyag rgya bzhi yis gzugs bcings te// sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod// rgyal po rang la dbang med par// rdul nag khrag tu 'dzag cing 'ong// de bzhin gsad pa'i las thabs kyang// smyo 'bog shi ba'i ldan phor du// de nyid rang gi snying khrag dang// dug sna gsum dang mi khrag dang// brnag pa'i ming rus bris te gzhug/ dur khrod ro ras rnying pa la// gsod pa'i 'khor lo bca' bar gsungs// dang po nyi ma bzhi pa'i sngags// de yi phyi rim rgyal po'i drag sngags bri// yang rim klu yi drag sngags bri// thod pa dril la rgya gram bcing// nyin bzhin lha yi ging bzhi bskul// skabs su ging chen bco brgyad bskul// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las kyang bya// oM ma hA rA dza thun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i srog la thibs/ mug ma ra na thun/ dgra bo'i snying shag/ tshal pa dum/ dgra bo'i bkrag la sem/ rlag dza ru thibs chug dgra bo'i khrag la 'jib/ b+hi ba b+hi ba dun dza/ mAM sa la dza/ snying ta snying la dun/ khrag ta khrag la thun b+h+yo thun b+h+yo mugs/ nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe la/ drag tu sngags la brdeg par bya// dkar po gcig gis thugs dam bskang// rtags kyang 'di

bzhin ston par nges// nyi zla 'char dang lder so dang// 'bag tu rmis na tha mar bshad// btsad po zhang blon dge bshes sam// dmag dpon rmis na 'bring du bshad// rgyal po nyid mthong nyams su ston// de ltar byung na rab tu bshad// bskang bshags bya zhing dngos grub blang// dam tshig bsre zhing phrin las bcol// de nas 'khor lo thod par bca'// shar du kha bltas chu mig ngor// rgyal rigs sbyor ba byas gyur na// smyo 'bog mdze dang lhog pas 'chi// thun du 'phangs na mdze rigs 'ong// mkhar rmang gnan na gnam lcags 'bab// 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ rgyal po phyi ltar sgrub pa smyo 'bog gi skabs te zhe dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos rgyal po nang du bsgrubs te smyo 'bog gtong ba 'di gsungs so// thog mar bla ma mnyes byas shing// sgrib pa sbyong zhing dam tshig bsrung// mtshan ldan dgon pa'i gnas nyid du// lta ba rgya bskyed 'jam dpal bsnyen// bla ma mnyes pa'i rim gro bya// dkyil 'khor brtsig dang chag chag gdab// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// thig bzhi btab la le'u tshe dgu// dbus kyi le'u tshe dkar po la// shar ser lho sngo nub dmar byang ni ljang// mtshams bzhi smug nag sgo dang bcas// dbus su gru gsum re re bri// de nas tsan+dan dkar po'am// rgya shug dkar po'i phur pa dgu/ srog bdag dgu ru mnga' gsol la// dar dkar srog snying bris te gdags// 'di skad brjod la dgod par bya'o// hUM/ dbus phyogs shel re shel gyi khang pa nas// khams gsum srog la mnga' mdzad pa// srog bdag nag po ral pa can// bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol// bsam pa bsgrub phyir gshegs nas kyang// pho brang dbus kyi le'u tshe la// dgra bgegs bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ging ka ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan// zhes dbus su dgod do// rgyal rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa// srog bdag rgyal po khu le shod// dkyil 'khor shar gyi le'u tshe la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// bram ze'i srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po ag ge yang// lho phyogs dkyil 'khor le'u tshe la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// rjes rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa'i// rgyal po chen po ug ge yang// de bzhin nub kyi phyogs su dgod// dmangs rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po bram ze yang// de bzhin byang gi phyogs su dgod// bud med srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po shang ze yang// dkyil 'khor shar lho'i le'u tsher dgod// byis pa'i srog la mnga' mdzad pa'i// rgyal po chen po da khod kyang// dkyil

'khor lho nub le'u tsher dgod// mi nag srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po ni khod kyang// nub byang dkyil 'khor le'u tsher dgod// byol song srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po nyi zla yang// byang shar dkyil 'khor le'u tsher dgod// de nas mchog gi phur pa bzhi// nyin bzhi'i ging bzhir mnga' gsol la// ris mthun dar gyi cod pan gdags// phrin las bcol phyir sgo bzhir gdab// dar skud gsum dril mtha' ma bskor// bla rgyan logs rgyan ci mang dgram// dar dkar gur phub za 'og gdan yang bting// de nas dbus kyi srog bdag la// gtsang phye bre gang lha bshos la// ri rab tshul 'dra zhig byas la// dbus su smyug ma tshigs dgu la// mtshal gyi mkhar thabs nya mig bri// rtse la bya rgod rgyal mtshan dang// dar dkar gdugs gcig steng nas dgab// dngul gyi g.yer kha g.yag rnga phon// lpags bu dkar po'i blud bu gdags// tha ma'i tshigs la ming rus gdags// gzhan yang smyug ma tshigs gsum brgyad// mtshal dang ldong ros sgo sprad la// mkhar thabs bris la rtse kha sprad// lce la dar lce re yang gdags// bar bar ra dkar blud bu dang// dung dang zangs dang rin po che// byu ru mgron bu sa gser gdags// tha ma'i tshigs la ming rus gdags// lcang ma mtho re ba bzhi la// mtshal lam rams kyis g.yung drung bris// thod rer la lpags ming rus re// de bzhin btags la sgo bzhir gzhag/ gzhan yang thud dang nya sha dang// bu ram gtor ma 'bras chan dang// za 'og dar dang pags dkar dang// rin chen bstsal la phyogs bzhir gzhag/ gcig ni dbus su gzhag par bya// nya phyis dung phor 'khar gzhong du// gser dang chang phud sbyar ba lnga// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru gzhag/ gcig tu mtshe dang nyung nag dang// chang phud gangs chu chu mig chu// de gsum gcig tu bsres la gzhag/ drag sngags rgyun du bzlas pa'i phyir// bdag nyid shar bltas sngon du gzhag/ gzhan yang spos dang me tog dang// mar me dri chab rnga gling dang// mchod pa'i yo byad phyogs bzhir dgram// ra lug dkar po gang yod pa// ra dang ze ba dmar por byug/ ske ru dar dkar khug ma ru// mtshe nyung klu sman sna tshogs dang// dgra yi ming byang bcug la gdags// nub tu dar 'phan dkar po la// 'phan lce ser po btags pa gcig/ rgyal po'i gzugs bris mdung la gdags// rtse la snying gcig bkal la gzug/ gshin rje gshed por mnga' gsol la// sngags bzlas bstod pa mang du bya// ber gyon thod bcing rnga yang brdung/ snyan gsan dbab dang spyan drang dang// phyag 'tshal bzhugs dang mchod pa dbul// bstod pa dbul zhing smon lam gdab// thugs

dam bskang zhing phrin las bcol// srog snying 'di ni rtag tu drangs// oM tri stu ti bya 'gyur ra ka la mA ra mA ra ya swA hA/ de ni srog bdag rang gi snying po'o// 'di ni 'khor srog bdag gi snying po'o// oM khu le ma hA be raM swA hA/ oM ag ge ru rta swA hA/ oM ug ge sha ma le swA hA/ oM drang zi rta ba swA hA/ oM shang ze shang ka ra swA hA/ oM da khod bi si yang swA hA/ oM ni khod ba ra hi te swA hA/ oM sUr+Ya tsan+d+ra ma ta khu le swA hA/ de rnams srog gi snying po'o// mi tshig g.yal dang sbrid pa spang// skya rengs shar nas 'khor rnams bskul// grub pa'i rtags rnams ston par nges// rab 'bring tha ma gsum du 'ong// rab la sku ni dngos su ston// 'bring la 'od dang sgra ru ston/ tha mar rmi lam ltas su ston// de la dbang bskur dam bsre bya// rbad sngags bgrangs shing phrin las bcol// A+oM ma hA pra ma na rak+sha rak+ta tsa ra mun tra ma hA shi de tso ka tsa la bing bing dgra bo mA ra ya hab hab// de ni rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams las la rbad pa'o// de nas rta dkar po'i thod pa'i nang brnag pa'i ming rus bcug la/ rta thod za 'og dag gis gril// dam sri smyo ru gzhug pa'i phyir// khrag skam gu gul sbyar ba dang// mtshe nyung go ro tsa na la// smyo 'bog gtang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM mA ma ma rang ga thun b+h+yo/ ma hA rA dza thun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma hA ba b+ha b+ha ma hA de ba ma hA ru tra b+h+yo b+h+yo/ oM tro ta ya tro ta ya/ tra ta ya tra ta ya/ k+Shu lha k+Shu lha ging ka ra ging ka ra/ ging dz+wa la ging dz+wa la/ yak+sha gr-i ba/ yak+sha gr-i ba/ d+ha sha grI ba d+ha sha grI wa/ phu tra dkar po b+h+yo b+h+yo/ de ni srog bdag 'khor gyi smyo 'bog tu sngags so// de nas brnag pa'i ming rus la// rang rang rtsa ba'i sngags brjod cing// phur pa rnams kyis rim pas gdab// gtso bo'i phur pa snying la gdab// khu le shod kyi gsang bar gdab// rgyal po ag ge lag pa g.yas// rgyal po ug ge dpung par gdab// rgyal po drang ze'i lag pa g.yon// shang ze'i rkang pa g.yas su gdab// da khod dpung mgo g.yas su gdab// ni khod dpung mgo g.yon la gdab// nyi zlas rkang pa g.yon la gdab// gsad pa nyi ma bzhi pa ste// nyin bzhi lha yi ging bzhi bya// de nas rta yi thod pa ru// ling+ga'i thed shul mthun rdzas stsal// lha khang rnams la btags gyur na// smyo 'bog khrag skyugs mA ra ya// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ smyo 'bog gi zla gsang las rgyal po nang ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te lnga bcu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos rgyal po gsang bar sgrub pa'i thabs thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa 'di gsungs so// rnal 'byor yon tan ldan pa des// bla ma mnyes pa rab byas te// mgo ni rma bya bzhin du dgug/ dam tshig chen po srog bzhin bsrung// gzhan

don ma yin rang don du// dur khrod sa phug dgon par 'gro// phyi bshags sdig sbyangs bsod nams bsag/ ma nyes dbang gzugs glud gtor gtang// dkyil 'khor brtsig la chag chag gdab// thig gdab dkyil 'khor cho ga bya// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum bri// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thod phreng bcas// gru chad sgo bzhi ldan pa la// dur khrod rgyan dang ldan pa la// gru gsum me 'od 'bar ba bri// sgo bzhi gru gsum re re bri// de nas mchog gi phur pa dgu// srog bdag dgu yi sngags bris la// dbus su dkar po snying 'byin dgod// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal bar bskyed// shar phyogs rtsibs la khu le dgod// lho yi rtsibs la ag ge dgod// nub kyi rtsibs la ug ge dgod// byang gi rtsibs la drang ze dgod// shang ze shar la da khod lho// ne khod nub la nyi zla byang// de ltar sgo bzhir dgod par bya// 'khor gzhong dung phor bse gab tu// snying sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bsham// lug dkar snying srog ma bral ba// srog rtsa'i nang du ming rus gzhug/ snying rtse gyen du bstan la gzhag/ dar dkar tshil gyis kha bcad la// dbus su srog bdag nyid la gzhag/ shar du khrag sna'i gtor ma gzhag lho ru sha sna'i gtor ma gzhag/ nub tu rus pa'i gtor ma gzhag/ byang du mkhal ma'i gtor ma gzhag/ de nas sgo bzhi'i gtor ma yang// shar sgor mchin pa sna tshogs gzhag/ lho sgor sha chen 'bru sna gzhag/ nub sgor mcher pa sna tshogs gzhag/ byang sgor tshil bu sna tshogs gzhag/ gtor ma de dag nang du yang// bshos bu mkhyid re btsugs la gzhag/ de la smyug rgod re la yang// phod dkar pags bu dkar po dang// ming byang re yang btags la gzhag/ phyogs ma nor bar gzhag pa yang// man 'jil steng du gzhag par bya// shar du lug dkar lho ru ra// nub tu byang dkar byang du khyi// bag zan gzugs byas dkar por bsgyur// sems can dngos su yod na rab// med na gang rung gcig gi sker// ming rus bris te gdags par bya// dkyil 'khor lho nub 'brub khung du// dam sri'i gzugs dang ming rus gzhug/ sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma la// tsil chen zhal khebs yod pa la// rak+ta'i gsang nan chas pa gcig/ dkyil 'khor byang shar mtshams su gzhag/ ting 'dzin rnams gsum gsal bar bsgom// gzhal yas gdan bcas spyan drang bskyed// bdag nyid gshed por gsal bsgom la// rgyal po 'khor bcas gsal bar bsgoms// spyan drang bzhugs mchod tshul bzhin bya// rtag tu snying po 'di yang bzlas// oM 'bar sha ma hA rA dza swA hA/ oM khu le ma hA be ra ma swA hA/ A+oM ag ge ru rta swA hA/ oM ug ge ma le swA hA/ oM drang ze ba b+hA swA hA/ oM shang ze

shang ka ram swA hA/ oM da khod pi pi pha ra swA hA/ oM ni khod ba ra hi ti swA hA/ oM sUr+ya tsan+d+ra ma hA khu le swA hA/ de ni rtsa ba'i drag sngags te/ grub rtags sku yang dngos su ston// me dang 'od dang sgra yang ston// sgra dang byi la seng ge 'bag/ dge bshes btsad po lta bu dang// dmag dpon lta bur ston par nges// rgyal po drag tu sngags 'dis rbad// oM ma hA dra ma rak+sha rak+ta tsa ra mu tra ma hA ni te tso ka tsa la bing bing dgra bo mA ra ya hab hab/ 'khor bcas las la gtang ba'o// lha dang dbye ba drag po'i sngags 'dis dbral// ma hA sa ma ya rak+sha ma hA rA dza thun thun phrol phrol// de nas bsgrub pa thon nas kyang// gsad pa'i phur pas gdab pa ni// dbus nas phyung la 'di skad do// hUM/ khro bdag chen po snying 'byin gyis// dpa' bo chen por dbang bskur bas// dgra snying dkar nag mtshams su gdab// btab nas myur du brlag gyur cig/ kI li kI la ya tsit+ta mugs// dkar po snying 'byin lhan lhan// hUM/ khro bdag chen po khu le shod// gsod pa'i phur par byin brlabs te// phrag khyim g.yas dang g.yon du gdab// btab pas khrag skam myur du gsod// badzra mu ti tsa sha rak+ta rngubs lhan// hUM/ khro bdag srog bdag ag ge yang// 'gugs pa'i bdag por mnga' gsol nas// nu ma g.yas dang g.yon du gdab// btab pas mkhris pa k+Sha yas sod// tsi li tsi li ma sa ma thibs thibs/ hUM/ khro bdag sgrol ging ug ge yang// rno ba'i dpal du byin brlabs nas// spyi bo'i btsug tu btab pas kyang// klad gzer mgo dang 'dar bus sod// mas bu ta tshal pa tshal pa ka ru hUM hUM/ hUM/ khro bdag shan pa drang ze yang// 'debs pa'i dpal du byin brlabs nas// mkhal khung gnyis su gdab par bya// btab pas chu 'gag sked nad sod// bi ma la bi khu ya bim nad shad phaT dza/ hUM/ khro bdag srog gcod shang ze yang// zur gsum rtse mor byin brlabs te// mchin pa pho gdung rtsa la gdab// btab pas mchin nad khrag gis sod// ma sa la khum ta ra la tshang pu re ra dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ hUM/ khro bdag gsod dga' da khod kyang// thogs med 'debs par dbang bskur nas// sha mtshan rmen bu'i dkyil du gdab/ btab pas sbos nad grum bus sod// kha la ru tse kha mal sha phu phaT dza/ hUM/ dgra bla'i rgyal po mi khod kyang// rtse gsum ngar can rab 'byin bskyed// mcher pa'i dbus su btab nas kyang// mcher nad lkugs nad smyo 'bog thong// me kha kha ru tse bag sha ru tra rag me mu ru mu ru phaT dza/ hUM/ gsang ba'i srog bdag nyi zla yang/ phur pa'i lha ru dbang bskur nas// rkang pa'i mthil du gdab par bya// zha grum smur nad 'theng grum gtong// 'ba' lu ba ga te rag sha kha khrag rngubs rngubs// phur

sngags btab nas thun sngags brab// A+oM mA ma mA ra ya thun b+h+yo/ ma ra ra tsa thun b+h+yo b+h+yo ma hA ba ba ma hA de ba ma hA ru tra b+h+yo b+h+yo/ thun gyis brgyab ste brlan par 'gyur// ling+ga gtubs la gtor mar stsal// ri gsum rtse la yas stags bskyal// rgyal po bsrung ba'i sngags ni// oM kha du she sha sha pra la ma ma ru tra/ khra kha khra kha/ srog bdag 'khor dang bcas las nor sgrub pa'i sngags la/ oM dza ma be le she ba la go me sa sruM sruM truM truM swA hA/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas byes su gar 'gro yang dgra bgegs mi 'byung ba ni/ oM nas ne nas ne haM shi ka ra ka ra ma ra ma ra ru lu ru lu phaT phaT b+ho b+ho/ rgyal pos gal te bdag gam gzhan la 'tshe bar gyur na// de bzlog pa'i sngags la// pu ma hA rA dza ba shan zhil zhil shAn ting swA hA/ ma hA rA dzA shan ting swA hA/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas rigs rgyud 'phrog pa dag rabs bcad pa'i sngags la// oM ma hA ka la gangs dre mo bdud rnams rngam rngam swA hA/ rgyal pos ye 'drog sum brgya drug cu dang thob shor gtong ba'i sngags la// oM ma ya raM/ yaM be ra srog rtsal kha sa kha sa me ru me ru swA hA/ rgyal pos ser ba 'bebs pa'i sngags la// oM phra ta phre sha thor b+h+yo/ nal chem chem b+h+yo/ hUr tsal b+h+yo/ kha shar rta be shar shar/ nal chem chem b+h+yo/ rgyal pos ltas ngan 'bebs pa'i sngags la// oM shar ging ram shag rgyug rgyug/ ram rgyug/ srog la rgyug sha sha dgra bo'i snying la sha/ 'phru til ram khyer sod srog rgyal pos ya cha stab bsnol gtong ba'i sngags la/ oM ma hA brag shing kha me ru kha la a tsi ma sha dgra bo phrol phrol shig b+h+yo/ zhes sngags kyi don bstan las rnams 'grub/ gang la bya yang thogs pa med/ dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ rgyal po gsang bar bsgrub pa'i smyo 'bog gi skabs te nga gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos/ 'gal ba cham la dbab slad du// gnod sbyin gdug pa'i zla gsang gsungs pa// dad pa gsum ldan rnal 'byor pas// dam tshig rang gi srog bzhin bsrung// bla ma mnyes pa'i rim gro bya// dur khrod nags tshal dgon par 'gro// phyi bshags 'bum la sogs pa 'don// bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag bsag/ ma nyes dpang gzug glud gtor gtang// gnod sbyin 'di nyid bsgrub par bya// lcang lo can gyi pho brang na// las grub rigs kyi zhing khams nas// gnod sbyin bye ba sa ya gnas// de dag nang nas dregs pa'i sku// mthu stobs ldan pa'i gang bzang bsgrub// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi khri brtsegs la// steng du gnod sbyin sku gzugs bzhag/ tsan+dan rigs las 'bur du brkos// chu zheng gab ba gel gel po// sku mdog sngon po gzi ldan pa// dbu skra lcang

lo rin chen brgyan// ut+pal sngon po'i phreng bas mdzes// g.yas na shing tog dmar po bsnams// g.yon na mi lpags rgyal mtshan bsnams/ gzas pa'i gzugs byas snying gar gzhug/ de yi dbus su dong gru gsum// rtse mo byang du bltas pa la// nang du khrag dang sol bas byug/ til gyi phye la dgra yi gzugs// mi khrag bla dgas bris la gzhug/ zhabs mas bril la tshon skud bcings// gru gsum brus pa'i nang du gzhug/ mtha' ma rtsang gis bskor te gzhag/ gzugs kyi ske nas sngo dmar gdags// sne gcig sku yi zhabs la gdags// sngags pa'i mdun du dam rdzas dgram// la phug rus phye ske tshe la// de bzhin gtor ma byas te gzhag/ nyung nag lan tshwa dug tu sbyar// gzugs la brab cing ngan sngags bzlas// ma nyes dpang gzug 'o dod 'bod// de bzhin rim pas las rnams bya// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo ni// dug khrag sbyar bas bri bar bya// rim pa bzhin du drag sngags dgod// spyan drang bzhugs mchod bstod pa bya// phrin las bcol zhing gnad nas bskul// lha dang phral zhing rdzas kyis bdug/ drag sngags bzlas shing 'khor lo gzhug/ bsad pa las kyi sbyor la 'jug/ mnan bsreg 'phang ba gsum la gtad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ srog gcod spu gri gnod sbyin gyi zla gsang las/ gang ba bzang po phyi ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te nga gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos gang ba bzang po nang du bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// zla gam gsum gyis bskor ba bri// dmar smug me ri ra bas bskor// dbus su gshed po yab yum ste// mdun du gang ba bzang po dgod// mtshan ldan thod pa dum gsum du// la phug rus pa'i phye ma dang// snying sna khrag sna sbyar la gzhag/ dbus kyi gru gsum mthur du bskor// nang du rabs chad thod pa gzhug/ nyung nag nyung dkar lan tshwa dang// dug dang sme khrag sbyang bas dgang// dmigs pa'i ming rus ji bzhin byas// thod pa'i nang du gzhug par bya// dur khrod grong khyer bcom nas kyang// mtshan ma'i ras blangs skyang nul bya// ldong ros chu rtsa ser pos phyung// dug khrag sbyar nas 'khor lo bri// de bzhin yi ge dgod byas la// thun gyi thod pa kha yang bcad// de nas rim pas las rnams bya// hUM/ gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// grub pa'i gnod sbyin chen po spyan 'dren na// bye ba sa ya'i 'khor dang rab chas te// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol// e h+ya hi rak+sha ba sna ba bi sa ma ya ho ha/ gser ltar rab tu bstan pa'i ri ngos la// rma bya rab gnas gser du snang ba ltar// bdag gis khyod bsgrub

khyod kyi rang bzhin 'grub// grub pa'i dbang po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// brtan par bzhugs shig gnod sbyin mchog/ rin chen gcal bkram sa gzhi la// baiDUr+ya dang dman shel dang// khri chen dpangs la brtan par bzhugs// sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan s+t+wam// gser dang bcas pa'i skyems phud ma nyams pa// dung chen snod du sbyar nas mchod par 'bul// dar gyi lhab lhub glu \u0f84gar rol mo bcas// bsam pa dag pas sbyar nas mchod pa dbul// dril bu sgra snyan spos dang dri// mar me bshos dang gtor ma khrag/ mos pas 'bul lo bzhes su gsol/ oM ra ra so pa ba'u pU tsa kra ma pU tsa ho ha/ de nas gsang sngags rab bzlas la/ oM ba hU ri rta dza/ ma d+ha la bag sha dza/ ra tra ma ru ru dza/ snying la shar shar ru dza/ srog la breng breng thuM dza/ gnod sbyin sku dang 'od dang sgra// sa g.yos thog dang char chen 'ong// gong gi rdzas kyis rab tu brdeg/ thugs dam bskul te phrin las bcol// dus drug sngags 'di gzugs la brdeg/ oM dza laM ma hA dza laM/ rak+sha rak+sha/ sti bu stud de pa laM bag sha swA hA/ 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste// thams cad grub pa'i sngags zhes brjod// 'khor lo bcas kyi dam rdzas de// byang bltas chu mig dogs sbas na// khrag skyugs 'chi bar the tshom med// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ srog gcod spu gri gnod sbyin gyi zla gsang gang ba bzang po nang du bsgrub pa'i skabs te nga gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos gang ba bzang po gsang ba bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dam tshig dbang sgo thub pa'i bus// bla ma mnyes phyir yid 'thad dbul// mi don ma yin rang don du// bsgrub pa gong bzhin tshul bshams te// de rting man ngag 'di bzhin bya// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ lug mig kar+sha pa na le// sngags ni 'di dag rab tu brjod// oM dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa la/ yag sha bag sha so pu sdu de pa lam/ bag sha swA hA/ 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste// sngon du bsnyen pa sum 'bum bya// lus bsrung sbyor ba 'di bzhin bya// dpung pa dag la btags gyur na// nad rnams thams cad byang bar 'gyur// de nas gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// kar ni ka dang bal bu dang// 'u su rdo dreg sha ka ra// ngang pa'i sgro la bskus nas kyang// gzugs la dus drug mchod byas te// phyag byas bzlas pa byas gyur na// longs spyod dpag med thob par 'gyur// khrag dang nyung rgod rta mchin dang// ba lang dag la bzlas byin na// rta bong la sogs mig zlum rnams// 'chi'am yang na smyo bar 'gyur// tsit+ta rus pa gyo mog gsum// sngags 'di bzlas nas byin gyur na// oM b+ha hU ri ri dza/ ma g+ha la bag sha dza/ ra ta ma ru ru dza/ snying la shar shar ru dza/ srog la breng breng thuM dza/ glang chen ba

lang byin gyur na// glang chen ba glang 'chi bar 'gyur// bse dang ka ka ru la yang// sngags re bzlas te byin gyur na// lug la byin na 'chi bar 'gyur// b+hi li ka dang a mar dang// bu+u ram yang ru ram sbyar te ri lu bya// zla ba gzas zin dus su bya// ling+ga byas te bsdums byas nas// chu mig nang du thod par gnan// mdze dang shu bas 'dzin par 'gyur// bse zho btsan dug sbyar nas kyang// gsang sngags gong ma bzlas byas nas// sha la reg pa'i gos la bsku/ lhog pa dkar pos 'chi bar nges// yang na skrangs nas 'chi bar 'gyur// yang na zha grum 'gro ma nus// dang por khas blangs bzhin du bya// phag pa spyang ki'i mche ba dang// wa yi ril ma spyang rtug par/ nyi ma gung ngam nam phyed na// sum 'bum bzlas te don po yi// mkhar la rgyab na 'jig cing 'gas// de nas thog chen 'bebs 'dod na// srin rdo gdung chen sha ri ram// de rnams thod pa dum gsum du// yugs sa'i khrag la sbyar la stsal// gong gi sngags bzlas lha rten sba// gdon mi za bar thog 'bebs 'gyur// 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ srog gcod spu gri gnod sbyin gyi zla gsang las gang ba bzang po gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te nga bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos// 'gal ba cham la dbab slad du// gdug pa klu yi zla gsang gsungs// nub phyogs pho brang rgya mtsho'i chu// ngo mtshar chu bo bzhi 'babs pa// rab tu mi srun klu yi gnas// de nyid dregs pa 'dul ba'i phyir// bcom ldan gshin rje gshed po yis// lag na rdo rjer sku sprul te// lag na rdo rje thugs khros te// gser mig 'bar ba'i nga rgyal gyis// gdug pa'i klu rnams bred 'gyur te// rab tu mi srun klu rnams kyis// rab tu 'dzer te 'di skad smras// kye ma'o rdo rje gzugs mdzes pa// rab tu rngams pa'i rdo rje'i so// lcags mchu 'bar ba rab tu brjid// gser mig 'bar ba rab tu bgrad// mgo la yid bzhin nor bus brgyan// shes rab thabs ldan gshog pa brkyang// thabs ldan sder mo rnam par gdengs// kye ma'o sku stod mchog gi g.yang gzhis brgyan// sku smad sbrul gyi chun pos brgyan// thod pa tshar gsum se ral kha// rtsal 'phags khyad par de bzhin mthong// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig lha// drag po'i cha byad zla las rgyal// drag po chen po bka' bzhin bgyid// zhes 'dzer zhing 'thon nas dam tshig smras te sku la 'khril lo// nA du tra sa na d+h+ri pa la du ba ni gar si ti swA hA/ de nas gser mig 'bar ba yis// nga rgyal chen po bstan te/ dbang du bsdu phyir dam tshig phyag rgya bstan// dang po gnyis ni nang du bsnol// zla rnams rab tu skyong pa ste// khros pa'i nga rgyal 'di (14)

brjod do// ta ki dza de byi dzaHde hUM ya hUM ya/ hu lu hu lu pu ru te pu ru swA hA/ zhes brjod nas che ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas rigs bzhi'i klu rnams la// rab tu che ba bstan pa'i phyir// nyid kyi gzhal yas khang chen po// rab tu brjid pa 'di nyid du// byol song rigs bzhi dang thabs cig tu 'dug pa'i gnas 'di lta ste// rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus gnas 'bar// ri rab mchod rten gzugs 'dra la// bum pa yid bzhin lcang los brgyan// sbrul gnyis dar 'phyang lta bus mdzes// rigs bzhi'i rgyan gyis rab tu bklubs// sgo bzhi ka brgyad rab tu ldan// de 'og gsum gnyis rab tu mdzes// byol song longs spyod rab tu ldan// de nyid bum pa'i khong seng na// gser mig 'bar ba dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ gzi brjid mtha' yas dung skyong dang// gang po nor ldan la sogs dang// dga' bo 'jog po ma dros dang// rigs bzhi'i gtso bo klu brgyad de// sku la 'khril te rab tu gnas// gyad nor med la sogs pa'i rgyan// dar dpyang ma dang pad+ma'i rgyan// gzi brjid ma dang dung can ma// klu mo rigs bzhi la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos gnyen po sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dgon pa dur khrod mtsho gling ngam// chu mig nags na gnas pa'i bar// dkyil 'khor cha mnyam yid 'ong la// dri spos sman gyis chag chag gdab// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud ldan// sgo bzhi rigs dang ldan pa bri// dbus su lag na rdo rje ste// 'khor lo bzhi la bya khyung bzhi// gru chad mchod pa'i bum pa bzhi// sman lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// 'bru lnga me tog lnga la sogs// bcu gnyis lnga nyid byin gyis brlab// sgo la mchod pa'i gtor ma bzhi// b+ha ma hasti bcas pa yi// sor mo lnga yi bcangs pa'i rjes// mkha' lding mchod pa'i rdzas su gzhag/ de nas ting 'dzin rim pa ni// dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis pa snying rje 'byung ba dang// gsum pa rgyu yi rnam pa las// baM gyi sa bon las byung ba'i// rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su ni// laM las ri rab rin chen bskyed// de steng khroM las ga ru Da/ rdo rje gshog pa'i byin rlabs las// bya khyung rgyal po bzhi byung bas// dkar dang dmar dang ser dang ljang// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i steng du bsgom// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// ye shes mkha' lding stobs po che// sku mdog dkar mdzes 'od 'bar la// dbu gsum rdo rje'i mchu khra la// ring la dmar zhing spyan yang dmar// zhal gdangs ral pa sprugs pa'i tshul// ye shes gshog gdengs sku yang shin tu g.yo// sku dang yan lag rin chen baiDUr brgyan// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po 'khor

lo phyar// bar pa lcags kyu tha ma thal mo sbyar// g.yon gyi dang pos rin chen zur brgyad bsnams// bar pa zhags pa tha ma thal mo sbyar// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// ye shes mkha' lding rgyal po gzi brjid 'od po che// dbu gsum mdog dmar ral pa lcang lor 'khyil// zhal gdangs ye shes gshog pa chen po gdengs// sku dang ye shes yan lag me chen 'bar// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje rtse lnga pa// bar ma lcags kyu tha ma rin po che// g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje pad+ma 'phyar// bar ma zhags pa tha ma dbyug to bsnams// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// ye shes mkha' lding rgyal po mi mgo can// dbu gsum mdog ser ral pa gyen du 'khyil// yan lag rin chen sku las me chen 'bar// ye shes gshog pa rgya chen brkyang bskum mdzad// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po rin chen 'bar// bar ma lcags kyu tha ma dpag bsam shing// g.yon gyi dang po ye shes ral gri 'phyar// bar ma zhags pa tha ma gshog tshul brkyang// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// ye shes mkha' lding rlung gi shugs// dbu gsum mdog ljang ral pa 'khyil// sgra skad sna tshogs bzhad cing smin ma bskyod// yan lag rin chen brgyan pas sku 'bar ba// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po ral gri phyar// bar ma lcags kyu tha ma shing thog bI ja pUr// g.yon gyi dang po 'khor lo 'bar ba bsnams// bar ma zhags pa tha ma gshog tshul brkyang// de rnams rtsa ba'i snying po khroM las bskyed// de bzhin spyan drang bzhugs gsol phyag bya dang// mchod dang bstod dang bzlas pa tshul bzhin bya// ba liM la sogs byed pa dang// b+ha ma hasti bcings pa yis// sor mo lnga yis bcangs pa'i rjes// zan chang dkar gsum 'bru dang sman gyis mchod// oM rA dza ma hA ga ru Da/ hUM ba liM pU tsa ba liM ta khA hi/ zhes dbul bar bya'o// de nas sngags 'di rgyun du bzlas// ong kaM ong kaM khyung ka ra khyung ka ra/ sha ma ra dbyig du/ oM badzra ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ sngags de rtsa ba rgyun du drangs// mkha' lding gso ba'i las byed na// bdag gam gzhan la gdug pas 'jigs// ga ru rgyal po mchod 'dod pas// gnas sam khang pa'i sgo ngos te// snum pa'i sa'am bag zan la// ga ru Da yi gzugs bcas te// ba liM la sogs pU tsa dang// b+ha ma hasti bcings pa yi// sor mo lnga yi pU tsa des// ga ru Da nyid la ni dbul// snying po lnga po gang yang
