rin chen so ma btang// nyi ma chu rlung rdo rje dang// lcags bdud rdo dang be thag ta// rlung gi tshe na ling+ga 'phangs// su men lta yi khu ba bzhin// las kyi 'dren pa'i don byed de// de bzhin ri bo lcab chen dang// gser gyi dgu thog brgyab pa dang// mtshon cha 'khor lo rgyal po bzhin// las dang 'dod pa'i bye brag dbye// bcu gnyis las la sogs pa ni// rnam grangs bzhi la sogs pa dbye// las ni brgyad brgya la sogs te// 'khor lo'i bye brag dpag tu med/ sbyor ba nyis brgya stong bcu drug/ bsdoms pas bcu drug stong phrag gcig/ yan lag bcu gnyis rtsa ba bzhi// sbyor ba drag po sngon gyi las// 'phen pa gcig gis byas pa ste// zhes gsungs

so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ las kyi mdo byang chen po bstan pa'i le'u ste so brgyad pa'o//// de nas gsang ba bshad pa ni// mdor bsdus pa de rgyas par min// 'khrug pa dmar thag 'khor lo 'di// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung// de dag phan tshun thun sbyar ba// yon tan bskyed dang las kun rdzogs// de yi sbyor ba 'di dag ste// thog mar sbyor ba dang po ni// rtsa ba'i sa bon yi ge gnyis// me dbal ming gi 'khor lo la// rig pa ming gi yi ge bzhi// bsdus pas sbyor ba bdud mo'i ming// rnal mar bskor ba'i phyogs kyi sbyar// mchog gi yi ge 'bru lnga ldan// kun gyi thog mar sbyar bya ste// phyir la dbul nas bskor byas nas// me dbal yab kyi 'khor lo bzhin// rnal ma ldog pa'i rim pa bzhin// ming gi mjug la btags byas la// rjes su mthun pa'i bzhi sbyar na// byed pa kun gyi snying po'i mchog/ sbyor ba kun gyi rtsa ba yin// mtha' rten las kyi skabs kyis 'jug/ las rnams kun la thogs med 'gro// de bzhin shi k+shi shri pan tsa'i// 'gros kyi 'bru 'ded bdun pa'i sngags// rjes su mthun pa de bzhin te// 'khril ba sbrul dang rus sbal dang// chu srin ka hi la yi 'gros// 'bur mgo mgo mangs 'gros nyid du// 'bru 'ded stag mo kha sbyor ba'i// bzhi dang lnga sogs drag po'i sngags/ kun gyi sbyor ba'ang de bzhin te// thog mar de bzhin drug pa'i ming// drangs te de bzhin kun la sbyar// mtha' rten 'jug gi sngags nyid ni// drag po'i mA ra ya nyid la// spu gri 'khor lo 'dab ma bzhi// bkod pa'i phreng ba sbyor ba bzhin// bsdebs nas 'phen pa'i 'bru brgyad kyi// yi ge lnga bzhin bzlog bskor nas// sbyor ba gsod pa ma lus pa// 'jug pa nges par gdags pa yin// dbus kyi sbyor ba rkyang pa ste// drag po gnas kyi 'phen pa yin// phyi rim bzhi pa'i rim pa ni// bdud mo gshin rje'i sbyor ba ste// khro bo rnams kyi ming yang yin// de yi sbyor ba dpag med las// mkha' 'gro drag mo'i sbyor ba ste// gnad log drag po'i rim pa yin// rengs dang 'gugs pa ma lus byed// las gsang gnyis dang kun rdzogs yin// de yi rim pa 'di dag ste// ta b+hi ta yi 'gros stangs kyis// 'khor lo'i phreng ba dril ba yin// de bzhin phyogs kyi dang po nas// re mig brgyad nyid de bzhin gcig/ rim par 'khor lo'i phreng bar ni// mu khyud lta bur dril ba yin// thog mar dbus nas bdud kyi sngags// 'bru drug ming gis de bzhin drang// mtha' rten gdags pa sngar bzhin te// drag po'i las la spu gri dang// 'phen pa'i 'bru brgyad rim par sbyar// phyi rim lnga pa'ang de bzhin te// mu khyud phreng ba'ang rim pa gcig/ ta pi ta yi 'gros kyis

te// go rim phreng ba rim par bsdeb// rim pa de bzhin kun la'ang// mgo dang mjug ma snga ma bzhin// mchog tu gsod la sbyor ba ste// rig pas bsdus pa'i ye shes lnga// lte rtsibs sbyor bas 'khor lo gcig/ yan lag lnga bsdus 'dus phung las// mkha' 'gro bcu dang drug 'dus pa'i// drug po'i yi ge 'bru drug cu// 'dus pas mtshon kha me lce gnyis/ dril bas sngags kyi phreng ba gcig/ brjod pas nges par mi 'jog gcod// phyi rim drug pa'ang de bzhin te// bskor dang phyogs dang de mthun las// rim pa de bzhin bskor bya ste// snga ma ji bzhin dril bar bya// de ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// smyo dang 'bog dang dal khas 'debs// drag po las kyi yi ge 'bru// drug po'i yon tan gzer las bsdus// 'phen byed sbyor ba bag bcas kyis// 'phangs na rim pa ma lus byed// mgo dang mjug dang snga ma bzhin// de bzhin rim pas shes par bya// drag po'i sbyor ba rkyang pa 'di// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba dbyings sdus ma// snying po'i dam dang drag po'i snying// yon tan las kyi rim dang gsum// gcig gi gcig nas dril ba ste// dam pa'i sbyor ba dam pa yin// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo gnyis las ni// phye ba'i 'khor lo 'bum phrag yas// gsang ba'i las sbyor ji snyed pa// 'di nyid du ni 'dus par bstan// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ pho mo lto dkrugs sogs pa'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o//// de nas yang gshin rje'i gshed po yis/ 'gal ba cham la dbab pa'i phyir// mkha' 'gro gnad la dbab pa'i thabs// sngags kyi 'khor lo dam pa 'di// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung// dur khrod chen po la sogs 'bar ba yi// bkra shis stobs dang yon tan ldan pa'i gnas rnams su// rkyen rnams tshogs rnal las rnams rdzogs bya ba// dang po rgyun bzlas gnyis pa sbyar bya zhing// gsum pas dril ba bzhi pas yul// 'di ni yan lag rdzogs par byed pa ste// chos rnams rgyal zhing bla ma bde ba de 'gyur na// las ni yongs su dag par bya ba ste// mi nus btsas su nga yis bshad pa yin// rig pa'i don stobs gter gyi sems ldan na// rtag tu pa ta ra ti'i ra ta ka zos kyang// de ni dbang phyug nyid 'gyur gzhan du min// de yi sbyor ba bsam pa nyer bstan pa// lho dag gis gul du don ma yin pa'i// sha khrag 'bru sna 'bras bu mang po sogs// de la sogs de rdzas ni sum ldan bya// sku gsung thugs kyis 'khor lo rgyas ldan pa// ras sam shing shun dag la ming bris nas// de la yang dag bsnyen nas brten rdzas ni// las kyi mthun pa'i gnyer rdzas rab sbyar nas// stag gam spre'u+u 'am skar ma 'dod dam// khwa ta

glang dang chu srin khyi dang sbrul// de dag rnams kyis dngas ma'i ling+ga sbyang// phye la mchod rdzas 'dod pa'i le'u bya// thod pa nag por sngags kyi 'khor lo dgod// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo lus sam gzhan yang bya// sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag bya ba rdzogs par sgyur// drag po bsad pa la sogs nyer bsgrub pa// sU ba mU khri te bA nA la'i rdzas// rin chen sna lnga 'brug gi rus pa ste// gang 'dod bsgrub pa'i rdzas ni tshogs par bya// thod chen gang la 'dod pa'i rdzas de lnga kar bya// thod pa nag por bcug ste ta log rdzas rnams ni// sa gnyis yu ba med pa'i rtse mo gnyis// nim bsres sol sprus g.yas thog ma blugs pa// sngags kyis 'khor lor bcug ste gang 'dod sa ru mnan// drag po'i las ni smyon dang bsad la sogs// sbrul gyi lus sam dur bya'i thod par te// 'du ba'i nad la bsad par shis pa yin// de rjes mthun pa'i yan lag rdzogs par bya'o// thabs kyi stobs kyi 'brel ba'i rim pa ni// 'di dag bsdebs te dmu thag dngul lcags 'dra// bya ba'i las grub rim sbyar gdon mi za// 'jigs byed cho 'phrul ston pa'i phung byed bzhi// 'jug cing las rnams rdzogs pa'i don byed pas// dbus kyi oM ni kun 'gro log pa med// phyogs bcu las kyi sngags de dang por min// dbus nas gshin rje'i phyogs 'gro g.yas bskor gyis// dza la thug pa'i par ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// spyi srog yin te kun gyi thog mar sbyar// zlog pas las sbyor kun dang sbyor bas na// sa bon chu gnyis b+h+yo'i klung du'ang sbyar// mu khyud phyi rim ma bdud las kyi phreng// phyi rim 'khor lo shar phyogs rtsibs la ni// rdo rje dngos grub gsung ba'i srog snying ni// dbus nas nub tu de bzhin g.yas bskor nas// dbus nas rtsibs brgyad rim par bsdeb pa ni// sku gsung yon tan ma lus bsdus pa yis// gsang ba srog gi phreng ba'i sbyor ba ste// dbus kyi 'khor lo'i dbus nas de bzhin du// rim pa 'khor lo'i snying po bdun sbyar bya// klad du sbyar te lhag ma tha mar yin// de ni rgyun bzlas mchog tu 'dren pa ste// gshin rje'i phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa ni// de bzhin snga ma'i tshul gyis sbyor ba ste// dbus dang byang dang de bzhin g.yas bskor yin// thog ma tha ma de bzhin ji bzhin sbyar// rdo rje u tshus srog gi thag pa yin// de bzhin gsum pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa ni// gong ma bzhin te dbus nas shar du sbyar// de bzhin rim pas g.yas su bskor ba ste// lhag ma sngar bzhin rdo rje srin po yin// gnod sbyin phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa ni// gong ma bzhin te dbus nas lho ru sbyar// de bzhin rim pas g.yas su bskor ba ni// tha ma thog ma'ang gong ma bzhin sbyar te// ma lus 'dus pa'i

snying po mchog yin te// nye bar bsgrub pa'i gsang ba nas zhes bya// un man sbyor ba rdzogs te las mchog yin// phreng thag chad la sogs pa'i las byas nas// 'khor lo ma lus rim par g.yon sbyar bas// dbus nas sngar bzhin rim par bsdeb pa ste// drag po'i sbyor ba gsang ba'i u d+he can// shin tu gsang ste bdag nyid gzhan dbang bsgyur// gal te rtsom na bde gshegs kun 'dir 'dus// brtan pa'i blo thob dmigs pa'i don rnyed nas// tshul bzhin bsgrub na 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur// sbyor ba gzhan yang rim par rten sbyar te// phyi rim 'khor lo rnams la sbyar bya zhing// kun gyi lte ba dbus kyi phyogs dang ste// gnyis gnyis dor gyi phyi nas rim pa yis// g.yas nas bskor te yang dag sbyar ba nyid// dbus kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa gsum pa yi// chu yi sa bon gnyis dor sngar bzhin sbyar// thog ma tha ma snga bzhin sbyar byas la// 'di ni phyi yi sbyin pa bstan pa ste// dang po sngags kyi phreng ba rnal ma yin// gsung gi gsum pa nye bar 'jug byed pa// sbyor ba las la 'jug pa'i byed pa ste// gnod sbyin phyogs kyi 'khor lo g.yas bskor gyi// tha ma'i 'khor lo gzung ste de dang der 'brel ba// brgya byin i lam mtshams kyi dbus phyogs gzung// de nas de nyid dbus phyogs 'khor lo'i bsdeb// de nas rim pas gshin rje'i 'khor lo la// lte bar dbus phyogs dang po gnyis bzung ste// pi laM phyogs kyi 'khor lo lte bar sbyar// de log gnod sbyin 'khor lo yang gzung ste// i laM mtshams dang de 'og gnyis par sbyar// de rjes phyi rol i laM mtshams dang ldan// de nas de bzhin a 'og mtshams su sbyar// de nas rim par ti laM mtshams 'jug ste// de 'og sku byin mtshams su nye bar sbyar// mgo mjug dang po snga ma dang sbyar te// tha ma'i dza bzhag skabs kyis las kun sbyar// yon tan sku yis sbyor ba'i las rdzogs te// skabs kyi sbyar bas ma lus don 'grub 'gyur// gsang ba'i ming yang gsungs bzhin rab sbyar ba// oM 'gu si dan la b+h+yo/ ma ma rak+sha b+h+yo/ khaM las rbad sha b+h+yo/ us tsasma sha b+h+yo/ sa ma ya rak+sha sha tsag+shu lo la 'ur 'ur tug tug chem chem yaM yaM rbad drag tu phob phob ma ma cho cho// ming dang sbyar nas skabs kyi 'jug/ snying po nyid dang skabs kyis sbyar// las la sbyar bas cho ga'i rim pa yin// mu khyud nang la thugs kyi phrin las te// ki laM mtshams nas rim par brgya byin phyogs// sbyar bas e nas mtshams su nye bar dril// de 'og gshin rje rim par sbyor phyogs te// de rjes dbus kyi pra kyin mtshams su bsdeb// de nas lam gyi mtshams su nyer dril ba// de nas lha lam mtshams su 'gro ba'i phyogs dang bsdeb// de 'og ku bin mtshams yin dbus kyi ta la

sbyor// de nas de bzhin me lam mtshams su dril// de nas de bzhin gnod sbyin mchog bsdeb na// dbus kyi ku bin mtshams nas me lam mtshams su dril// de nas de nyid phyogs bzhin g.yas rim sbyar// de bzhin dril te dbus kyi phyi rim gyi// mjug nas dngos grub bskor ba mgo drangs pa// 'di ni mchog ste sbyor ba'i las kun byed// de ni las rgyal dngos grub bsgrub pa'i gtso// gsang ba thugs kyi yang bskol rim gnyis bsdus// 'di ni don chen mU la'i snying bzhin du// phyir mi 'byung bar 'dod pa'i 'khor du bzhag/ rtsa ba sbubs kyi 'khor lo sdud pa yin// rang rang phyogs mtshams bsdeb bya dbus su yang// rus sbal 'gros kyis so sor sbyar ba ni// sgo dgu'i nye bar dril ba zhes bya ste// i lam mtshams ni kun tu'ang rim gyis sbyar// de bzhin rim pas so sor sbyar bar bya// de bzhin bsad dang oM rtogs las rnams la// g.yal thog snying po'i gnas su gang 'dod dgod// de bzhin rjes su bsgrubs pas las kun 'grub// 'khor lo de bzhin mu khyud rim pas bsdeb// dbus kyi mtshams bzhi dor byas phyogs bzhi yi// rim pas phyogs dril 'dod pa'i snying por ldan// 'di ni theg chen rigs bdun 'bebs pa yin// sbyor ba gzhan yang 'dod pa rnam dag gi// don 'grub yang dag rnams ni bshad bya ba// phyi rim de bzhin dang po'i 'khor lo nas// dang po'i dbus ni kun gyi mgo yin te// drangs nas rtse mo'i 'khor lo rim pa gsum// g.yas su bskor nas rim pas bsdeb bya ste// gshin rje pi lam phyogs kyang de bzhin de// gnod sbyin phyogs kyang de bzhin nyer byas la// ki lam mtshams ni rim pas nyer sbyar bya// dbus kyi de bzhin skabs kyi sbyar byas nas// mchog tu srog la 'joms yin khugs pa'i las// dbus kyi 'khor lo 'bru rnams skabs kyi snga ma bzhin du sbyar// phyogs kyi dang po 'khor lo dbus ma yin// 'bru rnams bsdeb ste rim pas snga ma bzhin// gshin rje'i phyogs dang de bzhin rjes mthun te// dbus kyi snying po dang por sbyar ba bzhin// brjod na gang 'dod yum du 'grub 'gyur te// gzer nad lhog 'khrug nad rnams gtong// de bzhin rim pas 'khor lo dang po yis// dbus kyi 'bru gzung tha ma'i 'khor lo rnams// rim sbyar phyogs kun de bzhin te// gnod sbyin 'khor lo rtsa bar gnyis gzung ste// dbus kyi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin slangs nas// gang yin ming dang snying po bcas bskul te// las kyi sbyor ba snga ma bzhin bcas nas// yul khams pho brang bcas te dbang du bsgyur// gzhan yang sngags dang sbyor ba rnams bstan pa// bsrung gso las 'brel kun la shes pa yin// 'khor lo dang po'i dbus dang dbus phyogs

nyid// de bzhin pa yi lam phyogs dbus rim gyis// rdzogs par sbyor te slar yang dang po'i pi lam mtshams// de nas g.yas su rim rdzogs bskor ba yis// sbyor ba shes pa'i las ni kun byed yin// de bzhin gshin rje'i dbus kyang dbus// rim pas sngar gyi rjes bzhin sbyar ba ste// gnod sbyin phyogs su'ang rim pas dbus bsdeb de bzhin te// slar yang gshin rje snga ma bzhin bsdeb pa// 'di ni gsang ba'i las kyi de bzhin te// dbang du bsdus dang rengs la sogs pa'i las// sbyar ba re re rjes 'jug pas sbyar bas// de dag las kun rim gyis byed pa yin// dbus kyi 'khor lo'am skabs kyis rim sbyar bya// dang po gnas kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa ni// rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud rim gnyis ldan// dbus kyi lte ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// cha mnyam thig bran bzhi bzhi le'u tshe dgu/ de dag kun kyang rtsibs brgyad 'khor lor bcas// mu khyud thig bzhi tha ma re rim brgyad// phyogs bzhir gnyis grangs bcu gnyis 'gyur// dbus kyi lte ba'i dbus su gru bzhir bya// mtha' mar le'u tshe bzhi oM gnad kyi yig 'bru dgod// gsod pa las 'byung bzhi'i yi ge 'khrug bcas gzung// ki lam mtshams su phaT te mA ra ya// de rnams rim par g.yas nas mthun par dgod// g.yal thog las la ki lam mtshams su 'gro// de bzhin shu te dud dang ha rim bzhin// rjes su mthun rim 'dod pa'i snying po yin// phyogs bzhir thum ril nyig dril rbad rnams te// de bzhin rim pas le'u tshe bzhi la dgod// phyi rim 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad la// brgya byin 'khor lo ldegs pa'i b+h+yo bzung ste// sku+u bam mtshams su yi ge dza dgod la// gshin rje la sogs 'khor lo'i rim pa ni// chu yi snying po gnyis ni so sor dgod// de 'og mtshan ma'i ming yin ra nang ga/ de gnyis sbyor ba gcig la dgod par bya// de 'og 'dzin yig mi dgod rtsibs gnyis la// rjes su mthun par snga ma gnyis bzhin dgod/ de nas mu khyud re mig rim pa la// shar gyi dang po sha yin gnyis par ni// ma yin mtshams su sha ste ra dang 'dus par sbyar// de bzhin gshin rjer ru dang tsa yin te// mtshams su me yi snying po bzhag ste phyogs su ni// rtsa dang mu gnyis rim dgod mtshams su bzhag/ sha dang ga gnyis 'brel bar sbyor ba yin// phyogs su yi ge drag dang mo dgod rim// rim dgod mtshams su ri dang la sbyor te// 'brel pa nyid pa'i stobs ldan byed// shar gyi 'khor lo rim par dgod pa ni// g.yon nas 'khor bar bkod de g.yas nas bsdeb pa dang// dbus kyi sku yi 'bru bzhag rim par ni// bi laM rtsa dgod gsum par bdun gzhag bya// bzhi lnga drug pa la dang ma sha rnams// rim par

bdun dang brgyad par ma bshad gong// byang gi 'khor lo de bzhin rjes mthun te// dbus su dral dgod gnyis par mo bzhag ste// gsum par kha dgod bzhi par kha dgod bya// lnga par snying dgod drug par shig dgod bya// bdun par de bzhin bzung ste brgyad par mo// dgu par drag dgod de bzhin gsum pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa la// dgod rim lnga las bzlog ste dbus su ni// sku yi yi ge tsam dgod gnyis par mo bzhag ste// gsum par dbus bzhin bzhi par gnyis pa bzhin// lnga par sdud pa'i yi ge phra dgod bya// drug par ring po'i la bzhag bdun par mu// brgyad par las yig sha ni dgod bya ste// dgu par de bzhin ring po la dgod par bya// 'khor lo bzhi pa de bzhin rjes mthun te// dbus su bskal pa'i yi ge ra bzhag gnyis par de// gsum par sdud pa'i yi ge re dgod bya// bzhi par gnyis pa bzhin te lnga par sbyor ba'i rtsa// drug par 'jug byed las kyi yi ge ba bzhag bya// bdun par de bzhin ring po'i ma dgod brgyad par ni// 'jug pa'i yi ge dun drag kha ni bzhag/ dgu par chags pa las kyi yi ger ka dgod bya// phyi rol gyi lam mtshams su 'jug las kyi// yi ger ga gcig tu sbyar bzhag chags pa'i g.yas nas rim pa gnyis kyis mtshams su ni// bya snying mu gri ra mtshan 'gu si ste// gnyis pa'i mtshams su gnad du 'jug pa'i// snying po don ma shag ces bya ba bri// bzhi pa'i mtshams su ka pi mu ka'i gnad 'jug pa'i// ring por sdud pa'i mu shag dgod par bya// de dag dgod pa'i sbyor bas las kun byed// de rim sbyor ba thabs kyis rdo rje mchog/ ye shes sbyor bcas ka to la ni dbyug 'dzin/ gcod dang rtog 'dral 'bigs dang brdung la sogs// smyos dang skrod la sogs pa'i don kun// las kyi sbyor ba nyams shing rig sngags nyams gyur na// 'ching dang dus med nyams shing spyod yul bral// 'di dang yun du skyon dang sdug bsngal ldan pa yin// 'dod pa'i sbyor dang mi mthun kha zeng sna tshogs pa// bral shing rtogs ldan g.yo ba'i nges bcings te// mi 'dod sna tshogs sdug bsngal gcig gis byed// me'am 'khor lo sprul bzhin sbyor bas zin gyur na// bya ba kun spyod gcod dang bdud rtsi ma lus 'grub// de las log na gzhan du 'gyur te bdag nyid 'jig/ ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gnam lcags thog 'bebs me lce 'phreng ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed kyis gza' mchog sgrub pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so// dgon pa'i gnas sam shing drung ngam// nags 'dabs dben zhing nyams dga' bar// brag dmar shin tu nyam nga (19)

dang// dmar nag rgya skyegs mdog 'dra'am// chu gling rab tu dben pa'am// 'dus mdo sdong po rkang gcig gam// bas mtha'i grog po phug rdugs su// gza' bdud rog ti bsgrub par shis// sngon du bya ba'i cho ga ni// tsha tsha mchod rten grangs med gdab// mnga' gsol spang skong gtong dkar btang// sna tshogs gtor ma gser skyems kyis// phyogs skyong gtsug lag srung ma dang// lha klu la sogs sde brgyad dang// khams gsum 'gro ba rigs drug dang// mA ra ya yi yul dang lha// kho lha mched pa'i lha dgu dang// bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu la// bcol gtam bya shing mchod sbyin stsal// sgrib pa rnam gnyis sbyang ba dang// bsod nams tshogs chen spel ba'i phyir// dang du blangs te mchod cing dgong// rab tu rgya cher spel bar bya// dpang gzug la sogs smre sngags 'don// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas gnyis bya'i phyir// zhi khro'i bsnyen bsgrub zhag gsum bya// ya mAn+ta ka'i lha bsgrub ni// lo zla tsam du yun bsring ste// bzlas pa yig 'bru bcu bdun pa'o// bdun 'bum bsnyen du tshang bar gdon// 'dis ni gdong bzhi 'khor bar nges// 'di yi bsgrub pa'i dus su ni// dang por ta ka yab yum bskyed// hUM ya hUM ya hUM ya zhes brjod de// dkar po sngon po dmar po dang// ljang gur snang ba'i ya bzhi las// s+pha ra ni yis spros pa dang// 'gro ba yongs kyi don byas te// rang skal phrin las yongs rdzogs nas// gtso bo yab yum thugs dam bskul// saM ha ra nas slar bsdus pas// yig 'bru thugs mtshan dag tu gyur// de bzhin mo shing bsdus pa las// ya ma rA tsa sa to me ya/ e ka tsa ti sa ma ya staM/ hUM yag+sha dz+wa la ni snying khrag yag mo snying rtsa la tiSh+Tha lhan// sngags kyi sku rnams gsal bar rdzogs// ya ma rA tsa yab yum ni// mthun par sku mdog mthing nag po// yag sha dz+wa la yab yum ni// sngo nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis po// ma ru tse ni yab yum gnyis// dmar nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis so// rog ti nag po dud ka ste// lus po gcig la mgo bo dgu/ mgo lus med par mig gis khengs// lag na chu srin zhags pa thogs// yan lag stong khams kun tu nyul// yengs med rtog pa brtas pa ru// yid kyis dmigs shing blta byas te// mA ra tsa sha bzhi po las// s+pha ra na yis spros pa dang// rang skal phrin las rdzogs pa dang// 'byung bzhi rtsad bcad slar 'dus nas// phyag mtshan bzhi yi 'phro 'du las// gdong mo bzhi yi skur bskyed de// ri rab shar lho'i gru mtshams su// yi ge ma las stag srin mo// srin mo'i gzugs la stag mgo can// kha nas 'brug gi sgra sgrogs shing// pho log sbos nad gtong par bsgom// ri rab kyi ni lho nub tu// yi ge ra las bam srin

mo// srin mo smug nag dred mgo can// kha nas glog gi phreng ba rgyu// klad nad gtong ba'i bdag mor bsgom// ri rab nub byang gru mtshams su// yi ge tsa las kong srin mo// srin mo dmar nag ban glang gdong// sna nas bu yug 'thor zhing ni// kha nas ser ba 'phro ba las/ gzer nad gtong ba'i bdag mor bsgom// ri rab gru mtshams byang shar du// yi ge sha las 'brog srin mo// srin mo ljang nag chu srin gdong// kha nas thog gi phreng 'bebs shing// lhog pa gag pa'i bdag mor bsgom// yab yum 'khor bcas de dag kun// srin po srin mo'i sha gzugs can// dur khrod kyi ni chas brgyad dang// chas par 'dris shing gsal bar bsgom// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs spyan drangs te// hUM chos dbyings mi mngon dbyings nyid nas// 'jam dpal gzhon nur sku sprul pa// bstan pa rgya mtsho bsrung mdzad lha// 'khor dang bcas pa spyan 'dren na// sgyu ma'i thabs kyi rol pas gshegs// oM badzra sa mA dza hUM// hUM gru gsum mthing nag 'bar klong du// rta ro 'bum ni gcal du bkram// mi ro 'bum brtsegs gzhal yas 'dir// 'jam dpal yab yum 'khor bcas rnams// thugs dam dbang gis gshegs su gsol// phyogs bzhin nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// stag srin sde bzhi 'khor bcas kun// bstan pa bsrung phyir spyan 'dren gyi// thugs dam dbang gis gshegs su gsol// srin mo chen mo khyod bzhi yang// nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'brug sgrogs shing// bar snang khams nas glog 'gyu ma// ri rab rtse nas thogs 'bebs ma// ri rab gling bzhir dbang bsgyur ma// 'jig rten khams su rtsal byin ma// pho log klad nad gzer thabs dang// thog dang ser ba lhog pa'i bdag/ 'jam dpal gshed po'i spyan snga ru// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas bzhin// gdung ba'i nga ros bdag 'bod kyi// dmar gyi gtor ma dam la 'du// hUM sngon gyi bskal ba dang po la// bstan pa bsrung bar zhal 'ches ma// sbas shing gsang ba'i ma mo rnams// dgra bo 'dul phyir da tshur spyon// bstan pa bsrung gi da tshur spyon// skyin thang dbab kyi da tshur sbyon// hUM shar phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// shar gyi stag srin zor ba gdong// sring gcig pho log bdag mo da tshur spyon// lho phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// ban srid smug nag dred mo gdong// sring gcig glang thabs bdag mo da tshur spyon// nub phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// kong srin dmar nag ban glang gdong// sring gcig gser 'bebs nag mo da tshur spyon// byang phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// 'brog srin ljang nag chu srin gdong// sring gcig lhog rgal bdag mo da

tshur spyon// hUM khro rgyal gshin rje nag po yab yum dang// srog gi gshed po yab yum ming sring bcas// bstan pa bsrung ba'i lha mchog 'khor bcas rnams// gnas 'dir gshegs shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// srid pa gsum yang mnga' bzhes pa// bstan pa gnyan po bshig pa yi// dgra bo 'dul phyir brtan par bzhugs// thugs rje dpal dang ldan pa yis// thugs rje'i byin brlabs char ltar 'bebs// dpal ldan yi dam mnyam pa'i dbyings// 'gro ba yongs kyi gter gyur pa// khyod la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rjes gshed bzhir sku sprul pa// bdud 'dul dbu brtsegs srog gshed bzhi// shes rab yum chen srog 'dul chen mo bzhi// thabs dang shes rab zung nyid dang// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang la phyag 'tshal lo// khro bdag gshed po'i bka' nyan zhing// bstan pa rgya mtsho bsrung mdzad ma// sbas shing gsang ba'i ma bzhi la// gdung ba'i yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo// hUM yab cig lha yi rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed// nag po rag sha gdug pa 'joms mdzad lha// sku yi cha lugs gtum rngam 'jigs par ston// gtum rngam drag shul can la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM thugs rje nyi zer lta bu sprul pa'i sku// srog gi gshed po 'jigs byed bzhi// srog len yum chen bzhi po dang// gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i lha// mkha' dbyings gsang ba'i gnas chen du// gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba'i dpal// srog gshed srog len yab yum dang// rnal 'byor bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// gdug pa ma lus 'joms pa yi// gdug pa 'dul mdzad dkyil 'khor tshogs// lha mchog ya mAn+ta ka yis// dkyil 'khor bcas pa khyed cag gi// mdzad pa ma lus bdag gis gyis// sangs rgyas bstan pa bdag bsrungs pas// ya mAn+ta ka'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// bdag gi bsam pa bsgrub pa dang// bstan pa gnyan po bsrung du gsol// gdug pa ma lus 'joms shing sgrol// ya ma dam sri cham la 'bebs// rngam pa'i zhal du mthun pa'i rdzas// dmigs kyi 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// hUM gdug pa thugs rjes sgrol ba yis// srog gi gshed po yab yum la// mnyes pa'i mchod pa mthun pa'i rdzas// dmigs kyis 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// hUM phyogs bcu nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// sbas shing gab pa'i gdong mo bzhi// nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'brug sgra sgrogs// bar snang khams nas glog 'gyu ma// ri rab rtse nas thog 'bebs shing// khrag gi ser ba lhog rgal bdag/ dam rdzas mchod pa'i bye brag rnams// dmigs kyi 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i mkha'// rta ro dag ni rtsig par brtsigs// mi ro dag ni gcal du bkram// mi ro rta ro'i

khri steng na// ri rab brjid pa'i skur bzhengs pa// lha mchog ya mAn+ta ka ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag zhal// dbu skra srid gsum thor tshugs bcings// smin ma glog chen 'gyu ba yis// gdug pa thams cad sreg par mdzad// spyan gsum ye shes 'od 'phro can// shangs ni ri rab phur bur brjid// zhal nas hom khung gdangs pa'i zhal// ljags ni hom gzar rlom pa'i zhal// mche ba phur bu bsnol ba'i tshems// ba spu rtsang phur gshibs pas bltams// g.yas pa'i phyag gis sa gzhi mnan// g.yon gyi phyag gis nam mkha' 'degs// zhabs kyis dmyal ba'i gtan pa mnan// gdug pa ma lus 'joms par mdzad// thams cad khro bo khyod kyi sku// hUM de dang gnyis med sbyor ba'i yum// pe ta yak+sha mi bzad sku// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun// ri rab 'khod pa'i bdag mo ste// spyan gsum nam mkha'i thod gdengs can// ri rab mchog gi thor tshugs la'o// spyi bo'i gtsug nas 'od zer 'phro// skra mtshams sprul pa'i pho nya 'gyed// dpral ba'i dbyings nas 'brug gi sgra sgrogs shing// smin ma nam mkha'i glog ltar 'gyu// shangs nas bu yugs rdzi ba 'thul// zhal nas nad kyi rkyal pa 'bud// thugs kyi dkyil nas gzer chen 'bebs// yak+sha dz+wa la 'bar ba ni// dam tshig rak+ta ha ling ka/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis gru gsum zhal// g.yas pa s+t+wa re'i dbyug pa 'phyar// g.yon pa rak+ta'i rgya mtsho rlobs// rdo rje yak+sha ma yis ni// sku la dgyes shing 'khril bar sbyor// bstan pa rgya mtsho srung mdzad lha// ki kang rog ti mi bzad pa// lus po gcig la mgo bo dgu// mgo gcig srin po'i mgo bo ste// ba ti ba ta mgo bos ni// srin po'i ser chen ki kang 'bebs// mgo gcig drang srong rA hu la// skyin thang ki kang rtag tu 'bebs// mgo gcig 'jigs byed sgra gcan 'dzin// srog gshed ki kang rtag tu 'bebs// mgo gcig du ba mjug rings te// 'jig rten bsgul g.yo'i ki kang 'bebs// mgo gcig khyab 'jug sprul pa'i sku// lha srin yongs kyi ki kang 'bebs// mgo gcig be nu rA tsa ste/ glo bur 'khrugs pa'i ki kang 'bebs// mgo gcig tsa ra ka yi mgos// drag po nad kyi ki kang 'bebs// mgo gcig ljang sngon drag po ste// sri thabs sna tshogs ki kang 'bebs// rog ti bya rog mgo brtsegs des// sad dang ser ba btsa' dang mu gai 'bebs// nad ngan sna tshogs ki kang 'bebs// dam tshig nyams pa'i srog zan po// dam las 'das pa chad pas chod// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs nas kyang// mchod bzhes dam skong phrin las mdzod// bka' las 'da' ba'i dam sri la// glo bur ye 'drog gi gang phob// srog pa rtsa la chad pa phob// rgyob cig mA ra

ya ni dza/ sog la lo nad ser ba phob// shar gyi stag srin zor ba gdong// zhal gcig phyag gnyis smug nag zhal// g.yas na nad kyi rkyal pa bsnams// g.yon pas 'brug mo zhing chung bsnyod// kha nas thog gi bu yug skyug/ lho yi bam srin dred mo gdong// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag zhal// g.yas na nad kyi rkyal pa bsnams// g.yon na thog gi 'phreng ba bsnams// kha nas lcags kyi ser ba skyug/ nub kyi gong srin ba glang gdong// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dmar nag zhal// g.yas na nad kyi rkyal pa bsnams// g.yon na glog gi phur bu 'dril// kha nas khrag gi ser ba skyug/ byang gi 'brog srin chu srin gdong// zhal gcig phyag gnyis ljang nag zhal// g.yas na nad kyi rkyal pa bsnams// g.yon na ser ba'i rkyal pa thogs// kha nas ser ba'i bu yug 'thor// 'khor gyi ma mo 'bum sde kun// zhal gcig phyag gnyis smug nag zhal// g.yas nas thog gi ser ba 'bebs// g.yon nas ser ba'i rkyal pa blugs// kha nas ser ba'i bu yug 'thor// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhengs nas kyang// drag po'i phrin las sgrub par mdzod// de skad brjod la phrin las bcol// bskul ba las kyi phrin las kyang// drag po'i thun sngags dag dang sbyar// des ni dmigs pa gang yang 'grub// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rag sha 'bar ba khros pa gza' mchog ming sring bsgrub pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas yang 'jam dpal gshin rje nag pos/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di bka' stsal to// a a hUM hUM/ ra keng b+h+ruM/ bi shwa bi shud+d+he/ dz+nyA na b+han d+ha tsakra/ oM hUM nr-i mA ra du ya ma du/ ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag ya ma b+han d+ha/ tshal pa tshal pa/ dum bu dum bu ni/ mA ra ya ni hUM phaT/ hUM ya hUM ya hUM ya hUM/ ma b+h+yo ma b+h+yo ma b+h+yo ma b+h+yo ma b+h+yo/ mA ra tsa shang s+pha ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM/ ya mAn de ba many+dzu shri ku mA ra ya hUM/ be ta li yag+sha mo hUM/ yA mA rA tsa sa to me ya e ka dza ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ yag+sha dz+wa la ni snying khrag/ yag mo snying rtsa la tiSh+Tha lhan/ ya to yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ rak+mo rak+mo snying tsa sha ma b+h+yo/ rak+mo rak+mo hUM tsa ba tsa ba snying kha rak+mo b+h+yo/ rak+mo rak+mo trag mo shig shig kha rag ma b+h+yo/ rak+mo rak+mo/ ru ru ro ru/ tsa pA la ma b+h+yo/ ma ma yo ki ru lu ru lu/ rak+mo rak+mo tshab mo tshab mo khrag la mu sha ma b+h+yo/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn many+dzu shrI ya mAn+ta ka ya ma rA tsa/ ma mo nag mo kro tI shwa rI sarba rak+mo rak+mo sarba e a ra li hriM hriM/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ oM a kro te ka/ ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ pe ta li rag+sha rak+sha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya sarba ma byi/ sa ma ya sarba ma byi/ sa ma yA badzra tiSh+Tha lhan/ rak+mo yag mo ru ru ro ru tsab mo sa ma yA tiSh+Tha lhan/ rag+mo snying tsang

sha mo b+h+yo/ hUM tsab tsab snying ka rag ma b+h+yo// rak+mo tsa mo khrag ma sha ma b+h+yo// rak+mo ru ru ro ru tsa pa la ma ma b+h+yo/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha badzra lhan/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsar+g+ha b+h+yeHsarba rta thA ga ta many+dzu shrI ku mA ra b+han+d+hA nAM ka mo ri mi/ a ti pu ho pra ti pu ho/ oM e a ra li ya mAn+ta ka/ ya ma ra tsa ma ma sarba snying rtsa sha ma/ tshab tshab snying kha ra ma la/ rak+mo shig shig kha rag la/ ru ru ro ru tsa pa la ma ma/ tshab mo khrag la mu sha ya/ sarba pU tsa tsa bi sa ra bi sa ra kha kha raM kha raM khA hi ho/ hUM ya ma rA tsa sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ dgra bgegs nr-i tri mA ra ya hUM dza/ ha la ha la ra la ra la ri li ri li/ bab bab shu shu shar shar thugs thugs dgra la phrom/ ke ta ke ta swA hA/ oM na ma a ka ha ra tsa na ma hA ka nu/ na ma khe she tsa nye nu swA hA/ oM ya mAn+ta ka/ shI ya mAn+ta ka ki tsi hUM/ ma ma nya kha khA raM kha nyag khe te rtse/ ya to tsa ko du dgra bo nA ra gan/ mug nye la kha tshal/ ya mAn+ta to bum khe she shrI ya mAn+ta ka tsa mu nya mu mu nya mu kru+u ma phru nyu du sha dgra bo mA ra ya na/ sa gi tsa ta shu lu shu lu/ pu shu la pu shu la/ mu li shu shu ti ti tsi ri ti/ hUM ya hUM ya ro ti swA hA/ phroM mu sha phroM/ ya ma sho sha phaT/ oM nA ga sha shu nA ga le le/ su badzra yag+sha ha te badzra rak+sha phroM/ ma ma raM ril/ tsa mun sha ka dud phroM/ ya mAn+ta ka a kar du ru du ru phroM dza dza/ ru mu ni ag ne rak+mo ta ge swA hA/ kyang rje kyang mo tsu ru tsu ru phaT/ phroM mu sha phroM/ oM ba sha mi ki du ru ma shig ki dz+wa la rag shang snying lan rbad thum/ raM raM dun shag hril b+h+yo/ nA ga rA tsa hril shar shar shag badzra sA du+u sa ma yA/ trag rak+mo hril hril rbad ser hril shar b+h+yo/ a ba le ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma ma trag sha hril hril shar b+h+yo/ oM ba sha mi ki rA hu la shar shar hril b+h+yo/ oM sen sen khrag la mu sha rngubs swA hA/ oM raM raM dun shag hri la shar b+h+yo/ oM ya ma rA dza yaM yaM hril shar raM raM/ oM nA ga hril sel shag sad dun sa ma yA hril b+h+yo/ oM ya ma snying ya ma khrag rA hu la hril hril shag shag sen ya b+h+yo/ hril oM badzra khrag tig sna ba rbad// oM badzra tsakra ru ki ta ra rbad/ oM badzra ba shang kri da ra hi da ya badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra ri sha ba ru ka ra khrag ba ra rbad/ oM ka ru Na tsit+ta rbad snying khrag rbad/ thuM ri li li/ oM 'bugs ti man tsi ra mugs// 'bugs ti sa man ta chod/ da ra chod/ da ra rmugs/ da ra khums/ da ra chod/ oM badzra ni dgra bo nr-i nan/ traM ta ta rag rbad/ oM badzra ra rbad/ ba sham ba khrag ti rbad/ khaM ril rbad/ badzra mug tig da ra ya tib rbad/ oM rak+Sha ni tib/ pra ti dz+nyA na da ra thibs/ badzra subs ril rbad/ badzra da ra lib/ oM badzra da ra lib/ oM badzra snying mgo chod/ kha la za mu ta taM ting/ bu na taM ting/ da ra na rbad nan/ dgra bo nan/ oM kro

ti baM rtse ra tsa rbad/ oM ho te/ bag tsa hUM/ ya ma rA tsa sa to mo ya hUM phaT/ oM shrI many+dzu badzra kro ti ba ta tsakra oM hUM badzra sa twa hUM/ tri phur bu hUM/ badzra kI li ki la ya sarba duSh+tan mA ra ya hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ya hril hril b+h+yo raM shar/ ya ma snying ya ma khrag/ rA hu la hril hril/ shag shag mA ra ya dzA/ oM ni tri pra be shag/ pa ra man+ta be ta she te sha ya hUM phaT/ pA ra mu tra be te sha ya hUM phaT/ dun tri tig sna sa ma ya s+t+waM 'gu si dan ma ma b+h+yo/ u tsu sma sha dgra la b+h+yo/ kham pa rbad shag dgra la b+h+yo/ ya ma snying ya ma khrag ya ma du/ ya ma 'dus/ ya ma rA dza 'dus 'dus/ ya ma rA dza 'dus 'dus/ ya ma ra ya snying la sen 'dar srog sam/ chums chums/ snying rbad/ sum ril rnam shes rbad buM/ oM badzra ya mAn+ta ka ya/ badzra ya ma rA dza ya/ badzra tig sna ya/ badzra kha thaM/ kha thaM ya/ badzra sha na mu ru ya/ badzra zhu zhu ya/ badzra ti sha me kha ya/ badzra ma da pra ba ya/ badzra bong bong ya/ badzra ro kri ya/ badzra ma zhu zhu ya/ badzra ra ti ya/ nu ha na tri tsa ya tri laM du ya/ rung laM du ya/ paM su laM a nan ta nan/ ti li ma ti mo ti ni mu tsaM la sa ma ya swA hA/ oM bi sha mi ki/ du ru ma ni ke dz+wa la ti a tse te swA hA/ tsa pa ti rA hu la a ka swA hA/ phroM ra sha ra sha la lta hUM phaT/ ces bcom ldan 'das kyi drag po gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyis/ zhing bcu ma lus 'dul bar gyur to// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rak+sha 'bar ba gza' mchog gi sngags rim gyi le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o//// de nas mgon po gshed chen gyis// skyin thang las kyi rim pa dang// bsnyen bsgrub thus ka mdor bsdus pa// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis zung// 'dir ni gza' mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir// las kyi rim pa 'di rnams bshad// gza' mchog rog ti sgrub pa dang// sring mo bzhi yi sgrub thabs dang// 'di dag bsgrub pa'i rdzas dag dang// dmag bskos ki kang 'bebs lugs dang// rgyu ba'i dus dang tshes grangs dang// 'jug cing gdon pa'i dus tshod dang// grub pa'i rtags dang mtshan ma dang// thugs rje'i las kyi bzlas pa dang// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i bzlas pa dang// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang// bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen dang// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i dam rdzas dang// las la sbyar ba'i tshes grangs dang// bskul tshig rnams kyi bye brag dang// phur bu las kyi bye brag dang// 'jug gcod las kyis gnan thabs dang// skyin thang las kyis thus ka dang// rnam grangs bcu bdun las kyi sbyor// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// khyab 'jug chen po rA hu la// 'di bsgrub pa yi dam rdzas ni// shing sngon dag gi shun pa la// dam sri'i ming dang rus bris te// bse gab kha sbyar nang du'o// dkar gsum mngar gsum klu sman dang// la sman

rtsi sman sna tshogs dang// dri yi rgyal po ga pur dang/ sbyar te bse gab nang du stsal// de nas ban+d+ha'i thod phor du// sha sna rnam pa sna tshogs dang// skye tshe shang tshe nyung nag til// thal chen gsur dang khrag chen rnams// ba yi 'o mar sbyar la stsal// khrag sna tshogs pa'i dmar thab dang// dkar thab sngo thab tshang bar bsham// gzhan yang gu gul nag po dang// 'bras dang tshan dang gru sman sbyar// tsa ra rog po'i 'gal kha la// ro la rog ti nag po bri// ske ru rten dang ming rus gdags// dmigs pa de la bcas pa dang// de yi drung du bzhag pa ni// yugs sa mo yi klad phor du// gdong mo bzhi yi dam rdzas dang// stag dom ba glang nya yi snying// khrag rul sha rul ra mchin dang// sha sna grangs med mdzo zho dang// khrag sna dag dang sbyar nas kyang// klad phor nang du stsal bar bya'o// gu gul nag po tshil chen dang// rgya tshil dag dang bsreg phyir bsham// dpal gyi gtor ma sha chen can// phud dang bcas pa bsham par bya'o// de nas bdud po rog ti de'i// lus po dum bu re re la// lha srin sde brgyad re re byung// gyur te dus tshes tshes grangs dang// nyin mtshan dag tu 'khor mor rgyu// tshes grangs dag la dbang byed de// ki kang 'bebs lugs rim pa yis// bskul ba'i rim pa tshul bzhin bya'o// rog ti nag po bsgrub pa yis// gru bzhi pa yi stegs bu la// dbus su e ni gru gsum gyi// zur du gzug pa'i sgyed rdo ni// shar du kha bltas lung pa nas// sgyed rdo dkar po btsal byas la// shar lho'i rtse la gzug par bya// nub tu bltas pa'i lung mdo nas// sgyed rdo gro bo btsal byas la// lho nub rtse la gzug par bya// byang du bltas pa'i lung mdo nas// sgyed rdo dmar po btsal byas la// byang gi rtse la gzug par bya// gtsugs la gshin rje rnam gsum po'i// spyan drang bstim mchod dbang bskur la// de yi steng du bsgrub pa'i rdzas// zangs sam thod pa mtshan ngan du// khrag sna snying sna mang po dang// dkar thab dmar thab ra mchin dang// ba dmar ra dkar 'o ma dang/ dme khrag rnam pa gsum po dang// chu bdud chad pa'i sa dag ni// sa rdo drus dang gong bu dang// snga sngo phal dag ci 'byor btsal// mA ra ya yi ling+ga dang// yul gyi phu chu rdzing pa dang// yul gyi ming byang bris la bstsal// gzed mo'i bsnol mo'i thod pas so// rta dang mdzo yi thod pa la// pad+ma bsgrub ste mnan na 'grub// ling+ga dang bcas thod pa dang// de dang de rnams bsgrub cing drangs// hUM khro chen ya ma rA dza ni// ya ma dam sri dgra bo'i gshed// bstan pa rgya mtsho bsrungs pa'i lha// gru gsum rtse la gshegs su gsol// srog bdud dmar po bdud kyi bu// gshin rje'i rgyal po ma ru tse// bstan pa rgya mtsho srung mdzad lha// gru

gsum rtse la gshegs su gsol// rA tsa nag po bdud kyi rje// bdud dang gshin rje ma mo yi// tshogs la dbang bsgyur dgra yi gshed// gshin rje'i rgyal po nag 'joms rje// bstan pa rgya mtsho srung mdzad lha// gru gsum rtse la gshegs su gsol// de nas thod par drangs te bskyon// bstan pa rgya mtsho srung mdzad phyir// bstan pa bshig pa 'gugs mdzad lha// ya ma rA dza'i dus la bab// ma ru tse yi dus la bab// gshin rje nag po'i dus la bab// sprul pa'i mnga' dbang gshin rje rnams// ling+ga dang bcas thod pa 'dren// bstan pa bshig pa kun drangs nas// dmigs pa'i rten la bstims byas te// gshin rje rnam gsum phyag tu gtad// mi thar gshin rje'i lag tu bskyal// ri bo gsum gyi rtse la bskyal// sdug bsngal mang po ya re nga// ki kang mang pos srog bcad nas// gdong mo bzhi yis rngam zas byas// rA hu la yis khyur mid byas// gshin rje rnams kyi lto ru phyin// lhag ma lus pa med par ni// gshin rje rnams kyis bzhes su gsol// thod pa ling+ga la sogs pa'i// dmigs pa'i rten kun drangs byas la// sgyed pu gsum la bskyon par bya'o// mda' gang ngam ni gru bzhi pa'i// stegs bu'i dbus su gru gsum e// gong du bstan pa lta bu'o// phyogs bzhir 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// mu khyud me ri gru chad dang// sgo bzhir bcas pa bri bar bya// e yi dbus su hUM ya rnams// rtsibs bzhir ma ra tsa sha dgod// zhing chen gyi ni g.yang gzhi dang// khyi nag po yi g.yang gzhi dang// glang dmar gyi ni g.yang gzhi dang// rta nag po yi g.yang gzhi dang// mi'am ci sogs g.yas pa bsham// dme khrag zhal bu bzhi yang bsham// de nas thun rdzas g.yang gzhi'o// drag por bskul ba'i rim pa rnams// las la sbyor kha'i dus su shis// ma mo dbang du bsdu ba dang// gsang ba'i rdzas kyi bskang ba'ang bya// thun dmar bsgrub pa'i gong du'ang// lha dang dbral ba'i rim pa bya// mA ra ya yi yul phyogs su// rims nad sna tshogs gtang ba'i phyir// sngon du bshad pa'i rdzas rnams kyis// nang du dug sna sna tshogs blugs// bsgrub ste mkhar dang yul la brdeg/ gza' bdud rgyu ba'i dus tshod du// rlung dang shwa ser byung ba la'o// gdon mi za bar yams nad 'ong// pho log bal nad glang thabs 'ong// phyugs la 'phog na lhog rgol dang// phyugs nad sna tshogs 'byung bar nges// rdo rje 'dzin pas rab tu zung// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gza' mchog bsgrub pa'i las kyi rim pa dang/ thun gyi thus ka gces pa bsdus pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o//// de nas gshin rje'i gshed po yis// 'gal pa cham la dbab pa'i phyir// skyin thang las kyi rim pa

'di// yang dag bsdus te bshad par bya// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung// bstan pa srung byed yul phyogs su// lo tog smin 'joms gzhom bya'i phyir// ra rog dang ni khyi rgya yis// khrag sna bsres pa grod pa gang// mA ra ya yi yul phyogs kyi// lha rten rnams ni chu mig khar// dug shing dag dang nyung nag ni// rtsi shing dag la me btang la// rnal 'byor dam can bdag nyid ni// gshin rje ba ni ya ga ste// gtsug na me 'bar skur bsgoms la// dud ka dbu gnyis phyag bzhi pa// g.yas pa dud ka nag po'o// g.yas pa rdo rje pre le can// g.yon pa b+han d+ha rgyu zhags can// spyan nas khrag gi ser ba 'bab// smin mtshams khro gnyer glog tu 'gyu// rkan sgra brdebs pas 'brug chen sgrogs// dur khrod sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// de 'dra'i sku ru bdag bsgom ste// mdun du maN+Dal chag chag gdab// sa dkar ras ni bag phye yis// gnam the'u yi ni gzugs bris la// nyi ma'i rtse la bdag nyid kyang// shar du kha bltas gnam the'u'ang// mgo bo shar du bstan pa bzhag/ snying ga ru ni nr-i badzra// bya ba legs par bris la bzhag/ snying gar nyung nag shing bu'am// yang na dug shing gdug pa la// rgya tshil gu gul la sogs bsreg/ grod pa'i khrag la sbyin sreg bya// oM bi nA ya ka yung nag khrag shing ma thug swA hA/ ku hi gu hi kha li ku hi dza du tre nan gzer khu shing pu le su hi/ mi shi khra nan si ni pu hi ka ha khu nan pu tri kring mi traM raM swA hA/ zhes pa bzlas te/ me btang/ ling+ga khrag blug sbyin bsreg bya// ting 'dzin sngags bzlas 'od zer 'phros// skye 'gro thams cad gshin rjer gyur// gnam the'u'i snying gar gzer bsam ste// kha nas ser ba 'bebs par bsgom// grod pa'i khrag lhag khab kyis gtsags// 'dod pa'i zhing gseb kun tu 'drud// khrag 'dzag rjes su ser ba 'bebs// tshigs khrid bya ba'i rim par bshad// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// lho phyogs gshin rje ya ba tis// lo nad skyin thang dbab pa la// nyung dkar dang ni til nag dang// ra dug re lcags spyad tsher dang// khrag chen dur khrod sol ba dang// yugs sa mo yi dor ma dang// bdud rtsi dang sbyar dpa' byed du// gong gi rdzas rnams de ru blugs// yul gang yin pa'i lha rten nam// chu mig gi ni nang du sba// rdzas kyis bum pa ma phyung bar// thog dang ser ba dus med dbab// yang na gdug pa'i dri nga dang// bra ma glang ma'i me la ni// lha rten drung du bsreg par bya'o// thal ba'i sa bon sngo gseb tu// kun tu khyab par gtor zhing bzlas// sngags la nan tan rab tu bskyed// rdzas rnams sbed kyang drag tu bzlas// oM badzra sa ma ya sha sha phaT phaT/ hu lu hu lu ban da thuM ri li ri li sha pa ka Ta la ma nu ba ba ni swA hA/ 'bum

phrag bdun du bzlas par bya// chu mig nang du sba ba ni// khros nas thog chen rang la 'ong// nA ga ge sar nA ga bus pa dang// 'dam bu rtsa ba dbang po lag pa dang// shu dag la sogs klu sman sna tshogs dang// dkar gsum mngar gsum gtor mar rin chen brdar// dar sna lnga yis steng nas lhab lhub bya// bden pa bdar zhing mchod pas mnyes par bya// lha klu dag la dpang gzug bcol gtam bya'o// thog las bsrung phyir sngags 'di drag tu bzlas// nA ga mu ti sa ma ya a a/ de nas thog las rdo rje gur gyis bsrung// rnal 'byor de la thog gis mi tshugs so/ thog ser dbab sngags 'di yang rgyun du bzlas// ya ba ti yi thog ser dbab thabs te// 'di la drag po'i btsan thog mchog tu gsungs// gshin rje ral pa tshar dgus las byas te// thog dang ser ba dbab lugs ni// bdag gi gshin rje ral pa tshar dgu yi// cha lugs nag po ral pa tshar dgu dag/ gyen la brdzes te dgra s+t+wa lcags kyu dang// zhags pa tho ba thogs par bsgoms nas ni// nyung dkar rgyal po krag chen 'o ma dang// lan tshwa dag la bsngags te sngo la gtor// sngags la nan tan bskyed la grangs med bzlas// pi pi shar dza la dza la phug phub mun zhes// thabs sna gsum byas rdzas dang thal 'jim dang// lo la gtor zhing yul der gnan par bya// de nas drag por yid 'dod phebs pa dang// ser ba de nyid bcang par 'dod pa yang// dkar gsum dag dang mngar gsum dang// 'bru sna spos dang gu gul dkar po dang// thab tu stsal te sngags 'dis gcad par bya// ral pa tshar dgu las chen sngags 'dis gcad// duM duM zhi zhi bi ta li zhes brjod do// des ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams byed// gshin rje me ru tse yi las bya ste// lo nad ser ba 'bebs na 'di ltar bya// bdag nyid gshin rje ma ru tse// sku mdog dmar nag chen po la// zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste// zhing dbyug 'khor lo 'bar ba can// dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan par bsgom// thog bsreg nad kyi las pa yis// lci ba dang ni skyes bu dang// dur khrod kyi ni thal ba dang// grangs med pa ru sngags 'di bzlas// ta ki dza ti ki dza/ hu ya hu ya hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ khyi dang ra dang bud med kyi// mngal khrag dang ni sngo sna dang// mdzo mo'i 'o ma dang bsres te// ma thang phur pa rang thab bya// yang na dza so ma btang la// sngags bris snod dkyil thab sbub ste// thod pa'i dkyil du phru ba mnan// ma ru tse yi dbab lugs te// 'di yang las kyi mchog tu bshad// ya ma rA tsa'i las byas te// thog dang ser ba'i dbab lugs ni// bdag nyid ya ma rA tsa ste// smug nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa rdo rje spu gri la// g.yon

pa thog gi phreng ba can// de 'dra'i sku ru bdag bsgoms te// chu mig dang ni lha rten du// bra ma'i hom shing khru gang bya// lug sha nya sha la phug dang// ro ldang ba gla lan tshwa dang// ma bdud dang ni gu gul dang// rgya tshil skam po dag bshams te// khrag sna dag dang khrag chen du// sbyar te ga'u khengs pa der// rdzas rnams bdug cing hom du skyur// sngags 'di dag tu bzlas par bya// nA ga nA ga na ka la ka la phaT phaT/ sngo sna rnams kyi thab rlangs dang// rdzas rnams sreg pa'i rlangs pa nyid// sprin du chags pa rlung gis gtor// sprin nag 'thor zhing 'khrugs pa dang// klu nag gel pa mgo lnga yis// kha nas khrag gi ser ba dang// gzhung dang bcas te dbab par byed// nyung dkar dang ni zangs dreg dang// mA ra ya yi yul phyogs kyi// ma mig gnyen po'i chu gsum la// sngags te bzlas la sman du gtor// gcer bur phyung ste ra khyi yi// khrag gis ngo gdong byug nas ni// brang brdung 'o dod ngud mos brdab// des ni ser ba nges par 'bebs// ya ma rA tsa'i dbab lugs so// myos byed 'bar ba'i dbab thabs ni// gshin rje myos byed 'bar ba ni// ser nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// chibs su gshed po 'brug la bcibs// phyag gnyis glog gi phur bu 'dril// zhal nas khrag gi ser ba 'bebs// de ltar bdag nyid bsgoms nas ni// so ma btang ba'i rdza nang du// khyi dang phag gi 'o ma dang// sngo sna tshogs pa bsdus nas kyang// ra rog khrag dang de bsres la// rgya tshil gyis ni me btang la// ri gsum rtse ru de bskol la// gshin rje'i drag sngags bzlas te dbul// drag po'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya// oM ta ki dza hi byi tsa hi byi tsa hi ha ya hUM phaT// gnod sbyin gang gis mi bzlog ste// myos byed 'bar ba'i dbab lugs so// brag gyon kog rje'i gshin rje yis// dmod btsugs drag pos dbab thabs ni// bdag nyid ya ma rA tsa ste// sku mdog nag po 'bar ba la/ lus la brag nag gos su gyon// lag na lcags kyi 'khor lo bskor/ de dra'i sku ru bdag bsgom ste// rta nag ra rog khyi nag gi// khrag sna gsum bsres grod pa gang// khyer te dmod btsugs 'dug nas su// lce shing gi ni hom byas te// sngags de bzlas shing lce shing gi/ hom du khrag sna gsum po sbreng// oM gu dzi khu kra tsi khrug/ shar shu shar shu yab sha/ ya tun mi tsa khan he du nyags// sngags de bzlas shing ra rog gi// lpags rlon brdab cing 'o dod 'bod// ra lpags ras sod khas phug bsreg/ gdon mi za bar phebs par nges// brag gyon gshin rje'i dbab lugs so// hUM chen ya mAn+ta ka yis// gling bzhi phung byed gzhi bsgrub ste// sel ba'i ser ba dbab thabs ni// chu mig klu yod nges pa'i sar// ra khyi rgya bo'i

khrag dang ni// ra yi 'o mar sbyar byas nas// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru// blugs te thag pa mkhar nag gi/ bkyigs nas btags te bzung bas ni// bdag nyid ya mAn+ta kar bskyed// spyan drang bstim ste mchod nas ni// bsnyen pa thon dang sngags bzlas nas// de nas ma mo'i sngags 'bum bzlas// dza dza me he d+ha d+ha/ sa ma ya snying kha rag nag mo tri sa ma ya dus tri rak+mo ya ma rak+mo ya ma b+h+yo/ bskul tshig 'di yang brjod de bskul// gling bzhi ma mo nang 'khrug byed// nying sha nying gis za mo b+h+yo// hUM gling bzhi ma mo chen mo ni// shin tu mi bzad sdig mo che// srin mo khros ma 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rdo rje lha mo dam tshig ma// ral pa phyed kyis gnam khebs ma// ral pa'i zar bus skar 'brul ma// khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// rtag tu bshug pa'i glu len ma// lag na bdud kyi khram bam thogs// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// nam mkha'i khams kyi glog ma sprin// srid pa gsum gyi chu 'bebs ma// chu yi skyin thang dbab pa'i dus la bab// oM rak+sha ma ru ma ru ma ru sprugs sha dgra sdibs// ni sha ku ru kha ram so ti ku sha sha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ so ti ku sha sha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ zangs bu mgo la bkal te sngags rnams drag tu bzlas/ thod pa'i rdzas su bzlas/ gshed chen ya mAn+ta ka'i dbab lugs so// drag po btsan thabs rim pa brgyad// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dmag dpon brgyad kyi thog ser skyin thang dbab pa'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o//// de nas ya mAn+ta ka yi// thog zor thun gyi dus su yang// phrin las myur bar bya ba'i phyir// drag po'i bskul ba 'di gsungs so// hUM shar gyi stag srin zor ba gdong// na bza' stag gi shun chen gsol// bse yi ral pa sha ra ra// zhal nas 'brug gi sgra sgrogs ma// g.yas na bse yi phur pa 'dril// g.yon na khrag zor dmar po 'phen// dam nyams dgra la pho lhog thong// thog dang glog gi sna yang 'dren// dam nyams dgra bo'i yul phyogs su// ri rab shar nas ser ba phob// oM ha ra dang yang phob// mu kha ma rak+sha hUM hUM/ hUM lho yi bam srin dred mo gdong// na bza' dred kyi shun chen gsol// mthing gi ral pa sha ra ra// zhal nas glog gi 'od 'gyu ma// g.yas na gnam lcags sta re bsnams// g.yon na khrag zor dmar po 'phen// dam nyams dgra la gzer thabs thong// thog dang ser ba'i sna yang 'dren/ dam nyams dgra yi yul phyogs su// ri rab lho nas ser ba phob// oM da ra mu yum kha rak+sha b+h+yo hUM hUM/ hUM nub kyi kong srin ba glang gdong// na bza' ba glang shun chen gsol// zangs kyi ral pa sha ra

ra// zhal nas gnam lcags thog 'bebs ma// g.yas na zangs gri rnon po bsnams// g.yon na khrag zor dmar po 'phen// dam nyams dgra la glang thabs thong// thog dang ser ba'i sna yang 'dren// dam nyams dgra bo'i yul phyogs su// ri rab nub nas ser ba phob// oM ma rak+sha du kha tsa ya kha hUM hUM/ hUM byang gi 'brog srin chu srin gdong// na bza' chu srin g.yang gzhi gsol// lcags kyi ral pa sha ra ra// kha nas khrag gi ser ba 'bebs// g.yas na rdo rje be con thogs// g.yon na khrag zor dmar po 'phen// dam nyams dgra la lhog rgol thong// thog dang ser ba'i sna yang 'dren// dam nyams dgra bo'i yul phyogs su// ri rab byang nas ser ba phob// oM tsa tu ma sha sta ya kha rag b+h+yo b+h+yo hUM hUM/ de nas yang ni gshed po yis// las kyi bskul ba 'di gsungs so// hUM shar gyi stag srin zor ba gdong// lus po gcig la mgo bo dgu// phyag na thog dang ser ba bsnams// zhabs ni gnam lcags phur bu rkang// ljags kyis glog gi phreng ba 'gyu// mchil ma thal ba'i ser ba 'bebs// kha rlangs dmar po glog ltar 'gyu// thal mo brdabs bas 'brug chen sgrogs// shar gyi stag srin dgra yi gshed// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas drongs// skyu rlibs rbad bu nan// lha yi bam srin dred mo gdong// sku mdog sngo skya thal mdog ma// dbu lnga ma la phyag bcur gdengs// dkar sngo dmar ljang nag po'i dbu// kha nas glog gi phreng ba 'gyu// mchil ma thal ba ser chen 'bebs// g.yas kyi phyag lngas mi snying 'byin// g.yon gyi phyag na snying 'dren lcags kyu thogs// thal mo brdabs pas 'brug chen sgrogs// skra ni ma mo'i ral pa can// mchog gi ral nag nyi li li// ral nag snyigs pa'i nang shed nas// bse yi ma mo bdun 'bum 'byung// 'jig rten khams kun skrag cing g.yo// ya ma dam sri'i sha rus la// chem chem nal nal dgra la b+h+yo// oM g+hi ta ya ma ta mA ra ya rbad bu nan// nub kyi kong srin ba glang gdong// sku mdog dmar mo chen mo la// bse yi ral pa sha ra ra// ral pa bse 'od 'bar ba las// bse yi spyang mo nyi li li// rkan sgra brdabs pas 'brug chen sgrogs// ljags nas glog gi 'phreng ba 'gyu// phyag na thog gi rgyal mtshan bsnams// mchil ma thal bas ser cher 'bebs// gsod byed chen mo bse gdong ma// mna' zan dam nyams bka' gcog po// ya ma dam sri'i snying la b+h+yo/ ya dang dgra la dza pa ti/ rbad bu nan/ byang gi 'brog srin chu srin gdong// sku mdog sngo mthing chen mo la// lcags kyi ral pa sha ra ra// ral pa lcags 'od 'bar ba las// lcags kyi spyang mo nyi li li// lcags kyi mtsho rlabs glog 'gyu zhing// rkan sgra brdebs pas 'brug chen sgrogs// zhal nas

khrag gi ser ba 'bebs// kha rlangs tog gi bu yug 'thul// phyag na rdo rje be con bsnams// dam tshig nyams pa'i snying 'dren ma// dgra snying za zhing dgra khrag 'thung// don snying dkar nag mtshams nas za// ya ma dam sri'i snying la b+h+yo// mA ra ya ni rbad dun nan// drag po thun zor dus su ni// las 'di bskul bar rab tu gces// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gza' mchog ming sring gi thun gyi bskul ba las kyi le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// phur bu las kyi bye brag 'di// gnam lcags dang ni khro chu dang// spre'u thun gyi mtshon cha dang// mi phyugs bsad pa'i mtshon dum dang// rno mnyen ngar dang bcas pa dang// lcags sna lnga po de dag la// mgar ba spro thung gsod la dga'// mgo dang phur bu 'phrad dus su// phur pa 'di ni brdung bar shis// sor gyi tshigs ni bco brgyad dam// yang na sor tshigs bcu gnyis tshad du bya// yang na sor brgyad tshad du ste// yang na sor gsum sor lnga tshad// las gang bya ba'i dbyings dag ni// mgo yi sor gcig tshad du bya// sked pa sor gcig de bzhin te// stod ni zur brgyad dag tu bya// smad ni zur gsum dpal du bya// seng ldeng la sogs gdug pa'i shing// tsher ma rno ba gang dag dang// sngar bzhin dag tu phur bya'o// gdab kar byin gyis brlab pa ni// dang por chos kyi sku ru dmigs// de nas longs spyod rdzogs skur brlab// sprul skur byin gyis brlab pa ni// phur bu rog ti nag por dmigs// ye shes rog ti nag po bstim// bzlas pa'i yi ge 'du ti yis// bsnyen pa'i tshad du phyin pa ste// gdab pa'i dus su 'di ltar dmigs// bdag nyid rog ti nag por bsam// rog ti nag po ki kang bdag/ bya rog mgo bo sum brtsegs can// de yi lag mthil g.yas par ni// ya ma rA tsa gsal bar bsam// lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil la ni// e ka dzA ti gsal bar bsgom// g.yas mtheb yak+sha dz+wa la 'bar// g.yon mtheb rdo rje yak+sha mo// mdzub g.yas pa tri ba kra ma// gung g.yas rA hu la ru bsgom/ srin lag g.yas pa sgra gcan 'dzin// mthe'u chung g.yas par bsam pa ni// ki kang du ba mjug rings so// mdzub mo g.yon la khyab 'jug bsgom// gung mo g.yon gyi bi nu ni// ra tsa gsal ba nyid du bsgom// srin lag g.yon par ra tsa ka/ mthe'u chung g.yon pa ljang sngon po// mtheb srin g.yas la stag srin te// mtheb srin g.yon la dred mo gdong// mdzub snying g.yas la ban lang gdong// mdzub snying g.yon la chu srin gdong// de ltar 'dris gsal goms pa dang// phur bu rog ti nag por bsam// dpal la rA hu la nyid de// gsal bar bsgom (20)

ste dril dril la// 'debs pa'i tshul bstan tsam gyis kyang// srid pa gsum yang skad ngan 'don// dmigs rten gang yin dmigs sngags 'don// ling+ga'i gzhug tshul gsal ba la// rab tu dril te srog khrag gdab// glo dang snying gi dkar nag ni// mtshams nas thal gyi byung ba yis// shes pa brlags te bag bzhi nyams// bkrag dang gzi mdangs phur bus bsdus// rog ti nag po 'khor bcas kyis// dbang po gnas yul bcas pa dang// sha khrag rus ba lpags la sogs// rngams shing bstod de bcad cing za// srog gshed pho mos srog gsad cing// srin po srin mo'i sprul pa rnams// la la yis ni dbus la rngubs// la la yis ni khrag la 'jibs// la la yis ni rtsa nas 'dren// la las glo snying nang rol 'dren// la las klad khrag 'khrug cing za// ki kang phab nas gsad pa la// rjes shul med par za byed cing// mA ra ya yi yul dag tu// ser ba sna tshogs char ltar 'bebs// thog gi ser ba sgong ltar 'dril// pho log glang thabs gzer thabs dang// lhog rgal bam nag la sogs pa// ki kang sna tshogs dus med 'bebs// lha dang phye la phur pas gdab// thun dmar zor gyi las rnams 'grub// thugs dam bskang ba rnam gnyis bya// de nas mjug gcod gnan thabs bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gza' mchog gi phur pa bsgrub pa dang/ las rim bsdus pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o//// gshin rje gshed kyis gsungs pa'i don// lag na rdo rjes rab tu nyon// gsang ba rgyud chen brnag pa'i lung// don gnyis dag tu shes par bya// bsnyen bsgrub dang ni phrin las so// bsnyen pa la yang rnam gnyis so// sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga ste// bsod nams bsag par bstan pa dang// bsnyen pa dngos nyid bstan pa'o// thabs dang dgod pa rnam gnyis kyis// bsod nams bsag pa'i cho gar 'dod// ngo bo dbye ba nges pa'i tshig/ dgos ched rnam pa bzhi yin te// bsnyen pa'i dbye bar bstan pa yin// sgrub pa la yang bcu gnyis te// gnas dang brtul zhugs mtshan ma bzhag/ mchod rdzas bzhag dang dngos grub rten// dam tshig ting 'dzin 'phro 'du dang// grub pa'i rtags dang blang ba'i thabs// bar du gcod pa'i bgegs dang ni// grub pa'i rtags dang spogs pa'i thabs// spogs pa chen po'i cho ga ste// drag shul ting 'dzin bcu gnyis kyis// dngos grub blang ba'i cho gar 'dod// phrin las dag la rnam gsum ste// 'khor lo bskor te mnan bsreg go/ dus dang gang zag bskor ba'i gnas// ngo bo dbye ba nges pa'i tshig/ 'khor lo rgyu rkyen mthun pa'i dpe// grub byed grogs dang ma grub skyon// grub pa'i rtags dang ma

grub spogs// dbye ba bcu gsum rab tu gces// zhes gshin rje'i gshed pos rab tu gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ las kyi mdo byang bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dus tshod mtshon cha rnon po la// rdo rje slob dpon sku dgra sogs// the tshom med par bsgral bas 'grub// phag sbrul ston dpyid ra ba la// byi ba rta ni ston dpyid 'bring// ston dpyid tha chung glang lug la// stag sprel dbyar dgun ra bar shis// dbyar dgun 'bring po bya yos la// khyi 'brug dbyar dgun tha mar 'grub// de ni lo kag zla ba'i gshed// khyad par nyi ma'i gshed gnyis te// dbyar rlung 'jug cing dgun rlung 'byung// de yi dus su gsad par shis// zhag gi gshed du gyur pa yang// ra ba bzhi la bcu bzhi shis// 'bring po bzhi yi bco lnga la// tha chung bzhi yi bcu drug go/ tshes bzhi brgyad dang bcu gcig dang// bco lnga bco brgyad nyi shu gnyis// nyi shu lnga dang nyi shu dgu// dus ni srod dang snga dro dang// 'jing dang nam gung nam chung dang// nyi shar skya rengs shar ba dang// nyin mtshan zhag ni go rim bzhin// de phyir ma gshin cher phyin rgyu// btsal nas gsod pa'i dus bstan pa// dpyid ra tshes bdun dag la shis// tha chung nyi shu bdun la shis// dbyar zla tshes brgyad 'bring po ni// bco brgyad tha chung nyi shu brgyad// ston zla tshes dgu'am 'bring po ni// bcu dgu tha chung nyi shu dgu/ dgun zla gsum la de bzhin te// dus su gsang ba'i las la 'jug/ sa yi las la dpyid zla gsum// shing gi dbyar zla ston ni me// dgun ni lcags khams 'chi ba'i dus// de dus zhag gshed btung bar bya// ra ba bzhi ni rta la bcod// rta chung dus su 'bring bzhi ste// tha chung khra la brdeg par bya// dgun gsum skar ma gsum 'char te// skar ma'i gshed kyi dus su ni// sbyar thabs thams cad rab na yang// khrag 'thung la sogs zor rnams shis// lo zla zhag gis dus bstan nas// dus tshod rnon po brtan par bya// sems can yid ni gnyid log pas// de dus rgyu zhing 'khyams pa'i tshe// kun kyang rnam rtog las byung bas// sbyor ba rtog bskyed gsad par shis// sha ba srod dang nam phyed na// lug dang gnyan gyi bla yang rgyu// phag pa tho rangs bya nyid ni// nyi ma'i zer la rgyu bar bshad// ra bla nyi ma nub kar te// bya zla nyi ma zer la rgyu// g.yag dang glang la srod la rgyu// rta la nyi ma gung la rgyu// de dus dgug cing gsad par shis// thun mong bsgral ba'i thabs su gsungs// dngos po cing yang 'gyur ba'i tshe// 'gyur ba'i bla dang sbyar bar bya'o// khams kyi gshed du bstan pa ni// sgrub pa po dang

lo zla dang// dus tshod kyis ni gsod par byed// king ni gshed po lug dang glang// lo dgra bya dang spre'u nyid// dgun zla dbyar zla tha chung nyid// dus tshod phyed yol nyi ma phyed// ha las sman ni gsod 'gyur na// bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba smos ci dgos// khyi 'brug bya yi gshed po ste// phag dang byi ba lo dgra nyid// mi mthun bdun zur the tshom med// zla gshed ston zla tha chung ste// zla ba bdun zur rdo rjes gcod// tho rangs srod la bsros par byed// bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur na// sbyor ba bdun rgyud the tshom med// kung la khyi 'brug shing khams pa// shing dang kha dog 'dra ba ste// gsod pa'i las la the tshom med// stag dang yongs su dar ba'i dgra// bdun zur gshed du gyur pa ste// tsha ba'i me bzhin gsod par byed/ zla gshed srog dang mi mthun pa'i// bdun zur gsod de the tshom med// dus tshod nam phyed dus la shis// kun gyi khams kyi gshed chen po// lus po lnga yi khams las gsod// lo dgra glang lug gnyis kyis gsod// mi mthun bdun zur shin tu 'joms// dus tshod mtshan mo rangs par shis// de nas mthun 'phrod bshad pa ni// bzang zhing grub par bya ba las// bdud kyi nyi ma bdun po la// drag sngags tshogs kyis cham la dbab// nyi ma gru sogs bre ru 'byor// bre ru bya 'jug zla bar 'byor// mig dmar khrums smad la ro sman// gza' lhag sgrog dang smin drug mthun// phur bu rgyal stod rgyal smad 'jebs// pa sangs khyab 'jug rta chung nyid// spen pa sa ga sa ri ste// de ltar mthun sbyor dus su ni// ngan pa'i las ni 'byung 'gyur bas// de phyir bzang po'i las su 'gyur// bdud kyi nyi ma bshad pa ni// nyi ma lag sor cha rgod gsum// zla ba rgyal smad bre ru gsod// mig dmar bre dang sgrog gis te// gza' lhag dbyug pa gnyis gyis 'jigs/ phur bu mgo ru 'byor bar 'jigs// pa sangs wa dang lag sor gsum// spen pa bya ma bdud kyi nyin// bzang po las kyis gsod gyur na// ngan pa'i las kyis smos ci dgod// mi 'phrod bdun du bshad pa ni// nyi ma khrums smad zla ba dang// sa ga mi 'phrod mig dmar dang// lag tu mi 'phrod gza' lhag dang// gru sogs mi 'phrod phur bu sgrog/ pa ba sangs dang bre mi 'phrod// de ltar mi 'phrod bdun po la// phan gdags las ni gcig mi 'grub// nyi ma dang ni sa ga 'jig/ zla ba dag ni sa ri ste// mig mar sgrog tu 'jig par bstan// gza' lhag bya'u 'jig pa ste// phur bu la yang bi dzi 'jig/ pa ba sangs la bya gzhug 'jig/ spen pa la na bya ma 'jig/ mi 'phrod bdun dang 'jig pa bdun// bdud kyi nyi mar gsad par shis// 'tsho byed yul lha skyob pa ni// g.yag dang mi dkar tshul gyis

'gegs// bud med dri chen bsreg nas kyang// 'chi bdag rnams kyi bka' kun bzlas// zhang bon bzang po lta bus ni// pho lhas 'gegs pa de dus su// glang rog rwa bsreg sngar bzhin bya// khra dang spyang khu lta bus skyob// dgra lha yin te gsur chen gtang// rgya tshil bsreg pas 'bros par byed// bud med sha ba lta bus ni// ma lha ma sman 'go ba ste// ra dang rta spangs til nag bsreg/ ting 'dzin mi gsal bying rmugs na// pho lhas 'gegs pa yin par brjod// til nag nyung nag gu gul ni// sbyar ma bsregs na 'phros par byed// mi 'phrod dbye ba'i thabs bstan pa// bya rog 'ug pa'i gung ru+u la// grogs gang a dang shag shag bri// go rim bzhin du bri bar bya'o// yugs sa mo yi rkang dreg dang// 'bog dang glang rog ra khrag sogs// dam pa'i dud pas dus gsum bdug/ 'di ni dbye ba'i mchog tu gsungs// nag po gsal byed sgron ma'i don// bya thabs nyams len nying khu 'di/ dus ni rang byung dgra la gsungs// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bya thabs nyams len nying khu'i le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'jam dbyangs khro bo yis// mtshan ni gshin rje'i gshed pos bya// bstan pa bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// steng phyogs gshin rje nag 'joms ni// nag po g.yas na dgra sta bsnams// chib ni lkugs pa lug la chibs// khro mo srin mo mgo 'phyang ma// nag mo chen po ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di long la// bstan pa bshig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud pho bcu+u yi khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la bskul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab bo sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// steng phyogs gshin rje phya sangs ni// dkar po lag na bum pa thogs// chibs su nyi zla'i zer la chibs// khro bo kham rgya mthu bo che// nag mo mgo 'phyang ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di long la// bstan pa bshig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud pho bcu yis khram la thob// ging chenabaco brgyad las la bskul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// shar phyogs kong rtse brag gyon ni// dkar po tshe srog bum pa

bsnams// chibs su dri za bgegs pa chibs// brag srin chen mo mgo 'phyang ma// khro mo dkar mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di long la// bstan pa bshig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgya las la bskul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// shar lho a ba glang mgo can// smug nag tri shul rtsegasum bsnams// chibs su 'gugs byed dre'u chibs// mi bzad bdud mo mgo 'phyang ma// khro mo smug nag ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dug dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di long la// bstan pa bshig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la bskul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// lho phyogs gshin rje ya ba ti// sngo nag gsod byed dgra sta bsnams// chibs su gshin rje bgegs pa chibs// btsan mo nag mo mgo 'phyang ma// khro mo dred kyi yab sham can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di long la// bstan pa bshig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud pho bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la bskul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// lho nub gshin rje mig dmar ni// dmar po gcod byed ral gri bsnams// chibs su smyo byed sha ba chibs// byi ling chen mo mgo 'phyang ma// khro mo dmar mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di long la// bstan pa bshig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la bskul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// nub phyogs gshin rje smig pa ni// smug nag dbang sdud zhags pa thogs// chibs su klu rgyal bgegs pa chibs// bdud mo chen mo mgo 'phyang ma// khro mo smug nag ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la

'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di long la// bstan pa bshig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la bskul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// nub byang gshin rje tel pa ni// nag po 'byed pa'i dbyug tho bsnams// chibs su rta dang ma he chibs// gza' srin nag mo mgo 'phyang ma// khro mo nag mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam las ma 'da' gtor ma long// bstan pa bshig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la bskul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// byang phyogs gshin rje lha mchog ni// ser po bum pa rgya gram bsnams// chibs su rgyas pa rta la 'chib// klu srin chen mo mgo 'phyang ma// khro mo ser nag ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di long la// bstan pa bshig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la bskul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// byang shar chos kyi rgyal po ni// dmar po thod pa mda' gzhu bsnams// chibs su skrod byed rnga mo chibs// nam gru chen mo mgo 'phyang ma// khro mo dmar mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di long la// bstan pa bshig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la bskul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// 'og phyogs ral pa tshar dgu ni// smug nag lcags kyu ri rab bsnams// chibs su ma he sngo nag chibs// lha mo nag mo mgo 'phyang ma// khro mo smug nag ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam las ma 'da' gtor ma long// bstan pa bshig pa'i gshed ma

mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la bskul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// 'og phyogs gshin rje thod dbyug ni// nag po phyag na thod pa bsnams// chibs su sa bdag bgegs pa chibs// sa bdag stong khyab mgo 'phyang ma// khro mo nag mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di long la// bstan pa bshig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la bskul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// ces bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos 'khor rnams la bskul te/ so so'i gshed bsgos so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ phyogs skyong gi gshed bsgo ba'i le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po des/ nyin bzhi lha yi ging bzhi la// phrin las bcol ba 'di gsungs so// rA tsa ha la 'khor lo'i lha// 'khor lo'i nag po mA ra bdud// dug gi mtshon cha sngags kyi thems// rdzas kyi sbyor ba thabs kyi dang// bsnyen pa dbye ba gsang ba'i thabs// hrIHSh+t+r-IHsbyor ba bla ma'i ngag/ 'khor lo bskor ba man ngag gter// zla ba nag po gces pa'i grogs// bar bar spyi rgyug thabs kyi phul// dmar nag khrag dmar man ngag thabs// gshed bdud ging rbad man ngag gter// las bsgrub mnan pa rang gi snying// drang srong dmod pa spog byed grogs// de bzhin spyi rgyug gcig la ni// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa'i// nyin bzhi lha yi ging bzhi bskul// nyi ma dang po'i rtsis byed ging// pra ma ra tsa srin po ste// bar snang khams la yid kyi rgyu// gsang bas dbang bskur sgrol zhing bdag/ stag zhu stag ral sku la bsnams// phyag na sho rdo'i rtsis byed ging// bdag gi ma nyes 'di yis nyes// sho rde nag po'i rtsis su chug/ srog gcod snying phyung smyo 'bog thong// gtad do ma btang shor ra re// nyi ma gnyis pa rtsis byed ging// ya ma rA tsa gshin rje'i ging// zhal bgrad mche gtsigs kha dog gnag/ thod sbrul g.yang gzhi sku la gsol// chu glang nag po chibs su chibs// phyag na sho rde'i rtsis byed ging// bdag gis ma nyes 'di yis nyes// sho rde nag po'i rtsis su chug/ srog chod snying phyung smyo 'bog thong// gtad do ma btang shor ra re// nyi ma gsum pa'i rtsis byed ging// 'da' sha gri ba bdud kyi ging// nag po sha zan sha zhu can// nag

po snying gar chibs su chibs// mi sha za zhing mi khrag 'thung// dug mda' 'phen zhing mi sha za// rta nag zhon pa 'bum khrir bcas// srog chod snying phyung smyo 'bog thong// sha za khrag 'thung dgra la rol// khaM khaM dun dun dgra la dun// 'ur 'ur chem chem dgra la chem// lag na dkar nag rtsis byed ging// bdag gis ma nyes kho yis nyes// sho rde nag po'i rtsis su chug/ srog chod snying phyung smyo 'bog thong// gtad do ma btang shor ra re// nyi ma bzhi pa'i rtsis byed ging// ya ma ra tsa gnod sbyin ging// zhon pa gza' rta nag po zhon// zab slag khra bo sku la gsol// bdud zhags nag po dgra la 'phen// dbu la dom zhu nag po gsol// lag na dkar nag rtsis byed ging// bdag gis ma nyes kho yis nyes// sho rde nag po'i rtsis su chug/ srog chod snying phyung smyo 'bog thong// gtad do ma btang shor ra re// bdud kyi rbad thuM ri li li// 'da' sha gri ba rbad thuM ri li li// yag+sha gri ba rbad thum ri li li// de skad ces ni drag tu brjod// nyes pa dang bcas sho rde bgrang// rang bshags dang ni bsrung ba bya zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las// nyi ma bzhi'i lha'i ging bzhi la phrin las bcol ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po la/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// shin tu dgyes pas yi rangs nas 'dud ste 'di skad ces bstod do// hUM gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms byed pa// nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod// phyag mtshan mang po bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rab brjid gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i sku la klu dbang rab brgyan cing// gcan gzan gdug pa'i lpags rlon na bza' gsol// mi mgo thod rlon sku yis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum tshul gyis gshin rje zhabs kyis mnan// mi bzad khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug hUM sgra can// phaT kyis khams gsum sngangs mdzad zhal drug gdangs// sha za'i mgo bcad dbu yi thod du bcings// spyan zlog tsam gyis bdud kyi ser chen 'bebs// ljags 'dril tshems kyi rtse nas rdo rje'i thog 'bebs shing// 'khor gyi ma mo rnams ni 'dar zhing 'dud// de bas lha klu gnod sbyin gzhan lha smos ci dgos// rkan sgra gtog pas lha chen khyab 'jug kyang// bub 'gyel bcas pas khrag 'thung nyid la 'dud// stong khams mid par bcas pa'i zhal gdangs can// khro gtum tsham rngams chen po bstan pas kyang// tshangs pa 'khor bcas rdul gyi thigs 'dzag cing// nad gtong srin mo'i tshogs kyang 'dar zhing 'dud// rgyu phreng khrag dang bcas pa'i zhal thogs shing// phyag na tri shul mi mgo rab bsnams

shing// dngos grub mchog gi klad khrag gzhal du gsol// khyung dang 'ug pa lta bu'i khra bsnams shing// dam las ldog pa rnams la gtong bar byed// gnod sbyin mi bgrungs phreng bas sku+u la brgyan// rdo rje brjid pa'i stangs stabs gar byas pas// dur khrod chen por mtshan mor rab rgyu zhing// ro las mgo bcad so yis chem chem za// ngo mthong tsam gyis sma 'bab zhabs la gtugs// yon tan bye bas brgyan pa'i lha khyod la// de nas bzod par bka' yang bdag 'dud na// gdug pa'i sems kyis bdag gi 'khor du gtogs pa la// gnod par byed pa'i mi dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs// zung zhig non cig sgrol mdzad gshin rje'i gshed// yun gyi lhar yang khyod la gsol 'debs na// ri rab gser gyi ngos la bya gnas pa// bya yi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang// thams cad chos kyi sku ni bdag bsgoms pas// bdag gis rang bzhin bor nas khro bor gsal// lha mchog khyod la yi dam su bsten pa// mi yi tha ma rnams kyang mchog tu 'gyur// de bas 'di dang pha rol gnyis ka ru// srog gi phyir yang lha mchog mi gtong na// byams pa'i zhal bzang bdag la bstan pa dang// thugs rje'i spyan gyis bdag la gzigs su gsol// khyed ltar bdag gyur de ltar phyag kyang 'tshal// yun ring gong nas lha mchog bdag bsgrubs na// khyod kyi dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// kA la rU pa che ge mo sta ga hrIHSh+t+r-IHna hUM phaT/ gang dag gshin rje'i gshed po yis// de bas be con phyag rgyar gsal// 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs mchod pas// yang dag bstan pas yang dag gsal// phyag rgya bcings par gyur pa 'dis// khro bo'i snying por sngar 'bar byed// mtshon cha ma lus pa yi gtso// bdud dang dgra bgegs zhi bar byed// oM na mo bud d+hA ya/ d+harma sang g+he b+h+yaH/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kro d+ha bi dza ya ag ni ra dz+wa la ni/ shrI hUM phaT/ zhes 'khor rnams kyis rab tu bstod do// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gtum chen la bstod pa'i le'u ste nga gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos// 'gal ba cham la dbab pa'i slad du// gdug pa klu'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// nub phyogs pho brang rgya mtsho'i chu// ngo mtshar chu bo bzhi 'bab pa// rab tu mi bgrungs klu yi gnas// de nyid dregs pa 'dul ba'i phyir// bcom ldan gshin rje'i gshed po yis// lag na rdo rjer sku sprul te// phyag na rdo rjes thugs khros pa// gser mig 'bar ba'i nga rgyal gyis// gdug pa'i klu rnams bred par 'gyur// rab tu mi bgrungs klu rnams kyis// rab tu 'jigs te 'di skad smras// kye ma rdo rje gzugs mdzes pa// rab tu rngam pa'i rdo rje

yis// lcags mchu 'bar ba rab tu brjid// gser mig 'bar ba rab tu bgrad// mgo la yid bzhin nor bus brgyan// shes rab thabs ldan bshog pas brgyan// thabs ldan sder mos rab tu gdengs// kye ma sku mdog g.yang gzhi can// sku smad sbrul gyi chun pos brgyan// thod pa tshar gsum se ral kha// rtsal 'phags khyad par de bzhin mthong// bdag cag rnams kyi yi dam lha// drag po'i cha byad zla rgyas la// drag po chen po bka' bzhin bgyid// de skad zer zhing 'thon nas ni// dam tshig 'di smras sku la 'khril// nA ga ru tra sa na hrI la la dus ni/ gar sang ti swA hA// de nas gser mig 'bar ba yis// nga rgyal chen po 'di bstan te// dbang du bsdu phyir dam tshig rgya// dang po gnyis ni nang du bstan// gzhan rnams dbang du brgyangs pa ste// khros pa'i tshig ni 'di brjod do// ta ki dza de byi dza de/ hUM ya hUM ya/ hU lu hU lu/ pu ru pu ru te swA hA/ zhes gsungs so// che ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas rigs bzhi'i klu rnams la rab tu che ba bstan pa'i phyir// nyid kyi gzhal yas khang chen po// rab tu brjid pa 'di nyid du// byol song rigs bzhi'i 'khor rnams dang// thabs cig 'dug nas 'di lta ste// rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus na 'bar// ri rab mchod rten gzugs 'dra la// bum pa yid bzhin shing los brgyan// sbrul gnyis dar dpyangs lta bus mdzes// rigs bzhi rgyan gyis rab tu bklubs// sgo bzhi'i ka ba yang dag ldan// de 'og sbrul gnyis rab tu mdzes// byol song longs spyod dag dang ldan// de nyid bum pa'i khong seng nas// gser mig 'bar dang thabs cig tu// bzhugs pa'i tshul yang 'di lta ste// gzi brjid mtha' yas dung skyong dang// gang po nor ldan la sogs te// dga' bo 'jog po ma dros dang// rigs bzhi klu yi gtso brgyad bskul// sku la 'khril te rab tu gnas// gya nom nor min la sogs sbrul pa brgyad// dar dpyangs ma dang pad+ma can// gzi brjid ma dang sprul pa ma// klu mo rigs bzhi la sogs pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos gnyen po bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dgon pa dur khrod mtsho gling ngam// chu gling nA ga gnas pa'i sar// dkyil 'khor cha mnyam yid 'ong la// dri spos sman gyis chag chag gdab// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud ldan// sgo bzhi rigs dang ldan pa bri// dbus su lag na rdo rje ste// 'khor lo bzhi la bya khyung bzhi// gru chad mchod pa'i bum pa bzhi// sman lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// 'bru lnga me tog lnga la sogs// bcu gnyis lnga nyid byin gyis brlab// sgo bzhir mchod pa'i gtor ma bzhi// 'ba' ma ha stas bcangs pa

yis// sor mo lnga yi pan tsa'i rje// mkha' lding mchod pa'i rdzas su bzhag/ de nas ting 'dzin rim pa ni// dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis pa snying rje 'byung ba ste// gsum pa hUM rgyu'i rnam pa las// baM gyi sa bon las byung ba'i// rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su ni// la las rin chen ri rab bskyed// de stengs sa khams ga ru Na// rdo rje gshog pa'i byin rlabs las// bya khyung rgyal po bzhi byung bas// dkar dang dmar dang ser dang ljang// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i steng du bsgom// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// ye shes mkha' lding stobs po che// sku mdog dkar ser 'od 'bar ba// dbu gsum rdo rje mchu phra ba// rig la dmar zhing spyan yang dmar// zhal gdangs ral pa sprugs pa'i tshul// ye shes gshog gdengs sku dngangs shin tu g.yo// sku dang yan lag rin chen baiDUr rgyan// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po 'khor lo 'bar// bar ma lcags kyu tha ma thal mo sbyar// g.yon gyi dang po rin chen zur brgyad bsnams// bar ma zhags pa tha ma thal mo sbyar// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// ye shes mkha' lding rgyal po gzi brjid 'od// dbu gsum mdog dmar ral pa lcang lor 'khyil// zhal gdangs ye shes gshog pa chen po gdengs// sku dang yan lag ye shes me chen 'bar// phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// bar ma lcags kyu tha ma rin po che// g.yon pa dang po rdo rje pad+ma 'bar// bar ma zhags pa tha ma dbyug to 'phyar// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// ye shes mkha' lding chen po me chen 'bar// dbu gsum mdog ser ral pa gyen du 'khyil// yan lag rin chen sku la me chen 'bar// ye shes gshog pa rgya chen brkyang bskum mdzad// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po rin
