chen 'bar// bar ma lcags kyu tha ma dpag bsam shing// g.yon gyi dang po ye shes ral gri 'phyar// bar ma zhags pa tha ma gshog tshul brkyangs// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// ye shes mkha' lding rgyal po rlung gi thugs// dbu gsum mdog ljang ral pa gyen du brdzes// sgra skad sna tshogs bzhad cing smin ma bskyod// yan lag rin chen brgyan pas sku 'bar ba// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po ral gri 'bar// bar ma lcags kyu tha ma shing thog pi dza bur// g.yon gyi dang po 'khor lo 'bar ba bsnams// bar ma zhags pa tha ma gshog tshul brkyangs// de rnams rtsa ba'i snying po khrom las bskyed// de bzhin spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol// phyogs dang mchod dang bstod dang bzlas pa tshul bzhin bya// ba lim la sogs byed pa dang// 'ba' ma ha stas bcangs pa yin// sor mo lnga yis bcangs pa'i rjes// zan changs dkar gsum 'bru dang

sman gyis mchod// oM rA tsa ra ma ma hA ga ru Da/ hUM hUM ba lin pU tsa b+hA ta khA hi// zhes pas pU tsa dbul bar bya'o// de nas rgyun du sngags 'di bzlas// oM kaM yod kaM/ khyung ka ra khyung ka ra/ sha ma rang dbyig du/ sha ma rang dbyig du/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ gsang sngags rtsa ba rgyun du grangs// mkha' lding gsang ba'i las byed na// bdag gam gzhan la gdug pas 'jigs// ga ru rgyal po mchod 'dod pas// gnas khang ba yi sgo ngos su// snum pa'i sa'am bag zan la// ga ru'i gzugs byas rten bcas te// ba ling la sogs pU dza dang// 'ba' ma ha stas bcangs pa yis// sor mo lnga yis pU tsa rdzas// ga ru rA dza nyid la dbul// snying po gang yang rung// gcig gis sna drangs brjod rjes la// mnyes pa'i bstod pa 'di yang 'bul// ga ru Ta nyid brjod nas kyang// de rjes pU tsa rab tu brjod// thog mar oM dang swA hAs dbul// 'di ltar gzhung gzhin byas nas ni// ka la sha ta zin pa las// grol bar 'gyur ba the tshom med// de nas gnyan po rigs bzhi la// mnyes pa'i bstod pa 'di yang 'bul// hUM rig sngags mthu stobs bdag po'i sku// e ma ho phyag mthil dkyil na rdo rje 'bar ba 'dra// zhal nas gsung skad bton pas stong gsum dbang du sdud// khams gsum drag tu g.yos pas klu chen pho mo btul// mkha' lding rgyal po 'jigs pa ga ru Na// lcags kyu 'dang gshog brkyangs pa yis// gser gyi 'od 'phros rlung sgra drag po yis// gser bya chen por kun tu brdal ba yis// klu rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa zil gyis gnon// 'jigs byed gser gyi spyan non chen pos ni// tshangs pa chen po'i g.yul sa rtse nas gnon// gal te klu rnams dam las 'da' gyur na// rgya mtsho'i snying po rgya mtsho lbu ba ni// gshog pa chen po rgya mtshor byabs nas ni// klu rnams thams cad dbang du bsdus nas kyang// me yi snying po 'bar bas bsreg byas te// lus ni rul myags dri ni nga bar 'gyur// nad kyi sna drangs rnam pa mang por btab pa yang// lus la nad kyang sha bkrar 'byung bar 'gyur// ga ru Ta tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ hUM mkha' lding rgyal po tshangs pa'i bya// gser 'dab bya khyung ga ru Da// drang srong 'khor ni stobs po che// rigs gsum mgon po rdo rje rgyal// dmangs rigs klu yi 'khor gyis bskor// rdo rje rnon po spu gri so gnyis brtsegs// gser gyi spyan gnyis khro gnyer can// thabs ldan rdo rje rwa gnyis brjod// yid bzhin nor bu gtsug na 'bar// lcags kyi mchu can rno dbal gyis// rab tu gdug pa'i klu rnams za// rdo rje sder gshog brkyangs pas rlung mo che// klu rgyal gdug pa dbang du sdud// ces bstod de dbang du bsdu bar bya'o// de nas yang

bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos/ gdug pa klu rgyal bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// mtsho 'gram chu mig rkang gcig shing// nags ljongs stug po'i dur khrod du// maN+Dal cha mnyam yid 'ong la// de las byung ba'i rnam pa lnga// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga la byug/ de nyid byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir// hUM sa ma ya oM gyi sngags// bya ba byed pa'i byin gyis brlabs// bdag nyid chen por rab brtags nas// thams cad grub par bya ba'i phyir// bdag nyid spyi bor sngags dmigs la// bdag po bzhi yis dbang bskur ro// rdo rje lbu gur ma bsams la// g.yu byed sngon mos dbang bskur ro// ti tar ya bsam dregs pas dbang bskur bya// snying gar hUM bskyed bdag dbang bskur// lte bar oM yig gnyen po ru'o// de nas thig gdab ri mo bri// pad+ma 'dab brgyad mu khyud ldan// gru chad sgo rnams de bzhin bri// lte ba mthing nag pad+ma dkar// mu khyud dmar po gru chad ljang// sgo rnams ser po sgo 'bur rigs// de bzhin tshon rnams dgye bar bya// dbus su gnyen po dgod par bya// pad+ma brgyad la klu chen brgyad// rang rang rtsa ba'i sngags kyang bri// rtsibs mchan de ming bri bar bya// gru chad bzhi la klu mo bzhi// na za 'phru ba gru chad la// sgo 'bur ha sa tra ga dgod// shar nas bskor te rim pas dgod// ces rgyun du bzlas pa'i yi ge dgu pa 'di gsungs so// hUM nA ga rA tsa sa ma ya/ che ge mo zhig tsi ta dz+wa la ya/ bsgrub par bya'o// zhag dgu par khrus byas te// zas lnga dag ni spang bar bya// de nas grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// dngos su longs spyod tshogs rnams 'byung// rab ni bas ldag thor par 'byung// de nyid sngon du gyur tshe'o// rigs ma'i sham bu gdags par bya// smi ta mgu tis las la gzud// de nas don thams cad grub par bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// dar dkar gzhi la bting nas ni// pad+ma 'dab bzhi bri bar bya// dkar po la sogs mu khyud ldan// dbus su dam tshig pa ni dgod// de nas yid 'ong bum pa la// bdun pa dgu pa'i ri mo bri// dge ba gnyis po rab tu dmigs// kha dog tshangs pa'i ras kyis bcings// drag po'i rdzas la bdug par bya// ras la sogs pa'i gzungs thag gdags// sder gshog phyag rgyas snying gar bstan// sman lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// 'bru lnga rin chen lnga la sogs// bcu gnyis lnga nyid byin gyis brlab// oM AHhUM nA ga phu yu yu// nA ga spu ru dza la nI nA ga sa ma ya swA hA/ dmigs pa'i yan lag gsum pa'i rgyu// yi ge rtsa gcig sprul par shar// hUM bskyed pa bdag nyid nas sprul nas// yi ge rtsa gcig la 'od zer sna tshogs bdud rtsir sprul// yi ge dmigs pa'i gnas lnga ru// bdud rtsi bum pa

bstan par bya// mkha' lding rgyal po de nyid bsam// de nyid gtsang ma'i ras kyis dkri// gur gum sman nam chus bsres bkrus// de bzhin ma smad zas rnams bza'// yang ni 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye ma rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag/ bdag ni dam tshig mngon dga' bas// dam tshig dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug na// khyod nyid dam tshig gtso lags kyi// longs spyod sku yi pho brang nas// rigs ma'i rgyal mo dbang bskur cig/ ces pas gsol de de nyid 'khod// nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi gtso// longs spyod sku yi rigs rnams kyi// pho brang yid 'ong nyams dga' ba// rab tu gdug pa'i klu rnams la// yid bzhin rin chen rab gnas pa// de ring khyod kyis bcang bar bgyi// zhes dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas bar chad bsal phyir/ rma byas bsdigs shing gu gul gyi// dud pas bdug ces rab tu bshad// gnyen po'i rigs bzhi dbu rgyan dang// dar gyi cod pan me tog phreng// longs spyod tshogs kyi zhal zas dang// rten gyi bum pas dbang bskur bya'o// de nas dam tshig rten 'brel gyi snying po 'di sbyin par bya'o// rigs ldan thogs med rgyu ba yi// skal ldan sngags kyi bdag po khyod// de ring dam tshig 'di nyid zung// yid bzhin rin chen gter ldan 'chongs// nam mkha'i dngos po mi gnas la// sna tshogs 'od kyi 'ja' byung tshul// snang byed sprul sku'i ngo bo las// rnam shes ldan pa'i thogs med ni// rnam shes rgyu yi ngo bo las// yi ge'i phreng ba nyid du bkod// nA ga li li kra yang/ sa hri sni ra/ za ro tri tri ra mgo ru pa tri ya/ he he hUM hUM b+h+yo dzaH/ zhes rten 'brel gyi snying po yongs su rdzogs par byas pas so// de grub bar du klu las gang mi bya// de yi sbyor ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang// klu'i sbyor ba tshang bar bsag par bya'o// 'di ni dang po rgyun du rab tu gces// klu'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// nA ga gnas shing nA ga gnas pa'i sar// de yi drung nas 'jam pa'i sa blangs la// sa gnyen sbyin po dag dang rab bsres nas// klu yi rgyal po de yi gzugs byas te// lus bcus mgo gcig sbrul mgo bdun gyis brgyan// g.yas na rin chen 'bar ba'i bum pa thogs// kha dog mthing ga lus kyi chu srin mnan// oM gyis yi ge 'di ni de'i rgyu yin te// nA ga ba su tri ni s+t+waM/ de nas gsal bskyed sngags 'dis dgug par bya'o// nA ga rA dza ba su ki ni dza dza/ de ltar gsal na nyi shu pa nyid rtag tu bzlas/ ji ltar nus pa bzhin du rab bzlas te// de ltar bzlas te gzugs de bar bur gzhug/ gzhan gyis mi mthong rang gi spyod yul yin// rtags dang mtshan ma rang rang gzugs su 'byung// bzlas pas skyo na mchod pa dbul bar bya// nA ga rA tsa'i gzugs

la thim par bsam// de nas gtad pa'i las rnams byed 'dod na// bdag nyid mthu stobs bdag por bsam byas la// thugs kar mkha' lding rgyal po bsam byas te// chu gtor mngar dang ldan pa byin nas ni// seng ldeng phur pa bdag dang 'dra bar bsam// de yi gsang sngags gnyis kyis byin gyis brlab// bdag nyid de nyid dril zhing nA ga bsdig/ kA la rU pa chag chag dam dam ni// brgya'am stong du bzlas pa byas nas ni// gsang sngags 'di yis gtad par bya bar gsungs// oM nA ga rA tsa dzaHhUM baM hoH/ che ge mo A kar ShA ya/ a kar ShA ya/ hUM tsi na yang tsi na yang/ len yang len yang/ nA ga chings nA ga chings/ nA ga sdoms nA ga sdoms/ de skad ces ni rab tu lan gnyis brjod// mi 'di'i bdun brgyud rtsad nas chod ces bsgo// 'di skad ces ni gnad la bor// gdug pa klu yis dgra 'di ma bsad na// phyag na rdo rjes rang gi mgo bo 'gems// khong nas snying khrag dron mo 'dzag par byed// de skad brjod la gnad la bor// de nas mnan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs// mdze thod dmar po pha mes thod ba ru// ming dang rus bcug skud pa sngo dmar dkri// bud med zhabs mas gtums la khyim gyi gting du sba// nub sgor kha bltas khyim gyis bdag po la// ba dmar glang dmar bris pa'i co to la// ming dus 'chi rkyen gang 'dod bris pa de// lto 'phye sbal lcong lto ru bcug nas ni// hUM gis mtha' skor ba ni tshig ming bya// kun la de yi gang 'chi rkyen bris te// oM laM suM lam pra ti ta nan/ tiSh+ta tiSh+Tha/ oM che ge mo laM nan/ stam b+ha nan/ mA ra nan/ oM nan nan/ ti khas/ bye'u char kha nan ti khas/ sra nan sra khas/ nA ga su ka nA ga su ka/ nA ga lam nA ga li ma swA hA/ bdag la mi tshugs bya phyir gang mi smos// mnan pa'i rkang pa rdo rje rgya gram bsam// sa brko rang gis grib ma rab tu spang// ma nyes dpang gzug klu bsen dbang du bsdu// de ltar byas na nges par las rnams 'grub// de nas klu'i drag sngags rgod pa 'di gsungs so// nA ga rA dza ba su ki ni s+t+waM/ nA ga rA dza ba su ki ni dza dza/ nA ga nI nA ga ni dza dza dzA/ yu yu yu/ dum pa ni dum pa ni/ nA ga rA dza ba su ki a smri sarba sa ma ya/ nA ga rA dza byi chags li/ nA ga rA dza ad rat+na nA ga su ka nA ga su ka hUM dza hUM dza/ che ge mo sa ma ya dza/ hUM nA ga hUM/ oM nA ga rA dza ba su ki ni/ dza dza/ a a da da nan/ oM nA ga ra dza/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ che ge mo a kar+Sha ya a kar+Sha ya hUM/ tsin yang tsin yang/ len yang len yang/ nA ga chings nA ga chings/ nA ga sdoms/ nA ga sdoms/ nA ga su ka nA ga su+u ka/ hUM dza hUM dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya/ dza dza ya hUM phaT/ nA ga rA dza ba su ti ni/ dza dgra bo mA ra ya dza dza hUM phaT/ oM laM suM laM/ pra ti sta nan/ ti sti ti sti nan/ oM che ge mo (21)

laM nan/ s+t+waM b+ha nan/ mA ra nan// oM nam nam ti khas/ byi'u char khas/ na ti khas/ pra nan pra khas/ nA ga su ka nA ga laM nA ga laM swA hA/ nA ga rA dza nan/ na ga ku mA ra ya b+h+yo/ de bzhin sngags rnams tshang ba dang/ las kyi 'khor lo rdzogs pa dang// mtshan ma rtags dang ldan pa yis// mdze nad dz+wa las mA ra ya'o// zhes lag na rdo rjes rab tu gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyu las/ gdug pa klu'i zla gsang mdze nad dz+wa la'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po la/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ shin tu dga' ba yi rangs nas/ rang rang dga' ba'i bstod pa phul nas mthu stobs kyi bdag po lag na rdo rje dang/ stong gsum mun par gtong ba'i bdud po pho mo rnams mgrin gcig tu thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// he he dpa' bo chen po yab cig mchog/ 'jigs byed chen po gshin rje'i gshed// dpa' bo 'khor lo bdud 'khor bdud// gshed pos bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan// bdag cag 'khor gyi bdud po rnams// phyin ci log rnams 'dul slad du// tshul bzhin bsgrub na ji ltar bsgrub// rdzas dang yo byad gang la rten// las la gtang na ji ltar gtang// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal nyan// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos// shin tu rngam pa'i sgra 'brug stong ldir pa tsam du dus gcig tu bsgrags nas// bdud kyi tshogs thams cad dbang du bsdus// zil gyis mnan nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// nag po bdud kyi tshogs rnams kun// phyin ci log rnams 'dul slad du// bya ba'i las de bsgrub pa dang// rten pa'i rdzas dang bskul ba'i thabs// mi mthun sbyor ba gsod 'dod na// ngas bshad pa la sems mthud cig/ ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan gshed chen pos// 'phrin las myur phyir bdud kyi sgrub thabs 'di nyid gsungs so// thog mar dang po dad pa rab tu gces// bka' yi gnas sam dga' ba'i gnas dag tu// dbang thob bya phyir bla ma mnyes bya zhing// dkyil 'khor bris nas dam tshig dbang rnams nod// dgos pa bsgrub phyir man ngag 'thob par bya// man ngag thob nas bsnyen bsgrub mtha' ru dbyung// bsnyen pa bya phyir thun rdzas 'bad de bsag/ las kyi gnas su dkyil 'khor bya// 'dom gang gru bzhi dug khrag chag chag gdab// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gru gsum zla gam gsum// gru chad sgo bzhi lcags ri lugs bzhin bya// thod pa'i phreng ba rdo rje ra ba gur// bskal pa'i me ri smug nag rlung tshub ldan// gru gsum gshin rje'i gshed po ste// zla gam gsum la yab yum sras dang gsum// seng ldeng la

sogs mchog gi phur pa dgod// yab yum mnga' gsol dbang bskur byin gyis brlab pa'o// lcags phur la sogs mchog gi phur pa bcu// khram thogs bdud po bcu ru mnga' gsol la// 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad dag la dgod par bya// dar nag cod pan rim gyis dbang bskur gdags// steng du 'bar ba ya chen te// shar du rol po ral pa can// lho ru khram bdag srog bdud ste// zla bdud yor po zhags can nub// byang du srog bdud s+t+wa re can// shar lho khram bdag thod po che// lho nub bar btsan ri bo rje// nub byang seng 'dzin sdig dang rje// byang shar 'bar ba nag po rje// sgo bzhir bka' nyan ging chen bzhi// rtsang bzhi dag las dbang bskur dgod// mthun pa'i rdzas dang mchod pa'i rdzas// mi sha rta sha'i gtor ma la// rus pa'i sna tshogs brgyan byas nas// gshed po yab yum sras la bzhag/ bya nag rta nag lug nag snying// khyi nag phag pa rog po'i snying// g.yag dang glang dang ra rgod snying// sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang// mi shas brgyan pa zangs bu gang// bdud po bcu por dgod par bya// sha sna khrag sna'i gtor ma la// spyan gzigs dkar chas brgyan pa bzhi// sgo bzhi'i ging chen bzhi la bzhag/ sman dang rak+ta sbyar ba yis// snang srid srog la bdud dbang bskur// mig sur rta gsur rgyun du gtang// rgyal mtshan chen po bzhi yang gzugs// dar nag gur phug khyi nag g.yang gzhi gdags// lug nag 'bem bca' ra rog dmigs pa'i rten// skyer pa la sogs stag pa dag la yang// mgo mjug ma nor gzhogs la khram shing bya// drag po'i sngags bzlas rim pas khram la gdab// yi dwags gos la 'khor lo bri bya ste// dug dang thod pa mkhas pas bri bar bya// gzi brjid 'phags pa 'jam dpal yab yum dang// bka' nyan nyin bzhi'i lha bsgrub mchod// khram thogs bdud rnams las la bskul phyir rbad// thod mtshan ngan par ra rog khrag blugs la// ra sog bris pa thod pa'i nang du'o// dpal 'bar ngos bzhag re bas gril byas la// khrag gis blugs shing khram sngags bzlas par bya// oM dgra nr-i tsit+ta thun mugs/ khram gtor che ge mo mA ra ya/ gug ling rbad swA hA/ bzlas shing khram gyis skabs su bkug/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum gsal bsgom la// dbang chen 'byung ba rim brtsegs te// b+h+rUM las 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud ldan// gru chad bar khyams sgo khyud ldan// shar phyogs rus pa'i gzhal yas khang// lho phyogs me yi gzhal yas khang// nub phyogs khrag gi gzhal yas khang// byang phyogs dbugs kyi gzhal yas khang// dbus su ya ma chen po ste// gshin rje ma he bsnol ba'i gdan// hUM las

gshed po'i skur gyur te// stang zil mdog 'dra gnag la 'tsher// stag lpags glang chen sbrul nag chun po dang// thod pa la sogs dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// zhal drug bcu gnyis phyag rgyar ldan par bsgom// g.yas g.yon yum dang mdun du sras mchog ste// rgyan dang cha lugs phyag mtshan gsal bar bsgom// 'khor lo rtsibs rgyad steng du nr-i bsam ste// nr-i las dgra bgegs bsnol ba'i gdan du bsam// de steng ya bcu 'od zer 'phros pa las// 'phro 'dus ya las bdud po bcu// steng gi bdud po 'bar ba ya chen ni// g.yu 'brug zhon pa glog gi zhags thogs bsgom// shar gyi bdud po rol po ral pa can// rnga mo zhon nas ral gri thogs pa bskyed// lho phyogs khram bdag srog bdud mche ba can// bdud sha zhon nas zhags pa thogs pa bskyed// nub tu zla bdud yor po zhags pa can// 'brong bu zhon nas lcags phur zhags pa thogs pa bskyed// byang du srog bdud gser gyi s+t+wa re can// khyung chen zhon nas s+t+wa re thogs pa bskyed// shar lho khram bdag gnam btsan thogs po rje// rta la zhon nas gnam lcags thog 'bebs bskyed// lho nub khram bdag bar btsan ri yi rje// rlung sha zhon nas rlung nag g.yab 'debs bskyed// nub byang khram bdag seng 'dzin lding dang rje// phag pa rtar zhon khram shing thogs pa bskyed// byang shar khram bdag ro langs nag po rje// chu glang zhon nas s+t+wa re thogs pa bskyed// 'og phyogs nag po yab rje khrag 'thung ni// rta dmar zhon nas sbrul dmar thogs pa bskyed// re re'i 'khor na bdug dang bsam yas te// rang bzhin gnas nas 'khor bcas spyan drangs pas// sgrub pa'i gnas su de ltar byon par bsam// sgo bzhir nyin bzhi lha yi ging bzhi yang// bka' nyan byed cing 'gugs 'dren dza las bskyed// de ltar bskyed pa'i bdud po de rnams kyis// bstan pa bshig cing sku la bsdau ba rnams// zhags pas 'chings shing la las khram la 'debs// la las mtshon 'debs la las thun du 'jug/ gan bub rdul nag 'thog cing khrag tu skyug/ mig rtsa rig rig 'o dod tser tser 'bod// tsi tsam 'on thong zer zhing gsod par bsgom// ting nge 'dzin gyis de ltar gsal bskyed la// drag sngags 'di bzlas bdud rnams myur bar bsgrub// ru khra ba kra mu khrag tsa ra khrag/ tsa pa de phor sa du+u na ha ba swA hA// khri'am 'bum na bdud rnams mngon du 'ong// mon dang btsad po skad rigs mi gcig pa// ldab ldib smras shing las la mngon du byon// gtum chen bstod la bdud rnams las la bskul// hUM bskal pa snyigs ma'i lnga brgya la// khro rgyal gshin rje'i spyan sngar khas blangs pa// mi bzad chen po srog bdag kun 'dul byed// 'jam dpal

gshin rjes dmar gyi ar+g+haM dang// bdud rtsi dmar gyi dam rdzas dam pa 'di// khram thogs bdud la byin nas dbang bskur bas// bdud 'khor yongs kyis bde gshegs bstan pa bsrungs// lus kyi dam tshig a ra yam// ngag gi dam tshig di ra yam/ dam las mi 'da' phrin las mdzod// steng phyogs bdud kyi zhing khams nas// 'bar ba ya chen bla med ni/ g.yu 'brug sngon mo'i rta la zhon// lag na glog dmar thod zhags thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram bam khram la thob// oM snying khrag rag tsit+ta rbad// dun rmugs khram tor ta rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya gug ling swA hA/ zhes pas brjod cing khram la rim par gdab// rak+ta sgrengs shing bdud rnams las la rbad// mun nag 'khyil pa'i zhing khams nas// nag po yab rje khrag 'thung ni// stag chen dmar po'i rta la zhon// lag na sbrul dmar zhags pa thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes pa dar ma'i snying la ya// bdud kyi khram bam khram la thob// oM snying tsit+ta rbad// dun rmugs khra ma to ra ya rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya gug ling swA hA/ shar phyaugs rus pa'i zhing khams nas// shar bdud rol po ral pa can// phung sri rnga mo glog 'gyu zhon// lag na gnam lcags ral gri rnams// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram bam khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad// dun rmugs khraM tor ta rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya gug ling swA hA// lho phyogs me yi zhing khams nas// khram bdag srog bdud mche ba can// bdud sha nag po ru bcu bcibs// lag na 'dzin byed zhags pa bsnams// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram bam khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad// dun rmugs khram gtor ta rbad/ che ge mo mA ra ya gug ling swA hA// nub phyogs khrag gi zhing khams nas// zla bdud yor po zhags pa can// 'brong bu nag po rta ru zhon// lag na gnam lcags phur pa 'debs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram bam khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad// dun rmugs khram tor ta rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya gug ling swA hA/ byang phyogs dbugs kyi gzhal yas nas// srog bdud gser gyi sta re can// chibs su khyung chen rta la chibs// lag na gser gyi sta re thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram bam khram la thob// oM snying tsit+ta rbad// dun rmugs khram tor ta

rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya gug ling swA hA/ khram bdag gnam lcags thog po rje// chibs su bdud kyi rta la chibs// skal ldan gnam lcags thog 'phen pa// skal ldan gnam lcags 'od zer 'phro// ched 'ga' sprul pa'i tshe// 'brug ldir chems se chem// glog yar ljibs se ljib// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram bam khram la thob// khram sngags bzlas shing rak+ta sbreng// khram bdag bar btsan ri bo rje// chibs su rlung sha'i rta la chibs// phyag na rlung nag g.yab kyis 'debs// stong khams rlung la bskur ba yin// ched 'ga' sprul pa'i tshe/ grangs rngam rta ru zhon/ skyem ser 'ben ni 'ben/ sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyis khram bam khrom la thog/ khram sngags bzlas shing rak+ta sbreng// khram bdag se 'dzin sdigs dang rje// chibs su dur phag rta ru zhon// 'khor du bse rag 'khor dang bcas// lag na khram nag khram shing thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya/ skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud gyi khram bam khram la thob// khram sngags bzlas shing rak+ta sbreng// khram bdag ro langs nag po rje// chu glang sngon po rta ru zhon// lag na gnam lcags sta re thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram bam khram la thathrab// oM snying khrag tsit+ta rbad// dun rmugs khram tor ta rbad// che ge mo mA ra ya gug leng swA hA/ gshin rje nag po'i dus la bab// 'bar ba nag po'i dus la bab// sha za nag po'i dus la bab// nag po skya gsum dus la bab// rol po rkya gsum dus la bab// spyang sngon 'bar ma'i dus la bab// rgya bo mig bzhi'i dus la bab// ces pas rbad cing khram la gdab// rak+ta sbrengs shing phrin las bcol// nyung dkar nyung nag dug khrag la// drag sngags 'di yis brdeg par bya/ ru dra tshal pa thun khrag/ shi kri ma mo ro thun khrag la kha la ya chu thun khrag mi sha rol thun khrag/ khram tor tsa ra thun khrag/ stong snya ku+u ba thun khrag/ ma ku pa ra thun khrag/ che ge mo mA ra ya thun khrag/ ces ni rab tu khros par brdeg/ gtang ba'i las su bya ba yang// khram dang 'khor lo thod par blug/ chu mig nub tu bltas par gtad// gtor ma gtong zhing smon lam gdab// bsad pa nyin bzhi'i ging bzhi ste// 'phang ba dug thun thun du 'phang// sreg pa khram shing thod pa ste// tsher ma can gyi shing btus la// grog po phug thugs phyin la bsreg/ mnan pa'i 'khor lo chu mig mgor// nag po klu yi lag tu gtad// gdab pa rang

rang phur pas gdab// des ni brnag pa mthar phyin 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bdud kyi zla gsang stong gsum mun par gtong ba/ bdud phyi ltar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nga gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ stong gsum mun par gtong ba'i bdud nang ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dang por dang ba'i dad pa rab tu bskyed// bka' yi gnas sam dga' ba'i gnas dag tu// sa bdag lha klu zhi bar rab byas te// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// mthing nag zla gam gsum gyis bskor// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gru chad sgo bzhi ldan// mthing nag dbus su ya ma gshed po dgod// zla gam gsum la yum nyis sras dang gsum// 'khor lo brgyad la bdud kyi rgyal po brgyad// bar khyams dmar po bdud kyi lcam mo brgyad// sgo bzhir bdud kyi yang khol bzhis// lho nub mtshams su grir shi g.yang gzhi gzug/ nub byang mtshams su spyang ki'i g.yang gzhi gzug/ byang shar mtshams su bya rgod g.yang gzhi gzug/ shar lho mtshams su lug nag g.yang gzhi gzug/ dbus su khyi nag ngar nag zhing gi gur// phyi rim dog pa nag po'i rgya yis bskor// lha rnams grangs dang mnyam pa'i phur pa dgod// dbus su yab yum gtor ma bzhag/ bse gab mon thod 'khar gzhong du// mi sha rta sha'i gtor ma bsham// lho nub mtshams su rje rigs thod pa ru// mi yi snying khrag bsres pa'i gtor ma bsham// nub byang stag snying sbyar ba gang// shar du spre'u'i snying khrag bsres pa bzhag/ bdag nyid mthing nag ber chen gon// srog gi snying po rgyun du grangs// oM sha ra na/ sha ri na/ kha ra na/ kha ra na/ ma shor ra na/ ruM bu shang dri na/ ma ri ta na du ta ra na/ a pa tsa ga ra tsu ru sha/ mu ra to sha/ mu ra to sha/ ar+ya ba dug su+u ra na/ he he ya na dza ya ru/ mA ra ya hUM a pa ya te la ba da ra/ bdud kyi snying po de rnams bgrang// lcam dral 'khor bcas dril ba ni// oM ha no mo ho 'bi li ma khu ri bum ruM bu nu tra tra du ru du ru tra dza dza hUM dza/ stong ngam bye ba sa yar bzlas// stong gsum mun par gtong byed na// mun pa'i dum bu dug khrag la// nyi ma bsad pa'i drag sngags bzlas// rang sngags mjug tu mun 'thibs brjod// stong gsum bdud kyi drag rtsal gyis// skad cig tsam la g.yo 'gul gtong// las la sbyar te gsod 'dod na// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru// dug dang klad khrag sbyar ba yis// gtum khro bstod la bdud rnams rbad// hUM nam mkha' yangs pa'i mkha' klong nas// yang rje gshin rje bshan pa dbu gsum phyag drug pa// gnas 'dir mun 'thibs dam la shog/ mun pa 'thibs pa'i

klaung dkyil nas// ya zher nag po 'brug ston sku// gnas 'dir mun 'thibs dam la shog/ shar phyogs rus pa'i zhing khams nas// shar bdud rol po ral pa can// zhe sdang mun 'thibs dam la shog/ lho phyogs me yi zhing khams nas// srog 'dud sngon po ral pa can// srog la mun 'thibs dam la shog/ nub phyogs khrag gi zhing khams nas// zla bdud yor po zhags pa can// bla la mun 'thibs dam la shog/ byang phyogs rlung gi zhing khams nas// srog bdud ser po sta re can// srog la mun 'thibs dam la shog/ tshe bdud skyin thang ral pa can// tshe la bar chod dam la shog/ sro tra 'khrigs pa sems kyi bdud// yid la mun 'thibs dam la shog/ dkar mo 'bar ma spyan gcig ma// sngon mo stag ri bsen mo 'khol// dmar mo g.yu klu gnyan mo 'khol// nag mo dred mo ma yams 'khol// ser mo rlung gshog dbang ldan 'khol// dkar ljang 'ug mgo dri za 'khol// sngo nag sreg byed gshin rje gsol// dmar mo sgeg ma srin mo 'khol// sngo skya zhal thogs rlung lha 'khol// dgra bo'i rnam shes brgyad la mun ltar gtibs// ha na ha na/ sti ta sti ta/ ru dra ma ma sa ma ya hUM kha tri dza/ ma tri dza/ sho na tri dza/ yag+sha dza/ ma tri dza/ da tri dza/ sha tri dza/ da tri pra tri dza/ dza byin dza kar ma dza/ ha nu dza/ li sha dza/ yak+sha dza/ pu li dza/ kho dar dza/ dza hUM rbud po la ku nas rbud/ du du rbud/ kha la khu rbad/ shed tshe ta gong chod/ kha la rug ti mu ha rbud swA hA/ za za nad skum thum ri li li/ khe le kha le shag thum ka nan/ ha ra rbad/ chum khug ril srog tsa rbud ril/ de dag gsad cing gzir ba dang// gnan cing 'phangs dang bsreg cing gtad// 'khor lo bri bya yi ge dgod// dbye dang dgug dang bstim pa'i las// man ngag 'di bzhin byas gyur na// the tshom med par rlag par byed// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bdud nang ltar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nga bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen pos bdud gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// thog mar bya ba sngon song nas// nag po brag gi rtsar phyin la// lhor bltas rtsa na chu 'bab tu// gur nag nang du+u sa blangs te// stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi brtsig/ mi khrag rta khrag khyi khrag dang// rgya sol bsregs la chag chag gdab// dbus su gru gsum mkhyid gang bru// zla gam dmar po thod phreng dkar// gru chad ljang nag sgo bzhi ser// bdud po ha nu stag sha kha// dar la gzugs bris dbus su dgod// lcags sam mchog gi phur pa la// gshed por byin brlabs dbus su dgod// ya dar nag po lce bzhi la// phyogs bzhir bdud bzhi'i gzugs bris dgram// shar du khu le khyab pa

dgod// lho ru nag po bkrag med dgod// nub tu so 'dar 'khrig pa dgod// sor mo'i rtsa skams byang du dgod// dri za khung btsun shar du dgod// pha dkar sta re sa to lho ru dgod// ngan za 'phen dkar nub tu dgod// na bun rmugs ma byang du dgod// bka' 'khor skyong ba'i gnod sbyin bdud// phyag brnyan bcu+u gsum khrag gi gdong ral can// sprul pa bcu gsum stag dang gzig chas can// mon bu bcu bdun bdud kyi rta nag can// pho nya bcug sum stag seng thang ga can// phyag brnyan ma rnams re ba'i go cog can// sprul pa ma mo sol ba'i yan tshar can// mon mo bcu gsum zha nye'i rgyang lang can// pho nya mo rnams mgron bu'i thang ga can// gru chad khyams dang sgo la rim pas dgod// de la dam rdzas bsham pa ni// rabs chad mon gyi thod pa ru// bra zan gtor ma cha gcig rung// lug nag khyi dkar bya rog dang// rta nag snying dkar gsum gyi snying// srog pa rtsa dang ma bral nang// dgra bo du yod ming rus rnams// gro ga'am shing shun bris la gzhug/ bya rog gsob dang skyud kha'i gsob// brgyangs te shar nub kha bstan bzhag/ chang phud nang du gser brdar la// dngul skyogs gang yang gzhag par bya// g.yab dar nag pos g.yab tshul bya// lug nag lcags ru+u gser mig la// re ba'i sgyai nag khal du bkal// g.yas su pho rnams ming rus gzhug/ g.yon du mo rnams ming rus gzhug/ sngo dmar skud pas gong rmed bya// rwa la dar lce mthing nag gdags// mig gnyis nang du rin chen brdar// dar dkar yug gis mig gnyis gdab// dkyil 'khor byang shar gra ru gzug/ dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bca'// thod par dug khrag bsres te dgang// gos nag gon la thod nag bcings// bdud kyi g.yab dar lag tu thogs// gtum chen bstod la bdud rnams rbad// drag sngags 'di bzlas mngon du gyur// hUM phaT ba hUM la ma sa sha sta ha sta ba ba be ra pa ma sha sa ra ya hUM/ ma he mang ga la ya hUM phaT/ sum 'bum bzlas na gang yang 'grub// de bzhin 'grub na mngon du 'gyur// yang na sbyor ba rdzogs par bya// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig na'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bdud kyi zla gsang gsang bar bstan pa'i le'u ste nga lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal 'jigs byed chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mes bsreg pa'i btsan phyi ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// brag dmar rtsa'am dur khrod du// sa bdag zhi bya klu gtor gtang// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi 'dom gang la// ra dmar khrag gis chag chag gdab// dbus kyi lte ba dmar po la// zla gam dmar po brgyad kyis bskor// lcags

ri nag po me 'od 'bar// zla gam re la mA ra ya// ra dmar bse dgram phyi rten bca'/ dbus su bshos cha khru gang bzhag/ ra dmar khrag gis dmar por byug/ za 'og dmar po mda' gang gdags// ra lpags dmar po mda' gang gdags// zer mo ldem pa'i phod kyis brgyan// dbus kyi zla gam steng du bzhag/ de 'khor zla gam brgyad po la// bshos cha brgyad la mda' dmar brgyad// dar dang ra lpags dmar po dang// zer mo'i phod kyis brgyan pa brgyad// phyi rol zla gam brgyad la dgod// gser brdar chang phud bya pho dgu// 'bras dang til nag la sogs pa// zla gam dgu la phul dgu bzhag/ dur khrod ras la 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad pa ru bya bar bshad// oM la li pra ma ni// ri rtse thal ba ni/ tri ki ki ki shi tri mu tri re tri tri/ te tri haM shaM taM sarba karma be ba/ be ba swA hA/ 'di ni rab tu drag po'i sngags// dgug dang rbad pa'i sngags 'di brjod// srog la li phra ma ni baM ril/ dgra bo nr-i dza/ kro ti ga ye/ baM ri li li/ dgra bo nr-i dza/ kro ti ko ya/ sha baM ri li li/ dgra bo nr-i dza/ rab dbang dpon g.yog dgu pa yi// snying po brjod cing srog nas drangs/ srog la li pra ma ti/ dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza dza/ srog gi ting ga la ya sha mA ra ya/ dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dza/ srog gam ti kam/ k+Sha ma mA ra ya/ dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dza/ srog mu ti raM tri dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dza/ dmigs pa'i gzugs la sngags kyis brdeg/ gshin rje stod la btsan rnams rbad// hUM 'dzam gling 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// me 'od dam pa'i zhing khams nas// mi rengs dmar po mdung tsam gcig/ dbu la skra med bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar// 'jig rten khams kun me yis bsreg/ smin ma lcags kyu 'khyil pa 'dra// spyan rtsa dmar pos dam nyams dgra bo zlog/ sku la le brgan dmar po'i 'jol ber gsol// g.yas pa btsan gyi rgyu zhags 'debs// g.yon na hu lu'i lhas ngan 'debs// zhabs la lcags l+h+wam yu thung gsol// sbrul nag stong gi chun 'khor can// sbrul dmar 'jigs pa'i ske rags can// skar chen mang po'i tsha tsha 'phro// bzhugs ni bar snang khyab bar bzhugs// nam gyi gung la rgyu tsam na// brag gi wa mo kha nag bcibs// nyi ma'i zer la chas tsa na// chibs su ltas ngan gla ba bcibs// nyi ma'i zer la chas tsa na// chibs su bra bo rting dkar bcibs// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di long la// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// 'khor gyi btsan rnams las la bskul// 'jig rten khams su me yi bskal pa phob/ dgra bo'i rnams shes brgyad po thal bar rlog/ skyes bu chen po dgra la ya// rab gsang mched dgu dgra la

ya// btsan gyi zhags pa da sdoms shig/ tha ram dgra la da phob cig/ khrag skyug gzer thabs bur gyis thob// de skad ces ni las bcol na// lo dang zla bas brlag 'gyur ro// btsan ra kham rog rten du bca'// be'u wa dang rta cung dang// lag sor rnams la gong bzhin bskul// chang phud gtang zhing las gnyer gtad// rtags byin pa dang gtang rag gtang// gsob dang bshos cha dbul bar bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten mes sreg par byed pa btsan gyi zla gsang gi le'u ste nga drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ btsan nang ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// gong gsum kha'am bram dmar rtsar// dur khrod nags rdzong 'thug po ru// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dug dang chang gis chag chag gdag/ dbus su gru gsum thur du brko// mu su ra yi thod pa ru// rdo sol su ba ras la sogs// til mal bsres te gzhag par bya// de la zla gam gsum gyis bskor// lcags ri la sogs me 'od bri// dbus su ya ma gshin rje dgod// zla gam gsum la yum sras dgod// zla gam steng du btsan rgyal po// rdo rje reg bya gser mig dgod// lho ru rdo rje drag mchog dgod// nub tu rdo rje mgyogs byed rtsal// byang du rdo rje gzhong po 'bar// yab yum sras su bshams pa yang// mi sha rta sha'i gtor ma dang// snying chen cig la rten te bsgrub// phyogs bzhir gtor ma bzhi byas la// bzhu bo mched bzhi'i rdzas su dgod// ra dmar snying dang bya se dang// rta 'tshal snying la btsan rnams rten// bya rgod mda' dang le brgan dang// lag tu thogs la rtag tu g.yab// gri bo thod par tha rams bca'// rtag tu ra gsur rgyun du gtang// gser skyems la sogs gser brdar la// rtag tu btsan la mchod par bya'o// gdug pa'i klu blang sna gling bud// rtag tu nyung dkar nyung nag la// sngags bzlas gru gsum thod par bstim// rnam gsum ting 'dzin btsan rnams bskyed// a bi shu sa ma ya rA dza baM ni// a nan tri sham rbad// dza ra shan+tiM sa na 'dar glu+u na/ rtsi na bi ma/ ku ru dza dza/ khri'am 'bum du bzlas gyur na// sku yang dngos su ston par 'gyur// gzhan yang rta med srab sgra dang// mi med bshud pa dir dir 'ong// de bzhin las la sbyar bar bya// gshed po bskul la btsan rnams rbad// 'jig rten me yis bsreg 'dod na// rdo sol rdzas sbyar dam rdzas la// rtsa ba'i sngags la raM raM sbyar// de yis rdzas sbyor rab tu gces// dkon mchog mnyes phyir bla ma bsten// gsad pa'i las kyang gong dang 'dra// btso ru rang gi dam tshig bsrung// ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod lam

bya// g.yel na gang yang mi 'grub ste// rtag tu mi dang gnyer mi bya// tha rabs bcad pa'i thod pa de// gong gsum btsan gyi 'dus sa 'am// brag btsan klu btsan yod sar sba// gang la bya ba thogs med 'joms// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten gyi khams mes bsreg pa btsan gyi zla gsang gi le'u ste nga bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ btsan gsang bar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dgon pa dur khrod lta bu ru// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum brtsig/ dbus su rab chad thod pa ru// khrag sogs dug sogs rdo sol dang// dur khrod ras dang til gyi mar// ra mar snying dang ra khrag blug/ ming dang rus bris thod par gzhug/ bse phor zangs gzhong gtor mas dgang// rang sngags srog snying tshad du grangs// oM de ba tri ma ga na dza mus mar na ya ma ra na ya/ dgra po che ge mo srog breng breng/ thum b+h+yo dza dza/ 'di ni rab tu mi bgrungs sngags// thod pa'i nang du 'bum du bzlas// thod pa nags ljongs stug po'am// ri la sbas na ri mes tshig/ khyad par rgya mtsho lta bu 'am// chu mig sbas na chu yang khol// dgra yi gdung gses sbas gyur na// khyim mam khang pa 'jig par 'gyur// de nas sngags de zu'i sdong po la/ lan stong du bzlas na/ de smyo bar 'gyur ro// da ru'i lo ma dang/ sha sna ba pe dang/ kang ka ri la bzlas nas byin na mdzer 'gyur ro// be'u be dang kar sna la bzlas nas byin na// skrangs 'bur gyi nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// dza yi 'bras la bzlas nas phyogs su gtor na sbrul chen po khang pa'i nang du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rdo sol la bzlas nas ban+d+ha'i nang du chang dang sbyar nas rtswa gseb bam// shing gseb du sbas na yul 'tshig par 'gyur ro// rdo sol la bzlas te chang dang sbyar la bzhag nas byin na mi rengs kyi 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rdo sol zho dang btsan dug sbyar mas btab nas/ dgra'i lus sam sha la reg gam gos la bskus na lhog pa dkar pos 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten gyi khams mes bsreg pa btsan gyi zla gsang gi le'u ste nga brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos/ chu 'khyags drag tu dbab pa khyab 'jug gza'i zla gsang 'di gsungs so// gza' phyi ltar bsgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa// thog mar dad pa rab tu bskyed// ri gsum rtse'am dur khrod du// dbang thob bya phyir bla ma mnyes par bya// dkyil 'khor bris nas dam tshig dbang dag nod// dgos pa bsgrub phyir man ngag thob par bya// man ngag thob nas bsnyen bsgrub mtha' ru

dbyung// gnyen po bya phyir mthun rdzas bsag/ khyab 'jug las kyi go rim bzhin// gzhan yang mthun pa'i cho ga bya// mchod dang gzu dpang gsol ba gdab// gtor ma la sogs cho ga bya// dbab gsad las kyi go rim ni// tshes grangs phyogs dang dus tshod dang// sprul pa'i yan lag 'jug pa'o// go rim bzhin du so sor sbyar// bzhi la nub nas shar du spyod// ma mor sprul te rkang pa g.yas// brgyad la shar lho mtshams nas su// nyi ma dros te nub byang du// dgra lha'i rgyal po'i mjug mar sbul// bcu gcig 'jing la byang nas lhor// bdud du sprul te lag pa gnyis// bcom lnga nam phyed lho nub nas// byang shar mtshams su rgyu ba ste// srin por sprul nas mgo bo 'gro// bco brgyad nam yol shar nas nub// dmu'i sprul pa dpung mgo bo g.yon// nyi shu gnyis la nyi ma nyub// nub byang mtshams nas shar lhor rgyu// gshin rjer sprul te lag pa g.yon// nyi shu lnga la lho nas byang// skya rengs shar te dpung mgo mig/ klu btsan gdon du sprul te 'gro// nyi shu dgu ste myur chung na// byang shar mtshams nas lho nub tu// gza' bdud chen por sprul te 'gro// de yi dbang mor sbyor ba ni// phyogs kyi gdon sprul re re las// bsad ba'i sbyor ba so sor bya// gdon sprul so sor rgyu ba ste// ma mor sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan ni// nag mo chen mo ral pa can// 'jigs pa'i rgyan cha mang po dang// lag na thod khrag 'thor zhing rgyu// rlung nag thog dang ser ba rgyu// rgyal po sngo skya ka tar thogs// sngo skya zhon te 'jigs pa'i gzugs// sgra dang ser ba mtshan ma 'ong// sprul pa bdud nag mdog nag po// lag na bdud nag zhags pa thog/ rta nag zhon te gdon dang bcas// btsan thabs drag po'i nad rnams dang// dus min ma mo mang du 'byung// 'jigs pa srin po so nag dang// mi rtsa dmar la sdang mig bgrad// mche ba gtsigs te za ba'i tshul// mda' zhugs pa yi gdon dang bcas// rlung nag 'tshub mar bcas te 'ong// sprul pa mu stegs dgra sta thogs// dmar po khrag gi thig le can// ba lang zhon te 'jigs pa'i gzugs// mtshan ma thogs dang sprin nag 'khrugs// klu gdon drag po'i sprul pa ni// sbrul nag chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'khyil ba'i tshul gyis rgyug cing 'gro// chu drag glog dang char pa 'ong// nag po chen po 'khor lo thogs// gdon gyi gtso bor sprul te rgyug/ rgyu ba'i dus dang mtshungs nges na// mtshan ma myur du 'grub par 'gyur// des na dbab gsad sbyor ba brgyad// nges par rgyu ba'i dus su bya// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// gru bzhi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus su e// phyogs

mtshams brgyad la e brgyad bskor// e dgu nag po 'khor lo bskor// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la sprul pa brgyad// bskyed la dbab gsad sbyor ba bya// dbus su gshed po yab yum ste// khA hi bcas pa'i gtor ma bzhin// phyogs mtshams brgyad kyi sprul pa la// so so las kyi bya ba brtsam// dgug dang 'dren dang stob pa'i las// 'grogs pa'i tshul de gdong du min// bsreg dang mchod pa la sogs pa// phyogs nas drangs te zhal du dbul// phyogs mtshams brgyad du bsad pa ste// dbus kyi e la bsreg pa'o// sprul pa'i mgo bo rgyu ba'i tshe// gnag pa'i dpral ba'i dbyings su gdab// rkang pa g.yas g.yon rgyu ba na// bol gang g.yas g.yon gnyis su gdab// sprul pa'i yan lag go rim bzhin// bsad pa'i las kyang de bzhin gdab// tsher ma can gyi shing la bsreg/ rgyu ba'i dus dang mtshungs nges na// phung bar 'gyur te gdon mi za// gshin rje'i gshed kyis rab tu bshad// gdon dang phye ma rnam pa gnyis// gdon gyis rdzas la nus pa yod// phye ma gdon gyi bya ba min// lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig/ gza' bdud rgyu ba'i dug de na// rjes dang dri ma'i 'dag pa dang// gos dum lo ma rnying ba la// gdug pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhi byas te// rnam grangs gnad du bsad byas nas// gong ma'i rdzas dang tsha ba gsum// bsres te gzugs brnyan bya bar gsungs// myur du bsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// gong ma'i steng du ha las bya// gong ma bzhi la lcags phye dang// khrag gi sbyor bas dri nyid du// til dang ske tshe nyung nag dang// khrag dang zi ra gu gul dang// gong gi rdzas kyis ma nges bsad// dur khrod ras sam shing shun la// brkyang nul byas te smug nag bya// yang na dmar po nyid du bya// de la gnas pa'i sbyor ba'o// myur du dbab pa'i las bya na// dam sri yul gyi chu sogs bsag/ yugs sa mo'am rabs chad thong// yang na mdze can thod pa ru// ra khrag khyi khrag mi khrag dang// mngal khrag la sogs dme khrag sogs// ba dkar 'o ma mdzo dang ra// 'o ma sogs dang sbyar bar bya// sngo sna dug dang gu gul sbyar// gar 'bebs chu mig klu yod sar// bsregs sam bkol na klu rnams dang// dus tshod bzung ba'i gdong btsugs nas// chu 'khyags khrag tu 'ong bar nges// ma ha tsan+Da rak+Sha tri thi tra ma ya thA/ che ge mo la bya ti b+h+yo// zhes pa ni sprul pa srin po'i gdon gyi gsad cing dbab pa'o// nA ga rA dza be ni Ni a na Na sta/ nA ga dza ra na ting/ san d+ha ra rak+shun tsit+ta b+ha smi ku ru// klu'i gdon gyis dbab gsad pa'o// rmu tri tsan d+ha duM buM buM// ba la rak+sha thum ri li li// ba sha baM raka stam thum ri li li// dmu bdud sprul pas dbab gsad pa'o/ ma ma sa ma ya/ ma

trag rak+sha ma tri ga nas kha ya ku ru/ tso tso 'ba' la ya/ a yu sh+ta da ra da ra/ un ma daM ni/ sha truM ni sha ni dza dza/ ma mo'i gdon gyis gsad dbab pa'o// tri dkar mo tri dul dul snying kha rag la ril ril/ chom chom rtsa la thun shig mA ra ya dzra/ rgyal po sngo skyas dbab gsad pa'o// ya ma tsan d+ha d+hi ha dz+wa la tsa khra da ra na sha ya/ dgra bo nr-i du ma ra na sod sod chom chom shig/ gshin rje'i gdon gyis dbab gsad pa'o// ma hA ni tri sa b+h+yo sna can d+ha ru bi ni// rA hu la dgra bo tsit+ta la 'bun dza to kha'i he ka li ma hA tsan d+ha mA ra nr-i khug dza dza/ gza' bdud chen pos dbab gsad pa'o// bdud tr-i ni ra tr-i sa na tri ya/ ma tri ya b+h+yo/ khaM khaM so b+haM rbad/ srog rtsa thun che ge mo dza ni dza/ zhes pas gar dmigs thogs pa med// gtum chen nyid la rab bstod cing// gza' bdud chen po rab tu rbad// hUM ri rab phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad ni// lha srin sde brgyad bskul re ran// khyab 'jug chen po sku bzhengs shig/ gtum po chen po bskyod tsam na// gza' bdud ngan po ki kang 'bebs// de yis ki kang 'bebs byed pas// gza' bdud chen po mi bsrun pa// khyab 'jug chen po kun tu rgyug/ 'jigs byed rog ti sprul pa'i las// lus po gcig la mgo bo dgu/ mgo lus med par mig gis khengs// ro stod mi la ro smad sbrul// lus ni brjid pa'i dud ka la// lag na chu srin zhags pa thogs// pha ni srin po ma ni klu// klu srin tshogs pa'i mthu bo che// lho nub mtshams nas sku bzhengs nas// zla ba'i rjes gcod shar du rgyug/ nyin mo rgyu zhing mtshan mo 'joms// bar snang khams nas rgyu ba'i tshe// 'jig rten khams kun sgrol bar mdzad// lo nyes 'khrug pa yams nad gtong// nyi ma zla ba lto ru za// rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas pa'i tshe// klu rnams kun yang 'khrug cing slong// thog ser sa g.yos ki kang 'bebs// 'jigs byed chen po mi bgrungs pa// mig brgya po la kha sdong po// dus tshod tshes grangs kun gyi bdag/ lha 'dre kun gyi nad yan byed// lha srin sde brgyad dmag dpon byed// 'byung ba lnga yi bdud chen po// mtshan ni rnam pa dgu ru 'dod// steng 'og phyogs mtshams thams cad nas// kun nas rgyu zhing ki kang 'bebs// lho nub mtshams nas bskyod pa'i tshe// srin po rak+sha pi tis bya// ki kang pa ta chen pos bya// srid pa'i ki kang chen po 'bebs// shar lho mtshams nas spyod pa'i tshe// drang srong chen po rA hu la// drang srong gis ni ki kang mchog/ ki kang bdag nyid can zhes bya// byang shar mtshams nas bskyod tsam na// 'jigs byed ra tsa sgra gcan 'dzin// bi na ya ga pho nyar 'gyed// ki kang 'bebs pa'i las la brtson// nub byang mtshams nas bskyod tsa na// du+u ba 'jug

rings chen po ste// 'jig rten khams na mthu bo che// 'jig rten g.yo 'gul byed pa'i bdag/ lho yi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// khyab 'jug chen po bya ba ste// dus tshod tshes grangs kun tu rgyug/ sprul pa'i sku ni ki kang 'bebs// shar gyi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// dmu bdud chen po ha li ka/ biSh+Nu rA tsa'i ki kang brgyad// dmu yi ki kang 'bebs par byed// byang gi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// bdud po rog ti 'bar ba'i gzugs// bdud kyi ki kang 'bar ba 'bebs// ki kang 'bar ba ra tsa ka/ nub kyi phyogs nas bskyod tsam na// srid pa'i ma mo rnams dang rol// ma mo'i ki kang kun gyi bdag/ ljang sngon chen po ki kang 'bebs// lho nub mtshams nas bskyod tsam na// rog ti bya rog mgo brtsegs te// bskal chen 'bar ba'i 'od chen po// sngun du zhum med su phrad za// khyod ni khro chen sprul pa ste// lho nub mtshams nas sku bskyod nas// lha srin sde brgyad dmag dpon byed// nub nas shar du bskyod tsam na// srid pa'i ma mo'i dmag dpon byed// nad ngan ki kang dbab pa'i dus la bab// shar lho mtshams nas bskyod tsam na// bdud dmag kun gyi dmag dpon byed// bdud dmag ki kang hur thum 'bebs// bdud kyi ki kang dgra la ya// byang shar mtshams nas bskyod tsam na// srin po 'bum gyi dmag dpon byed// srin po'i ki kang dgra la ya// gri thabs sna tshogs ki kang ya// shar nas nub tu bskyod tsam na// dmu bdud yongs kyi dmag dpon byed// dmu rdo 'bebs pa'i las byed cing// gar rbad dmu yi ki kang 'bebs// byang shar mtshams nas bskyod tsam na// gshin rje yongs kyi dmag dpon byed// skye 'gro yongs kyi bla tshe sdud// gshin rje'i ki kang dbang med 'bebs// lho nas byang du bskyod pa'i tshe// klu btsan kun gyi dmag dpon byed// thog dang ser ba'i sna 'dren zhing// thog ser ki kang mdze nad gtong// nub byang mtshams nas bskyod tsam na// gtibs grir gsod pa'i ki kang 'bebs// mdun du gang byung khyud mid byed// ki kang sna tshogs 'bebs pa'i bdag/ ki kang sna tshogs dgra la ya// zhes pas rbad cing rak+ta sbreng// bsad na bla phur gzugs la brdeg/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sha tri sha tri/ kI li kI la ya/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ mu lu mu lu/ ku ru ku ru/ thuM bu thuM bu/ ba ra ta thuM ru thuM ru// pa ra ba shu da na d+ha pa ra ta ya/ ro ti ro ti/ sho pa ra ya/ shan tri ku la tri dza/ ces ni bsad pa'i las sbyor bya// chu 'khyags khrag tu 'bebs byed na// sngags kyi man ngag zhag gcig bya// oM me g+ha kha thun kha thun/ raM yaM raM yaM/ na su ta na na ga ste/ ra thun ra thun ru/ oM a tra ga kha'i li shar ma kug hril// phroM/ kha dog ji ltar 'dod pa ltar// (22)

mtha' bsgyur las kyi sngags kyis bya// dbyibs dang gang 'dod sbyor ba ni// ji ltar khas blangs bzhin du bya// oM 'gur pi tsa mu ru ril/ ga ma skye phroM/ 'dod par las bzhi'i dbyibs su bya'o// rigs mi mthun pa'i spel ba ni// drag sngags 'dis ni 'dod par 'gyur// oM bi tri rgya ma rak+ka kaM hri ka la li ur ba'i nud pa hUM phaT/ ces pa'i sngags bzlas khro tshul bstan// mig ldog kha bgrad mig sprin las// khrag srin dmar po 'dril bar bsam// rdzas rnams 'thor zhing sngags sprul las// ser ba khrag tu 'ong bar bsam// gnas ri sa brag gang du 'ong// b+ha ri sha ya gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ chu 'khyags khrag tu dbab pa/ khyab 'jug gza'i zla gsang gi le'u ste nga dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po des/ chu 'khyags khrag tu dbab pa'i phyir// rog ti nag po'i nang bsgrub 'di gsungs so// dur khrod sa la sogs pa ru// dkyil 'khor gru gsum sbrags mar bya// gru gsum sbrags ma'i nang rol tu// snel gri'i thod pa 'og tu gzhag/ mngal khrag la sogs khrag sna tshogs// dug dang snga sngo dkar gsum blug/ rabs chad thod pa thog nas dgab// gru gsum nang du gzhag par bya// bsnyen pa bya ba'i thabs dag la/ lha bsnyen sum stong byas nas ni// tshes bzhi bco lnga brgyad dus la// gza' chen nyid kyi snying po bzlas// stong rdzogs thun la nyung dkar brab// oM bya sha mi ki du ru ma shri kha ta dza la a ta swA hA/ stong rdzogs thun khrag dag la bstim// oM tsa ba ti rA hu la ma hA kro d+ha ka pha ba shar shal shar hUM phaT/ sngags la stong ngam khri ru bstim// bzlas pa rdzogs nas nyung gis brab// nyi shu dgu'am tshes gcig la// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas sa gtsang sba// thun gcig gnas su rten du bca'// mis ma tshor bar gsang sngags bzlas// oM tri tri tri lo la glo bur/ skyin thang phob/ trag rak+sha snying kha rag b+h+yo/ khrag la mu sha ma b+h+yo/ 'gu si dan ma b+h+yo/ tsan d+ha rak+sha ma b+h+yo/ btsan bdud khrol khrol b+h+yo/ nam mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi rengs sod/ rkyang rje rkyang mo tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ de nas zer sngags mdzub bstan la// yul gyi phyogs su bzlas pa bya// ri'i rtser song la thun zor 'phang// chu skyes zla ba tshes bzhi la// nyi shu dgu mthar bsnyen rdzogs nas// chu 'khyags zla ba kun tu dbab// de ltar las rnams byas gyur na// chu 'khyags khrag tu 'bab 'gyur te// skyin thang ri rab bsnyil bar des// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ chu 'khyags khrag tu dbab pa khyab 'jug gza'i zla gsang gi le'u ste drug cu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan

'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'gal ba cham la dbab pa'i phyir// khyab 'jug gza' yi gsang bsgrub gsungs// sgra gcan chen po nyi zla'i gnyan// drag po chen po rA hu la// khrag tu dbab pa'i las 'di yin// dur khrod la sogs gnas dag tu// maN+Dal chag chag thig gdab bri// dbus su gru gsum brtsegs ma la// mu khyud zlum po thod phreng btang// sgo bzhi rigs dang mthun par bri// sbrul sngo dag gi shun pa la// rdzas kyi phud blug ming rus gzhug/ 'khyil pa'i tshul du+u ga 'ur gzhug/ gru gsum dbus su bzhag la bsgrub// dkar thab dmar thab sngo thab gsum// gru gsum rgyab ma dag la bzhag/ sha rus khrag rul btsos dang rjen// ra mchin grub sman gu gul bzhag/ la phug til sgog pha ltar smos// snel gri'i thod par blugs la bzhag/ dkar gsum mngar gsum klu sman dang// gu gul nag po 'bras chen rnams// ma ltar smos pas 'khar gzhong blug/ mthun rdzas bsdus la thod par bsag/ tsa ra rog po'i rwa la ni// sngags bris ke ru ming byang bris// lha srin sde brgyad mchod rdzas dgram// thun rdzas thod 'phreng steng du bzhag/ rang nyid gshin rje'i gshed po rje// yi dam bcas pa rdzogs pa dang// srog snying 'di ni nus thang brjod// oM a bi sha la du ru ma shi kha dza la a ta swA hA/ stong rdzogs thun la mchod pa bya// hUM 'jigs byed chen po rA hu la// sku mdog dud kha 'jigs byed khengs// gshin rje gshed po'i zhabs drung du// rgyal bar bstan bsrung khas blangs pas// dus 'dir 'da' bar ma byed par// dam rdzas mchod pa 'di long la// dam nyams grog rtsa gcad pa dang// yul du lo nad ser ba phob// hab pa sha mi ki du ru+u ma ki du ru ma shi ba gi dz+wa la ti a tsit+ta ti swA hA/ dus tshod brgyad la gtor ma sbyin// bsnyen zhing bsgrub pa'i dus tshod rnams// gzhung mthun nyams su len pa dang// drag po thun gyi rdzas kyang dgram// ga 'u'i nang du thun gyis brab// oM mu ka ye ka pa ye a pa ye/ hrIHSh+t+r-IHwi kri na ta yul 'di'i lo tog la/ dza ba ti rA hu la/ ma hA kro d+ha ga ba ba ta/ shar shar ta shal de hUM phaT/ thig ni nag cig me/ gnyis med trag brgyad bcad du phroM// nam mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi rengs sod/ rkyang rje rkyang mo tsu ru hUM phaT/ stong khri thon nas rdzas kyis brab// de nas lha srin sprul pa brgyad// sngags kyi gang gi mtshan du brab// trag rag mo hril shag rbad/ ser hril shar b+h+yo// de ni ma mo'i drag sngags so// A le me la b+h+yo// ru lu ru lu ma ma trag raka sha hril hril shar b+h+yo// dgra lha'i rgyal mo'i drag sngags so// A la me la b+h+yo/ oM pa sha mi ke rA hu la hUM shag shar shar hril b+h+yo// de ni bdud kyi drag sngags so// oM ser khrag la

mu sha gtub swA hA/ de ni srin po'i drag sngags so// oM raM traM thun shag ril raM shar b+h+yo// de ni dmu'i drag sngags so// oM ya ma snying ya ma khrag rA hu la la hril hril shag shag sen sen ya ya b+h+yo b+h+yo raM raM hril hril/ de ni bgegs kyi drag sngags so// zla gcig dus brgyad phyogs nas brdeg/ ling+ga bsnur zhing thun rdzas brdeg/ gtum chen bstod la gza' mchog rbad// bla phur ling+ga dag la brdeg/ tshes grangs thems nas grub rtag 'byung// rdzas dang thun zor sngags dang ming// dbus kyi rabs chad thod par blug/ sa ser yul dbus la sogs su// skya rengs gzar du btab la bzhag/ yang na rim pa gzhan yang ste// sri'u phroM ma g.yul thog sbyor ba ni// me lce lta bu'i rim pa ste// kha dog sbyar ba dbyibs nyid ni// 'dod pa'i khrag dang kha dog lnga yi rim// so so'i ji ltar bdag nyid 'dod pa bzhin// ni rang su yi thal bar bsgyur bya ste// nag po'i kha dog rjes su bya ba ni// dbyibs kyang ji lta bde bzhin bsgrub bya ste// thun pa'i ga'ur glod thang rgya yis gdab// de nyid sa ser chen por dbus su gsal// de nas thun gyis zor byas te// dam rdzas maN+Dal gong bzhin bya// dam sri yul gyi chu sogs bsags// lha gnyen bsgrub sngags phyed du ste// phyed ni man chad sngags 'di bzlas// oM mu kha ye ga pa ye/ sA pa ye/ hrIHSh+t+r-IHwi kri de/ yul 'di'i lo thogs la dud phrom// dkar phrom/ shu ti phroM/ yug ti smi/ na sha ra sha ta drag tu phob/ dza pa ti rA hu la/ a kro te ka phob/ ra sha ra sha ra ta hUM phaT/ tsa mu le/ ag+ne rag mo kor te swA hA/ rkyang mo rkyang rje tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ ho ho phroM mu ra mu ra sha ru ru phroM/ gang gi thig nag brtags nas kyang// de la sham bu 'di yis gdags/ ma mo seng ga ye/ ma mo bye tsha dza ye/ ma mo tsit+ta ye/ ma mo srog tsa ye/ dgra'i lo thog snar po la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ snying po sngags kyi bar bar du// mchod cing gtor ma dbul bar bya// ra bsgral thab kyis thugs dam bskang// thon nas gnam gzer ri la bye// dkar thab dmar thab sngo thab gsum// gcig tu dril bas bzhi ru bya// dmar rengs zor ni phyogs su 'phangs// gong gis sngags bzlas mdzub ris bya// nyi shu dgu la 'joms par 'gyur// yang na chu skyes rdzogs pa la// khyab 'jug gtor ma rgyun du gtang// bla phur btab la bsad las bya// bar bar lha dang dbye bar bya// de ltar byas na rab 'bring gis// gnam lcags lce dang dmu rdo dang// chu 'khyags khrag tu dbab bar bya// de la 'di yi las dag ni/ dus gang yang rung ba dang/ khrag dang gu gul/ lcags zangs kyi phye ma rnams la sngags la/ yul gang yang rung ba'i ri rten nam chu mig tu sbas na/ yul de skyin thang rlung gis khyer te 'gro bar 'gyur/

yang na rdzas de rnams la ril bu byas la/ de ltar dgra bo'i khang thog tu bskyur na khang pa 'jig par 'gyur ro// yang de rnams la brjod nas chu mig kha byang du blta bar sbas na/ gong ltar drangs par sha za zer 'ong ngo// srin rdo'i khar ba chags pa la bzlas nas khyab 'jug rgyu ba'i dus su kha byang du bltas par sbas na thog drag po 'bebs par 'gyur ro// 'bru sna tshogs dang/ 'brug gi rus pa dang/ chu srin gyi sder mo la bzlas te 'og tu sbas nas phyogs bcu ru gtor na ser ba khrag tu 'bab par 'gyur ro// ka na ka so dang khyi nag po'i mche ba la sngags nas dgra phyogs su gtor na rkang nad du 'gyur ro// de la sogs te las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// ser ba bzlog pa dang shwa bzlog pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ nyung dkar la bzlas te gtor na bzlog par 'gyur ro// ma ga la ya ti la brjod nas gtor na bzlog par 'gyur ro// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las// chu 'khyags khrag tu dbab pa gza'i zla gsang gi le'u ste re gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po gshin rje'i gshed pos// 'jig rten khams su thog dbab pa'i phyir lha chen dbang phyug chen po phyi ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// lhor lta brag chen po seng ge mchongs pa 'dra/ yang na dmar me 'dra ba'am/ dur khrod la sogs dgon pa'i gnas dag tu// rnal 'byor goms pas yo byad ldan byas te/ 'phags pa la sogs mchod cing gtor ma gtang// gras phying gtsang ma mda' gang gru bzhi la// mtshal lam ldong ros dag gis thig gdab ste// le'u tshe dgu pa dag gi tshad du bya// dbus su ga pur dag gi chu blugs te// dar ram ras sam dkar 'jam la// lha chen dbang phyug dag gi gzugs bris te// smyug ma gtsang ma dag la dgod par bya// steng nas le brgan dag gi gdugs kyis dgab/ de yi mtshams bzhir ljang gu'i 'phan bzhi gzug/ phyogs bzhi'i le'u tshe bzhi po dag la yang// lha yi blon mo bzhi yi gzugs bris dgod// shar du dri za'i lha nyid dgod par bya// lho ru gshin rje nub tu klu// byang du gnod sbyin lha ste bzhi yang dgod// de yi phyi rim me tog sna tshogs bskor// mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma gcig/ nang du rta tshil khrag dang snying yang bstsal// snying gi srog rtsar dmigs pa'i ming rus bri// khre phye dag la dgra gzugs bya// snying gar thig le dkyil du ming rus gzugs// ske nas sngo dmar skud pas gdags par bya// lag pa g.yas kyi srin lag rtsa la 'gel// chos gos ljang nag gon la thod nag bcings// dur khrod ras sam bram ze'i pags pa la// ldong ros chu rtsas kha dog ser por sgyur// dug dang khrag gis 'khor lo rtsibs

brgyad bris// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshin rje'i snying po dgod// dbus kyi lte bar lha chen po yang dgod// phyi rim thog gi dbab sngags dag gis bskor// 'khor lo mnga' gsol smon lam gdab// bram ze la sogs mdze can thod par gzhug/ de yi nang du bse dang lcags zangs dang// dngul dang snying sna khrag sna mang blug ste// le'u 'bras bu man+dzi'i kha la gzhag/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim gyi tshul bzhin bskyed// dbang chen rim brtseg steng du bruM gcig bsam// bruM las 'bar ba lha yi gzhal yas khang// phyi dang nang med kun tu gsal bar bskyed// dbus su ma he bam chen bsnol ba la// nyi zla 'khor lo rab tu gsal ba'i steng// ya las 'jam dpal gshed po 'bar ba'i sku// zhal drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis gsal bar bskyed// de yi 'khor na gnas pa ste// ma hA de ba hUM zhes brjod pa yis// dbus su lha chen dbang phyug de ba yang// sku mdog nag po spyan gsum mche ba can// rtse gsum 'bar ba khyung gi rgyan mtshan g.yas// zhags pa rdo rje be con g.yon pa na// smin mtshams glog 'gyu bskal pa'i thog 'bebs sam// 'khor gyi lha yang rta zhon thog 'bebs pa'o// de bzhin ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal bsgoms la// gshin rje gshed pos lus 'byung dbang du sdud// hUM lha gnas rim gyis bgrod pa'i yang rtse nas// smon lam dbang gis bstan pa 'phel mdzad cing// ma hA de ba lha chen dbang phyug gtso// bstan pa bshig pa'i dgra rnams bsgral ba dang// sangs rgyas bstan bsrung dkon mchog bstod pa'i phyir// 'khor bcas ma lus spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// oM bra h+ma na rak+Sha na i h+ye hi dzaHhUM baM hoH/ dga' zhing gus pas pus btsugs thal bar sbyar nas// lha mchog khyod kyi yon tan rab brjod cing// tsam pa ka dang pad+ma rab gtor nas// deng 'dir bstod de khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// khyod kyi thugs ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'dra zhing// 'od zer cha las 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// thogs med mkha' lding nam mkha'i gdan stengs su// brtan par bzhugs nas bdag la dngos grub stsol// 'khor gyi lha chen mi bzad thog 'bebs bzhi// shugs kyis thogs med rta mchog gdan la bzhugs// ma hA de ba pra mo ha tsa ra ni sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan// lha yul gtsang ma dag las rab bshams te// bram ze mtshan ldan chags pas rab tu mchod// 'bras dang ku shar bcas pa'i yon chab 'di// ga pur gur gum gla rtsi lce pog sogs// til mar gsur can rab gsal mar me'i mchog/ du ru ka la sogs pa'i dri yi chu// lag pan mar dang bcas pa'i bu ram bshos// dung dung ru dang zangs dang bkra shis dang// rnga rings rdza rnga muny+tsa ta mi li// cha lang pi wang tam

bu rgyud mangs dang// glu gar rol mo rtsed 'jo dag la sogs// bde ba'i yo byad thams cad ma lus kun// mchod par 'bul lo thugs rjes bzhes su gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga puSh+pa d+hu pa A lo ke gan+b+he ba liM pU tsa ho// sku mdog nag po spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs// drang srong cha lugs pad+ma'i phreng bas brgyan// zhal bzhi gling bzhi yongs la khyab par gzigs// snyan pa'i dril sgra gsung gi nga ro can// dbang phyug chen po khyod la phyug 'tshal lo// 'khor gyi lha ni blon po bzhi// rta la bzhon pa ral gri bskor// thog ser 'bebs pa'i las la brtson// khyed la bdag bstod bdag phyag 'tshal// sngags 'dis lha rnams rab tu bsnyen// oM ma hA de ba ti badzra laM snga ma na rak+Sha kang+ka la ya hUM/ de ba rA dza ma hA ni dza/ dgra bo che ge mo ni thum thum rbad// sha sen sen dza dza hUM hUM/ khri khri stong stong bar pa bstod// de skad brjod la bsnyen par bya// rang gis ma nyes dpang yang gzug/ nyes byas bris sku'i mdun du glan// 'o dod 'bod cing g.yab skor bya// gshed po bstod la lha rnams bskul// g.yas nas skor zhing thugs dam bskul// 'dod khams nyi shu'i yang rtse nas// gzugs khams lha yi dga' tshal nas// pho brang de ba'i gzhal yas nas// chos kyi rgyal mtshan dbang bskur ba'i// lha chen dbang phyug chen po ni// sku mdog dmar ser 'bar ba la// tshad med dbu bzhis gling bzhi 'joms// g.yas kyi pad+ma skyon dang bral// tha ma bgrang 'phreng rig sngags spel// g.yon gyi gun d+hes dgos 'dod skong// tha ma blugs snod dgra bgegs sbyong// gang gis bsams par yud kyis phyin// pad+ma ser pos brgyan byas nas// ras kyi kha tshar mgul rgyan can// thugs rje drag tu bskul byas nas// log pa'i dgra bgegs 'joms pa'i tshe// sku ni sngo nag chen mo la// zhal gyi mche ba gdengs pa yis// dgra bo bdun rgyud rtsad nas gcod// smin mtshams glog 'gyu thog chen 'bebs// mdzub mo bskul bas gling bzhi 'khrug/ ljags kyang srid pa g.yo bar mdzad// dkon mchog gsum gyi sku dgra 'di// thog chen 'bar bas lnga phung bshig/ tshe srog chod la bdun rgyud chod// 'khor gyi blon po bzhi la bskul// bar snang thog chen 'khrug tu chug/ dbang po rnam lnga kha long kha'i// bu smad 'khor yul mkhar bcas la// gser thog lcags thog tshal tshal la/ 'khor lo bro brdung 'u ru ru// zangs thog 'khar thog rams se ram// me mdag glog dmar khyugs se khyug/ 'khor rnams shugs chen rta zhon cing// ral gri me long klad la bskor// ki kang gshed bzhi klad la bskor// ral gri bskor ba'i 'od 'phros pas// thog chen sna tshogs skar ltar 'khrugs// nyams pa'i dgra la thog mda' ya// skad cig tsam la

phung par gyis// rta snying stob cing rak+ta sbreng// rtag tu 'brug dang ser ba dang// glog dang thog dang shwa bud 'ong// rnam pa'i rtags byung thog gta' gzhug/ mkhar dang lha rten chu mig gam// mchod rten lha khang brag 'og tu// lhag par dgra yi go kha'am// nyal ba'i lngas sam mal 'og tu// 'khor lo bcas kyis thod pa sba// drag sngags 'di bzlas thod par bstims// oM tsa tu+u ra mu kha rak+Sha pra ma na ma hA de ba dgra bo'i yul khams su// ro kha du kha pa hUM pra mo swA hA// zhes ni thod pa'i nang du bzlas/ gtor ma gtang zhing smon lam gdab// bris sku dag la rten bcas la// grwa phying maN+Dal dag la gril// rtag tu lha rnams mchod gyur na// yid kyis ci bsams 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten du thog dbab pa lha'i zla gsang gi le'u ste re gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed pos// 'gal ba cham la dbab slad du// thog dbab lha yi nang bsgrub gsungs// srid pa'i mgar gyis ma brdungs mtshon// mi srid byang chub sems kyi dbal rang mtshon// rlung gi bshams pa'i ngar gyi mtshon// me sbud chen po mtshon dbal ngar can des// 'byung ba gzhan gyis mi tshugs shing// de gnyid ngang las thogs chags med par 'joms// de nyid bsgrub phyir dur khrod la sogs su// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su gru gsum e brtsigs te/ 'khor lo bzhi dang rol mtsho bdun// gser ri dbus su ya mAn+ta ka ste// steng du lha chen dbang phyug yab yum dgod// 'khor lo bzhi la lha yi blon po bzhi// khrag zhag mar khu chang dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang// rgya mtsho'i chu la sogs pa mtsho bdun no// lha chen lnga la phur pa lnga dgod de/ dung gi phur pa sor brgyad shar la dgod// dri za lha yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// gser gyi phur pa lho yi rtsibs la dgod// gshin rje lha yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// zangs kyi phur pa nub kyi rtsibs la dgod// klu gdon lha yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// lcags kyi phur pa byang gi rtsibs la dgod// gnod sbyin lha yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// 'khar ba'i phur pa dbus kyi e la dgod// dbang phyug chen po ma hAr mnga' yang gsol// gro ga ras sam shing shun dar dkar la// lha rnams rtsa ba rang rang snying po dang// dbab pa'i sngags dang dmigs bya'i yul ming dri// sngo dmar skud pas dmigs pa'i ming rus mgul du gdags// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa kha sbyor la// thod pa'i phyi nang med par khrag gis byug/ steng gi thod pa yab tu mnga' yang gsol// 'og gi thod pa yum du mnga' yang gsol// thod pa

steng mar yab kyi sku yang bri// thod pa 'og mar yum kyi sku yang bri// thod pa'i rtsibs ring dmigs pa'i ming yang bris// dpral bar rus bris kha ru ming byang bri// snying gar nr-i bris 'doms su bla dgas bris// de yi mtha' mar kha sbyar dza dzas bskor// gro ga shing shun zhing gi pags pa la// dgra gzugs bris la dbang phyug yum la brgyan// 'khar ba'i phur pa thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ gro ga shog bu shing gi lo ma la/ lha chen tshogs bdag dbang phyug chen po khyod// khyod kyi btsun mo mA ra ya 'dis spyad// 'khor gyi lha rnams myur du bskul mdzod las// 'di la dbang phyug chen pos thog chen phob// thod pa de yi mgul du gdags par bya'o// thod pa'i nang du dme khrag skam po dang// gser phye zangs phye lcags phye 'khar phye dang// dngul dang thog lcags thog grir shi ba yi// snying dang rus pa sha yang stsal// thod pa kha sbyar mi yi rgyus pas bcing// sgyed gsum kha la chu gsum steng du bzhag/ chu skyes me tog sna tshogs dang// 'dod pa'i longs spyod zas rnams dang// rgun chang sbrang dang 'bras chang dang// gro chang dang ni a 'bru sha/ de dag mchod pa'i rdzas su dgram// sna tshogs snying dang khrag tu sbyar// bu ram 'bras kyi gtor ma bzhi// lha yi blon po bzhi yang dgod// ling+ga ji ltar 'dod pa'i dbyibs// gzugs ming byas la mdun du bzhag/ sngags kyis brab cing gsad las bya// ting 'dzin gdan bcas gzhal yas bskyed// ya mAn+ta ka 'khrugs par bsgom// gdan du yi dwags gding bar bya// dbang phyug chen po gsal bsgoms te// 'khor gyi lha bzhis bskor bar bsam// oM ma hA de ba ka la hUM/ zhes brjod dbang phyug chen po yang// nag po spyan gsum mche ba rab tu gtsigs// phyag mtshan rtse gsum khyung gi rgyal mtshan g.yas// zhags pa 'dren tshul be con rdeg tshul g.yon// chibs su 'brug rta sngon po chibs// gser gyi ral gri 'bar ba klad la bskor// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i ral gri glo la btags// de 'dra rab tu gsal bar bsgom par bya// shar phyogs lha yi phyag na dngul gyi gzhu bdungs dngul mda' phyag na bsnams// dngul gyi 'khor lo bskor zhing 'brug rta zhon nas ki kang phrag la bcug/ rlung gi thog 'bebs ser ba'i skyin thang gtong// lho nas gser gyi thog chen gong bzhin 'bebs// nub nas zangs thog byang nas lcags thog 'bebs// de 'dra gsal bsgom yengs par mi bya'o// hUM rnam snang mtshan nyid mi g.yo gtsug tor bstan// byang chub chen po mchog gi phyag rgya ni// bdud 'dul chen po sku ru sprul pa'i rgyal// byang shar mtshams nas sku bde shin tu bstan// me lce bar snang sprin gtibs dkyil 'khor nas// sku stod sngo nag

'bar ba'i 'od phur can// shin tu khro brjod dbang phyug gtum bag che// thugs rje sprin ltar gtibs nas nam mkha' gang bar khyab// gzir gnon stobs kyi drag po stabs kyis gnon// bdud po nag po spyan gsum mche ba can// bstan pa bshig pa'i srog la spyan 'dren na// dbang phyug lha chen 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// dbang phyug chen po gnas nas bskyod tsam na// rtse gsum 'bar ba khyung gi rgyal mtshan 'phyar te gshegs// zhags pas 'dren cing be con snying la brdeg/ nag po spyan gsum sdang dmigs bzlog pa'i bdud// dbu skra 'bar ba 'phrog zer ral pa can// sku lus mun pa spyan gsum ser la 'dril// rno dbal che ba zla tshes gyen du 'khyil// spyan mig bzlog pas drag po'i skyin thang 'bebs// shangs nas rlung 'khor 'bud pa'i bu yug 'khrugs// mdung dang gri rkang sku yi rten du bcas// spyan mig mi mthun las kyi zla 'dril ltar// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gshegs su gsol// e h+ye hi ma hA kA la tri dza/ ga ru ni ga dri sh+ya ha/ sa ma ye hUM sa ma ye s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ lha chen dbang phyug 'khor ba'i g.yul bzlog pa// sprul pa'i rlabs chen lha yi dmag dpung sdud// dbang phyug legs ldan nag po'i 'khor gyis bskor// ma rig sgrib pa ma lus sel mdzad cing// dbang phyug legs ldan sku la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang phyug bsod nams gzi brjid 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// bstod pa'i lung bstan 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang phyug nyi zla'i 'od ltar zhal gsal zhing// ma rig sgrib ba ma lus sel mdzad cing// 'khor bcas lha yi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// me tog phreng ba la sogs dang// rin chen dbyig dang sgog btsong dang// la phug la sogs tsan d+ha li// 'bras bu yid bzhin sna tshogs zas// phyogs bcu'i chu skyes dang ni longs spyod rkyen// mchod pa'i longs spyod 'di 'bul na// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// zhal zas bdud rtsi dza gad sman gyis mchod// e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru ni/ pa ti ma hA rak+Sha/ ru pa kha kha khA hi/ pa ti dza/ ma hA pe ta li/ kha kha khA hi/ hUM dbang phyug chen po 'khor bcas la// mchod sbyin la sogs sna tshogs dang// rdzas dang yo byad dpag mi lang// bla med dad pas mchod 'bul bstod// 'od phung bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i 'od// gdug pa ril mid mdzad pa'i khro gnyer can// dug gsum rtsad gcod mche ba gtsigs pa po// ye shes spyan gsum nyi zla bzhin du 'bar// bstod pa'i bka' rgyud bla med lung bstan dpal// dam tshig chos kyi 'khor lo rnam snang mdzad// bla ri mchod pa brjid pas bcings pa ni// nges par bstod pas bcu yi bdag po 'phags// rtag tu dur khrod 'bar ba'i

gnas na bzhugs// dur khrod ma mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor// nad gtong rak+sha'i tshogs rnams kun mchod nas// bstan pa 'jigs par byed pa'i dgra dang bgegs// mdangs rnams 'phrog la thal ba'i rdul du rlog/ stobs chen glang po'i pags pa gos su gyon// lha klu gnyan gyi grong khyer thams cad kun// lha chen bdud dpung che btsan gsum pos ni// log 'dren dgra sri gzir dug gnon pa'o// dpa' bo chen po stag gi pags pa thogs// 'khor du lha yi blon po bzhi yis bskor// phyag nas phyogs cha kun tu rnam grangs pa// smon lam khyad par mang pos mthu sbyar la// sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam par thar pas rol// phan mdzad dmag dpon 'khor bcas khyod la yang// sdug bsngal tsha bas gdungs pa'i sems can la// drag po'i thog chen phob la rgyun du 'bebs// lha chen dbang phyug khyod la bdag 'dud skyabs su mchi// sngags 'dis lha rnams srog nas gzung// oM ma hA de ba ka ka ti dzi ri sang ni/ i na hri si ban+dza na/ ga ru ru be seng ke na phu/ se na d+he sa na u ta ke na/ sa pa de de bu ye na/ de ba de na ma ra ya raM/ khri tsho re re bgrang zhing sku bskyed bstod// 'od dang sgra dang dri zhim dang// 'brug dang glog dang thog dang shwa// de rnams sgrub pa'i rtags su ste/ dbang du bsdu zhing phrin las bcol// thog rje thog bdag bskul zhing bstod// gnam lcags thog chen 'bebs pa'i lha// chibs su 'brug rta sngon po chibs// rol tu khyung dang seng ge khrid// kha rlangs sprin dang na bun 'thibs// shangs nas bu yug khu 'phang 'dril// lcags kyi ser chen phrams se phram// shel gyi khu 'phang hril li li// gser thog lcags thog chems se chem// gnam lcags ral gri glad la bskor// gser gyi sha rlang glog chen 'khyug/ 'khor gyi lha yang thog chen 'bebs// shar phyogs dri za'i zhing khams nas// dri za lha yi blon po yang// dngul gyi gzhu+u mdung mda' thags te// lag nas dngul gyi thog chen 'bebs// dngul gyi thog chen 'u ru ru// ki kang pho mo 'phral du las la 'dzud// thog ser skyin thang blo bur 'bebs// de bzhin phyogs kyi blon bzhi bskul// thog gi dbab sngags thod par bstim// ur choms rbad nal raM shad shad b+h+yo/ dza rak+sha bi ta mA ra ya snying la rbad/ tsit+ta baM ril kha rag tshal pa baM/ rak+sha yag+sha bi ta kha la rbad/ bu tsha 'ur choms/ rbad nal ram shad shad nag po srog la choms choms/ bobs bobs des ni lcags thog dbab pa'o// 'ur choms rbad/ na la raM raM shad de ba yak+sha srog la chums chums rbad rbad ri li/ 'ur rbad nal shig mA ra ya/ des ni gser thog dbab pa'o// 'ur choms shig shig mA ra ya ni ni/ kha la rbad du dza dza/ nA ga du ma hA ra tsa kha la rak+sha tsig

tsig/ tsag tsag hril hril phob ya// de ni zangs dbab pa'o// de bzhin thod pa kha sbyar te// dmigs pa'i yul gyi dbus su sba// lcags phur mkhar gyi rmang du sba// zangs phur yul lha'i rten sar sba/ dngul phur rta yi bres su sba// de bzhin byas nas phab gyur na// sbas pa'i rten sar dus su 'bebs// de la the tshom bag mi bya/ zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ thog dbab pa lha'i zla gsang nang du bsgrub pa'i le'u ste re gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// bstan pa gnyan po bsrung ba'i phyir// thog dbab lha yi gsang bsgrub gsungs// rma bya dag gi rgyal mtshan la// dmigs pa'i ming rus 'og tu bcug/ smyug rgod rtsang ni bzhi gshags la// ling+ga dag gi ske ru gdab// phying dkar gtsang ma gru bzhi gcig/ stegs bu'i steng du bting nas kyang// nas sngon phul gang shar du spungs// dkyil du rgyal mtshan gzug par bya// nyin mo sngags bzlas nas kyis brab// nub mo sngags bzlas til gyis brab// sngags rdzogs ri gsum rtser song la// e brkos ming rus nang du gzhug/ rtsang dang mnyam pa'i khung brkos la// dgra la rtse bstan re mas gzhug/ dbang phyug che la las bcol lo// 'o dod bos shing bsad cing mnan// myur du thog chen 'bebs 'dod na// rnam par smin pas shi ba'i mgor// ha la pa la ta ka dang// de bzhin sna tshogs nyung dkar nag/ zhing chen pags pa mtshan ngan la// yul gyi ming dang brnag pa'i ming// de bzhin bris te der bcug ste// spyan drang bzhugs mchod bstim par bya// drag sngags 'di dag rab tu bzlas// ma hA tsan d+ha rag+sha be she an ya phob// ha ra tsan+Ta ha ra ma ha tsan+Ta ha ra yak+sha bag+sha phob/ rak+sha ma yag+sha b+h+yo/ shar shel ha la ha la d+han+Ta pra tshe phob/ pra tse ba tse ha ri ha ri dza du ti b+h+yo/ rag rag+ta tsan+d+ha ma hA sha ra ti nan d+ha ra tsan d+ha pa tsa ha la ha la da ra da ra phaT/ rag+sha tsan+d+ha d+hi ma hA shak+ti b+h+yo b+h+yo/ badzra ra tse ru badzra de de ra ra ha na ha na b+h+yo// gang 'dod gnas kyi yul lha'i rten// bdun 'bum bzlas bya khru gang gnan// dus med thog chen nges par 'bebs/ dung dang a ka ru dang li ga bur rnams la bsngags te/ dgra bo'i phyogs su gtor na mdze ru 'gyur ro// bag zan la sems can gyi gzugs sna tshogs byas te/ khrag gis byugs la khang pa'i thog tu bzhag na/ sems can de nyid mang por 'phel nas khang pa'am khang gseb tu skad sna tshogs 'don zhing 'ong ngo// sman 'bri ta sa 'dzin dang/ 'gi wang la sngags nas rdza mar blugs na/ grum bu dang srin bur 'gyur ro// phru bar blugs na tshod ma sha mar 'gyur ro// tshon rtsi lnga la

sngags nas khyim du bzhag na/ byi bas khyim dang zhing dang ldum rar za mi nus so// mu tig la sngags bzlas nas bud med la byin na bu yong bar 'gyur ro// smag shad la sngags btab nas dbang phyug chen po la mchod nas// phyugs 'gab nyungs pa la gtad na phyugs 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rma bya'i rgyal mtshan la bsngags nas/ rtag tu lus la bcangs na de mdze 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// sbyor ba'i rim pa bsdus par gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten khams su thog dbab pa'i zla gsang lha gsang bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste re bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos thugs rin chen ga'u nas 'di gsungs so// bstan pa gnyan po bsrung ba dang// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir// nad bdag ma mo'i zla gsang gsungs// dur khrod la sogs dgon pa'i gnas nyid du// sa bdag mnyes bya ma nyes dpang yang gzug/ phung ba'i shul nas sa blang dkyil 'khor brtsig/ mngal khrag la sogs chag chag gdab// dug gis rtsal bskyed sman gyi dri yang byug/ dbus su gru gsum brtsegs ma gting du bru// zla gam dmar po 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ldan// mu khyud zlum po thod pa'i phreng bas bskor// gru chad bar khyams sgo bzhi'i rigs dang sbyar// gru gsum rtse drug dpal gyi zhal yang bri// dbus su 'jam dpal yab yum sras bcas dgod// 'khor lo bzhi la phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi dgod// zla gam gsum la nag mo phung gsum dgod// gru chad bzhi la srin mo gdong bzhi dgod// rtsibs chen bzhi la bshan pa ma bzhi dgod par bya// bar khyams bzhi la sa bdag ma bzhi dgod// lcags ri nag por dbang phyug rtsa brgyad dgod// de ltar lha re phur pa snying po re// dbus su thod pa nag po'i nang dag tu// dgra bo'i ming rus gzugs dang bcas pa dgod// 'jam dpal yab yum sras kyi gdan du gding// gru gsum rtse mor rabs chad thod pa gsum// gcig tu ra khyi mi dang rta yi khrag/ rims khrag la sogs brgya rtsa brgyad du sbyar// btsan dug la sogs brgya rtsa brgyad du sbyar// thod pa gcig tu nyung dkar nyung nag sbyar// ske tshe lan tshwa thal chen mnyam por sbyor// thod pa gcig tu zangs phye lcags phye sbyar// rdo phye la sogs mang du sbyar la bzhag/ dug khrag thod pa bal tshon sna lngas bcas// gri mor shi ba'i pags pa'i steng du yang// ra khrag dug khrag sbyar ba gru bzhir thog kyang gdab// gong bzhin 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pho brang bcas// sngar bzhin bkod la rang rang snying po dgod// mtho do sor bzhi rtsang gi rtse la brgyangs// dkyil 'khor dbus su thod pa brubs la bzhag/ gtor ma sha chen bcas

pas bse gab dgang// ya mAn+ta ka gshin rje nyid la dbul// g.yas su snel gri'i thod pa dum bu lnga pa ru// sgrol bdag chen po e ka dza ti la// shes rab mtshal dang snel gri'i snying la rten// g.yon du sbyor bdag nag mo re ti la// yugs sa'i thod par mi dbang sha khrag dang// sman dang shing dang khrag tu sbyar la bzhag/ zla gam gsum du nag po phung gsum la// skyes bu dar ma grir shi'i thod pa ru// glang nag snying dang pad+ma rak+ta dang// sbrul nag snying dang 'ug pa'i mig 'bras dang// pho rog snying dang bud med klad khrag bzhag/ 'khor bzhi'i bud med bzhi po la// gzhong pa gru gsum nang du'ang// khrag sna gsum dang stag seng glang// sa bdag rgyal po'i snying bzhi bzhag/ rtsibs chen bzhi la bshan pa ma bzhi la// mdzo mo'i thod pa'i nang dag tu// snying dang khrag gi gtor ma bzhag/ gru chad gong gi dam rdzas su// yugs sa mo yi glad phur du// stag dom ban glang gi snying dang// rang rang khrag tu sbyar la bzhag/ bar khyams bse mo bzhi la yang// ba men rwa'am bse phor du// mar khu sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang// khrag sna mang po sbyar la bzhag/ de nas las kun zin pa dang// de ni sgrub pa'i dam rdzas so// de nas dkyil 'khor byang shar du// sman phud rak+tas sbrus pa la// mchod rten mtho gang gru bzhi pa// dur khrod ro sol nag pos bskus la bzhag/ dug khrag ming rus bcas pa rnams// mchod rten bum pa'i nang du stsal// lha phyag bya zhing sngags kyang bzlas// mchod rten ma mo rnam pa gsum// chu mig nya lcibs can du sbra// ma nyes dpang gzug mkhyen par gsol// gtor ma gtang zhing dus tshod du// nang par skya rengs shar ba dang// dgongs kyang dmar thag chad pa la// ma mo'i gtor ma rim pas gtang// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang// snang la rang bzhin med pa yis// chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du bsgom// de bzhin rgyu yi ting 'dzin ni// mthing nag hUM gcig gsal bar bsgom// spro bsdus bde gshegs thugs dam bskul// 'gro ba'i don byas slar bsdus pas// gser gyi rdo rje rtse lngar gyur// ya mAn+ta ka badzra kro d+ha/ ces pa yid dang ngag la brjod// gtum chen ya mAn+ta kar gyur// dbu drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis la// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal bar bsgom// g.yas su k+Sha las sgrol bdag mo// e ka dza ti gsal bar bsgom// g.yon du ma las sbyor bdag mo// nag mo re ma ti ru bsgom// yab yum sbyor ba'i byang sems las// lhag par yi ge ma lus 'phros// stong gsum khams khyab 'gro don byas// slar bsdus zla gam gsum la dbab// yig 'bru gsum gyi dbang bskur te// nag mo phur gsum gsal bar bsgom// 'khor lo bzhi la phung byed

bzhi// rtsibs chen bzhi la bshan pa bzhi// gru chad bzhi la gdong mo bzhi// bar khyams bzhi la bse mo bzhi// lcags ri la yang dbang phyug ma// sku mdog cha lugs gsal bar bsgom// de bzhin bsgom pa'i ma rnams la// spyan drang bzhugs gsol mchod yon dbul// dgyes bstod bcol bskul phrin las bcol// tha ma las kyi sbyor bas bsad// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ oM sa ma ya shrI ma ny+dzu ya mAn+ta ka/ ya ma rA tsa ma ma e ka dzA ti/ trag rak+sha kha mun tra/ mu ru lu ru lu hUM/ raka mo te kuM dza dza/ kha la ma hi b+h+yo b+h+yo// ru ru ro ru/ tsa pa la ag shu me dza dza/ du ni du ti dza la ya dza dza/ du ru dza la ha na dza dza/ du ru ma ra ga ha b+h+yo dza/ rus snying kha la rak+sha rbad/ thums ri li li/ ni sha ku ru ra kha he ni/ ku ni kur kha raM rbad thuM ri li li/ snying kha la rag+sha ni sha ti s+t+waM rbad na thuM ri li li/ trag rag+sha mu tra snying kha rag ma b+h+yo// oM ru ru tsa ba la ag shu me b+h+yo/ ma rag mo rag snying rtsa la b+h+yo/ rag mo dgra kha rag b+h+yo/ tsab mo tsab mo b+h+yo/ khrag la mu sha ma b+h+yo/ ku ma da ri shu la da ri/ tsa mun da ri/ kang ka da ri/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo
