b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ de rnams srog gi snying po de// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe dang// rdo rje lcags phye'i rdzas rnams la// stong stong bzlas la thun la bstim// de bzhin grub pa'i rtags rnams 'ong// me dang sgra dang du ba dang// rjes dang 'od dang skad ngan 'don pa dang// rmi lam rtags dang skad ngan 'don// gang nye rtags kyi drod tshad gzung// gang nye dag la gtor ma gtang// las la rbad sngags gong bzhin sbyar// ya mAn+ta ka ya mA rA tsa/ ma ma e ka dzA ti ni b+h+yo// ru ru ro ru tsa pa la ag shu me b+h+yo b+h+yo// du ne dun ting du la ya b+h+yo b+h+yo// ma ru trag raka mo b+h+yo// ma ma ru ru rag mo b+h+yo// snying ga rag+sha ti ta ma b+h+yo// rag mo ma ma khong gi snying la ya b+h+yo// rag mo tsab khrag la mu+u sha/ snying tsa ru ru tsa pa la ma ma b+h+yo// snying sha ti mar po thun b+h+yo// snying tsa la dmar po thun b+h+yo// snying khrag la dmar po thun b+h+yo// tsit+ta phyung dmar po thun b+h+yo// de ni ma mo rbad sngags te// rang rang grub pa'i rtags dang sbyar// de nas gsad pa'i las bya na// rang rang grub rtags srog bzhin sbyar// ma mo'i bsad pa'i thun sngags dang// rang rang rims nad dbab pa'i sngags// gshin rje'i gshed pos dbang bsdus la/ e ka dza tis rgyu gser gdab// gong gi rdzas la sngags 'di brdeg/ trag rak+sha kha mun dra/ ma tra ma mun ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo// rag mo te ku ma tsa tsa kha la mi ti b+h+yo// ru yu ru lu ma ti b+h+yo/ rak+sha thun b+h+yo b+h+yo// dza dza/ shrir ra thun/ sa ma ya thun/ d+ha ru la thun/ bi ma la ru tsa dgra bo la thun b+h+yo// phaT phaT/ du ru bi ma ru tse/ kha tham ma mo tsa la ya ma/

srog la thun/ snying la thibs/ gong gi drag po'i rdzas blangs la/ e ka dza tis mdze nad gtang/ trag rag+sha kha 'dar/ kha 'dar so chums so chums nA' ga rA dza mag mug srog baM ri li li// dgra bo mA ra ya dza dza/ re ma ti yis nad ngan dbab/ myos myos shig shig tsit+ta baM ril shig/ tsit+ta baM myos/ ma ti rgyob/ tsit+ta baM phung/ chod cig thums shig/ long long thum thum/ long yer long yer sod/ ru ru shi ti kri/ du sod sod srog la thum thum sod/ ma rag du rbad du ya sod// kha rug kha sha ma sod/ srog thums ni rbad sod/ ni ni tsa ya thun sod// gang grub rtags dang sbyar te bsad// de nas thun dang 'khor lo de// mchod rten bum par bstsal bar bya// chu mig nang mnan dpang yang gzug/ yab yum 'og gi gzugs ming la// rang rang phur pa sngags kyis bsad// dkyil 'khor 'brub khung nang du mnan// snying la rten bcas gtor ma gtang// zhes bshad do// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ ngan sngags sna tshogs dbab pa ma mo'i zla gsang bstan ba'i le'u ste re lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje'i gshed pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'gal ba cham la dbab pa'i phyir// ma mo stong gi las mkhan ma// nag mo mi pham srid gsum mgon// dpal ldan nag mo re ma tis// nad bdag mo yi zla gsang gsum// dang por chos dang sdig bshags sogs// rim pa ji bzhin stong thar bsgom// 'byung ba rim lnga'i gzhal yas bskyed// sems kyi rang bzhin gshed po ste// snying las 'phros pas spyan drangs te// sbyor rtsar rtogs pas gtor ma brlab/ srog gi snying pos dbul bar bya// rak+ta rgya mtsho de yis brlab// bar du bskul tshig gang rung bskul// de nas bsgrub par bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// zla gam dmar po gsum gyis bskor// gru chad bar khyams sgo bzhir ldan// shin tu drag po'i snod nang du// tsit+ta dang ni rak+ta dang// btsan dug rnams ni blug par bya'o// nal bu'i sha dang shes rab mtshal// nal bu'i ban d+ha'i nang du blug/ nal bu'i snying la rtag tu bod// bya nag lug nag rten du bca'// nal bu'i gsob la rma bya'i mdongs// dar nag 'phur lce btags te bzung// gtor ma spyan gzigs ldan pas bskang// bod pa rbad pa gsad pa'i sngags// nyung dkar nyung nag rdzas rnams la// bdun 'bum grangs ni tshang gyur na// rims nad sna tshogs char bzhin 'bebs// lha mo'i srog snying yang tig 'di// snying nas 'dren pa'i mchog yin na// ma ma trag rak+sha snying kha rag tsit+ta srog la dung dung dza dza hUM/ ma mo rbad pa'i rgyu tig 'di/ snying nas 'dren pa'i mchog yin no// ma rag mo thum sril snying rtsa (23)

'dus/ srog srog srog shaM shaM khyer b+h+yo// snying kha rag srog rtsa breng breng rbad rbad/ oM badzrA la badz+wA la hUM phaT/ ma srog tug tug khram la snying rbad/ ma srog thun/ snying la ma ma b+h+yo// sa ma ya rbad/ kha thun ni dza dza/ ma mo'i gsang thig nag mo 'dis// rims nad khrag skyug nad kyis gsod// ma ma rang gi snying khrag gi thuM thuM rbad/ tsa thang tsa thang che ge mo tsit+ta ma rbad rbad/ thums thums sub sub ti tha rbad rbad/ kha 'dar yed yed thums thums rbad rbad se le mu kha le rbad rbad swA hA/ bdag nyid gshin rje gshed bsgom ste// gshed po'i thugs las ma 'phros pas// yi ge ma yis stong gsum bkang// phar 'phros bde gshegs rnams kyi thugs dam bskul// slar 'dus sems dpa'i ngang du mthun par byas// mar 'phros dkyil 'khor lha la lhan gyis dbab// yig 'bru gsum gyis byin brlab dbang bskur nas// ma las lha mo nyid kyi sku gyur te// sku mdog nag mo shin tu gtum pa la// shin tu sgeg pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma// ral gri ban d+ha dmar bskyil g.yas rim bzhin// shak+ti tri shul mgul nas dar dpyangs g.yon// ral pa gcig tu bsgrengs pa lan bu g.yon du 'khyil// sgra sked sprul la thod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan// rna ltag me tog cod pan dar nag 'phyar// snyan g.yas sbrul gyi gdengs ka yod// mgul nas sil snyan 'khrol bas snyan g.yon pa// seng ge mgul nas 'phyo ba thod rlon do shal byas// bong bu gwa pa la zhon gzhan yang che ba'i rgyan// gdug pa'i rgyan rnams stong gis brgyan par bsgom// ting 'dzin sems dpa' hUM las 'od zer ni// lcags kyu 'bar ba'i 'od zer rab 'phros te// bdag nyid chen mo'i sraug gnas rab bskul la// srid pa ma mos stong gsum khengs par bya// gshin rje'i tshogs kyis kyang ni de bzhin no// srog la rngams pa kun gyis bskor bar bsam// de lta bu yi yang nas yang du ste// ji srid thib thib ma yid la cho 'phrul 'byung// de ltar rab tu yid kyis bsgom par bya// yengs par gyur na gcig kyang mi 'grub ste// gtso bo la sogs srid pa'i ma mo yis// gang la bya ba'i snying nas rab bzung ste// sgra sgrogs mig rtsa rig rig 'o dod tse re re/ gan bub rdul thigs kha nas khrag tu skyug/ ci mdzad 'o dod zer cing dbugs dang 'bral la khad// thun gyi snod nang du ni 'jug par dmigs// de ltar bsgoms la gshed pos dbang du sdud// mnyes pa'i tshul gyis stod pa 'di skad dbul// dpal ldan nag mo mi pham srid gsum mgon// bdag don bsgrub phyir rnam thar gsum gzhol yang// snying rje'i dbang gis rjes la thob pa yi// shes rab sna tshogs thabs kyis 'gro don mdzad// lha mo sku mdog nag mo char sprin mdog/ mchog mo

nag mo shin tu gtum pa'i sku// shin tu skem pa'i keng rus mche ba ma// zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis rab tu brjid// ral pa gcig kyang lan bu g.yon du 'khyil// skra sked sbrul la thod pa'i phreng ba can// rna ltag me tog dar nag cod pan can// khrag gi chang gis ra ro spyan gsum dmar// mi ro rengs pa khar bcug mche ba bzhi// rnam par gtsegs nas khrag la shin tu dgyes// snyan g.yas sbrul gyi mgul nas dril gsil cing// gdug pa btul nas tshangs pa'i sgra sgrogs ma// snyan cha g.yon pa seng ge ral pa can// dpa' bo khams gsum seng ge'i sgra sgrogs nas// phyag bzhi g.yas kyi dang po ral gri bsnams// 'og ma thod pa ban+d+ha dmar bskyil 'dzin// phyag g.yon dang po mtshon cha shaka ti bsnams// 'og ma tri shul g.yon nas dar dpyangs bsnams// shag ti ral gri mtshon cha phyar ba yis// lha ma yin gyi thod pas do shal byas// glang po che yi ko rlon stod g.yogs mdzes// smad nas ban glang ko bas dkris pa la/ phyed ni ri lde ser po'i sham bu can// klu yi dbang po bzhi yi sked chings can// zhabs gnyis lcags sgrog dag gi mdzes par brgyan// khrag zhag thig le mang pos mtshon char bris// bong bu dre'u zhon mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu// skad ni dung dang 'brug gi sgra sgrogs shing// ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za dam la sdud// lho phyogs gshin rje'i pho brang dag tu gnas// dam pa'i sa nas gzugs sku ldan nyid ma// ting 'dzin dbang thob gzugs khams gnas su byon tsam na// tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs phyag byas ma// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas su byon pa'i tshe// dbang phyug chen po sku la nyer 'khril ma// sum cu rtsa gsum tshal bzhir byon pa'i tshe// lha rnams dbugs phyung rgyal bzhin phyag byas ma// lha ma yin rnams phung bar byas pa'i tshe// lha min rgyal po kun gyi phyag byas ma// sku mdog ri rab che las sgrol ba'i tshe// lte ba'i thad ka'i phyogs nas nyi ma zla ba 'char// brgya byin phyogs skyong lha yi phyag byas ma// rgya mtsho gting nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems nus ma// sa 'og dbang po kun gyis phyag byas ma// lha mo khyod kyi cho 'phrul 'di bstan pas// bdud dang gshin rje'i rgyal po 'dar zhing 'dud// ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za rngam zhing dgod// tsit+ta rin chen gur phub gzhal yas nas// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ga'ur 'bar// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dug gi bcud bsdus nas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim mdzad ma// dug gi rlangs pa nag po'i phyogs rnams kyis// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad ni khong nas slong// de phyir nad kyi bdag mo dam la 'du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bdud rtsi'i bcud bsdus nas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag

la thim mdzad ma// bdud rtsi'i rlangs pas dkar po'i phyogs rnams kyis// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams rtsad nas gcod// bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal po dam la 'du// gang zhig khyed la dad na ma bas byams// de phyir nad kyi bdag mo sman gyi gtso// lha mo khyod la bdag nyid rtag tu bstod// rgyal ba shAkya thub pa'i spyan snga ru// dus 'dir bdag gis 'khor ba ji srid du// dkar po'i phyogs ni nad dang sdug bsngal tshogs// zhi bar bya zhing tshe dang longs spyod spel// nag po'i phyogs nas tshe dang longs spyod dbang du sdud// smyo 'bog lkugs pa'i las 'di ma thogs myur du gyis// bstan pa bsrung phyir myur du 'grub par gyis// 'di las 'das na sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i sku bslus pas// dus gsum rgyal bas mgo dang snying 'gems shog/ de skad rgyal ba'i spyan lngar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i// dam bcas bzhin du myur du phrin las gyis// rnal 'byor bdag gi 'khor rnams la// khyod kyi zhal nas bdud rtsi'i char phob la// nad tshogs sdug bsngal tshogs ni zhi bar mdzod// zang zing lo tog 'bru yi phung po dang// rin chen rkang 'gros phyugs rnams spel bar mdzod// bla ma smod cing dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod// bdag la dge ba'i bar chad byed pa'i dgra/ khyod kyi khong nas dug gi rlangs phyung la// 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad ni 'du ru chug/ bag bzhi sa la lhung nas rdebs su chug/ don snying sna lnga khong nas khrag skyug chug/ las ngan 'khor tshogs cho nges gdungs su chub// mkha' lding rgyal po'i tshogs kyi ltas ngan phob// dam bca' bzhin du bcol ba'i phyir las myur du mdzod// ces pas bstod cing phrin las bcol gyur na// gong 'dod rims nad phyogs su 'bebs// ma srog bsdus te gsad par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ yams kyi bdag mo ma mo'i zla gsang bstan pa'i le'u ste re drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'gal ba cham la dbab pa'i phyir// nad ngan sna tshogs dbab pa'i thabs// ma mo'i gsang sgrub zla gsang thig le 'di// thabs kyi sbyor ba mang mod kyang// bsdu na rnam pa bzhi ru 'dus// bla med sgrub mthu rang 'byung ste// 'jig rten bsgrub pa don gyi mthu// rten 'brel sgrub pa'i sbyor ba ni// rdzas gyi nus pa dag las byung// gdon dang rdzas su bcas pa la// rnam grangs ma rnyed khyad par snang// rnam pa gnyis ni gsal byas te// rdzas dang gdon du bcas pa bstan// myur du gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// gang la'ang 'di las yod ma yin// ma mo nag smug dkar mo dang// dmar mo'i tshogs kyi las dag las// rims nad btang ba mang

mod kyang// kun gyi phyag brnyan re ma ti// 'di dag bsgrub ste nad dbab na// rims nad sna tshogs stong gsum 'gengs// de yis las ni 'di ltar bya// rgyu gzer gyis ni shi ba'i khrag/ btsan dug thar nu bsres nas kyang// bse zho dag dang mar du sbyar// sngags 'di btab ste ltor yang gtang// ri ri shi shi ti ti kri ma ru so/ srog thun mug sod ma rag du rbad du/ ya sod/ kha ru sh+sha ma sod/ thang srog thun ni rbad sod/ ni ya ni ma dza du sod/ sha rgyud snying phyung sod/ snying rgyud srog gcod/ srog thun dbugs long ma ma thun thun sod sod// ces 'bum bzlas te de ltor btang na rgyu gzer khrag tu bshal te 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang bse zho dang btsan dug la sngags 'di bzlas te/ ru ru ti rbad ya/ ba ya du du rbad ya/ chums chums ni ma tsa rbad ya/ shag pa du du ya rbad chem chem rbad ya/ rbad pu rbad pu ru shan rbad ya/ ru ru tra tri ru ma ma ti rbad ya/ zhes 'bum bzlas te/ lus la reg pa'i gos la bskus na/ lhog pa skrangs pos 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang bse zho dang btsan dug la byang pa tsha tshob dang mdze khrag dang mdze can gyi shu ba kun sbyar la/ mar dang dri mar bsres te/ da dung ma sha sha khug du sha ma ma sha baM grol/ du tri ma ma snying phyung/ sa ma ya ma ma srog gcod/ dung shag ru ya ma ma tu ma ti ru ya/ sha sha ma ma rbad du ya ya/ nr-i nr-i b+h+yo b+h+yo sod sod/ ma ru ma ya ra ya/ tshal pa rbad/ yed yed/ sha thun sha thun rbad tsa tu ma tur rbad/ sha thun ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ sha sha tsa thun ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ zhes khri'am 'bum bzlas te/ sha la reg pa'i gos la bskus na/ mdze dang phol 'bras kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro// mdze khrag du chang dang sbyar nas ltor btang na/ snying la bab ste rus mdze dang/ mdze nad 'khor bas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang dug rdzas dang rims khrag sna tshogs sbyar nas// gong gi sngags rnams drag tu bzlas te/ yul mkhar gyi lha rten nam// chu mig klu btsan yod nges pa'am/ brag klu yod sar gtor na/ rims nad sna tshogs na bun bzhin du 'thibs te 'ong ba dang// thog mer 'ong ba dang/ ser ba khrag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rab tu gsal ba'i sbyor ba drag po'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ nad ngan sna tshogs btang ba'i ma mo'i zla gsang gi le'u ste re bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos// 'gal ba cham la dbab pa'i phyir// smyo 'bog gtang ba'i zla gsang 'di// yang dag blo can rnams la bshad// dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yi// bla ma mnyes pa'i rim gro bya// lta ba yangs shing spyod lam goms// slob dpon mnyes pa'i thugs bzung nas// man ngag thugs la phur te

bsgrub// ri gsum rtse dang brag dkar dang// lha khang dur khrod be'u'am// yang na kha phyogs shar bltas su// rtsa ba brag yod rtsi shing skyes// shar du kha bltas zur gsum 'dra// rgyab ri ma chad seng spungs 'dra// de ru+u sa btsal sa chog bya// sa bdag lha klu zhi ba'i phyir// gser skyems gtang la bden pa bdar// bdag ming 'di zhes rnal 'byor pa// phyogs 'dir sgrol ba'i ging chen po// srog bdag dkar po snying 'byin zhes// rnal 'byor rnams kyi dgra bla ste// rig 'dzin srog snying 'di sgrub pas// de bzhin sa bdag klu gnyan rnams// de bzhin gzhan du pho bar bgyis// sa gzhi 'di la bkra shis shog/ ma nyes dpang gzug yus kha gsol// de nas stegs bu brtsigs pa yang// gra phying ras sam dar bting la// nas 'bras 'bru yi gcal yang dgram// ga pur dzA ti pha la dang// rgya spos la sogs dri spos dang// yol dang bla re 'phan gdugs bres// srog bdag dkar po snying 'byin gyi// ras la bris pa'i sku gzugs gcig/ shar nas nub tu gdags par bya// 'bras la sogs pa'i bshos cha la// lha bshos tshul gyi ri rab bya// de yi phyogs bzhi mar khus byug/ dbus su smyug ma tshigs gsum la// bya rgod ldem phod za 'og dang// bse dang bye ru gser dang ni// lpags skud dkar pos brgyan par byas// gzhan yang sha rgod nya rgod dang// thung phrom la sogs spyan gzigs dag/ de yi tha ma bskor te dgram// spos dang me tog mar me dang/ rnga gling pi wang la sogs dang// sku gzugs de yi mtha' mar bzhag/ tsan+dan dkar po'i chu la sogs// dung sogs kha thor bkang ba gnyis// sku gzugs de yi mtha' mar bzhag/ nyung dkar nyung nag skye tshe yang// drag po sngags kyi mtshon du bzhag/ gzhan yang sgo nga sna tshogs dang// khur ba'i rnam grangs mang po dang// sgog pa sman dang dri spos rnams// bris sku de yi mtho phyir dgram// gshin rje'i gshed po'i skur bsgoms la// snying po brgya dang rtsa brgyad brjod// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hUM phaT/ oM kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHwi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bdag la byin brlab lus bsrung bya// de nas dbang du bsdu ba dang/ rgyal po dgug pa'i las kyang bya// spyan drang phyag 'tshal bzhugs su gsol// phyag chab gsol dang gdan skyems drangs// mchod pa 'bul zhing bstod pa bgyi// 'dzab bzlas dam tshig drag tu bsre// rgyal po'i srog snying drag tu brjod// oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka dza ti nr-i dza dza tri tsa pa la ag+shu me swA hA/ zhes ni khri'am 'bum grangs kyi bsnyen pa bya// rdzas kyi mchod cing rtag tu bzlas// grub nas sngags 'dis drag tu rbad// hi li li hu li baM ril nr-i dza/ la li gra ma ni/ ri rtse thal ba

ni/ kro ti ko la sha/ kro ti kro la ya/ a tri gaM shaM tri/ mu tri ri tri tri raM tra/ haM shag haM shag du/ che ge mo'i tsit+ta la dza/ de bzhin rgyal po drag tu rbad// gal te las byed ma btub na// rgyal po'i shi sa 'di yis bstan// ma ra na pra ma ra tsa tsi ha ba ling sa ma ya/ a shu dza dza/ phyag rgya bzhi yis gzugs bcings te// sngags ni brgya dang rtsa brgyad brjod// rgyal po rang la dbang med par// rdul dang khrag tu 'dzag cing 'ong// de bzhin gsang ba'i las thabs kyang// smyo 'bog shi ba'i klad phor du// de nyid rang gi snying khrag dang// dug sna dgu dang dme khrag sbyar// brnag pa'i ming rus bris te gzhug/ dur khrod ro ras rnying pa la// gsad pa'i 'khor lo bca' bar gsungs// dang po nyi ma bzhi yi sngags// phyi rim rgyal po'i drag sngags bri// nad rim klu yi drag sngags bri// thod par dril la rgya gram bcings// nyin bzhi lha yi ging bzhi bskul// skabs su ging chen bco brgyad bskul// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las kyang bya// oM ma hA rA tsa thun b+h+yo b+h+yo// dgra bo'i srog thibs/ ma ma ra thun swa ra dang// dgra bo'i snying shag tshal pa dun// dgra bo'i khrag la son la blag dza ru thibs dgra bo'i khrag la 'jibs// bi b+ha bi b+ha thun dza/ mang sa sha la dza/ snying tsit+ta snying la thun/ rag ta khrag dun b+h+yo// thun b+h+yo thun b+h+yo/ rmugs rmugs nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe la// drag tu bsngags la brdeg par bya// dkar po gcig gi thugs dam bskang// rtags ni 'di bzhin 'ong bar nges// nyi zla char dang lder so dang// 'bag tu rmis na tha mar bshad// btsad po zhang blon dge shes sam// dmag mi rmis na 'bring du bshad// rgyal po nyid mthong nyams su bshad// de ltar byung na rab tu bshad// bskong bshags bya zhing dngos grub blang// dam tshig bsres shing phrin las bcol// de nas 'khor lo thod par bca'// shar du kha bltas chu mig mgor// rgyal rigs sbyar ba byas gyur na// smyo 'bog mdze nad lhog pas 'chi// thun du 'phangs na mdze rim 'ong// mkhar rmang sbas na gnam lcags 'bebs// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rgyal po phyi ltar bsgrub ste/ smyo 'bog btang ba'i le'u ste re brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos/ rgyal po nang du bsgrub ste smyo 'bog gis gsod pa 'di gsungs so// thog mar bla ma mnyes byas te// sgrib pa sbyang zhing dam tshig bsrung// mtshan ldan dgon pa'i gnas dag tu// lta ba rgya skyed 'jam dpal bsnyen// sngon la mnyes pa'i rim gro bya// dkyil 'khor rtsi gdab chag chag gdab// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// dbus kyi le tshe dkar po la// shar ser lho sngo

nub dmar byang ljang// mtshams bzhi smug nag sgo dang bcas// dbus su gru gsum re re bri// de nas tsan+dan dkar po'am// rgya shug dkar po'i phur pa dgu/ srog bdag dgu ru mnga' gsol la// dar dkar srog snying bris te gdags// 'di skad brjod la dgod par bya'o// hUM dbus kyi shal re shel gyi khang pa nas// khams gsum srog la mnga' mdzad pa// srog bdag nag po ral pa can// bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol// bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs nas kyang// pho brang dbus kyi ling tshe la// dgra bgegs bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ging kar sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ de skad brjod la dbus su dgod// rgyal rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa// srog bdag rgyal po khu le shod// dkyil 'khor shar gyi ling tshe la// bzhugs su gsol ba sngar bzhin no// bram ze'i rigs la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po ag ni yang// lho phyogs dkyil 'khor ling tshe la// rje'u rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po ug ge yang// de bzhin nub kyi phyogs la dgod// dmangs rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po drang se yang// de bzhin byang gi phyogs la dgod// bud med srog la mnga' mdzad pa'i// rgyal po chen po shang se yang// dkyil 'khor shar lho'i ling tshe la// byis pa'i srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po da khod kyang// dkyil 'khor lho nub le tshe la// mi nag srog la mnga' mdzad la// rgyal po chen po ni khod kyang// nub byang dkyil 'khor le tsher 'khod// byol song srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po nyi zla yang// byang shar dkyil 'khor le tsher 'khod// de nas mchog gi phur pa bzhi// nyin bzhi ging bzhir mnga' yang gsol// rigs mthun dar gyi cod pan gdags// phrin las bcol phyir sgo bzhir gdab// dar skud bsgril la mtha' mar bskor// bla rgyan 'og rgyan ci mang dgram// dar dkar gur dbub za 'og gdan yang bting// de nas dbus kyi srog bdag la// gsang phye bre gang lha bshos la// ri rab tshul du 'dra byas la// dbus su smyug ma tshigs dgu la// mtshal gyi mkhar thabs nya mig bri// rtse la bya rgod rgyal mtshan dang// dar dkar gdug gcig steng nas dgab// dung gi g.yer ka g.yab rnga phod// lpags bu dkar po'i blud bu gdags// tha ma'i tshig la ming rus gdags// gzhan yang smyug tshigs gsum brgyangs la// mtshal dang ldong ros sgo sprad la// mkhar thabs bris la rtse ka sprad// rtse la dar lce re yang gdags// bar bar dar dkar blad po dang// dung dang zangs dang rin po che// byi ru mgron bu so sor

gdags// tha mar dgra yi ming rus gdags// lcang ma mtho re ba bzhi la// mtshal lam g.yung drung ris su bri// thod re ra lpags ming rus re// de bzhin btags pa rim par bzhag/ gzhan yang phud dang nya sha dang// bu ram 'bras chan gtor ma yang// za 'og dar dang lpags dkar dang// rin chen gsal ba phyogs bzhir bzhag/ gcig ni dbus su gzhag par bya// nya phyis dus phor 'khar phor du// gser dang chang phud sbyar la bzhag/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru bzhag/ gcig tu mtsho dang nyung dkar dang// chu phud gangs chu chu mig chu// de gsum du ni bsres la bzhag/ drag sngags rgyun du bzlas pa'i phyir// bdag nyid shar bltas mdun du bzhag/ gzhan yang spos dang me tog dang// mar me dri chab rnga gling dang// mchod pa'i yo byad phyogs bzhir dgram// ra lug dkar po gang yod pa// rwa dang ze ba dmar por byug/ ske ru dar dkar khug ma ru// mtshe nyung klu sman sna tshogs dang// dgra yi ming byang btsug la gdags// nub tu dar dpyangs dkar po la// 'phan lce ser po btags pa gcig/ rgyal po'i gzugs bris mdung la gdags// rtse la snying gcig bkal la gzug/ gshin rje'i gshed por gsal bsgoms la// sngags bzlas bstod pa mang du bya// ber gyon thod chen rnga yang brdung// snyan gsan dbab dang spyan drang dang// phyag 'tshal bzhugs dang mchod pa 'bul// bstod pa dbul zhing smon lam gdab// thugs dam bskul zhing phrin las bcol// srog snying 'di ni rtag tu drangs// oM hUM hrI du bya khyung kar ma ra ma ra ya swA hA/ de ni srog bdag rang gi snying po'o// 'di ni 'khor gyi srog bdag rgyad kyi snying po'o// oM khu le ma hA ba ram swA hA/ oM a ka ru tA swA hA/ oM mug sham le swA hA/ oM kro ti ba me b+ha swA hA/ oM shaM se shaM ga ra swA hA/ oM da khod bi ba sar swA hA/ oM ni khod ba ra hi de swA hA/ oM sur+ya tsan+d+ra ma hA khu le swA hA/ de rnams snying gi snying po ste// mi tshig g.yal dang sbrid pa dang// sngags kyi bar chad med par bgrang// skya rengs shar nas 'khor rnams bskul// bsgrub pa'i rtags rnams ston par nges// rab 'bring tha ma gsum du'o// rab la sku yang mngon du ston// 'bring la 'od dang sgra ru ston// tha ma rmi ltas lta bur ston// de la dbang bskur dam bsre bya// rbad sngags bgrang zhing phrin las bcol// oM ma hA pra ma na/ rak+sha rak+ta tsa ra mun dra ma hA shrI te tso ka li bing dgra bo mA rA ya hab hab/ de rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams las la rbad pa'i sngags so// de nas rta dkar thod pa ru// brnag pa'i ming rus gzugs bcug la// rta thod za 'og dag gis gril// dam sri smyo ru gzhug pa'i phyir// khrag skam gu gul sbyar ma dang// mtshe nyung go ro tsa na la// smyo

'bog gtong ba'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM ma ma rak+ta thun b+h+yo// ma hA ra tsa thun b+h+yo// mA hA pa wa/ ma hA de wa/ ma hA ru tra b+h+yo b+h+yo// oM kro ta ya kro ta ya/ tra ta ya tra ta ya/ klu la klu la/ ging ka ra ging ka ra/ ging dz+wa la ging dz+wa la/ yag+sha gri ba/ da sha gri ba/ dA shi gri ba/ pu tra dkar po b+h+yo b+h+yo// de ni srog bdag 'khor gyi smyo 'bog btang ba'i sngags so// de nas brnag pa'i ming rus la// rang rang rtsa ba'i sngags brjod cing// phur pa rnams kyis rim pas gdab// gtso ba'i phur pa snying la gdab// rgyal po ag ni lag pa g.yas// rgyal po ug nes dpung par gdab// rgyal po drang ses lag pa g.yon// shang ses rkang pa g.yas la gdab// da khod dpung mgo g.yon la gdab// nyi zlas dpung pa g.yas la gdab// bsad pa nyi ma bzhi pa ste// nyin bzhi lha yi ging bzhis bya// de nas rta yi thod pa ru// ling+ga'i mtheb shul thun rdzas stsal// lha khang gnam la btags gyur na// smyo 'bog khrag nad mA ra ya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rgyal po nang du bsgrub ste smyau 'bog btang ba'i le'u ste re dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos/ rgyal po gsang ba sgrub pa thams cad kyi mchog 'di gsungs so// rnal 'byor yon tan ldan pa des// bla ma mnyes par rab byas te// mgo ni rma bya bzhin du 'gugs// dam tshig chen po srog bzhin bsrung// gzhan don ma yin rang don du// dur khrod sa phug dgon par 'gro// spyi bshags sgrib sbyang bsod nams bsag/ ma nyes dpang gzug klu gtor btang// dkyil 'khor brtsigs la chag chag btab// thig gdab dkyil 'khor cho ga bya// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thod phreng bcas// gru chad sgo bzhir ldan pa la// dur khrod brgyad dang ldan par bya// gru gsum me 'od 'bar ba bri// sgo bzhir gru gsum re re bri// de nas mchog gi phur pa dgu// srog bdag dgu yi sngags bris la// dbus su dkar po'i snying bzhi dgod// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal bar bskyed// shar phyogs rtsibs la khu le shod// lho yi rtsibs la ag ni dgod// nub kyi rtsibs la u ga ste/ byang gi rtsibs la drang se dgod// shang se shar la da khod lho// ni khod nub la ni zla byang// de ltar sgo bzhi dgod par bya'o// 'khar gzhong dung phor bse gab tu// snying sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dgram// lug dkar snying srog ma bral ba// srog rtsa'i nang du ming rus gzhug/ snying rtse gyen du bstan la bzhag/ dar dkar tshil gyis kha bcad la// dbus su srog bdag nyid la bzhag/ shar du khrag sna'i gtor ma bzhag/ lho ru sha sna'i gtor ma bzhag/ nub tu rus pa'i gtor ma

bzhag/ byang du mkhal sna'i gtor ma bzhag/ de nas sgo bzhi gtor ma yang// shar sgor mchin pa sna tshogs bzhag/ lho sgor sha chen 'bru sna tshogs// nub sgor mtshor pa sna tshogs bzhag/ byang du tshil bu rkang sna tshogs// gtor ma de dag nang du yang// bshos bu ma khyid gang par btsugs la bzhag/ de la smyug rgod re re la/ phod dkar lpags bu dkar po dang// ming byang btags pa re yang gzug/ phyogs bcur mngon par gzhag par bya// mi 'jigs pa yi steng du yang// shar du lug dkar lho ru bya// nub tu ra dkar byang du khyi// bag zan gzugs byas dkar por bsgyur// sems can dngos su yod na rab// med na gang rung gcig gis bskyed// ming rus bris te gdags par bya// dkyil 'khor lho nub 'brub khung du// dam sri'i gzugs dang ming rus gzhug/ sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma la// tshil chen zhal khebs yod pa la// rak+ta'i gsang nan chas pa gcig/ dkyil 'khor byang shar mtshams su bzhag/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum gsal bsgoms la// gzhal yas rten bcas dkyil 'khor bskyed// bdag nyid gshed por gsal bsgoms la// rgyal po 'khor bcas gsal bar bsgom// spyan drang bzhugs mchod tshul bzhin bya// rtag tu snying po 'di yang brjod// oM bri bar sha ma hA rA tsa swA hA/ oM khu le ma hA be ram swA hA/ oM a ka rut+ta swA hA// oM yug sha ma le swA hA/ oM drang se b+ha ba swA hA/ oM shang se shar kang raM swA hA/ oM ad khod bi bi sar swA hA// oM ni khod pa ri ha ti swA hA/ oM sUr+ya tsan+d+ra ma hA khu le swA hA/ de ni rtsa ba'i drag sngags te// grub rtags sku yang yongs su ston// spre'u byi la seng ge dang// dge bshes btsad po lta bu dang// dmag dpon lta bur ston par nges// rgyal po rtag tu sngags 'dis rbad// ma hA bra na rag+sha rag+sha ta tsa ra ma hA mun tra ma hA shi te tso ka tsa li bing bing dgra bo mA ra ya hab hab/ 'khor bcas las la btang ba'o// lha dang drag po'i sngags 'di dbral// ma hA sa ma ya rag+sha ma ha ha ra tsa thun thun phrol phrol// de nas sgrub pa thon nas kyang// bsad pa'i phur pa gdab pa ni// dbus nas phyung la 'di skad brjod// hUM khro bdag chen po sting 'byin gyis// dbang po'i phur pas dbang bskur nas// dgra snying dkar nag mtshams su gdab// btab nas myur du brlag gyur cig/ kI li ki la ya tsit+ta mug/ dkar po snying 'byin tsit+ta lhan lhan// hUM rgyal po chen po khu le shod// gsod pa'i phur par byin brlabs te// khrag 'byin g.yas dang g.yon du+u gdab// btab pas khrag skams myur du sod// badzra mug te tsa sha rog ti gtubs po ru gtubs lhan/ hUM khro bdag srog bdag ag ne yang// 'gugs pa'i bdag por mnga' yang gsol// nu ma

g.yas dang g.yon du gdab// btab pas mkhris pa k+Sha yas sod// tsi li tsi li mAngs la thibs thibs// hUM khro bdag sgrol ging ug ge yang// rnon po dpal du byin brlabs nas// spyi bo'i gtsug tu btab nas kyang// klad gzer mgo nad dar 'bus sod// ma sha mu ta tshal pa tshal pa ka ru hUM hUM// hUM khro bdag bshan pa drang se yang// 'bebs pa'i dbang du byin bskyed nas// mkhal khung gnyis su gdab par bya// btab pas chu 'gags bskyed nas gsod// bi ma la bi ku yam mthibs nas shad shad phaT dza/ hUM khro bdag gshin rje shang se yang// zur gsum rtse mor byin phab ste// mchin pa bdud rtsi rtsa la gdab// btab pas mchin nad khrag gis gsod// mAM sal khums ra tsa bu be ra dgra bo phaT dza/ hUM khro bdag gsod kha da khod kyis// thogs med ston pas dbang bskur nas// shan shan rman bu'i dkyil du gdab/ btab pas sbos nad grum bus gsod// kha la ru rtse kha ma la shon bu ga shag bu phaT dza/ hUM dgra lha'i rgyal po ni khod kyang// rtse gsum ngar can rab byin bskyed// mcher pa'i dbus su btab pas kyang// mtsher nad lkugs dang smyo 'bog thong// me kha kha ru tsa bag sha ru Ta rak+mo mu ru mu ru phaT dza/ hUM gsang ba srog gi nyi zla yang// phur pa'i lha ru dbang bskur nas// rkang pa'i mthil du gdab par bya// zha brum sgur nas 'theng gru mthong// bu be ga re rak+ta mang sa khrag rngubs rbubs/ phur pas btab nas thun sngags brab// oM ma ma rag kha thun b+h+yo/ ma hA tsa ra thun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma hA ba ma ma hA de wa ma hA ru ka b+h+yo b+h+yo/ thun gyis brgyab ste brlag par bya// ling+ga gtubs la gtor mar bstsal// ri gsum rtse la yas stags bskyal// rgyal po srung ba'i sngags ni// oM kha du kha sha pra la ma ma ru tra kha khra kha khra swA hA/ srog 'khor dang bcas pas nor bsgrub pa'i sngags// oM dzam+ba le le she pa la go mes sruM sruM truM truM swA hA/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas byes yul gar 'gro yang// dgra bgegs mi 'byung ba'i sngags la/ oM nas ne nas ne haM shig ra ga ra ma ra ma ra/ ru lu ru lu phaT phaT b+h+yo b+h+yo// rgyal pos bdag gam gzhan la 'tshe bar gyur na// de bzlog pa'i sngags la/ sum ba ra ha da tsa ra ba shi zhil zhil shIn+taM swA hA/ ma hA rA tsa shIn+taM swA hA/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas rigs rgyud 'phrog pa dang/ rabs bcad pa'i sngags la/ oM ma hA kA la gra sa de mo bdud rngam rngam \u0f84swA hA/ rgyal pos ye 'drog sum brgya drug cu dang/ thob shor btang ba'i sngags la/ oM ya ma raM yaM be ra srog rtsa la khas khas/ ma ru ma ru swA hA/ rgyal pos ser ba dbab pa'i sngags la/ oM dra ra ba shang thor b+h+yo/ hUM ra tsa la b+h+yo/ kha shar tra be shar shar nal chem chem b+h+yo/ rgyal pos ltas ngan dbab pa'i sngags la/

oM hUM shar ging raM shag rgyug rgyug raM rgyug srog la rgyug sha sha dgra bo'i snying la 'brul tel raM khyer sod srog/ rgyal pos ya cha rgyab bsnol btang ba'i sngags la/ oM ma prag sha ga kha mi khar la ma tsam sha dgra bo phrol phrol/ shig shig b+h+yo// zhes sngags kyi don bstan las rnams 'grub/ gang ltar byas kyang thogs pa med/ ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rgyal po gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa ste/ smyo 'bog gtang ba'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos/ 'gal ba cham la dbab slad du// gnod sbyin gdug pa'i zla gsang gsungs// dad pa gsum ldan rnal 'byor pas// dam tshig rang gi srog bzhin bsrung// bla ma mnyes pa'i rim gro bya// dur khrod nags tshal dgon par 'gro// phyi bshags 'bum la sogs pa gdon// bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag bsag/ ma nyes dpang gzug klu gtor gtang// gnod sbyin 'di nyid bsgrub par bya// lcang lo can gyi pho brang du// las sgrub las kyi zhing khams na// gnod sbyin bye ba sa ya gnas// de dag nang na dregs pa'i sku// mthu stobs ldan pa'i gang bzang bsgrub// dkyil 'khor dbus su khri brtsigs la// steng du gnod sbyin sku gzugs bzhag/ tsan+da na rigs la 'bur du brko// mchu zheng bag la gel gel po/ sku mdog sngon po gzi ldan pa// dbu skra stsang lo rin chen brgyan// ut+pal sngon po'i phreng ba 'dzin// g.yas na shing thog dmar po bsnams// g.yon na mi lpags rgyal mtshan bsnams// gzas pa'i gzugs bcas snying gar gzhug/ de yi dbus su dong gru gsum// rtse mo byang du bltas pa la// nang du khrag dang sol bas byug/ til gyi phye mar dgra bo'i gzugs// mi khrag bla dgas bris la bzhag/ zhabs mas gril la tshon skud bcings// gru gsum brus pa'i nang du gzhug/ tha mar rtsang gi bskor te bzhag/ gzugs kyi ske nas sngo dmar gdags// sna gcig sku yi zhabs la gdags// sngags pas sngon du dam rdzas dgram// la phug rus phye skye tshe la/ de bzhin gtor ma byas te bzhag/ nyung dkar lan tshwa dug cu skyar// gzugs la brab cing las sngags bzlas// ma nyes dpang gzug 'o dod 'bod// de bzhin rim pas las rnams bya// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bri// dug khrag sbyar mas bri bar bya// rim pa bzhin du drag sngags dgod// spyan drang bzhugs gsol mchod gtor bya// phrin las bcol zhing gnad rnams bskul// lha dang dbral zhing rdzas kyis bdug/ drag sngags bzlas shing 'khor lor gzhug/ bsad pa las kyi sbyor la 'jug/ mnan sreg 'phangs pa gsum la gtad// ces gsungs

so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ srog gcod spu gri gnod sbyin gyi zla gsang/ gang ba bzang po phyi ltar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste don gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos/ gang ba bzang po nang du bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// zla gam gsum gyis bskor ba bris/ dmar smug me ri'i ra bas bskor// dbus su gshed po yab yum ste// mdun du gang ba bzang po dgod// mtshan ldan thod pa dum gsum du// la phug rus pa'i phye ma la// snying sna khrag sna sbyar la bzhag/ dbus kyi gru gsum thur du brko/ nang du rabs chad thod pa la// nyung nag mtshe dang lan tshwa dang// dug dang dme khrag sbyar bas dgang/ dmigs pa'i ming rus ji bzhin dbyibs// bcas la thod pa'i nang du bstsal// dur khrod grong khyer bcom nas kyang/ mtshan ma'i ras blangs brgyang btul bya// ldong ros chu rtsa ser pos byug/ dug khrag sbyar bas 'khor lo bri// de bzhin yi ge bkod byas la// phud kyi thod pa kha yang bcad// de nas rim pas las rnams bya// hUM gsang ba dam pa thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// sgrub pa'i gnod sbyin chen po spyan 'dren na// bye ba sa ya'i gtso 'khor dang bcas te// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol// e h+ye hi rak+sha brna bar si sa ma ya swA hA/ gser ltar ser bar bstan pa'i mi ngos nas// rma bya rang gnas gser du gnas pa ltar// bdag gis khyod bsgrub khyod kyi rang bzhin sgrub// grub pa'i dbang po de la phyag 'tshal lo// brtan par bzhugs shig gnod sbyin mchog/ rin chen gcal bkram sa gzhi la// baiDUr+ya man shel dag dang// khri chen yangs la brtan par bzhugs// sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan s+t+waM/ gser dang bcas pa'i skyems phud ma nyams pa// dung chen snod du sbyar nas mchod par 'bul// dar gyi lhab lhub glu gar rol mor bcas// bsam pa dag pas sbyar nas mchod par 'bul// dril bu sgra snyan yid 'ong spos dang dri// mar me bshos dang gtor ma khrag/ mos pas 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// oM ra ra pe ba 'u pU tsa ka ma su tsa to swA hA/ de nas sngags 'di rab tu bzlas pas/ oM rbu ni ra badzra ma ga la bag sha dz+wa/ ra ra ma ru ru dza/ snying la shad shad du dza/ srog la breng du thun dza/ gnod sbyin sku dang 'od dang sgra// sa g.yos thog dang char chen 'ong// gong gi rdzas kyis drag tu brdeg/ thugs dam bskul te phrin las bcol// dus drug sngags 'dis gzugs la brdeg/ oM dza la ma ma hA dza la/ rag+sha bag+sha si du bdud de ba laM bag swA hA/ 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste// thams cad sgrub sngags zhes kyang bshad// 'khor lo bcas kyi dam rdzas de// byang bltas chu

mig sngor sbas na// khrag smyug 'chi bar the tshom med// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ srog gcod spu gri gnod sbyin gyi zla gsang/ gang ba bzang po nang du sgrub pa'i le'u ste don gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos/ gang ba bzang po gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dam tshig gsang sgo thub pa'i bus// bla ma mnyes phyir yid 'thab dbul/ mi don ma yin rang don du// bsgrub pa gong bzhin tshul bsham ste// de nas man ngag 'di bzhin bya// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ lo mig kar sha ba ni la// sngags ni 'di dag rab tu bzlas// oM dza laM ma hA dza laM/ yag sha bag sha/ si su lhud ma li bag sha swA hA/ 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste// sngon du bsnyen pa sum 'bum bya// lus bsrung sbyor ba 'di bzhin bya// dpung pa g.yas la btags gyur na// nad rnams thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas bsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// kar ni ka dang par pu dang// 'u su rdo dreg shar ri raM// ngang pa'i sgro la bskus nas kyang// gzugs dang dus drug mchod byas te// phyag byas bzlas pa byas gyur na// longs spyod dpag med thob par 'gyur// khrag de nyung rgod rta mchin la// lung thang dag la bzlas byin na// rta bong la sogs rmi zlum rnams// 'chi'am yang na smyo bar 'gyur// tsit+ta rus pa gyo mo gsum// sngags 'di bzlas nas byin gyur na// oM badzra hUM ti ta dza/ ra ta ma ru dza/ snying la shad shad/ du dza srog la breng breng thun dza/ glang chen ba glang 'chi bar 'gyur// bse dang kang ka ka ru la/ sngags de bzlas nas byin gyur na// lug la byin na 'chi bar 'gyur// ba ling ka dang a mar dang// bu ram sbyar te ri lu byas// zla ba gzas zin dus su bya// ling+ga bcas te bskul nas kyang// lhog pa dkar nag 'chi bar nges// yang na skrangs nas 'chi bar nges// yang na zha grum 'gro mi nus// dang po khas blangs bzhin du bya// phag dang spyang ki'i mche ba dang/ wa yi ril ma spyang dug la// nyi ma phyed dam nam phyed na// sum 'bum bzlas te don po yi// mkhar la brgyab na 'jig cing 'gas// de nas thog chen 'bebs 'dod na// gser dngul zangs dang 'khar ba dang// srin rdo dung chen sha ri ra// de rnams thod pa dum gsum du// yugs sa'i khrag la sbyar la bstsal// gong gi sngags bzlas lha rten sba// gdon mi za bar thog 'bebs 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ srog gcod spu gri gnod sbyin gyi zla gsang gang ba bzang po gsang bar sgrub pa'i le'u ste don gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed pos/ 'di

'jug tu mi nub par bstan pa rgyas pa dang bsrung ba'i phyir/ gtad pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po 'di/ dus phyi ma la rnal 'byor pa gang zhig sgrub pa'i las byed na/ nga yang dam tshig las mi 'da' la/ 'khor khro bo dang/ khro mo dang/ ging dang bdud dang/ ma mo la sogs pas kyang/ nga'i dam tshig rjes su bsgrub par 'tshal bas/ dus tha ma gsang sngags kyi chos 'di/ rnal 'byor pa'i sku la bsdau ba rnams bsgral ba la/ dam tshig dbang gis grogs bya bar// zhal gyis bzhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos/ gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang/ phyogs skyong gshin rje yab yum dang bdud btsan dang/ ging dang/ lha dang/ sman dang/ gza' dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ ma mo la sogs pa 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal zla gsang nag po 'di/ bstan pa thams cad srung ba'i me long yin par rig gnas/ shin tu rngams shing ngo mtshar skyes nas bstod pa/ e ma ho// nyes bcom legs ldan mtshan zhi'i mtha' las 'das// bdud dang gshin rje la sogs kun gyi gshed// rU tra gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun 'dul ba/ thugs rjes sgrol mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// shes rab chen po nam mkha'i nyi mar gsal// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dbyings su 'char// dpa' brtul myur ba'i shugs kyis dregs pa sgrol// bdud 'dul dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rin chen gter ltar 'dod pa kun skong zhing// bde gshegs lung dang gtan tshigs kun gyi mdzod// 'jigs byed rgyal po zla gsang nag po'i rgyud// dregs pa tshar gcod rgyud la bdag cag 'dud/ zhes bstod nas chos thams cad dgongs pa'i chos nyid du gyur to// drag po'i rgyud 'di sba ba'i thabs su gsungs pa ni// shog dril dar zab men gyis dril// de nas gtsang ma'i ras dag gis// rab tu bsam zhing gril bar bya// de nas lcags bsam shing dag gi// sgrom bu'i nang du de bcug la// gtsang rdo mnyen 'jam pha wang la// gus tras de phru sgrom bu de nang bzhugs// rgya mtsho'i gting du sba bar bya// yang na sgrom bu de nyid la// rgyus pa'i 'dzog gis rab bsdams te// brag dmar brag phug dgon par sba/ las 'phro can dang 'phrad par nges// zhes gsungs so// phan gdon thabs kyi lung gi spyi// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs/ zhe sdang gi bcud phyung ba/ bstan pa bsrung ba'i man ngag thams cad kyi rtsa ba'o// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'khor gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i don la bstod pa dang/ man ngag sbas pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste don bzhi pa'o//// (24)

dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po/ ngan sngags thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis/ tshangs pa klu gnod kyi bse'i ka ba la sbas pa/ dz+nya na gar b+has rnyed/ nam mkha'i snying po la sin d+hu'i nags tshal du bgyid do// kun gyi thun mong ma yin pas/ srog chag bam gyis kha bzhin bsdom mo// 'di yi gnas ni brag dang chu la bzhag go/// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ya mAn+ta ka/ gu h+ya/ man tra/ tan tra/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed kyi gsang rgyud/ chos dbyings rnam dag skye med las// skye ba'i tshul bstan sprul pa'i sku// bcom ldan che ba lha yi dpal// 'jigs byed chen po bsam mi khyab// thams cad skur snang ma lus pa// sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// las rgyud phrin las sngags su bstan// cho 'phrul skur bstan bsam las 'das// 'dul stangs bsam las 'das pa'i phyir// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad ste// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig dang// brgya rtsa gcig dang bye ba'i las// drug dang gcig tu bstan pa la// tha dad nges pa med par bstan// lha srin sde brgyad gdul bya'i phyir// brgyad du bstan pa nges pa dang// 'gro drug don du drug bstan dang// sku gsung thugs dang ldan phyir gsum// nges pa de bzhin gzhag pa'o// bgegs rigs mi srun kun la las 'chol ba// gang yang 'dra na khyad par shis pa ni// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i bsam pa bya// kun bzang rnam dag mkha' klong nas// dus gsum bde gshegs zhi khro sprul// kun gyis dbang bsgyur gshin rje'i gshed// dbu dang phyag zhabs gang 'thad pas// mos pa bya ba bshin tu gces// gshin rje'i rnal 'byor brtson pa yis// gang la las la the tshom med// de la 'di ru smros pa la// la la gzhung de yod pa dang// gang yang 'dra bar bya'o// 'dir smros rtsa ba'i sngags rdzas gnyis de la the tshom mi bya'o// dam pa'i le'u ste gcig pa'o//// oM ya mAn ta ka hUM/ kA la rU pa hUM/ oM hriHSh+t+r-IHbi kr-i ta na hUM// oM many+dzu shrI hUM/ ya ma rA dza hUM/ yi ge drug lnga sum cu pa rtsa ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// de la yang dag bskyed pa'o// de yi don rtogs shes pa'o// oM oM/ oM hUM/ b+han dza b+h+yo hUM/ hUM hUM phaT/ ru ba na hUM phaT/ tah+ya tah+ya nah+ya nah+ya hUM phaT/ ya ma na h+ya hUM phaT/ su to h+ya hUM phaT/ su to h+ya hUM phaT/ lnga lngar bstan pa yang// yang na ba ste yan lag gi/ dang po dang ni de mtha' la// las su bsngags pa de kho na'o// oM a mAn ha ka dzA dzA/ kA la rU pa dzA dzA/ oM hriHSh+t+r-I?Hkr-i dzA dzA/ oM man dzu shrI dzA dzA/ oM ya ma rA dza dzA dzA/ de dag rtsa ba bgrang ba'i nges pa'o// de las lan cig ste ka ha nga sa pa'i rtsa ba bstan pa la/

dmigs pa de kho na de lan cig g+hu ya dz+nyA na hUM/ bi du ya ma dzA ya nan/ oM ma kha le kha thun mug nan/ oM ya ma kha thun rA dza/ oM shrI a kro bya tsir dza hUM/ hUM hu he ro te kA ya bA ka/ tsit+ta dzaHhUM baM hoH// yan lag lnga'i sgo nas de bzhin du/ dmigs pa bcas nas byas pa de lta'o// rnam pa kun tu de bzhin bsam pa kho na'o// mnan nam gzir ba'i mgo bstan tshogs/ le'u ste gnyis pa zhes bya'o//// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn ta ka sa ma ya s+t+waM dzaHhUM baM hoH/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrU+i/ mu dra ya mAn ta ka pan tsi te do ni hUM dza/ ya man k+Sha ya dzA dzA/ gu ya u traM dzA dzA/ las de gong 'og thams cad kyang// rig pa bde ba 'ba' zhig gis// de bzhin bcol ba'i rnam pa des// bka' las de ltar snang bar khos// ya ma rA dza ni dzA dzA/ zhes pa de yis thams cad du// brlag mdzad ma lus de bzhin bcol// bde bar der ni nges par rigs ma ru// yu ma he ma b+h+yo hUM phaT swA hA/ de ni nges pa'i ma de yang// 'byung ba ji bzhin ltas pa des// khams gsum pa tsam rlag par byed// de kho ma nor ngo shes pa'o// oM a kro te ka ya mAn ta ka kA la rU pa ya mAn ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hUM phaT/ bskyed pa dag dang las sngags sbyar// de ni ma nor dam pa yin// sngags su ldan pa de ka yin// oM aHhUM be tA li rak+Sha yak+Sha u tsus ma kro d+ha ya be tA li hUM phaT/ 'jam dbyangs khro bo gsang ba'i snying po dang ni dbyings yum gyi/ ma nor de yi na bar bsngags/ de yang skabs kyi rim par shes bya'o// oM many+dzu shrI ya ma rA dza ma mo e ka Ti dzA dzA/ trag rag+sha snying kha rak+sha snying rag mo b+h+yo/ rag mo kha li baM dzA b+h+yo/ kha 'graM ma yu za 'graM// ma b+h+yo/ rU dra rbad/ trag rak+sha rbad/ ma ma snying rbad/ kha mun rbad/ tsit+ta rbad/ ma rA ya rbad/ bal phyur bal phyur/ ma ma thuM ma ma thuM/ rbad du rbad du// ru thums ma ya/ du yaM tsi yaM ru thuM ru thuM ya na rbad/ sngags dang snying po grangs mang yang// gzer sngags pa dag i sa yin// de na man ngag zin par bya// de ni yang dag dam pa kha// le'u ste gsum pa zhes bya'o//// de b+h+yi thums ti ta ha ha dam dam sa ma ya gu gu thum ya ma baM ri li li rbad rbad sod sod/ oM many+dzu shrI ya mAn+ta ka/ u tsus ma kro d+ha be twa li ma ma kro tA shwa rI raka sha yak+Sha dza dza/ snying kha rag mo b+h+yo/ rag mo snying tsa mo b+h+yo/ khrag la mu sha mo b+h+yo/ nag mo ting tang kha la rag mo b+h+yo/ dum bum rA ya dum bu/ tsit+ta mA ra ya dum bu khrag du kha kha thums thums/ ma du ma tsi ru ru yan rbad rbad/ ces te khrag la bzlas pa de nyid do// zlos pa ye shes thun du byas// rdzas de rgyud de kun nas gsal// rmongs par mi bya khong nag pa'o// oM sa ma ya/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mu dra ya mAn+ta ka pan+tsa te ro ni hUM dza/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI ya mAn+ta ka

ta ka ya ma rA dza/ ma ma e ka dzA Ti dzA dza/ trag rak+sha mu tra snying kha rag ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rag mo te ku ma dzA dza/ kha la mi ti b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya ya lo ga tsin dan ma la b+h+yo dza/ snying kha rag srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ de la 'di yi gzhung dag kyang// kun kyang gces pa yin mod kyang// khyad par lhag pa 'ga' las med// de yang dbye bsal bya ba dka'// le'u ste bzhi pa zhes bya'o// oM ya ma rA dza sa to me b+h+yo ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ baM ri li li rbad nan// oM du ba nur du ba nur tshal pa tshal pa nan/ oM trag shag snying gong shag me kha la mu la tsa thun nan// oM swa ti ru ru ra tsa kro kra tsa ra tsa ra nan/ mA ra ya nan/ de dgos pa lhag pa'i sngags// lnga'am bzhi ru bzlas pa ni// mthun pa'i grogs su 'gro ba yin// de yang 'dir te drag po'i sngags// oM a kro te ka many+dzu shrI ka la rU pa k+sha yan na/ baM rbad ru lu hUM dza/ lu tshal pa yi ni to// sha ru ni nan/ mA ra ya nan/ oM ya mAn+ta ke k+ShaM/ Ar+ya a tsa la k+ShaM/ oM ma dug tsa tsa tshal pa tshal pa rbad rbad ma du ba k+shaM/ ya ma ya man k+shaM/ srog rtsa la mug te rbad/ rtsa rtsa ra dza rbad/ ma e khrag la dun dun snying gtub/ srin po'i rus pa la chom chom tshal/ gshin rje'i khrag la lhan lhan thob/ khraM lakhraM ri li'i nr-i dza rbad/ oM khrag thun mug/ oM mug ya mu ti subs/ cho cho yaM/ bal hubs bal hubs/ bal yu snying gong rtsa thu nan/ bal thun nan/ khrag thun khong khrag la ya ya/ khrag thig la phob/ snying thig la phob/ rtsa thig la phob/ srog thig la phob/ oM rag mo shan pa mA ra ya ni dza/ mgo 'phyang ma dzA dza/ dun rmugs/ bla rtsa la dzA dza/ rtsa po me la dun rmugs/ nang khrol smad lnga la rtsa baM/ thun baM thum ri li li rbad rbad/ mthun pa'i rdzas ni bsog pa gces// ma nor sngags bzlas shin tu gces// dgos pa'i mthun 'phrod tshogs pa ni// 'bras bu chud ma gsan par gyis// a la zhes brjod ya byar gyis// dmigs pa'i dgongs pa sangs par gyis// le'u ste lnga pa zhes bya'o//// tha ma'i gsang sngags zhes bya ba// ya dang ma dang ra dang dza// sa dang ta dang ma dang ya// ya dang me dang to dang ru// na dang yo dang da dang ya// ya dang da dang yo dang ni// ra dang ya dang k+Sha dang ya// ya dang k+She dang ya dang dza// ni dang ra dang ma dang ya// rtsa ba'i yi ge 'di rnams kyang// 'jam dbyangs dpal gyi thugs yin zer// da lta ma yin las byed pa'i// gshin rje'i ngo bo yo rtogs yin// de yi rtsa bar lta bar bya// yang na lha srin sde brgyad kyi// rtsa ba bsdus pa na par bzhag/ de phyir gsang sngags ngo shes bya// dbus na ya gnas yi dwags chen po'i// phyi na bcu drug gnas pa ni// lha srin sde brgyad yum dang bcas// de la bcu drug dag tu 'dod// yang na las kyi gshin rje brgyad du 'dod// de yi chung ma brgyad dang bcu drug

'dod// yang na ging chen brgyad dang chung mar bcas// gang ltar byas kyang dregs pa brgyad// de phyir las mkhan zhes su grags// de la dbus kyi yi dwags chen po yi// phyogs dang mtshams su phar 'phros pas// ya nas yar bskyal ya brgyad la// 'jam dbyangs khro bos ya brgyad mnan// phar la bskul zhing tshur la bsdus// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin no// dri za lha min nam mkha' lding// mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye'o// phyi ltar bltas na de ltar snang ba'o// srin po ma mo bdud dang ni// gshin rje rgyal 'gong btsan dang ni// klu srin bgegs chen 'byung po brgyad// nang ltar de tshul grags pa yin// chos kyi rgyal po ya ba ti// glang mgo tel pa phya sangs dang// ral pa tshar dgu smigs pa dang// myos byed 'bar ba brgyad du bstan// badzra zhing dang badzra sa// badzra lhun po badzra sbyin pa dang// badzra tri 'dzin badzra kun sdud dang// badzra nyes sel badzra gnas med do// ging du grags pa de kho na// de rnams las mkhan yin par gcig/ phar la las byed gshin rje pho mo yin// bsgo ba'i las byed dgug pa'o// a mu ka spram ya hUM ma ra shrI kra ma nA sha ya hUM phaT/ a mu kaM rak+ta tsa ra ya hUM mA ra ya shrI traM nA sha ya hUM phaT/ a ka mu ra tsa ya hUM/ mar shrI kri nA sha ya hUM phaT/ a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM/ ma ra shrI k+ShaM/ nA sha ya hUM phaT/ las rnams ma lus byed pa yang// mgo 'khor byed dang khrag skyugs byed// yid myos brgyal dang gsod par byed// mgo bo 'khor te la 'ur bsad// khrag tu skyugs te la 'ur bsad// yid myos byas te la 'ur bsad/ bsad pa yid kyis la 'ur bsad// nyid bzhis gsad pa'i las de bya// yang de 'di la bzlas par bya// oM hrIHSh+t+rIHbi kr-i tA na na tsit+ta la rak+ta ka spram ya hUM phaT/ oM shrI pri ti ma na tsi ba ma tsa ta pa tsa ha na pha rak+ta tsa ra ya hUM phaT/ oM an+d+ha ne ta na bla a mo ka tsi ta ti ta ya mur tsa pa hUM phaT/ oM ya ma d+he d+he pa ta dum tsa ta mA ra shrI ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ de yang bzhi ru bzlas pas nub/ hUM ya ma rA ya hUM phaT/ hUM ya ma be mA sha ya hUM phaT/ hUM ya ma snying ta mA ra ya phaT/ la ya dza dza hUM hUM/ las kyi gzer du bsngags pa yang// de ltar bu dag bzlas pa yang// de ltar 'khor lo'i sngags las gzhan pa med/ de la 'dus pa de ltar rtsa ba'i 'dus pa yin/ oM many+dzu shrI ya mAn ta ka u tsu sa ma kro ta be ta li/ oM bi kri shrI rak+sha hUM dzA dz+h+ya/ snying kha rag mo snying rtsa rtsa ma b+h+yo/ khrag la mu sha ma b+h+yo/ nag po gting maM maM b+h+yo/ nag po snying ta ra la rag mo b+h+yo/ dum bum ra dum tsi ta ra dum bu khrag tu skyugs kha kha thun/ sa thums ma tsi nu nu na ya rbad rbad/ de ltar be tA nag mo la// sngags de bzlas pas brdeg pa yang/ skabs dang sbyar te bzlas par bya'o// de ltar man ngag can gyis shes par bya// oM

shrI many+dzu badzra kro ta dwi pa ta tsakra/ oM badzra swA hA hUM hrI phur phur phur phu hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI ya ya/ sarba bi g+hA nAn baM hUM hUM shrI pa tsa hUM phaT/ 'jam dbyangs nag po'i bca' gzhi ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// las rnams mi 'grub gcig kyang med// 'di la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas// byang chub 'di don gnyis ka grub// des bstan drug rim gsal bas snang// nag po'i sngags rnams shes par spyod// le'u ste drug pa'o//// yang de 'jam dbyangs nag po yi// sngags rnams bsten pa de la ni// 'khor rnams mi bsrun gang yin dang// las rnams ji ltar bya ba ni// bsal ba dag tu bsten pa yis// de la 'di yi gnas skabs su// gnas dang dus dang maN+Dal rdzas// dgongs pa sgrub dang rdeg pa yang// mtshan ma grol dus mnan pa'o// don bcu tshang bar byed dgos te// rgyud gzhan kun nas zhib par bstan// 'dir ni sngags rnams rgyun tu gsungs/ le'u ste bdun pa zhes bya'o//// lho phyogs gshin yul dme nag tu// 'jam dpal khros pa gshin rje'i gshed// 'chi bdag bshan pa'i tshogs rnams la// zhe sdang rab 'dul drag sngags rgyud// rtsod dus bstan pa mar 'grib la// 'byung ba yin gyis gzhan du min// zhal gsum mthing nag drag po'i sku// ro langs sras mchog yab yum bzhi// bsgom pa yin gyi gzhan du min// rtsa gsum rtsa bzhi bcu gcig dang// bcu gnyis dgu dang bdun du bstan// rgyun du gnyis med re ti stong// 'jig rten pho mo'i srog tu bstan// bsnyen pa dang ni nye ba'i mchog/ dam pa yin nam zer ba'i mchog/ shes pa nyams su blangs pa'i mchog/ dpal gshin rje'i gshed pos gsungs pa/ gdug pa gtan nas rlag pa la 'khor rnams yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// gsang ba sngags kyi rgyud las phyi ma'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so//// gnubs pad+ma dbang rgyal gyis thugs kyi brnag pa'o//// ya ma rA dza khros pa'i rgyud do//
